0.pun_sentence: The cobbler was asked how many shoes he had soled by a well.

meaning_1.description: The bottom of a shoe; also refers to the action of repairing or providing a new bottom part for a shoe.

translations.de: Der Schuster wurde gefragt, wie viele Schuhe er an einem Brunnen besohlt hatte.
translations.fr: Le cordonnier a été interrogé sur le nombre de chaussures qu'il avait ressemelées près d'un puits.
translations.ko: 신발장이가 우물 옆에서 얼마나 많은 신발을 창을 갈았는지 물어보았다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The cobbler was asked how many shoes he had soled by a well.

meaning_2.description: To give something in exchange for money.

translations.de: Der Schuster wurde gefragt, wie viele Schuhe er an einem Brunnen verkauft hatte.
translations.fr: Le cordonnier a été interrogé sur le nombre de chaussures qu'il avait vendu près d'un puits.
translations.ko: 신발장이가 우물 옆에서 얼마나 많은 신발을 팔았는지 물어봤습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The cobbler was asked how many shoes he had sell by a well.

1.pun_sentence: A busy barber is quite harried.

meaning_1.description: Feeling stressed or harassed, usually because of excessive pressure or demands

translations.de: Ein beschäftigter Barbier ist ziemlich gestresst.
translations.fr: Un barbier occupé est assez harcelé.
translations.ko: 바쁜 이발사는 굉장히 스트레스 받고 있다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A busy barber is quite harried.

meaning_2.description: Having a lot of hair, especially in regards to the body.

translations.de: Ein beschäftigter Barbier ist ziemlich haarig.
translations.fr: Un barbier occupé est plutôt poilu.
translations.ko: 바쁜 이발사는 꽤 털이 많습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A busy barber is quite hairy.

2.pun_sentence: Two construction workers had a stairing contest.

meaning_1.description: A series of steps for climbing up or down, typically inside a building.

translations.de: Zwei Bauarbeiter hatten einen Treppenstarren-Wettbewerb.
translations.fr: Deux ouvriers du bâtiment ont eu un concours de regards sur les escaliers.
translations.ko: 두 명의 건설 노동자가 계단을 바라보는 대회를 가졌다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Two construction workers had a stairing contest.

meaning_2.description: To look fixedly or vacantly at someone or something with eyes wide open.

translations.de: Zwei Bauarbeiter hatten einen Starren-Wettbewerb.
translations.fr: Deux ouvriers du bâtiment ont eu un concours de regard fixe.
translations.ko: 두 명의 건설 노동자가 빤히 쳐다보기 대회를 가졌습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Two construction workers had a staring contest.

3.pun_sentence: The ultimate liquid measure is the supreme quart.

meaning_1.description: A unit of liquid capacity equal to a quarter of a gallon or two pints.

translations.de: Das höchste Flüssigkeitsmaß ist das oberste Quart.
translations.fr: La mesure de liquide ultime est le quart suprême.
translations.ko: 최고의 액체 측정 단위는 최고의 쿼트입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The ultimate liquid measure is the supreme quart.

meaning_2.description: A body of people presided over by a judge, judges, or magistrate, and acting as a tribunal in civil and criminal cases.

translations.de: Das ultimative Flüssigkeitsmaß ist der Oberste Gerichtshof.
translations.fr: La mesure liquide ultime est la cour suprême.
translations.ko: 궁극적인 액체 측정 기준은 대법원입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The ultimate liquid measure is the supreme court.

4.pun_sentence: Yesterday I accidentally swallowed some food coloring. The doctor says I'm OK, but I feel like I've dyed a little inside.

meaning_1.description: To change the color of something using a special solution, often used for fabrics or hair.

translations.de: Gestern habe ich versehentlich etwas Lebensmittelfarbe geschluckt. Der Arzt sagt, es geht mir gut, aber ich habe das Gefühl, ich habe mich innerlich etwas gefärbt.
translations.fr: Hier, j'ai accidentellement avalé un peu de colorant alimentaire. Le médecin dit que je vais bien, mais j'ai l'impression d'avoir un peu teinté à l'intérieur.
translations.ko: 어제 저는 실수로 식품 색소를 삼켰습니다. 의사는 저가 괜찮다고 하지만, 내부적으로 조금 물들었는듯한 느낌이 듭니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Yesterday I accidentally swallowed some food coloring. The doctor says I'm OK, but I feel like I've dyed a little inside.

meaning_2.description: To cease living; to expire or perish.

translations.de: Gestern habe ich versehentlich etwas Lebensmittelfarbe geschluckt. Der Arzt sagt, ich bin in Ordnung, aber ich fühle mich, als wäre ich ein wenig innerlich gestorben.
translations.fr: Hier, j'ai accidentellement avalé un peu de colorant alimentaire. Le médecin dit que je vais bien, mais j'ai l'impression d'être un peu mort à l'intérieur.
translations.ko: 어제 제가 실수로 식품 색소를 삼켰습니다. 의사는 저가 괜찮다고 하지만, 제가 내면에서 조금 죽은 것 같은 느낌이 듭니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Yesterday I accidentally swallowed some food coloring. The doctor says I'm OK, but I feel like I've died a little inside.

meaning_1.description: To be aware of through observation, inquiry, or information.

translations.de: Folgen Sie Ihrem Wissen.
translations.fr: Suivez vos connaissances.
translations.ko: 당신이 알고 있는 것을 따르십시오.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Follow your knows.

meaning_2.description: The organ of the face used for smelling and breathing.

translations.de: Folge deiner Nase.
translations.fr: Suivez votre nez.
translations.ko: 코를 따라가세요.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Follow your nose.

6.pun_sentence: A china doll was marked in tiny letters : 'maid in USA'.

meaning_1.description: A young, unmarried woman, often referring specifically to a servant or domestic help.

translations.de: Eine Porzellanpuppe war mit winzigen Buchstaben gekennzeichnet: ' Dienstmädchen in den USA '.
translations.fr: Une poupée de porcelaine était marquée en petites lettres : ' jeune fille non mariée aux USA '.
translations.ko: 중국 인형에는 작은 글자로 '미국에서 미혼 여성'이라고 적혀 있었다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A china doll was marked in tiny letters : 'maid in USA'.

meaning_2.description: To have been manufactured or produced, typically referring to the origin of a product.

translations.de: Eine Porzellanpuppe war mit kleinen Buchstaben gekennzeichnet: 'Hergestellt in den USA'.
translations.fr: Une poupée de porcelaine était marquée de petites lettres: 'fabriqué aux USA'.
translations.ko: 중국 인형에는 작은 글자로 '미국 제조'라고 표시되어 있었다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A china doll was marked in tiny letters: 'made in USA'.

7.pun_sentence: I deny everything, said Tom knowingly.

meaning_1.description: To be aware of the truth or factuality of a situation or statement.

translations.de: "Ich leugne alles", sagte Tom wissentlich.
translations.fr: "Je nie tout", a déclaré Tom en connaissance de cause.
translations.ko: "나는 모든 것을 부인합니다,"라고 톰은 실상을 알고 말했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I deny everything, said Tom knowingly.

meaning_2.description: An expression of disagreement or refusal.

translations.de: "Ich leugne alles," sagte Tom, nein.
translations.fr: "Je nie tout," a dit Tom, non.
translations.ko: "나는 모든 것을 부인한다,"라고 톰이 말했다, 아니.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I deny everything, said Tom no.

8.pun_sentence: The key to changing your performance ability is by tuning out criticism and staying musically octave.

meaning_1.description: An octave refers to a series of eight notes in a musical scale.

translations.de: Der Schlüssel zur Verbesserung Ihrer Leistungsfähigkeit besteht darin, Kritik auszublenden und musikalisch Oktave zu bleiben.
translations.fr: La clé pour changer votre capacité de performance est de faire abstraction des critiques et de rester musicalement octave.
translations.ko: 귀하의 성능 능력을 바꾸는 핵심은 비판을 무시하고 음악적으로 옥타브를 유지하는 것입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The key to changing your performance ability is by tuning out criticism and staying musically octave.

meaning_2.description: If someone is 'active' it means they are engaging or participating regularly.

translations.de: Der Schlüssel zur Verbesserung Ihrer Leistungsfähigkeit besteht darin, Kritik zu ignorieren und musikalisch aktiv zu bleiben.
translations.fr: La clé pour améliorer votre capacité de performance est d'ignorer les critiques et de rester musicalement actif.
translations.ko: 성능 능력을 바꾸는 열쇠는 비판을 무시하고 음악적으로 활동하는 것입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The key to changing your performance ability is by tuning out criticism and staying musically active.

9.pun_sentence: 'I've stuck a pin through my nose,' said Tom punctually.

meaning_1.description: Being on time or precise; not delayed.

translations.de: "Ich habe eine Stecknadel durch meine Nase gesteckt", sagte Tom pünktlich.
translations.fr: 'J'ai enfoncé une épingle dans mon nez,' dit Tom ponctuellement.
translations.ko: "나는 내 코를 뚫었습니다," 톰이 정시에 말했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: 'I've stuck a pin through my nose,' said Tom punctually.

meaning_2.description: To make a hole with a pointed object, like a pin.

translations.de: "Ich habe eine Nadel durch meine Nase gesteckt," sagte Tom, Durchstechen.
translations.fr: "J'ai enfoncé une épingle dans mon nez," a déclaré Tom, perforation.
translations.ko: "나는 내 코를 핀으로 찔렀어,"라고 톰이 말했다, 찌르다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: "I've stuck a pin through my nose," said Tom puncture.

10.pun_sentence: We welcome you with open psalms.

meaning_1.description: A sacred song or hymn, in particular any of those contained in the biblical Book of Psalms.

translations.de: Wir heißen Sie mit offenen Psalmen willkommen.
translations.fr: Nous vous accueillons à bras ouverts avec des psaumes.
translations.ko: 우리는 열린 시편으로 여러분을 환영합니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: We welcome you with open psalms.

meaning_2.description: The part extending from the shoulder to the wrist on the human body.

translations.de: Wir heißen Sie mit offenen Armen willkommen.
translations.fr: Nous vous accueillons à bras ouverts.
translations.ko: 우리는 팔을 벌려 당신을 환영합니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: We welcome you with open arms.

11.pun_sentence: Diets are for people who are thick and tired of it all.

meaning_1.description: In this context, 'thick' is referring to being overweight or having excess body weight.

translations.de: Diäten sind für Menschen, die dick sind und von allem müde sind.
translations.fr: Les régimes sont pour les personnes qui sont grosses et fatiguées de tout.
translations.ko: 다이어트는 뚱뚱하고 모든 것에 지친 사람들을 위한 것입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Diets are for people who are thick and tired of it all.

meaning_2.description: 'Sick' in this context refers to being fed up or thoroughly exhausted.

translations.de: Diäten sind für Leute, die von allem genervt und müde sind.
translations.fr: Les régimes sont pour les personnes qui en ont marre de tout.
translations.ko: 다이어트는 모든 것에 지치고 싫증난 사람들을 위한 것입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Diets are for people who are sick and tired of it all.

12.pun_sentence: 'I'm halfway up a mountain,' Tom alleged.

meaning_1.description: To assert or claim without providing concrete proof or evidence.

translations.de: "Ich bin auf halbem Weg einen Berg hinauf", behauptete Tom.
translations.fr: "Je suis à mi-chemin d'une montagne", a prétendu Tom.
translations.ko: "나는 산의 중간까지 올라왔다,"라고 톰이 주장했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: 'I'm halfway up a mountain,' Tom alleged.

meaning_2.description: A ledge refers to a narrow, horizontal surface or shelf, often found on the side of a mountain or cliff.

translations.de: "Ich bin auf halbem Weg eines Berges," führte Tom auf einem Vorsprung.
translations.fr: "Je suis à mi-chemin d'une montagne," dit Tom sur une corniche.
translations.ko: "나는 산의 절반까지 올라왔어," 톰이 절벽에서 말했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: "I'm halfway up a mountain," Tom ledged.

13.pun_sentence: They won't stay at friendly hotels, because they're hostel people.

meaning_1.description: A hostel is a budget accommodation where people can rent a bed, usually a bunk bed, in a dormitory and share a bathroom, lounge, and sometimes a kitchen.

translations.de: Sie werden nicht in freundlichen Hotels übernachten, weil sie Herbergsleute sind.
translations.fr: Ils ne resteront pas dans des hôtels accueillants, car ce sont des gens d'auberge.
translations.ko: 그들은 친절한 호텔에 머무르지 않을 것입니다, 왜냐하면 그들은 호스텔 사람들이기 때문입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: They won't stay at friendly hotels, because they're hostel people.

meaning_2.description: Hostile refers to the state of being unfriendly or antagonistic.

translations.de: Sie werden nicht in freundlichen Hotels übernachten, weil sie feindselige Leute sind.
translations.fr: Ils ne resteront pas dans des hôtels amicaux, parce qu'ils sont des gens hostiles.
translations.ko: 그들은 친절한 호텔에 머무르지 않을 것입니다, 왜냐하면 그들은 적대적인 사람들이기 때문입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: They won't stay at friendly hotels, because they're hostile people.

14.pun_sentence: Let's all play an A, a C sharp, and an E, cried Tom's band with one accord.

meaning_1.description: Agreement or harmony between people or groups.

translations.de: Lassen Sie uns alle ein A, ein Cis und ein E spielen, schrie Toms Band einstimmig.
translations.fr: Jouons tous un A, un C dièse, et un E, cria le groupe de Tom d'un accord commun.
translations.ko: 모두가 A, C♯, 및 E를 연주하자, 톰의 밴드가 일치하여 외쳤다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Let's all play an A, a C sharp, and an E, cried Tom's band with one accord.

meaning_2.description: A group of (typically three or more) notes sounded together, as a basis of harmony.

translations.de: Lass uns alle ein A, ein Cis und ein E spielen, rief Toms Band mit einem einzigen Akkord.
translations.fr: Jouons tous un La, un Do dièse et un Mi, s'écria le groupe de Tom avec un seul accord.
translations.ko: 모두 A, C#, E를 연주하자고 Tom의 밴드가 한 음색으로 외쳤다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Let's all play an A, a C sharp, and an E, cried Tom's band with one chord.

15.pun_sentence: The young pine sapling was admonished by his father. Apparently he'd been knotty.

meaning_1.description: Having a lot of knots. Referring to the natural raised bumps in wood.

translations.de: Der junge Kiefernsämling wurde von seinem Vater getadelt. Anscheinend war er knotig gewesen.
translations.fr: Le jeune plant de pin a été admonesté par son père. Apparemment, il avait été noueux.
translations.ko: 어린 소나무 묘목이 그의 아버지에게 경고를 받았습니다. 명백히 그는 많은 knots를 가지고 있었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The young pine sapling was admonished by his father. Apparently he'd been knotty.

meaning_2.description: Behaving disobediently or mischievously.

translations.de: Die junge Kiefernsämling wurde von seinem Vater ermahnt. Anscheinend war er ungezogen gewesen.
translations.fr: Le jeune plant de pin a été réprimandé par son père. Apparemment, il avait été désobéissant.
translations.ko: 어린 소나무 묘목이 아버지에게 꾸짖음을 받았습니다. 분명히 그는 말을 안 들었던 것 같습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The young pine sapling was admonished by his father. Apparently he'd been naughty.

16.pun_sentence: I've been to a film festival in the South of France, said Tom cannily.

meaning_1.description: Acting in a shrewd, intricate, or secretive manner

translations.de: Ich war auf einem Filmfestival in Südfrankreich, sagte Tom schlau.
translations.fr: J'ai été à un festival de cinéma dans le sud de la France, dit Tom astucieusement.
translations.ko: 나는 프랑스 남부의 영화 축제에 갔었다고 톰이 교묘하게 말했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I've been to a film festival in the South of France, said Tom cannily.

meaning_2.description: Cannes refers to a city in the South of France, internationally known for its annual film festival, le Festival de Cannes.

translations.de: Ich war auf einem Filmfestival in Südfrankreich, sagte Tom Cannes.
translations.fr: J'ai été à un festival de film dans le Sud de la France, a dit Tom Cannes.
translations.ko: 나는 프랑스 남부의 영화제에 다녀왔어, 톰 칸느라고 말했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I've been to a film festival in the South of France, said Tom Cannes.

17.pun_sentence: A music store was robbed. The thief made away with the lute.

meaning_1.description: A lute is a stringed musical instrument, similar to a guitar, that has a body shaped like a pear.

translations.de: Ein Musikgeschäft wurde ausgeraubt. Der Dieb machte sich mit der Laute davon.
translations.fr: Un magasin de musique a été cambriolé. Le voleur a emporté le luth.
translations.ko: 음악 상점이 털렸습니다. 도둑은 라우트를 가지고 도망쳤습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A music store was robbed. The thief made away with the lute.

meaning_2.description: "Loot" is a term used to describe goods stolen during a robbery or theft.

translations.de: Ein Musikgeschäft wurde ausgeraubt. Der Dieb machte sich mit der Beute davon.
translations.fr: Un magasin de musique a été cambriolé. Le voleur s'est enfui avec le butin.
translations.ko: 음악 상점이 털렸다. 도둑은 노략한 물건들을 가지고 도망갔다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A music store was robbed. The thief made away with the loot.

18.pun_sentence: He threw jello at his wife, who had him arrested for carrying a congealed weapon.

meaning_1.description: To solidify or become semi-solid, as a liquid does when cooled or a gel when set.

translations.de: Er warf Wackelpudding auf seine Frau, die ihn wegen des Tragens einer erstarrten Waffe verhaften ließ.
translations.fr: Il a lancé de la gelée à sa femme, qui l'a fait arrêter pour port d'arme congelée.
translations.ko: 그는 아내에게 젤리를 던졌고, 아내는 그를 응고된 무기를 소지하고 있다는 이유로 체포했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: He threw jello at his wife, who had him arrested for carrying a congealed weapon.

meaning_2.description: Hidden or kept out of sight.

translations.de: Er warf Wackelpudding auf seine Frau, die ihn wegen des Tragens einer verborgenen Waffe verhaften ließ.
translations.fr: Il a jeté du jello sur sa femme, qui l'a fait arrêter pour port d'arme cachée.
translations.ko: 그는 아내에게 젤리를 던졌고, 그녀는 그를 숨겨진 무기를 소지하고 있다는 이유로 체포했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: He threw jello at his wife, who had him arrested for carrying a concealed weapon.

19.pun_sentence: 'Be still my hart' she murmured, thinking how magnificent and stag-like he was.

meaning_1.description: A male deer, particularly one over five years old.

translations.de: "Sei still, mein Hirsch", murmelte sie und dachte darüber nach, wie prächtig und hirschähnlich er war.
translations.fr: "Sois calme mon cerf," murmura-t-elle, pensant à combien il était magnifique et ressemblait à un cerf.
translations.ko: "내 사슴아, 조용히 있어라," 그녀가 중얼거리며 그가 얼마나 웅장하고 수사슴 같은지 생각했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: 'Be still my hart' she murmured, thinking how magnificent and stag-like he was.

meaning_2.description: The organ that pumps blood through the body, often used metaphorically to represent one's emotions, courage, or enthusiasm.

translations.de: "Beruhige dich, mein Herz", murmelte sie und dachte, wie prächtig und hirschartig er war.
translations.fr: "Reste calme mon cœur" murmura-t-elle, pensant à quel point il était magnifique et semblable à un cerf.
translations.ko: "내 마음아, 조용히 해라" 그녀는 속삭였다, 그가 얼마나 웅장하고 사슴 같은지 생각하면서.

heterographic.pun_sentence: "Be still my heart" she murmured, thinking how magnificent and stag-like he was.

20.pun_sentence: Yesterday a cow saved my life - it was bovine intervention.

meaning_1.description: Pertaining to cows or cattle.

translations.de: Gestern hat eine Kuh mein Leben gerettet - es war eine bovine Intervention.
translations.fr: Hier, une vache a sauvé ma vie - c'était une intervention bovine.
translations.ko: 어제 한 마리의 소가 나의 생명을 구했다 - 그것은 소에 관한 개입이었다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Yesterday a cow saved my life - it was bovine intervention.

meaning_2.description: Of, from, or like God or a god.

translations.de: Gestern hat eine Kuh mein Leben gerettet - es war göttliche Intervention.
translations.fr: Hier, une vache a sauvé ma vie - c'était une intervention divine.
translations.ko: 어제 소가 제 목숨을 구했습니다 - 그것은 신의 개입이었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Yesterday a cow saved my life - it was divine intervention.

21.pun_sentence: Fashion is something that goes in one era and out the other.

meaning_1.description: A specific period of time in history or a person's life.

translations.de: Mode ist etwas, das in einer Ära hineingeht und aus der anderen herauskommt.
translations.fr: La mode est quelque chose qui entre dans une époque et sort de l'autre.
translations.ko: 패션은 한 시대에 들어가고 다른 시대에서 나오는 것입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Fashion is something that goes in one era and out the other.

meaning_2.description: The organ of hearing and balance in humans and other vertebrates.

translations.de: Mode ist etwas, das ins eine Ohr hineingeht und aus dem anderen herauskommt.
translations.fr: La mode est quelque chose qui entre par une oreille et sort par l'autre.
translations.ko: 패션은 한 귀로 들어가서 다른 귀로 나오는 것입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Fashion is something that goes in one ear and out the other.

22.pun_sentence: It's between my sole and my heel, said Tom archly.

meaning_1.description: To behave or speak in a playful, mischievous, or teasing manner.

translations.de: Es liegt zwischen meiner Sohle und meiner Ferse, sagte Tom schelmisch.
translations.fr: C'est entre ma semelle et mon talon, dit Tom avec malice.

meaning_1.description: Sagely means wisely or judiciously.

translations.fr: "Je sais quelle herbe serait agréable avec ça," dit Tom sagement.

90.pun_sentence: An heir is someone with a descent wage.

heterographic.pun_sentence: An heir is someone with a descent wage.

91.pun_sentence: Those who have icicles keep a stiff upper drip.

92.pun_sentence: I learned that the antelopes were coming when I heard the gnus.

meaning_1.description: A large dark African antelope with a long head, a beard and mane, and a sloping back.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I learned that the antelopes were coming when I heard the gnus.

translations.fr: J'ai appris que les antilopes arrivaient quand j'ai entendu la nouvelle.
translations.ko: 나는 뉴스를 들었을 때 안틸로프들이 오고 있다는 것을 알게 되었습니다.

93.pun_sentence: A paramedic got a new job as a chauffeur : an ambiance driver.

meaning_1.description: Ambiance refers to a particular environment or surrounding atmosphere.

94.pun_sentence: After the sniper attack at the symphony softball game, there were no men left on bass.

meaning_1.description: A range of male vocals which is lowest in pitch.

translations.ko: 교향곡 소프트볼 게임에서의 저격수 공격 이후에는 베이스에서 가장 낮은 음역대의 남성 보이스가 남아있지 않았습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: After the sniper attack at the symphony softball game, there were no men left on bass.

meaning_2.description: In softball or baseball, a base is one of four points that must be touched by a player in order to score a run.

translations.de: Nach dem Scharfschützenangriff beim Symphonie-Softballspiel waren keine Männer mehr auf der Base.

heterographic.pun_sentence: After the sniper attack at the symphony softball game, there were no men left on base.

95.pun_sentence: OLD CHINESE COOKS never die, they just wok away.

meaning_1.description: A wok is a versatile round-bottomed cooking pan, originating from China. In this context, it's used as a verb which doesn't make sense literally but is used to create a pun.

translations.de: Alte chinesische Köche sterben nie, sie gehen einfach im Wok weg.
translations.fr: Les vieux cuisiniers chinois ne meurent jamais, ils s'éloignent simplement en wok.
translations.ko: 노인 중국 요리사는 결코 죽지 않습니다, 그들은 그냥 왁으로 멀어집니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: OLD CHINESE COOKS never die, they just wok away.

meaning_2.description: To move on foot at a normal pace including advancing by steps.

translations.fr: Les vieux cuisiniers chinois ne meurent jamais, ils s'éloignent simplement à pied.
translations.ko: 노인 중국 요리사는 결코 죽지 않아, 그들은 그저 걸어서 떠나가.

heterographic.pun_sentence: OLD CHINESE COOKS never die, they just walk away.

96.pun_sentence: The ailing king of the doves sensed an imminent coup.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The ailing king of the doves sensed an imminent coup.

meaning_2.description: A soft, murmuring sound made by a bird (specifically a pigeon or dove)

translations.fr: Le roi malade des pigeons a détecté un roucoulement imminent.
translations.ko: 아픈 비둘기의 왕이 임박한 구구 구짖음을 감지했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The ailing king of the doves sensed an imminent coo.

97.pun_sentence: OLD SAILORS never die, they just lose their porpoise.

meaning_1.description: A small cetacean mammal, closely related to dolphins and whales.

translations.fr: Les vieux marins ne meurent jamais, ils perdent simplement leur marsouin.
translations.ko: 늙은 선원들은 결코 죽지 않습니다, 그들은 그냥 그들의 바다돼지를 잃어버립니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: OLD SAILORS never die, they just lose their porpoise.

meaning_2.description: The reason for which something is done or created or for which something exists.

98.pun_sentence: If you ride a bus you have to pay your fare share.

heterographic.pun_sentence: If you ride a bus you have to pay your fair share.

99.pun_sentence: If you work in a bakery, you may have to take on many roles.

meaning_1.description: A part or character someone portrays or the function performed by a particular person in a particular context.

meaning_2.description: A round piece of bread.

translations.fr: Si vous travaillez dans une boulangerie, vous devrez peut-être prendre en charge de nombreux pains ronds.

100.pun_sentence: My wife uses a kitchen implement to shred garlic and parmesan cheese, which I hate. It really is the grater of two evils.

translations.fr: Ma femme utilise un ustensile de cuisine pour râper l'ail et le parmesan, que je déteste. C'est vraiment le plus grand des deux maux.
translations.ko: 나의 아내는 마늘과 파르메산 치즈를 갈기 위해 부엌 기구를 사용하는데, 나는 그것을 싫어한다. 그것은 정말 두 악 중 큰 악이다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: My wife uses a kitchen implement to shred garlic and parmesan cheese, which I hate. It really is the grater of two evils.

translations.fr: Ma femme utilise un ustensile de cuisine pour râper l'ail et le parmesan, que je déteste. C'est vraiment le plus grand de deux maux.
translations.ko: 나의 아내는 마늘과 파르마산 치즈를 갈기 위해 주방 도구를 사용하는데, 이것은 나에게 정말로 두 가지 악에서 더 큰 것입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: My wife uses a kitchen implement to shred garlic and parmesan cheese, which I hate. It really is the greater of two evils.

101.pun_sentence: Chickens can give some people a foul rash.

meaning_2.description: A bird that is kept for its meat and eggs, such as a chicken, turkey, duck, or goose.

102.pun_sentence: Everybody was in shock when the hair stylist dyed.

translations.ko: 미용사가 죽었을 때 모두가 충격을 받았습니다.

103.pun_sentence: Qwertyus, god of keyboards, is a character from geek mythology.

meaning_1.description: An enthusiast or expert especially in a technological field or activity such as computers or digital technology.

translations.de: Qwertyus, Gott der Tastaturen, ist eine Figur aus der Geek-Mythologie.
translations.fr: Qwertyus, dieu des claviers, est un personnage de la mythologie geek.

meaning_2.description: Pertaining to Greece, a country in southeastern Europe known for its rich ancient cultural heritage.

104.pun_sentence: Businesses selling pleasure boats often have a sail.

meaning_1.description: A sheet of fabric attached to a boat and used to catch the wind to propel the boat forward.

meaning_2.description: An event or period during which a retailer reduces the prices of its goods for a short period.

translations.ko: 쾌락용 보트를 판매하는 기업들은 종종 세일을 합니다.

105.pun_sentence: Wheaties near the body suggested that police look for a cereal killer.

meaning_1.description: A type of grain used for food, which is often used in breakfast products such as Wheaties.

translations.de: Weizen-Frühstückszerealien in der Nähe der Leiche ließen die Polizei nach einem Getreidemörder suchen.
translations.fr: Les Wheaties près du corps ont suggéré à la police de chercher un tueur de céréales.
translations.ko: 시체 근처의 휘티즈는 경찰이 시리얼 살인범을 찾아보도록 제안했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Wheaties near the body suggested that police look for a cereal killer.

meaning_2.description: Pertaining to a person who commits multiple murders over a period of time, often with a consistent pattern or behavior.

translations.de: Wheaties in der Nähe des Körpers legten nahe, dass die Polizei nach einem Serienmörder suchen sollte.
translations.fr: Des paquets de Wheaties près du corps ont suggéré à la police de chercher un tueur en série.
translations.ko: 시체 근처의 휘티즈는 경찰이 연쇄 살인범을 찾아보라는 제안을 하였다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Wheaties near the body suggested that police look for a serial killer.

106.pun_sentence: OLD DOCTORS never die they just lose their patience.

meaning_1.description: The ability to accept or tolerate delays, problems, or suffering without becoming annoyed or anxious.

translations.de: Alte Ärzte sterben nie, sie verlieren einfach ihre Geduld.
translations.fr: Les vieux docteurs ne meurent jamais, ils perdent simplement leur patience.
translations.ko: 늙은 의사들은 결코 죽지 않습니다, 그들은 그저 참을성을 잃을 뿐입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: OLD DOCTORS never die they just lose their patience.

meaning_2.description: A person receiving or registered to receive medical treatment.

translations.de: Alte Ärzte sterben nie, sie verlieren nur ihre Patienten.
translations.fr: Les vieux médecins ne meurent jamais, ils perdent juste leurs patients.
translations.ko: 노인 의사들은 결코 죽지 않습니다, 그들은 그저 그들의 환자를 잃어버립니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: OLD DOCTORS never die they just lose their patient.

107.pun_sentence: The thief broke into the music store and stole the lute.

meaning_1.description: A lute is a stringed musical instrument, similar to a guitar, but with a longer neck and a pear-shaped body.

translations.de: Der Dieb brach in den Musikladen ein und stahl die Laute.
translations.fr: Le voleur a cambriolé le magasin de musique et a volé le luth.
translations.ko: 도둑이 음악 상점을 털고 류트를 훔쳤습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The thief broke into the music store and stole the lute.

meaning_2.description: Loot, in this context, refers to goods, especially private property, taken from an enemy in war or valuables stolen during a robbery.

translations.de: Der Dieb brach in das Musikgeschäft ein und stahl die Beute.
translations.fr: Le voleur a cambriolé le magasin de musique et a volé le butin.
translations.ko: 도둑이 음악 상점을 털어서 노획물을 훔쳤습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The thief broke into the music store and stole the loot.

108.pun_sentence: The invisible cows were herd but not seen.

meaning_1.description: To perceive a sound, typically that made by cows. It is used here as a homophone pun for the word "heard".

translations.de: Die unsichtbaren Kühe wurden gehört, aber nicht gesehen.
translations.fr: Les vaches invisibles ont été entendues mais pas vues.
translations.ko: 보이지 않는 소들은 들렸지만 보이지 않았다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The invisible cows were herd but not seen.

meaning_2.description: It refers to perceiving with the ear the sound made by (someone or something).

translations.de: Die unsichtbaren Kühe wurden gehört, aber nicht gesehen.
translations.fr: Les vaches invisibles étaient entendues mais pas vues.
translations.ko: 보이지 않는 소들은 들렸지만 보이지 않았습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The invisible cows were hear but not seen.

109.pun_sentence: The overweight fighter pilot was grounded for violating the rules of engorgement.

meaning_1.description: The state of being full to overflowing, often describing when something is excessively filled with blood, fluid, or food.

translations.de: Der übergewichtige Kampfpilot wurde wegen Verstoßes gegen die Regeln der Überfüllung am Boden gehalten.
translations.fr: Le pilote de chasse en surpoids a été cloué au sol pour avoir enfreint les règles de l'engorgement.
translations.ko: 과체중인 전투기 조종사는 과다 충혈의 규칙을 위반하여 지상에 머물렀습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The overweight fighter pilot was grounded for violating the rules of engorgement.

meaning_2.description: In this context, engagement means a military term referring to situations or actions where the enemy is directly confronted.

translations.de: Der übergewichtige Kampfpilot wurde wegen Verstoßes gegen die Einsatzregeln am Boden gehalten.
translations.fr: Le pilote de chasse en surpoids a été mis à terre pour avoir enfreint les règles d'engagement.
translations.ko: 체중 초과한 전투 파일럿은 교전 규칙을 위반하여 땅에 묶였다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The overweight fighter pilot was grounded for violating the rules of engagement.

110.pun_sentence: This is what I have learned off by heart Tom wrote.

meaning_1.description: To form letters or words by inscribing them on a surface, especially paper, with a pen, pencil, or other writing tool.

translations.de: Dies ist, was ich auswendig gelernt habe, schrieb Tom.
translations.fr: Voici ce que j'ai appris par cœur, a écrit Tom.
translations.ko: 이것은 톰이 쓴 것 중에 제가 외워둔 것입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: This is what I have learned off by heart Tom wrote.

meaning_2.description: Memorization based on repetition, often without an understanding of the reasoning or meaning behind it.

translations.de: Dies ist was ich auswendig gelernt habe, Tom durch Wiederholung.
translations.fr: C'est ce que j'ai appris par coeur, Tom par répétition.
translations.ko: 이것은 내가 외웠던 것입니다, 톰은 반복적으로 외웠습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: This is what I have learned off by heart Tom rote.

meaning_1.description: To act in a deeply respectful and religiously devout manner.

translations.de: '3.14159265,' sagte Tom fromm.
translations.fr: '3.14159265,' a déclaré Tom avec piété.

heterographic.pun_sentence: '3.14159265,' Tom said piously.

meaning_2.description: A mathematical constant symbolizing the ratio of a circle's circumference to its diameter, approximately equal to '3.14159265'.

112.pun_sentence: The geologist went to the doctor because he had a loss of apatite.

113.pun_sentence: The pun in the title of the play 'The Importance of Being Earnest' was a Wilde idea.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The pun in the title of the play 'The Importance of Being Earnest' was a Wilde idea.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The pun in the title of the play 'The Importance of Being Earnest' was a wild idea.

114.pun_sentence: 'I prefer trout to salmon,' Tom said officiously.

115.pun_sentence: One gruelingly intense month into the year-long diet regimen, the overwhelmed patient concluded she could not stand the weight.

heterographic.pun_sentence: One gruelingly intense month into the year-long diet regimen, the overwhelmed patient concluded she could not stand the wait.

116.pun_sentence: OLD GOSSIPS never die they just lose their confidants.

117.pun_sentence: When the father found he had septuplets, he could hardly believe his own census.

meaning_1.description: An official count or survey of a population, typically recording various details of individuals.

118.pun_sentence: Because the champion angler instructed his pupils to cast their lines where the river runs through narrow chasms, they called him the 'fissure King.'

meaning_1.description: A fissure refers to a long, narrow opening or line of breakage made by cracking or splitting, especially in rock or earth.

translations.fr: Parce que le champion de pêche a instruit ses élèves à lancer leurs lignes là où la rivière traverse des gorges étroites, ils l'ont appelé le 'Roi de la fissure'.
translations.ko: 챔피언 낚시꾼이 그의 학생들에게 강이 좁은 협곡을 통해 흐르는 곳에 그들의 낚싯줄을 던지도록 가르쳤기 때문에, 그들은 그를 '틈새 왕'이라고 불렀다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Because the champion angler instructed his pupils to cast their lines where the river runs through narrow chasms, they called him the 'fissure King.'

meaning_2.description: A fisher refers to someone who catches fish as a hobby or profession, in this case specifically an angler.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Because the champion angler instructed his pupils to cast their lines where the river runs through narrow chasms, they called him the 'fisher King.'

119.pun_sentence: Tried some bear stew. It was a little grizzly.

121.pun_sentence: Making up puns about the finest soil is the loess form of humor.

meaning_1.description: Acting in a manner that avoids offending others or sparking conflict; tactfully.

126.pun_sentence: The mad scientist in the old castle had a strange secret – but he kept it under his bat.

128.pun_sentence: The Keystone Kops were frequently criticized for excessive use of farce.

130.pun_sentence: Isn't the Grand Canyon just gorges?
