translations.de: Wissenschaftler, die die Sonne studieren, haben ein Talent für die Forschung.
translations.fr: Les scientifiques qui étudient le soleil ont un talent pour la recherche.
translations.ko: 태양을 연구하는 과학자들은 연구에 대한 재능이 있습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Scientists studying the sun have a flair for research.

133.pun_sentence: Abstinence makes the heart grow fonder.

meaning_1.description: The act of refraining from or avoiding something, often referring to a form of self-restraint or denial.

translations.de: Enthaltsamkeit lässt das Herz stärker werden
translations.fr: L'abstinence fait grandir l'affection dans le cœur
translations.ko: 금욕은 마음을 더욱 동경하게 만든다

heterographic.pun_sentence: Abstinence makes the heart grow fonder.

meaning_2.description: The state of being away or not present.

translations.de: Die Abwesenheit lässt das Herz stärker werden.
translations.fr: L'absence rend le coeur plus tendre.
translations.ko: 결석은 마음을 더 연애하게 만듭니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Absence makes the heart grow fonder.

134.pun_sentence: I love your old worn-out jacket covered with all those slogans, but I can't read the frays at the end of the sleeves.

meaning_1.description: The unraveling or worn threads in a piece of fabric.

translations.de: Ich liebe deine alte abgenutzte Jacke, die mit all diesen Slogans bedeckt ist, aber ich kann die ausgefransten Enden der Ärmel nicht lesen.
translations.fr: J'adore ton ancienne veste usée couverte de tous ces slogans, mais je ne peux pas lire les effiloches au bout des manches.
translations.ko: 나는 그 모든 구호로 가득 찬 당신의 낡고 닳아 빠진 재킷을 사랑하지만, 소매 끝의 풀린 부분을 읽을 수 없습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I love your old worn-out jacket covered with all those slogans, but I can't read the frays at the end of the sleeves.

meaning_2.description: A small group of words standing together as a meaningful unit within a sentence or clause.

translations.de: Ich liebe deine alte, abgetragene Jacke, die mit all diesen Slogans bedeckt ist, aber ich kann die Phrasen am Ende der Ärmel nicht lesen.
translations.fr: J'aime ton ancienne veste usée couverte de tous ces slogans, mais je ne peux pas lire les phrases à l'extrémité des manches.
translations.ko: 나는 네가 가진 그 늙고 닳아있는, 모든 슬로건이 적힌 재킷을 좋아하지만, 소매 끝에 적혀있는 구문들은 읽을 수 없어.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I love your old worn-out jacket covered with all those slogans, but I can't read the phrases at the end of the sleeves.

135.pun_sentence: A clean thief always makes a stainless steal.

meaning_1.description: To take another person's property without permission or legal right

translations.de: Ein sauberer Dieb macht immer einen makellosen Diebstahl.
translations.fr: Un voleur propre fait toujours un vol sans tache.
translations.ko: 깨끗한 도둑은 항상 무결점의 도둑질을 합니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A clean thief always makes a stainless steal.

meaning_2.description: A hard, strong, gray or bluish-gray alloy of iron with carbon and usually other elements, used extensively as a structural and fabricating material.

translations.de: Ein sauberer Dieb macht immer einen rostfreien Stahl.
translations.fr: Un voleur propre fait toujours un acier inoxydable.
translations.ko: 깨끗한 도둑은 항상 스테인리스 스틸을 만듭니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A clean thief always makes a stainless steel.

136.pun_sentence: 'Boy, I wish the elevator were working,' said Tom, staring up to the top.

meaning_1.description: To look fixedly or vacantly at someone or something with one's eyes wide open

translations.de: "Junge, ich wünschte, der Aufzug würde funktionieren", sagte Tom und starrte mit weit geöffneten Augen nach oben.
translations.fr: "Garçon, j'aimerais que l'ascenseur fonctionne," dit Tom, fixant le haut avec les yeux grands ouverts.
translations.ko: "소년, 엘리베이터가 작동했으면 좋겠어,"라고 톰이 눈을 크게 뜨고 위를 쳐다봤다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: 'Boy, I wish the elevator were working,' said Tom, staring up to the top.

meaning_2.description: A set of steps leading from one floor of a building to another

translations.de: "Junge, ich wünschte, der Aufzug würde funktionieren", sagte Tom, während er die Treppe hinaufstarrte.
translations.fr: "Garçon, j'aimerais que l'ascenseur fonctionne", a déclaré Tom, regardant les escaliers vers le haut.
translations.ko: "소년, 나는 엘리베이터가 작동했으면 좋겠어,"라고 톰이 계단을 올려다보며 말했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: ' Boy , I wish the elevator were working , ' said Tom , stairing up to the top .

137.pun_sentence: The Jedi Knight traded in his light saber for a light dagger. He had gone over to the dirk side.

meaning_1.description: A dirk is a long thrusting dagger.

translations.de: Der Jedi-Ritter tauschte sein Lichtsäbel gegen ein Lichtdolch ein. Er war auf die Dolchseite gewechselt.
translations.fr: Le chevalier Jedi a échangé son sabre laser contre un poignard léger. Il avait rejoint le côté du dague.
translations.ko: 제다이 기사는 빛의 세이버를 빛의 단검으로 교환했습니다. 그는 단검 쪽으로 넘어갔습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The Jedi Knight traded in his light saber for a light dagger. He had gone over to the dirk side.

meaning_2.description: In the context of Star Wars, the "dark side" refers to the evil and corrupt side of the Force.

translations.de: Der Jedi-Ritter tauschte sein Lichtschwert gegen einen Lichtdolch ein. Er war zur dunklen Seite übergegangen.
translations.fr: Le chevalier Jedi a échangé son sabre laser contre une dague lumineuse. Il avait basculé du côté obscur.
translations.ko: 제다이 기사가 그의 라이트 세이버를 라이트 단검으로 교환했습니다. 그는 이미 어둠의 편으로 넘어섰습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The Jedi Knight traded in his light saber for a light dagger. He had gone over to the dark side.

138.pun_sentence: A skunk fell in the river and stank to the bottom.

meaning_1.description: To emit a strong, unpleasant smell.

translations.de: Ein Stinktier fiel in den Fluss und stank bis zum Grund.
translations.fr: Un putois est tombé dans la rivière et a empesté jusqu'au fond.
translations.ko: 스컹크가 강에 빠져서 바닥까지 악취를 냈습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A skunk fell in the river and stank to the bottom.

meaning_2.description: To go down below the surface or towards the bottom of a liquid.

translations.de: Ein Stinktier fiel in den Fluss und sank auf den Grund.
translations.fr: Un putois est tombé dans la rivière et a coulé jusqu'au fond.
translations.ko: 스컹크가 강에 빠져서 바닥까지 가라앉았다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A skunk fell in the river and sank to the bottom.

139.pun_sentence: 'I think I've broken my leg', reported Tom lamely.

meaning_1.description: In a weak or unsatisfactory way, in this context, it's likely being used to describe Tom's condition after breaking his leg.

translations.de: "Ich glaube, ich habe mir das Bein gebrochen", berichtete Tom schwach.
translations.fr: "Je pense que je me suis cassé la jambe", a rapporté Tom faiblement.
translations.ko: "제가 다리를 부러뜨린 것 같습니다," 톰이 약하게 전했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: 'I think I've broken my leg', reported Tom lamely.

meaning_2.description: Inability to walk properly due to a physical injury to, or disability in, the legs or feet.

translations.de: "Ich denke, ich habe mein Bein gebrochen", berichtete Tom lahmend.
translations.fr: "Je pense que j'ai cassé ma jambe", a signalé Tom, boitant.
translations.ko: "제가 제 다리를 부러뜨린 것 같아요," 라며 다리를 절다는 톰이 보고했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: "I think I've broken my leg," reported Tom lame.

140.pun_sentence: We sternly warned the circus clown not to light the fuse while we were inside the cannon, but he did it anyway - and it really made us soar.

meaning_1.description: To fly or rise high in the air.

translations.de: Wir warnten den Zirkusclown streng davor, die Lunte zu zünden, während wir in der Kanone waren, aber er tat es trotzdem - und es ließ uns wirklich hoch in die Luft steigen.
translations.fr: Nous avons sévèrement prévenu le clown de cirque de ne pas allumer la mèche pendant que nous étions à l'intérieur du canon, mais il l'a fait quand même - et ça nous a vraiment fait monter haut dans le ciel.
translations.ko: 우리는 서커스 광대에게 우리가 대포 안에 있을 때는 불꽃을 점화하지 말라고 엄격하게 경고했지만, 그는 그렇게 했습니다 - 그리고 그것은 우리를 정말로 하늘 높이 날게 했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: We sternly warned the circus clown not to light the fuse while we were inside the cannon, but he did it anyway - and it really made us soar.

meaning_2.description: Feeling or displaying a sense of anger or annoyance.

translations.de: Wir haben den Zirkusclown streng gewarnt, die Zündschnur nicht zu entzünden, während wir in der Kanone waren, aber er tat es trotzdem - - und es hat uns wirklich wütend gemacht.
translations.fr: Nous avons sévèrement averti le clown de cirque de ne pas allumer la mèche pendant que nous étions à l'intérieur du canon, mais il l'a fait quand même - - et ça nous a vraiment rendus furieux.
translations.ko: 우리는 서커스 클라운에게 우리가 대포 안에 있을 때는 불씨를 붙이지 말라고 엄중히 경고했지만, 그는 그럼에도 불구하고 그것을 했다 - - 그리고 그것은 우리를 정말 화나게 했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: We sternly warned the circus clown not to light the fuse while we were inside the cannon, but he did it anyway - - and it really made us sore.

141.pun_sentence: Some people who cut hair can be quite barbarous.

meaning_1.description: Cruel, savage, or inhumane.

translations.de: Einige Menschen, die Haare schneiden, können ziemlich barbarisch sein.
translations.fr: Certaines personnes qui coupent les cheveux peuvent être assez barbares.
translations.ko: 머리를 자르는 일부 사람들은 상당히 야만적일 수 있습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Some people who cut hair can be quite barbarous.

meaning_2.description: A person whose job is to cut, style, and often also shave men's hair.

translations.de: Einige Leute, die Haare schneiden, können ziemlich Friseur sein.
translations.fr: Certaines personnes qui coupent les cheveux peuvent être de vrais coiffeurs.
translations.ko: 머리를 자르는 일부 사람들은 꽤 이발사가 될 수 있습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Some people who cut hair can be quite barber.

142.pun_sentence: Drinking a whole bucket of water could make you turn pail.

meaning_1.description: A cylindrical container with a handle, particularly used for carrying liquids.

translations.de: Wenn du einen ganzen Eimer Wasser trinkst, könntest du dich in einen Eimer verwandeln.
translations.fr: Boire un seau entier d'eau pourrait vous faire devenir une pelle.
translations.ko: 한 통의 물을 모두 마시면 당신은 양동이가 될 수 있습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Drinking a whole bucket of water could make you turn pail.

meaning_2.description: Pale refers to a person's skin becoming lighter in color, often due to sickness, shock or fear.

translations.de: Wenn Sie einen ganzen Eimer Wasser trinken, könnten Sie blass werden.
translations.fr: Boire un seau entier d'eau pourrait vous faire pâlir.
translations.ko: 한 통의 물을 다 마시면 얼굴이 창백해질 수 있습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Drinking a whole bucket of water could make you turn pale.

143.pun_sentence: Beautifully manicured lawns are highly sod after.

meaning_1.description: Sod refers to a layer of soil held together by matted roots of grass and other plants.

translations.de: Wunderschön gepflegte Rasenflächen sind sehr begehrt wegen ihres Rasens.
translations.fr: Les pelouses magnifiquement entretenues sont très appréciées pour leur gazon.
translations.ko: 아름답게 관리된 잔디밭은 그 뿌리가 얽힌 토양층 때문에 매우 갖고 싶어합니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Beautifully manicured lawns are highly sod after.

meaning_2.description: Sought after refers something that is desired or coveted by people.

translations.de: Wunderschön gepflegte Rasenflächen sind sehr begehrt.
translations.fr: Les pelouses magnifiquement entretenues sont très recherchées.
translations.ko: 아름답게 가꿔진 잔디밭은 매우 선호됩니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Beautifully manicured lawns are highly sought after.

144.pun_sentence: The man leaned on the printer cartridge because he wanted to tone up his abs.

meaning_1.description: To enhance or improve muscle definition or strength.

translations.de: Der Mann lehnte sich an die Druckerpatrone, weil er seine Bauchmuskeln stärken wollte.
translations.fr: L'homme s'est appuyé sur la cartouche de l'imprimante parce qu'il voulait renforcer ses abdominaux.
translations.ko: 그 남자는 복근을 강화하고 싶어서 프린터 카트리지에 기대었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The man leaned on the printer cartridge because he wanted to tone up his abs.

meaning_2.description: A type of powder used in a laser printer to form the printed text and images on the paper.

translations.de: Der Mann lehnte sich an die Druckerpatrone, weil er seine Bauchmuskeln mit Toner stärken wollte.
translations.fr: L'homme s'appuyait sur la cartouche d'imprimante parce qu'il voulait renforcer ses abdominaux avec du toner.
translations.ko: 그 남자는 프린터 카트리지에 기대어서 토너로 복근을 강화하고 싶었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The man leaned on the printer cartridge because he wanted to toner up his abs.

145.pun_sentence: I'll take the girl to the dance, Tom promised.

meaning_1.description: To express a guaranteed commitment to do something or assurance that something will happen.

translations.de: Ich werde das Mädchen zum Tanz bringen, hat Tom versprochen.
translations.fr: Je vais emmener la fille à la danse, Tom a promis.
translations.ko: 나는 그 여자를 댄스에 데려갈 것이다, 톰이 약속했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I'll take the girl to the dance, Tom promised.

meaning_2.description: A formal dance held by a high school at the end of the academic year, typically for students in their junior or senior year.

translations.de: Ich werde das Mädchen zum Abschlussball bringen, Tom.
translations.fr: J'emmènerai la fille au bal de fin d'année, Tom.
translations.ko: 나는 그 여자아이를 무도회에 데려갈 거야, 톰.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I'll take the girl to the dance, Tom prom.

146.pun_sentence: Two wrongs can make a riot.

meaning_1.description: A violent disturbance of the peace by a crowd.

translations.de: Zwei Unrechte können einen Aufruhr verursachen.
translations.fr: Deux torts peuvent provoquer une émeute.
translations.ko: 두 가지 잘못으로 폭동이 일어날 수 있습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Two wrongs can make a riot.

meaning_2.description: Something that is morally, legally, or ethically correct.

translations.de: Zwei Unrechte können ein Recht machen.
translations.fr: Deux torts peuvent faire un bien.
translations.ko: 두 가지 잘못이 옳음을 만들 수 있다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Two wrongs can make a right.

147.pun_sentence: She was so thrifty she could smell a bargain a mall away.

meaning_1.description: A large enclosed building or complex containing shops and businesses.

translations.de: Sie war so sparsam, dass sie ein Schnäppchen eine Mall entfernt riechen konnte.
translations.fr: Elle était si économe qu'elle pouvait sentir une bonne affaire à un centre commercial de distance.
translations.ko: 그녀는 너무 검소해서 쇼핑몰 거리만큼 떨어진 곳에서도 특가를 느낄 수 있었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: She was so thrifty she could smell a bargain a mall away.

meaning_2.description: A unit of linear measure equal to 5,280 feet, or 1,760 yards (approximately 1.609 kilometers).

translations.de: Sie war so sparsam, dass sie ein Schnäppchen kilometerweit riechen konnte.
translations.fr: Elle était si économe qu'elle pouvait sentir une bonne affaire à un kilomètre de distance.
translations.ko: 그녀는 너무 절약해서 1마일 떨어진 곳에서도 싸게 살 수 있는 것을 느낄 수 있었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: She was so thrifty she could smell a bargain a mile away.

148.pun_sentence: Act your praise, not your shoe size.

meaning_1.description: Expression of approval or admiration for someone or something.

translations.de: Handeln Sie Ihr Lob, nicht Ihre Schuhgröße.
translations.fr: Agissez votre louange, pas votre pointure.
translations.ko: 당신의 찬양을 행동으로 보여주고, 신발 사이즈가 아니라.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Act your praise, not your shoe size.

meaning_2.description: The length of time during which a being or thing has existed.

translations.de: Verhalte dich deinem Alter entsprechend, nicht deiner Schuhgröße.
translations.fr: Agis selon ton âge, pas selon ta pointure.
translations.ko: 나이에 맞게 행동하고, 신발 사이즈에 맞게 행동하지 마세요.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Act your age, not your shoe size.

149.pun_sentence: Partying Saturday and Sunday leaves me feeling weakened.

meaning_1.description: To become or cause to become weaker in strength, force, or vitality

translations.de: Feiern am Samstag und Sonntag lässt mich geschwächt fühlen.
translations.fr: Faire la fête le samedi et le dimanche me laisse me sentir affaibli.
translations.ko: 토요일과 일요일에 파티를하면 저는 약해진다고 느낍니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Partying Saturday and Sunday leaves me feeling weakened.

meaning_2.description: The two-day period of Saturday and Sunday during which people typically do not work and have leisure time.

translations.de: Am Samstag und Sonntag zu feiern lässt mich mich wie am Wochenende fühlen.
translations.fr: Faire la fête le samedi et le dimanche me fait me sentir comme en week-end.
translations.ko: 토요일과 일요일에 파티를 즐기면 주말처럼 느껴져요.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Partying Saturday and Sunday leaves me feeling weekend.

150.pun_sentence: It was raining cats and dogs. There were poodles all over the road.

meaning_1.description: Poodle is a type of dog breed.

translations.de: Es goss Katzen und Hunde. Überall auf der Straße waren Pudel.
translations.fr: Il pleuvait des chats et des chiens. Il y avait des caniches partout sur la route.
translations.ko: 고양이와 개가 비처럼 내리고 있었습니다. 길가에는 푸들이 가득했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: It was raining cats and dogs. There were poodles all over the road.

meaning_2.description: A small shallow pool of liquid, especially of rainwater on the ground.

translations.de: Es hat Hunde und Katzen geregnet. Überall auf der Straße waren Pfützen.
translations.fr: Il pleuvait des cordes. Il y avait des flaques d'eau partout sur la route.
translations.ko: 고양이와 개가 내리고 있었어요. 길 가득 웅덩이가 있었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: It was raining cats and dogs. There were puddles all over the road.

151.pun_sentence: The only things sure for cab drivers are debt and taxis.

meaning_1.description: A taxi is a vehicle with a driver for hire which transports one client or a small group of clients, typically non-shared.

translations.de: Die einzigen sicheren Dinge für Taxifahrer sind Schulden und Taxis.
translations.fr: Les seules choses sûres pour les chauffeurs de taxi sont la dette et les taxis.
translations.ko: 택시 운전사에게 확실한 것은 부채와 택시뿐입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The only things sure for cab drivers are debt and taxis.

meaning_2.description: A tax is a compulsory financial charge or some other type of levy imposed on a taxpayer by a governmental organization in order to fund government spending and various public expenditures.

translations.de: Die einzigen sicheren Dinge für Taxifahrer sind Schulden und Steuern.
translations.fr: Les seules choses certaines pour les chauffeurs de taxi sont la dette et les impôts.
translations.ko: 택시 운전사에게 확실한 것은 부채와 세금 뿐입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The only things sure for cab drivers are debt and taxes.

152.pun_sentence: Sign at a place where you lose weight : 'Stop Look and Lessen'.

meaning_1.description: To make smaller or less in amount, degree, or extent.

translations.de: Schild an einem Ort, wo Sie Gewicht verlieren: ' Halten, Schauen und Verringern '.
translations.fr: Pancarte sur un lieu où vous perdez du poids : ' Arrêtez, Regardez et Diminuez '.
translations.ko: 체중을 감량하는 곳에서의 표지판 : ' 정지, 보기 그리고 줄이기 '.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Sign at a place where you lose weight : 'Stop Look and Lessen'.

meaning_2.description: To give one's attention to a sound; take notice of or act on what someone says.

translations.de: "Stopp, schau und hör zu."
translations.fr: "Arrêtez, Regardez, et Écoutez."
translations.ko: "멈추고, 보고, 들어보세요."

heterographic.pun_sentence: Sign at a place where you lose weight: "Stop, Look, and Listen."

153.pun_sentence: She was only a Cyclist's daughter, but she peddled it all over town.

meaning_1.description: To sell goods, especially by going from house to house or place to place.

translations.de: Sie war nur die Tochter eines Radfahrers, aber sie verkaufte es überall in der Stadt.
translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'un cycliste, mais elle le vendait partout en ville.
translations.ko: 그녀는 단지 자전거 타는 사람의 딸이었지만, 그녀는 도시 곳곳에서 그것을 팔았습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: She was only a Cyclist's daughter, but she peddled it all over town.

meaning_2.description: To move or operate something with pedals, like a bicycle.

translations.de: Sie war nur die Tochter eines Radfahrers, aber sie fuhr mit dem Fahrrad durch die ganze Stadt.
translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'un cycliste, mais elle a pédalé dans toute la ville.
translations.ko: 그녀는 단지 자전거 주인의 딸이었지만, 도시 곳곳을 자전거로 다녔습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: She was only a Cyclist's daughter, but she pedaled it all over town.

154.pun_sentence: If you're stiff as a board it could be the lumbar.

meaning_1.description: Pertaining to the part of the spine that is located in the lower back region.

translations.de: Wenn Sie steif wie ein Brett sind, könnte es das Lendenwirbelbereich sein.
translations.fr: Si vous êtes raide comme une planche, cela pourrait être dû à la région lombaire.
translations.ko: 만약 당신이 판자처럼 뻣뻣하다면 그건 허리 부분 때문일 수 있습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: If you're stiff as a board it could be the lumbar.

meaning_2.description: Timber sawed into rough planks or otherwise partly prepared.

translations.de: Wenn du steif wie ein Brett bist, könnte das das rohe Holz sein.
translations.fr: Si vous êtes raide comme une planche, cela pourrait être le bois brut.
translations.ko: 당신이 널빤지처럼 딱딱하다면 그것은 톱으로 잘린 원목일 수 있습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: If you're stiff as a board it could be the lumber.

155.pun_sentence: A good carpenter will do his work and then varnish without a trace.

meaning_1.description: It is a resin dissolved in a liquid for applying on wood, metal, or other materials to form a hard, clear, shiny surface when dry.

translations.de: Ein guter Tischler wird seine Arbeit erledigen und dann ohne Spur lackieren.
translations.fr: Un bon charpentier fera son travail puis vernira sans laisser de trace.
translations.ko: 좋은 목수는 일을 하고 난 후 흔적 없이 칠하겠습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A good carpenter will do his work and then varnish without a trace.

meaning_2.description: To disappear suddenly and completely.

translations.de: Ein guter Zimmermann wird seine Arbeit erledigen und dann spurlos verschwinden.
translations.fr: Un bon charpentier fera son travail puis disparaîtra sans laisser de trace.
translations.ko: 좋은 목수는 일을 마치고 갑자기 완전히 사라질 것입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A good carpenter will do his work and then vanish without a trace.

156.pun_sentence: How do spacemen add more protein to their diet? They make it meteor.

meaning_1.description: A meteor refers to a small body of matter from outer space that enters the earth's atmosphere, appearing as a streak of light.

translations.de: Wie fügen Raumfahrer ihrer Ernährung mehr Protein hinzu? Sie machen es meteor .
translations.fr: Comment les astronautes ajoutent-ils plus de protéines à leur régime ? Ils le font météore .
translations.ko: 우주인들은 어떻게 그들의 식단에 더 많은 단백질을 더할까요? 그들은 그것을 유성으로 만듭니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: How do spacemen add more protein to their diet? They make it meteor.

meaning_2.description: "Meaty" refers to something that contains meat or has the nature or substance of meat (high in protein).

translations.de: Wie fügen Raumfahrer ihrer Ernährung mehr Protein hinzu? Sie machen es fleischig.
translations.fr: Comment les astronautes ajoutent-ils plus de protéines à leur alimentation? Ils la rendent charnue.
translations.ko: 우주인들은 어떻게 그들의 식단에 더 많은 단백질을 추가하나요? 그들은 고기질을 높입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: How do spacemen add more protein to their diet? They make it meaty.

157.pun_sentence: I'm glad I know sign language, it's pretty handy.

meaning_1.description: Convenient to handle or use; useful.

translations.de: Ich bin froh, dass ich Gebärdensprache kenne, sie ist ziemlich praktisch.
translations.fr: Je suis content de connaître la langue des signes, c'est assez pratique.
translations.ko: 나는 수화를 아는 것에 기뻐요, 그것은 꽤 편리해요.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I'm glad I know sign language, it's pretty handy.

meaning_2.description: The end part of a person's arm beyond the wrist, including the palm, fingers, and thumb.

translations.de: Ich bin froh, dass ich Gebärdensprache kann, es ist ziemlich handlich.
translations.fr: Je suis content de connaître la langue des signes, c'est assez manuel.
translations.ko: 나는 수화를 알게 되어 기뻐요, 그것은 꽤 손이 필요한 일이에요.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I'm glad I know sign language, it's pretty hand.

158.pun_sentence: I had to pay to get into the annual local carnival. But that was the county fare.

meaning_1.description: The cost of a ticket for a particular event, service or mode of transport

translations.de: Ich musste bezahlen, um auf das jährliche lokale Karneval zu kommen. Aber das war der Bezirkspreis.
translations.fr: J'ai dû payer pour entrer dans la fête foraine annuelle locale. Mais c'était le tarif du comté.
translations.ko: 나는 연례 지역 축제에 들어가기 위해 지불해야 했다. 그러나 그것이 군의 요금이었다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I had to pay to get into the annual local carnival. But that was the county fare.

meaning_2.description: A gathering or event held annually at a set time and place, often for the purpose of buying, selling, or exhibiting goods, crafts, products, or animals; or for recreational activities.

translations.de: Ich musste bezahlen, um in den jährlichen lokalen Karneval zu kommen. Aber das war die Landkreismesse.
translations.fr: J'ai dû payer pour entrer dans la fête foraine locale annuelle. Mais c'était la foire du comté.
translations.ko: 나는 매년 열리는 지역축제에 입장하기 위해 돈을 내야 했습니다. 그러나 그것은 카운티 박람회였습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I had to pay to get into the annual local carnival. But that was the county fair.

159.pun_sentence: I must attend my flock, said Tom, sheepishly.

meaning_1.description: To behave or speak in an embarrassed or hesitant manner due to lack of self-confidence.

translations.de: Ich muss meine Herde versorgen, sagte Tom, schüchtern.
translations.fr: Je dois m'occuper de mon troupeau, dit Tom, d'une manière embarrassée.
translations.ko: 나는 내 떼를 돌봐야 한다, 톰이 부끄럽게 말했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I must attend my flock, said Tom, sheepishly.

meaning_2.description: Domesticated ruminant animals that are often kept as livestock.

translations.de: Ich muss meine Herde betreuen, sagte Tom, schafig.
translations.fr: Je dois m'occuper de mon troupeau, a dit Tom, d'un air moutonneux.
translations.ko: 나는 내 떼를 돌봐야 해, 톰이 양처럼 수줍게 말했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I must attend my flock, said Tom, sheeppishly.

160.pun_sentence: The local baker was paying his staff based on a flourly rate.

meaning_1.description: A fine white or brown powder made by grinding and sifting the meal of a grain, especially wheat, used in baking.

translations.de: Der lokale Bäcker bezahlte sein Personal nach einem auf Mehl basierenden Stundensatz.
translations.fr: Le boulanger local payait son personnel sur la base d'un salaire horaire basé sur la farine.
translations.ko: 현지 제빵사는 직원들에게 밀가루 기반의 시간당 노무비를 지불했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The local baker was paying his staff based on a flourly rate.

meaning_2.description: Done or happening every hour.

translations.de: Der örtliche Bäcker zahlte sein Personal auf Stundenbasis.
translations.fr: Le boulanger local payait son personnel sur la base d'un taux horaire.
translations.ko: 지역의 빵집 주인은 직원들에게 시급으로 급여를 지급하였다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The local baker was paying his staff based on an hourly rate.

161.pun_sentence: It wasn’t the apple on the tree, but the pair beneath it.

meaning_1.description: Two of something that are similar or identical.

translations.de: Es war nicht der Apfel am Baum, sondern das Paar darunter.
translations.fr: Ce n'était pas la pomme sur l'arbre, mais la paire en dessous.
translations.ko: 그것은 나무 위의 사과가 아니라 그 아래의 한 쌍이었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: It wasn’t the apple on the tree, but the pair beneath it.

meaning_2.description: A type of fruit that is typically narrow at the top and wider at the bottom.

translations.de: Es war nicht der Apfel am Baum, sondern die Birne darunter.
translations.fr: Ce n'était pas la pomme sur l'arbre, mais la poire en dessous.
translations.ko: 그것은 나무에 있는 사과가 아니라, 그 아래에 있는 배였습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: It wasn't the apple on the tree, but the pear beneath it.

162.pun_sentence: He stayed at the auction to the bidder end.

meaning_1.description: A person who makes an offer to buy something in an auction.

translations.de: Er blieb bis zum Ende des Bieters bei der Auktion.
translations.fr: Il est resté à la vente aux enchères jusqu'à la fin de l'offre.
translations.ko: 그는 입찰자의 끝까지 경매에 머물렀다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: He stayed at the auction to the bidder end.

meaning_2.description: Intense and difficult to accept or bear; refers to the end or conclusion of a situation, usually a difficult one.

translations.de: Er blieb bis zum bitteren Ende bei der Auktion.
translations.fr: Il est resté à la vente aux enchères jusqu'à la fin amère.
translations.ko: 그는 경매가 끝날 때까지, 쓴맛을 느끼며 남아 있었다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: He stayed at the auction to the bitter end.

163.pun_sentence: I was going to study the work of Sigmund Freud, but I was too Jung to understand it.

meaning_1.description: Jung is the surname of Carl Jung, a Swiss psychiatrist and psychoanalyst who founded analytical psychology.

translations.de: Ich wollte die Arbeit von Sigmund Freud studieren, aber ich war zu Jung, um sie zu verstehen.
translations.fr: J'allais étudier l'œuvre de Sigmund Freud, mais j'étais trop Jung pour la comprendre.
translations.ko: 나는 지그문트 프로이트의 작품을 공부하려 했지만, 이해하기에는 너무 '정'했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I was going to study the work of Sigmund Freud, but I was too Jung to understand it.

meaning_2.description: Not having lived or existed for a long time; not fully developed or matured.

translations.de: Ich wollte die Arbeit von Sigmund Freud studieren, aber ich war zu jung, um sie zu verstehen.
translations.fr: J'allais étudier l'œuvre de Sigmund Freud, mais j'étais trop jeune pour la comprendre.
translations.ko: 나는 시그문트 프로이트의 작품을 공부하려고 했지만, 이해하기에는 너무 어렸습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I was going to study the work of Sigmund Freud, but I was too young to understand it.

164.pun_sentence: I'd really like to know whether her collapse was due to a serious illness or whether it was one of her usual feints.

meaning_1.description: A deceptive or pretend blow, attack, or movement, used in sports or games to distract or mislead an opponent.

translations.de: Ich würde wirklich gerne wissen, ob ihr Zusammenbruch auf eine ernsthafte Krankheit zurückzuführen war oder ob es einer ihrer üblichen Scheinangriffe war.
translations.fr: J'aimerais vraiment savoir si son effondrement était dû à une maladie grave ou si c'était l'une de ses feintes habituelles.
translations.ko: 그녀의 쓰러짐이 심각한 질병 때문인지, 아니면 그녀가 보통 하는 가짜 공격 중 하나인지 정말 알고 싶어요.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I'd really like to know whether her collapse was due to a serious illness or whether it was one of her usual feints.

meaning_2.description: To suddenly lose consciousness, typically due to a lack of oxygen or blood supply to the brain.

translations.de: Ich würde wirklich gerne wissen, ob ihr Zusammenbruch auf eine ernsthafte Krankheit zurückzuführen war oder ob es einer ihrer üblichen Ohnmachtsanfälle war.
translations.fr: J'aimerais vraiment savoir si son effondrement était dû à une maladie grave ou s'il s'agissait d'un de ses évanouissements habituels.
translations.ko: 그녀의 쓰러짐이 심각한 질병 때문인지 아니면 그녀의 평소의 의식불명 상태 중 하나였는지 꼭 알고 싶습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I'd really like to know whether her collapse was due to a serious illness or whether it was one of her usual faints.

165.pun_sentence: This is the Netherlands, Tom stated flatly.

meaning_1.description: Absolutely and without qualification.

translations.de: Das sind die Niederlande, stellte Tom unmissverständlich fest.
translations.fr: C'est les Pays-Bas, a déclaré Tom sans ambiguité.
translations.ko: 이것은 네덜란드입니다, 톰이 단언했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: This is the Netherlands, Tom stated flatly.

meaning_2.description: Flat can mean level and smooth with no raised areas.

translations.de: Das sind die Niederlande, stellte Tom flach fest.
translations.fr: C'est les Pays-Bas, a affirmé Tom avec aplomb.
translations.ko: 이것은 네덜란드입니다, 톰이 단호하게 말했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: This is the Netherlands, Tom stated flat.

166.pun_sentence: Pablo and Jose waited for a signal from Pilar to join her in the Church Tower, but neither responded to the chiming because they didn't know for whom the belle was tolling.

meaning_1.description: A belle is a beautiful woman who is the most attractive or amusing in a particular company or group.

translations.de: Pablo und Jose warteten auf ein Signal von Pilar, um sich ihr im Kirchturm anzuschließen, aber keiner reagierte auf das Läuten, weil sie nicht wussten, für wen die Schöne läutete.
translations.fr: Pablo et Jose attendaient un signal de Pilar pour la rejoindre dans le clocher de l'église, mais aucun n'a répondu au carillon parce qu'ils ne savaient pas pour qui la belle était tonnante.
translations.ko: 파블로와 호세는 필라르로부터 교회 탑에서 그녀에게 참가할 신호를 기다렸지만, 그들은 이 아름다운 여성이 누구를 위해 울리는지 모르기 때문에 두드림에 대해 반응하지 않았다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Pablo and Jose waited for a signal from Pilar to join her in the Church Tower, but neither responded to the chiming because they didn't know for whom the belle was tolling.

meaning_2.description: A bell is a hollow object, typically of metal and in the shape of a deep inverted cup widening at the lip, that sounds a clear musical note when struck by means of a clapper inside.

translations.de: Pablo und Jose warteten auf ein Signal von Pilar, um ihr in den Kirchturm zu folgen, aber keiner reagierte auf das Läuten, weil sie nicht wussten, für wen die Glocke läutete.
translations.fr: Pablo et José ont attendu un signal de Pilar pour la rejoindre dans le clocher de l'église, mais aucun n'a répondu au carillon parce qu'ils ne savaient pas pour qui sonnait la cloche.
translations.ko: 파블로와 호세는 피라르로부터 교회 탑으로 함께 가는 신호를 기다렸지만, 누구를 위해 종이 울리는지 모르기 때문에 종소리에 반응하지 않았습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Pablo and Jose waited for a signal from Pilar to join her in the Church Tower, but neither responded to the chiming because they didn't know for whom the bell was tolling.

167.pun_sentence: Working in the bakery left her with a loathe of bread.

meaning_1.description: To feel intense dislike or disgust for something.

translations.de: Die Arbeit in der Bäckerei hat ihr eine tiefe Abneigung gegen Brot hinterlassen.
translations.fr: Travailler à la boulangerie lui a laissé une aversion profonde pour le pain.
translations.ko: 그녀는 빵집에서 일한 경험으로 빵에 대한 커다란 혐오감을 갖게 되었다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Working in the bakery left her with a loathe of bread.

meaning_2.description: A quantity of bread that is shaped and baked in one piece.

translations.de: Die Arbeit in der Bäckerei hinterließ ihr ein Laib Brot.
translations.fr: Travailler à la boulangerie lui a laissé une miche de pain.
translations.ko: 그녀는 빵집에서 일하면서 빵 한 덩어리를 가지게 되었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Working in the bakery left her with a loaf of bread.

168.pun_sentence: Arriving late, Senator Kennedy slipped on a banana peel and fell in a heap, resulting in a humerus break in the midst of the subcommittee's intense discussion.

meaning_1.description: The bone of the upper arm or forelimb, extending from the shoulder to the elbow.

translations.de: Spät ankommend, rutschte Senator Kennedy auf einer Bananenschale aus und fiel in einen Haufen, was zu einem Bruch des Oberarmknochens inmitten einer intensiven Diskussion des Unterausschusses führte.
translations.fr: Arrivant en retard, le sénateur Kennedy a glissé sur une peau de banane et est tombé en tas, entraînant une fracture de l'humérus pendant une discussion intense du sous-comité.
translations.ko: 늦게 도착한 케네디 의원이 바나나 껍질에 미끄러져 넘어지면서 팔뼈가 부러지는 결과를 초래했는데, 이는 하위 위원회의 치열한 논의 가운데 일어난 사건이었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Arriving late, Senator Kennedy slipped on a banana peel and fell in a heap, resulting in a humerus break in the midst of the subcommittee's intense discussion.

meaning_2.description: Funnily or entertainingly causing laughter.

translations.de: Zu spät ankommend, rutschte Senator Kennedy auf einer Bananenschale aus und fiel in einen Haufen, was zu einer lustigen und unterhaltsamen Unterbrechung in der Mitte der intensiven Diskussion des Unterausschusses führte.
translations.fr: Arrivant en retard, le sénateur Kennedy a glissé sur une peau de banane et est tombé en tas, ce qui a provoqué une interruption amusante et divertissante au milieu de la discussion intense de la sous-commission.
translations.ko: 늦게 도착한 케네디 의원이 바나나 껍질에 미끄러져 넘어져 무더기가 되어, 이로 인해 하위위원회의 치열한 토론 중간에 웃기고 재미있는 중단이 발생하였다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Arriving late, Senator Kennedy slipped on a banana peel and fell in a heap, resulting in a humorous break in the midst of the subcommittee's intense discussion.

169.pun_sentence: When a college dormitory exploded a lot of roomers were flying.

meaning_1.description: A person who rents a room in another's house.

translations.de: Als ein Studentenwohnheim explodierte, flogen viele Mieter herum.
translations.fr: Quand un dortoir universitaire a explosé, beaucoup de locataires ont été projetés en l'air.
translations.ko: 대학 생활관이 폭발했을 때 많은 방 세입자들이 날아갔습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: When a college dormitory exploded a lot of roomers were flying.

meaning_2.description: An unverified piece of information, often about goings-on in society, that is passed around.

translations.de: Als ein Hochschulwohnheim explodierte, gab es viele Gerüchte, die umherschwirrten.
translations.fr: Lorsqu'un dortoir universitaire a explosé, de nombreuses rumeurs ont circulé.
translations.ko: 대학 기숙사가 폭발했을 때 많은 소문이 돌았습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: When a college dormitory exploded a lot of rumors were flying.

170.pun_sentence: At the petting zoo I saw a sheep scratching itself. Turns out it had fleece.

meaning_1.description: The wooly covering of a sheep.

translations.de: Im Streichelzoo sah ich ein Schaf, das sich kratzte. Es stellte sich heraus, dass es Wolle hatte.
translations.fr: Au zoo pour enfants, j'ai vu un mouton se gratter. Il s'avère qu'il avait de la laine.
translations.ko: 애완동물 동물원에서 양이 몸을 긁는 것을 봤습니다. 결과적으로 그것이 양털이었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: At the petting zoo I saw a sheep scratching itself. Turns out it had fleece.

meaning_2.description: Flea refers to a small parasitic insect that feeds on the blood of mammals and birds, often causing the host creature to scratch or itch.

translations.de: Im Streichelzoo habe ich ein Schaf gesehen, das sich kratzte. Es stellte sich heraus, dass es Flöhe hatte.
translations.fr: Au zoo pour enfants, j'ai vu un mouton se gratter. Il s'avère qu'il avait des puces.
translations.ko: 애완동물 동물원에서 나는 양이 자기 몸을 긁는 것을 봤다. 그것은 벼룩이 있었다는 것이었다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: At the petting zoo I saw a sheep scratching itself. Turns out it had fleas.

171.pun_sentence: At the urban renewal site, contractors were simultaneously tearing down and erecting. It was interesting to watch them razing all those buildings.

meaning_1.description: To completely destroy or demolish, often used in reference to buildings.

translations.de: Auf der Stadterneuerungsbaustelle rissen die Bauunternehmer gleichzeitig ab und errichteten wieder. Es war interessant, ihnen beim Abriss all dieser Gebäude zuzusehen.
translations.fr: Sur le site de rénovation urbaine, les entrepreneurs démolissaient et construisaient simultanément. C'était intéressant de les voir raser tous ces bâtiments.
translations.ko: 도시 재생 현장에서는 건설업자들이 동시에 철거하고 설치하고 있었습니다. 그들이 모든 건물들을 철거하는 것을 관찰하는 것은 흥미로웠습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: At the urban renewal site, contractors were simultaneously tearing down and erecting. It was interesting to watch them razing all those buildings.

meaning_2.description: The act of lifting or moving something to a higher position, often used in reference to buildings.

translations.de: Auf der städtischen Erneuerungsbaustelle waren die Bauunternehmer gleichzeitig am Abreißen und Aufbauen. Es war interessant, ihnen beim Hochziehen all dieser Gebäude zuzusehen.
translations.fr: Sur le site de rénovation urbaine, les entrepreneurs démolissaient et construisaient simultanément. C'était intéressant de les regarder élever tous ces bâtiments.
translations.ko: 도시 재건 사이트에서, 건설업자들이 동시에 철거하고 건설하고 있었다. 그들이 그 모든 건물을 들어올리는 것을 보는 것이 흥미로웠다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: At the urban renewal site, contractors were simultaneously tearing down and erecting. It was interesting to watch them raising all those buildings.

172.pun_sentence: There was a lot of equestrian paraphernalia at the bridle shower.

meaning_1.description: A bridle is a piece of equipment, usually made of leather, which is used to control a horse's direction or movement. It's a piece of equestrian gear.

translations.de: Es gab jede Menge Reitsportausrüstung bei der Gebissparty.
translations.fr: Il y avait beaucoup de matériel équestre à la fête pré-nuptiale.
translations.ko: 말 먹구름 파티에 많은 승마 장비가 있었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: There was a lot of equestrian paraphernalia at the bridle shower.

meaning_2.description: "Bridal" refers to anything relating to a bride or a wedding.

translations.de: Es gab viel Reitzubehör bei der Brautparty.
translations.fr: Il y avait beaucoup de matériel équestre à la fête pré-nuptiale.
translations.ko: 신부 파티에 많은 승마 용품이 있었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: There was a lot of equestrian paraphernalia at the bridal shower.

173.pun_sentence: There's a repair shop for baroque musical instruments.

meaning_1.description: Referring to the ornate and elaborate style of art, architecture, and music that flourished in Europe from the early 17th until the mid-18th century.

translations.de: Es gibt eine Reparaturwerkstatt für barocke Musikinstrumente.
translations.fr: Il existe un atelier de réparation pour les instruments de musique baroque.
translations.ko: 바로크 음악 악기를 수리하는 공방이 있습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: There's a repair shop for baroque musical instruments.

meaning_2.description: Damaged and not in a condition to be used.

translations.de: Es gibt eine Reparaturwerkstatt für kaputte Musikinstrumente.
translations.fr: Il y a une boutique de réparation pour les instruments de musique cassés.
translations.ko: 고장난 음악 기구를 수리하는 곳이 있습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: There's a repair shop for broken musical instruments.

174.pun_sentence: My wife really likes to make pottery, but to me it's just kiln time.

meaning_1.description: A kiln is a furnace or oven for burning, baking, or drying, especially one for calcining lime or firing pottery.

translations.de: Meine Frau mag es wirklich, Töpferwaren herzustellen, aber für mich ist es einfach nur Brennofenzeit.
translations.fr: Ma femme aime vraiment faire de la poterie, mais pour moi, c'est juste du temps de four.
translations.ko: 나의 아내는 도자기를 만드는 것을 정말 좋아하지만, 나에게는 그저 가마 시간일 뿐입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: My wife really likes to make pottery, but to me it's just kiln time.

meaning_2.description: The term "kill" is commonly used in the phrase "kill time", which means to use something up, especially spare time, in an easy and pleasant way.

translations.de: Meine Frau macht wirklich gerne Töpferware, aber für mich ist es einfach nur Zeitvertreib.
translations.fr: Ma femme aime vraiment faire de la poterie, mais pour moi, c'est juste pour tuer le temps.
translations.ko: 내 아내는 도예를 만드는 것을 정말 좋아하지만, 나에게는 그저 시간을 때우는 것일 뿐입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: My wife really likes to make pottery, but to me it's just kill time.

175.pun_sentence: The swollen blood vessels in her legs were very quarrelsome - she had bellicose veins.

meaning_1.description: Demonstrating aggression and willingness to fight.

translations.de: Die geschwollenen Blutgefäße in ihren Beinen waren sehr streitsüchtig - sie hatte kriegerische Venen.
translations.fr: Les vaisseaux sanguins gonflés dans ses jambes étaient très querelleurs - elle avait des veines belliqueuses.
translations.ko: 그녀의 다리에 부어 있는 혈관은 매우 다투기 좋아했습니다 - 그녀는 공격적인 정맥을 가지고 있었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The swollen blood vessels in her legs were very quarrelsome - she had bellicose veins.

meaning_2.description: Enlarged and twisted veins often appearing on the legs.

translations.de: Die geschwollenen Blutgefäße in ihren Beinen waren sehr streitsüchtig - sie hatte Krampfadern.
translations.fr: Les vaisseaux sanguins gonflés dans ses jambes étaient très querelleurs - elle avait des varices.
translations.ko: 그녀의 다리에 있는 부푼 혈관들이 매우 싸우기 좋아했다 - 그녀는 정맥 확장증이 있었다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The swollen blood vessels in her legs were very quarrelsome - she had varicose veins.

176.pun_sentence: The astronomer made a claim about a well-known star, but it wasn't sirius.

meaning_1.description: Sirius is the brightest star in the Earth's night sky. It's also referred to as the "Dog Star."

translations.de: Der Astronom machte eine Behauptung über einen bekannten Stern, aber es war nicht Sirius.
translations.fr: L'astronome a fait une affirmation à propos d'une étoile bien connue, mais ce n'était pas Sirius.
translations.ko: 천문학자가 잘 알려진 별에 대해 주장했지만, 그것은 시리우스가 아니었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The astronomer made a claim about a well-known star, but it wasn't sirius.

meaning_2.description: The word "serious" means grave, stern, earnest, or not joking or intended for fun.

translations.de: Der Astronom machte eine Behauptung über einen bekannten Stern, aber es war nicht ernst gemeint.
translations.fr: L'astronome a fait une affirmation sur une étoile bien connue, mais ce n'était pas sérieux.
translations.ko: 천문학자가 잘 알려진 별에 대해 주장했지만 그것은 진지한 것이 아니었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The astronomer made a claim about a well-known star, but it wasn't serious.

177.pun_sentence: For meat some people eat lamb and mutton else.

meaning_1.description: Mutton refers to the meat of an adult sheep.

translations.de: Für Fleisch essen manche Leute Lamm und andere Hammelfleisch.
translations.fr: Pour de la viande, certaines personnes mangent de l'agneau et d'autres du mouton.
translations.ko: 일부 사람들은 고기를 위해 양고기와 어린 양고기를 먹습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: For meat some people eat lamb and mutton else.

meaning_2.description: "Nothing" refers to the absence or lack of anything.

translations.de: Einige Leute essen zum Fleisch nur Lamm und sonst nichts.
translations.fr: Pour la viande, certaines personnes ne mangent que de l'agneau.
translations.ko: 일부 사람들은 고기로 양고기만 먹습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: For meat some people eat lamb and nothing else.

178.pun_sentence: 'I'm mentioned in this book,' said Tom contentedly.

meaning_1.description: Feeling or showing satisfaction with one's possessions, status, or situation.

translations.de: "Ich werde in diesem Buch erwähnt," sagte Tom zufrieden.
translations.fr: "Je suis mentionné dans ce livre," a déclaré Tom satisfait.
translations.ko: "나는 이 책에서 언급되었습니다,"라며 톰이 만족스럽게 말했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: 'I'm mentioned in this book,' said Tom contentedly.

meaning_2.description: The substance or material dealt within a speech, literary work or visual medium.

translations.de: "Ich werde in diesem Buch erwähnt," sagte Tom, Inhalt.
translations.fr: "Je suis mentionné dans ce livre," dit Tom, contenu.
translations.ko: "이 책에서 나를 언급했어,"라고 톰이 말했습니다, 내용.

heterographic.pun_sentence: "I'm mentioned in this book," said Tom content.

179.pun_sentence: If you want those ashes, you'll have to urn them.

meaning_1.description: An urn refers to a type of vase, often with a lid, where ashes after cremation are stored.

translations.de: Wenn du diese Asche willst, musst du sie in eine Urne legen.
translations.fr: Si tu veux ces cendres, tu devras les mettre dans une urne.
translations.ko: 그 재를 원한다면, 당신은 그것을 합장하기 위해 합장통에 넣어야 합니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: If you want those ashes, you'll have to urn them.

meaning_2.description: Earn typically refers to receive a specified sum in return for work or services, or achieve something deserved.

translations.de: Wenn du diese Asche willst, musst du sie verdienen.
translations.fr: Si tu veux ces cendres, tu devras les mériter.
translations.ko: 그 재를 원한다면, 너는 그것을 얻기 위해 노력해야 합니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: If you want those ashes, you'll have to earn them.

180.pun_sentence: I tried to record an album in a reptile shop, but there was a terrible gecko.

meaning_1.description: A small, usually nocturnal, carnivorous lizard that is found in warm climates

translations.de: Ich habe versucht, ein Album in einem Reptilienladen aufzunehmen, aber es gab eine schreckliche Gecko.
translations.fr: J'ai essayé d'enregistrer un album dans un magasin de reptiles, mais il y avait un horrible gecko.
translations.ko: 나는 파충류 가게에서 앨범을 녹음하려고 했지만, 끔찍한 도마뱀이 있었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I tried to record an album in a reptile shop, but there was a terrible gecko.

meaning_2.description: A sound caused by the reflection of sound waves from a surface back to the listener

translations.de: Ich habe versucht, ein Album in einem Reptiliengeschäft aufzunehmen, aber es gab ein schreckliches Echo.
translations.fr: J'ai essayé d'enregistrer un album dans une boutique de reptiles, mais il y avait un terrible écho.
translations.ko: 나는 파충류 상점에서 앨범을 녹음하려고 했지만, 끔찍한 에코가 있었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I tried to record an album in a reptile shop, but there was a terrible echo.

181.pun_sentence: OLD BATHERS never die, they just wade away.

meaning_1.description: To walk with effort through water or something that obstructs progress.

translations.de: Alte Schwimmer sterben nie, sie gehen einfach weg, indem sie durch das Wasser waten.
translations.fr: Les vieux baigneurs ne meurent jamais, ils s'éloignent simplement en pataugeant.
translations.ko: 노른자 수영객들은 결코 죽지 않습니다, 그들은 단지 물 속을 힘들게 걷는 것으로 사라집니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: OLD BATHERS never die, they just wade away.

meaning_2.description: Slowly disappear, lose importance, or become weaker.

translations.de: Alte Schwimmer sterben nie, sie verschwinden einfach langsam.
translations.fr: Les vieux baigneurs ne meurent jamais, ils disparaissent juste lentement.
translations.ko: 노인 수영객들은 결코 죽지 않습니다, 그들은 그저 천천히 사라집니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: OLD BATHERS never die, they just fade away.

182.pun_sentence: 'I wish I could remember the name of that card game,' said Tom wistfully.

meaning_1.description: Showing a feeling of vague or regretful longing.

translations.de: "Ich wünschte, ich könnte mich an den Namen dieses Kartenspiels erinnern," sagte Tom sehnsüchtig.
translations.fr: "J'aimerais pouvoir me rappeler le nom de ce jeu de cartes," dit Tom avec nostalgie.
translations.ko: "나는 그 카드 게임의 이름을 기억할 수 있으면 좋겠다," 라고 톰이 애석하게 말했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: 'I wish I could remember the name of that card game,' said Tom wistfully.

meaning_2.description: Whist is a classic English trick-taking card game which was widely played in the 18th and 19th centuries.

translations.de: "Ich wünschte, ich könnte mich an den Namen dieses Kartenspiels erinnern," sagte Tom beim Whist.
translations.fr: "J'aimerais pouvoir me souvenir du nom de ce jeu de cartes," dit Tom au whist.
translations.ko: "나는 그 카드 게임의 이름을 기억할 수 있었으면 좋겠어,"라고 톰이 화이스트에서 말했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: "I wish I could remember the name of that card game," said Tom whist.

183.pun_sentence: Old cotton-pickers never die. They just bale out.

meaning_1.description: In this context, "bale" refers to bundle or package tightly, especially in regards to a large quantity of a material like cotton.

translations.de: Alte Baumwollpflücker sterben nie. Sie ballen einfach aus.
translations.fr: Les vieux ramasseurs de coton ne meurent jamais. Ils font simplement des balles.
translations.ko: 오래된 면 수확자는 결코 죽지 않습니다. 그들은 단지 뭉쳐나갑니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Old cotton-pickers never die. They just bale out.

meaning_2.description: "Bail" in this context commonly means to abandon a situation or escape hastily.

translations.de: Alte Baumwollpflücker sterben nie. Sie steigen einfach aus.
translations.fr: Les vieux cueilleurs de coton ne meurent jamais. Ils se tirent simplement.
translations.ko: 노인 면 수확자는 결코 죽지 않습니다. 그들은 단지 급히 도망갑니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Old cotton-pickers never die. They just bail out.

184.pun_sentence: 'This looks like the fruit of the blackthorn,' said Tom slowly.

meaning_1.description: At a slow pace or rate; not quickly or rapidly.

translations.de: "Das sieht aus wie die Frucht des Schwarzdorns", sagte Tom langsam.
translations.fr: "On dirait le fruit du prunellier," dit Tom lentement.
translations.ko: "이것은 검은 가시나무의 열매 같아 보입니다," 톰이 천천히 말했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: 'This looks like the fruit of the blackthorn,' said Tom slowly.

meaning_2.description: A small, purple fruit of the blackthorn bush.

translations.de: "Das sieht aus wie die Frucht des Schlehdorns," sagte Tom, Schlehe.
translations.fr: "Cela ressemble au fruit du prunellier," dit Tom, prunelle.
translations.ko: "이것은 검은가시나무의 열매처럼 보입니다," 톰이 가시나무 열매를 가리키며 말했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: "This looks like the fruit of the blackthorn," said Tom sloe.

185.pun_sentence: In his latest promotional campaign, the manager of City Tent and Awning told his crew to canvas the entire area.

meaning_1.description: Canvas refers to a heavy, coarse cloth used to make things like tents, sails, and awnings.

translations.de: In seiner neuesten Werbekampagne forderte der Manager von City Tent and Awning sein Team auf, das gesamte Gebiet mit Leinwand zu überziehen.
translations.fr: Dans sa dernière campagne promotionnelle, le directeur de City Tent et Awning a demandé à son équipe de toileter toute la région.
translations.ko: 그의 최근 프로모션 캠페인에서, 시티 텐트 앤 아닝의 매니저는 자신의 크루에게 전체 지역을 캔버스로 덮도록 지시했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: In his latest promotional campaign, the manager of City Tent and Awning told his crew to canvas the entire area.

meaning_2.description: Canvass refers to the action of seeking opinions or votes, typically by going door-to-door or contacting people in a given area.

translations.de: In seiner neuesten Werbekampagne hat der Manager von City Tent und Awning seinem Team aufgetragen, das gesamte Gebiet Haustür für Haustür abzusuchen.
translations.fr: Dans sa dernière campagne de promotion, le gérant de City Tent and Awning a demandé à son équipe de faire du porte-à-porte dans toute la zone.
translations.ko: 그의 최근의 홍보 캠페인에서, 시티 텐트 앤 아닝의 관리자는 그의 팀에게 전체 지역을 문짝에서 문짝으로 방문하며 의견이나 투표를 구하는 활동을 하라고 지시했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: In his latest promotional campaign, the manager of City Tent and Awning told his crew to canvass the entire area.

186.pun_sentence: I once worked at a factory that made boat paddles. The starting pay was ten dollars an oar.

meaning_1.description: A long, thin, usually wooden pole with a blade at one end, used for rowing or paddling a boat.

translations.de: Ich habe einmal in einer Fabrik gearbeitet, die Bootsruder herstellte. Der Anfangslohn betrug zehn Dollar pro Ruder.
translations.fr: J'ai une fois travaillé dans une usine qui fabriquait des rames de bateau. Le salaire de départ était de dix dollars par rame.
translations.ko: 나는 한때 보트 패들을 만드는 공장에서 일했습니다. 시작 급여는 패들 당 십 달러였습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I once worked at a factory that made boat paddles. The starting pay was ten dollars an oar.

meaning_2.description: A unit of time equivalent to 60 minutes.

translations.de: Ich habe einmal in einer Fabrik gearbeitet, die Bootspaddel herstellte. Der Anfangslohn betrug zehn Dollar pro Stunde.
translations.fr: J'ai déjà travaillé dans une usine qui fabriquait des pagaies de bateau. Le salaire de départ était de dix dollars de l'heure.
translations.ko: 나는 한때 보트 패들을 만드는 공장에서 일했습니다. 시작 급여는 시간당 십 달러였습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I once worked at a factory that made boat paddles. The starting pay was ten dollars an hour.

187.pun_sentence: Many are content to live in a coal mine and never see the son.

meaning_1.description: A male offspring, a child considered in relation to their parent.

translations.de: Viele sind damit zufrieden, in einem Kohlenbergwerk zu leben und ihren Sohn nie zu sehen.
translations.fr: Beaucoup se contentent de vivre dans une mine de charbon et de ne jamais voir leur fils.
translations.ko: 많은 사람들이 석탄 광산에서 살면서 아들을 보지 않는 것에 만족합니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Many are content to live in a coal mine and never see the son.

meaning_2.description: The star around which the earth orbits, providing light and warmth; the shining, radiant center of daylight.

translations.de: Viele sind zufrieden, in einem Kohlebergwerk zu leben und die Sonne nie zu sehen.
translations.fr: Beaucoup se contentent de vivre dans une mine de charbon et ne voient jamais le soleil.
translations.ko: 많은 사람들이 탄광에서 살면서 해를 절대 보지 않는 것에 만족합니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Many are content to live in a coal mine and never see the sun.

188.pun_sentence: If roosters saw how hens are treated they'd turn over in their gravy.

meaning_1.description: Gravy is a sauce often made from the juices of meats that have been cooked or roasted and then thickened with wheat flour or cornstarch for added texture.

translations.de: Wenn Hähne sehen würden, wie Hennen behandelt werden, würden sie sich in ihrer Soße umdrehen.
translations.fr: Si les coqs voyaient comment les poules sont traitées, ils se retourneraient dans leur sauce.
translations.ko: 만약 수탉이 암탉이 어떻게 대우받는지 봤다면, 그들은 그들의 육수에서 뒤집어질 것이다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: If roosters saw how hens are treated they'd turn over in their gravy.

meaning_2.description: In the context of this sentence, a grave is a place where a dead body is buried.

translations.de: Wenn Hähne sehen würden, wie Hühner behandelt werden, würden sie sich in ihrem Grab umdrehen.
translations.fr: Si les coqs voyaient comment les poules sont traitées, ils se retourneraient dans leur tombe.
translations.ko: 수탉이 암탉들이 어떻게 대우받는지 보면, 그들은 무덤에서 뒤척일 것이다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: If roosters saw how hens are treated they'd turn over in their grave.

189.pun_sentence: The dervish had so much endurance, he set a new whirled record.

meaning_1.description: To move quickly with a spinning motion.

translations.de: Der Derwisch hatte so viel Ausdauer, er stellte einen neuen wirbelnden Rekord auf.
translations.fr: Le derviche avait tellement d'endurance, il a établi un nouveau record tourné.
translations.ko: 그 수행자는 너무나도 인내력이 강했기 때문에, 그는 새로운 회전 기록을 세웠습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The dervish had so much endurance, he set a new whirled record.

meaning_2.description: Earth, together with all of its countries, people, and natural features.

translations.de: Der Derwisch hatte so viel Ausdauer, dass er einen neuen Weltrekord aufstellte.
translations.fr: Le derviche avait tellement d'endurance qu'il a établi un nouveau record mondial.
translations.ko: 수행자는 그토록 인내력이 뛰어나서 새로운 세계 기록을 세웠다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The dervish had so much endurance, he set a new world record.

190.pun_sentence: I went out for a run this morning and tripped over, I could have been wearing the wrong size shoes, I haven't seen the footage yet.

meaning_1.description: Footage usually refers to a raw, unedited material of film or video recording.

translations.de: Ich bin heute Morgen joggen gegangen und habe gestolpert, ich hätte die falsche Schuhgröße tragen können, ich habe das Rohmaterial noch nicht gesehen.
translations.fr: Je suis sorti courir ce matin et j'ai trébuché, j'aurais pu porter des chaussures de la mauvaise taille, je n'ai pas encore vu les images brutes.
translations.ko: 나는 이번 아침에 달리기를 나갔다가 넘어졌고, 내가 잘못된 크기의 신발을 신었을 수 있습니다, 나는 아직 원본 영상을 보지 않았습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I went out for a run this morning and tripped over, I could have been wearing the wrong size shoes, I haven't seen the footage yet.

meaning_2.description: A foot is the lower extremity of the leg, below the ankle, on which a person stands or walks.

translations.de: Ich bin heute Morgen zum Laufen gegangen und habe gestolpert, ich könnte die falsche Schuhgröße getragen haben, ich habe den Fuß noch nicht gesehen.
translations.fr: Je suis sorti courir ce matin et je suis tombé, je pourrais avoir porté la mauvaise pointure de chaussures, je n'ai pas encore vu le pied.
translations.ko: 오늘 아침에 달리기를 위해 밖에 나갔고 넘어졌어요, 신발 사이즈가 잘못되었을 수 있어요, 아직 발은 봐보지 못했어요.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I went out for a run this morning and tripped over, I could have been wearing the wrong size shoes, I haven't seen the foot yet.

191.pun_sentence: OLD TREE SURGEONS never die, they just take a final bough.

meaning_1.description: A main branch of a tree

translations.de: Alte Baumschirurgen sterben nie, sie nehmen nur einen letzten Ast.
translations.fr: Les anciens chirurgiens d'arbres ne meurent jamais, ils font juste une dernière branche.
translations.ko: 늙은 나무 수술사들은 결코 죽지 않습니다, 그들은 그저 마지막 가지를 취합니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: OLD TREE SURGEONS never die, they just take a final bough.

meaning_2.description: Lowering one's head or body as a sign of respect or greeting.

translations.de: Alte Baumschirurgen sterben nie, sie verbeugen sich einfach ein letztes Mal.
translations.fr: Les vieux chirurgiens d'arbres ne meurent jamais, ils font simplement une dernière révérence.
translations.ko: 노인 나무 외과 의사들은 절대 죽지 않아요, 그들은 단지 마지막 인사로 머리를 숙여요.

heterographic.pun_sentence: OLD TREE SURGEONS never die, they just take a final bow.

meaning_1.description: In a manner that causes worry or fear

translations.de: Feuer! schrie Tom alarmierend.
translations.fr: Feu ! cria Tom de manière alarmante.
translations.ko: 불! 톰이 두렵게 외쳤다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Fire! yelled Tom alarmingly.

meaning_2.description: A sudden fear or distressing suspense caused by an awareness of danger

translations.de: "Feuer!" schrie Tom alarmiert.
translations.fr: "Au feu !" cria Tom, alerté.
translations.ko: "불이야!" 톰이 위험을 인식하여 공포에 질려 외쳤다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Fire! yelled Tom alarm.

193.pun_sentence: Lizards have a very strong heartbeat which can be faintly heard anywhere on their body, said Mr. Johnson, beginning a story. 'Come listen to this tail.'

meaning_1.description: The rear movable part of a lizard's body.

translations.de: Eidechsen haben einen sehr starken Herzschlag, der überall an ihrem Körper leise zu hören ist, sagte Herr Johnson und begann eine Geschichte. 'Komm und hör dir diesen Schwanz an.'
translations.fr: Les lézards ont un battement de cœur très fort qui peut être faiblement entendu n'importe où sur leur corps, a déclaré M. Johnson, commençant une histoire. 'Venez écouter cette queue.'
translations.ko: 도마뱀은 매우 강한 심장 박동을 가지고 있어 그들의 몸 어디에서나 희미하게 들을 수 있다고 존슨 씨가 이야기를 시작했습니다. '이 꼬리를 들어보세요.'

heterographic.pun_sentence: Lizards have a very strong heartbeat which can be faintly heard anywhere on their body, said Mr. Johnson, beginning a story. 'Come listen to this tail.'

meaning_2.description: A story or narrative, either factual or fictional.

translations.de: "Eidechsen haben einen sehr starken Herzschlag, der überall auf ihrem Körper leise gehört werden kann", sagte Herr Johnson und begann eine Geschichte. "Komm und hör dir diese Erzählung an."
translations.fr: "Les lézards ont un battement de cœur très fort qui peut être faiblement entendu n'importe où sur leur corps", a déclaré M. Johnson, commençant une histoire. "Venez écouter ce conte."
translations.ko: "도마뱀들은 매우 강한 심장 박동소리를 가지고 있어 마음이든 몸 어디든 약간씩 들을 수 있다"라고 존슨씨가 이야기를 시작했다. "이 이야기를 들어보세요."

heterographic.pun_sentence: Lizards have a very strong heartbeat which can be faintly heard anywhere on their body, said Mr. Johnson, beginning a story. "Come listen to this tale."

194.pun_sentence: It wasn't school John disliked it was just the principal of it.

meaning_1.description: The head or leader of a school.

translations.de: Es war nicht die Schule, die John nicht mochte, es war nur der Schulleiter.
translations.fr: Ce n'était pas l'école que John n'aimait pas, c'était juste le directeur.
translations.ko: 존이 싫어했던 것은 학교가 아니라 그냥 그 학교의 교장이었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: It wasn't school John disliked it was just the principal of it.

meaning_2.description: A basic general truth, foundation or guideline.

translations.de: Es war nicht die Schule, die John nicht mochte, es war einfach das Prinzip dahinter.
translations.fr: Ce n'était pas l'école que John n'aimait pas, c'était simplement le principe de celle-ci.
translations.ko: 존이 싫어했던 것은 학교가 아니라, 그것의 원칙이었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: It wasn't school John disliked, it was just the principle of it.

195.pun_sentence: Mickey Mouse gives some people Disney spells.

meaning_1.description: Disney refers to Walt Disney Company or anything pertaining to it, such as its films, products, or theme parks.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Mickey Mouse gives some people Disney spells.

translations.ko: 미키 마우스는 일부 사람들에게 어지럼증을 줍니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Mickey Mouse gives some people dizzy spells.

196.pun_sentence: The race horse went lame early. It was the first out of its gait.

meaning_1.description: The manner and speed of a horse's movement.

translations.de: Das Rennpferd wurde früh lahm. Es war das erste aus seinem Gang.
translations.fr: Le cheval de course s'est trouvé boiteux tôt. Il était le premier à sortir de son allure.
translations.ko: 경주마는 이른 시간에 절뚝거렸습니다. 그것은 그의 걸음걸이에서 처음으로 나온 것이었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The race horse went lame early. It was the first out of its gait.

translations.ko: 경마는 이른 시간에 절뚝거렸습니다. 그것은 자신의 출발 게이트에서 처음 나온 말이었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The race horse went lame early. It was the first out of its gate.

197.pun_sentence: The study of ancient symbols will lead you to rune.

translations.ko: 고대 기호의 연구는 당신을 침체로 이끌 것입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The study of ancient symbols will lead you to ruin.

198.pun_sentence: A bee keeper will sell you honey with swarm wishes.

meaning_1.description: A large group of insects moving together, especially a group of bees led by a queen bee, but in this case, it's likely implying a pun with large abundance or quantity.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A bee keeper will sell you honey with swarm wishes.

199.pun_sentence: 'I'm waiting to see the doctor,' said Tom patiently.

meaning_1.description: To tolerate delay or wait for something without getting angry or upset.

heterographic.pun_sentence: 'I'm waiting to see the doctor,' said Tom patiently.

meaning_2.description: A person receiving or registered to receive medical treatment.

translations.de: "Ich warte darauf, den Arzt zu sehen," sagte Tom, Patient.
translations.fr: "J'attends de voir le docteur," a dit Tom, patient.
translations.ko: "나는 의사를 보기 위해 기다리고 있어,"라고 톰이, 환자가 말했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: "I'm waiting to see the doctor," said Tom, patient.

200.pun_sentence: Did you know that donuts were first made in Greece?

meaning_1.description: Greece is a country in southeastern Europe known for its ancient culture and history.

translations.de: Wussten Sie, dass Donuts zuerst in Griechenland gemacht wurden?
translations.fr: Saviez-vous que les beignets ont été faits pour la première fois en Grèce ?

heterographic.pun_sentence: Did you know that donuts were first made in Greece?

meaning_2.description: Grease is a fatty or oily substance often used in cooking to prevent food from sticking or to add flavor.

translations.de: Wussten Sie, dass Donuts zuerst in Fett gemacht wurden?
translations.fr: Saviez-vous que les beignets ont été faits pour la première fois dans de la graisse?
translations.ko: 도넛이 처음으로 기름에서 만들어졌다는 것을 알고 계셨나요?

heterographic.pun_sentence: Did you know that donuts were first made in grease?

201.pun_sentence: Two snakes parted, and one said, 'fangs for the memories'.

meaning_1.description: A long, sharp, and often venomous tooth of an animal.

translations.de: Zwei Schlangen trennten sich, und eine sagte: 'Fänge für die Erinnerungen'.
translations.fr: Deux serpents se sont séparés, et l'un a dit, ' crocs pour les souvenirs '.
translations.ko: 두 뱀이 헤어졌고, 한 마리가 말했다. '독니로 추억을 간직하다'.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Two snakes parted, and one said, 'fangs for the memories'.

translations.fr: Deux serpents se sont séparés, et l'un a dit, 'merci pour les souvenirs'.
translations.ko: 두 뱀이 헤어졌고, 한 마리가 '추억에 감사드립니다'라고 말했습니다.

202.pun_sentence: A bird with a headache might just migrane south.

meaning_1.description: A severe, often recurring, headache that usually affects one side of the head and is often accompanied by nausea and disturbed vision.

translations.fr: Un oiseau avec un mal de tête pourrait simplement migrer vers le sud.
translations.ko: 두통이 있는 새는 그냥 남쪽으로 이동할 수 있습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A bird with a headache might just migrate south.

203.pun_sentence: Look at those tall flowers, said Tom gladly.

translations.fr: Regardez ces fleurs hautes, dit Tom avec plaisir.
translations.ko: 톰이 기쁘게 말했습니다, 저 높은 꽃들을 보세요.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Look at those tall flowers, said Tom gladly.

translations.de: "Schau dir diese hohen Blumen an", sagte Tom, Gladiolus.
translations.fr: "Regarde ces grandes fleurs", a dit Tom, glaïeul.
translations.ko: "저 키 큰 꽃들을 봐,"라고 톰이 말했다, 글라디올러스.

204.pun_sentence: What you seize is what you get.

translations.ko: 당신이 잡는 것이 당신이 얻는 것입니다.

translations.ko: 당신이 보는 것이 당신이 얻는 것입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: What you see is what you get.

205.pun_sentence: 'It's just gold leaf,' said Tom guiltily.

206.pun_sentence: A crow in a telephone booth had no money so he had to make a collect caw.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A crow in a telephone booth had no money so he had to make a collect caw.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A crow in a telephone booth had no money so he had to make a collect call.

207.pun_sentence: On my tour of the U.K., Charles invited me to cook at Buckingham Palace, and naturally, I took photos so I could show everyone the prince.

meaning_1.description: A male member of a royal family, particularly in the United Kingdom.

translations.de: Auf meiner Tour durch das Vereinigte Königreich lud mich Charles ein, im Buckingham Palace zu kochen, und natürlich machte ich Fotos, um allen den Prinzen zeigen zu können.
translations.fr: Lors de ma visite au Royaume-Uni, Charles m'a invité à cuisiner au Palais de Buckingham, et naturellement, j'ai pris des photos pour pouvoir montrer à tout le monde le prince.
translations.ko: 나의 영국 여행 중에, 찰스는 나를 버킹엄 궁에서 요리하도록 초대하였고, 물론, 나는 왕자를 모두에게 보여줄 수 있도록 사진을 찍었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: On my tour of the U.K., Charles invited me to cook at Buckingham Palace, and naturally, I took photos so I could show everyone the prince.

meaning_2.description: An image, picture, or piece of text that has been reproduced by pressing it onto a surface, especially by using ink and paper.

translations.fr: Lors de ma tournée au Royaume-Uni, Charles m'a invité à cuisiner au palais de Buckingham, et naturellement, j'ai pris des photos pour pouvoir montrer à tout le monde l'impression.
translations.ko: 저의 영국 투어 동안, 찰스는 저를 버킹엄 궁에서 요리하도록 초대했고, 당연히, 저는 모두에게 인쇄물을 보여줄 수 있도록 사진을 찍었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: On my tour of the U.K., Charles invited me to cook at Buckingham Palace, and naturally, I took photos so I could show everyone the print.

208.pun_sentence: A waist is a terrible thing to mind.

meaning_1.description: The part of the human body below the ribs and above the hips.

translations.de: Eine Taille ist schrecklich im Kopf.
translations.fr: Une taille est une chose terrible à l'esprit.
translations.ko: 허리는 마음에 끔찍한 것입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A waist is a terrible thing to mind.

translations.fr: Un gaspillage est une terrible chose à l'esprit.
translations.ko: 낭비는 신경 쓸만한 끔찍한 것입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A waste is a terrible thing to mind.

209.pun_sentence: The sailor called his girlfriend's belly ring a naval destroyer.

translations.ko: 선원은 여자 친구의 배꼽 반지를 배꼽 파괴자라고 불렀다.
