210.pun_sentence: John Deere has just released its most powerful tractor yet. It is the torque of the town.

meaning_1.description: A twisting force that causes rotation.

translations.de: John Deere hat gerade seinen bisher stärksten Traktor herausgebracht. Er ist das Drehmoment der Stadt.
translations.fr: John Deere vient de sortir son tracteur le plus puissant à ce jour. C'est le couple de la ville.
translations.ko: 존 디어는 지금까지 가장 강력한 트랙터를 막 출시했습니다. 이것은 마을의 회전력입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: John Deere has just released its most powerful tractor yet. It is the torque of the town.

meaning_2.description: Discussion or gossip.

translations.de: John Deere hat gerade seinen stärksten Traktor bisher veröffentlicht. Es ist das Stadtgespräch.
translations.fr: John Deere vient de sortir son tracteur le plus puissant à ce jour. C'est le sujet de discussion en ville.
translations.ko: 존 디어는 아직까지 가장 강력한 트랙터를 방금 출시했습니다. 그것은 마을의 이야기거리입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: John Deere has just released its most powerful tractor yet. It is the talk of the town.

meaning_1.description: Irritable or cranky

translations.de: Musik lesen macht mich mürrisch.
translations.fr: Lire de la musique me rend grincheux.
translations.ko: 음악을 읽는 것이 저를 까다롭게 만듭니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Reading music makes me crotchety.

meaning_2.description: A musical note equal to one beat in a measure of common time.

translations.de: Musiklesen macht mich zur Viertelnote.
translations.fr: Lire la musique me fait croche.
translations.ko: 악보를 읽으면 저는 4분음표가 됩니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Reading music makes me crotchet.

212.pun_sentence: Although he perfected his comic routines on the mainland, his best audiences were in the aisles.

meaning_1.description: A passageway between rows of seats in a building such as a church or theater, airplane, or train.

translations.de: Obwohl er seine Comedy-Routinen auf dem Festland perfektionierte, waren seine besten Zuschauer in den Gängen.
translations.fr: Bien qu'il ait perfectionné ses routines comiques sur le continent, ses meilleurs publics se trouvaient dans les allées.
translations.ko: 그가 본토에서 그의 코믹 루틴을 완성했지만, 그의 최고의 관객은 복도에 있었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Although he perfected his comic routines on the mainland, his best audiences were in the aisles.

meaning_2.description: A small island.

translations.de: Obwohl er seine komischen Routinen auf dem Festland perfektionierte, waren seine besten Publikum auf den Inseln.
translations.fr: Bien qu'il ait perfectionné ses routines comiques sur le continent, ses meilleurs publics se trouvaient dans les îles.
translations.ko: 그는 본토에서 코미디 루틴을 완성했지만, 그의 최고의 관객은 작은 섬에 있었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Although he perfected his comic routines on the mainland, his best audiences were in the isles.

213.pun_sentence: People have a happy time vacationing in Ireland because they are walking on Eire.

meaning_1.description: Eire is the Irish word for Ireland itself.

translations.de: Die Leute haben eine glückliche Zeit im Urlaub in Irland, weil sie auf Eire laufen.
translations.fr: Les gens passent un bon moment en vacances en Irlande parce qu'ils marchent sur Eire.
translations.ko: 사람들은 아일랜드에서 행복한 시간을 보내고 있습니다. 왜냐하면 그들은 에어에서 걷고 있기 때문입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: People have a happy time vacationing in Ireland because they are walking on Eire.

meaning_2.description: In this context, "air" is a phrase used to describe a state of happiness or euphoria.

translations.de: Menschen haben eine glückliche Zeit im Urlaub in Irland, weil sie auf Wolke sieben schweben.
translations.fr: Les gens passent un bon moment en vacances en Irlande parce qu'ils sont sur un petit nuage.
translations.ko: 사람들은 아일랜드에서 행복하게 휴가를 보내는데 그 이유는 그들이 신났기 때문입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: People have a happy time vacationing in Ireland because they are walking on air.

214.pun_sentence: I've caught Moby Dick! Tom wailed.

meaning_1.description: To shout loudly and forcefully in pain, grief, or anger.

translations.de: Ich habe Moby Dick gefangen! Tom schrie.
translations.fr: J'ai attrapé Moby Dick ! Tom a hurlé.
translations.ko: 나는 모비 딕을 잡았어! 톰이 소리쳤다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I've caught Moby Dick! Tom wailed.

meaning_2.description: Whale is a large marine mammal with a streamlined hairless body, a horizontal tail fin, and a blowhole on top of the head for breathing.

translations.de: Ich habe Moby Dick gefangen! Tom hat wie ein Wal gebrüllt.
translations.fr: J'ai attrapé Moby Dick ! Tom a crié comme une baleine.
translations.ko: 나는 모비 딕을 잡았다! 톰은 고래처럼 외쳤다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: "I've caught Moby Dick! Tom whaled."

215.pun_sentence: To emphasize that someone is a stranger : 'As we used to say in the cheese industry, I don't know him from Edam.'

meaning_1.description: Edam is a type of cheese.

translations.de: Wie wir in der Käseindustrie zu sagen pflegten, kenne ich ihn nicht von Edam.
translations.fr: Comme nous avions l'habitude de dire dans l'industrie du fromage, je ne le connais pas d'Edam.
translations.ko: 치즈 산업에서 예전에 자주 말하곤 했던 것처럼, 나는 그를 에담치즈에서 알지 못합니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: To emphasize that someone is a stranger : 'As we used to say in the cheese industry, I don't know him from Edam.'

meaning_2.description: Adam, in this context, is used in a common idiom and refers to any man or person.

translations.de: Wie wir in der Käseindustrie zu sagen pflegten, kenne ich ihn nicht von Adam.
translations.fr: Comme nous avions l'habitude de dire dans l'industrie du fromage, je ne le connais pas d'Adam.
translations.ko: 우리가 치즈 산업에서 말하곤 했듯이, 나는 그를 아담에서 온 사람으로 알지 못합니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: To emphasize that someone is a stranger: "As we used to say in the cheese industry, I don't know him from Adam."

216.pun_sentence: Take a God look at yourself.

meaning_1.description: A supernatural being considered divine and sacred.

translations.de: Werfen Sie einen göttlichen Blick auf sich selbst.
translations.fr: Jette un regard divin sur toi-même.
translations.ko: 자신을 신성하게 바라보세요.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Take a God look at yourself.

meaning_2.description: That fits or satisfies the stipulated criteria to a high degree.

translations.de: Werfen Sie einen guten Blick auf sich selbst.
translations.fr: Prenez un bon regard sur vous-même.
translations.ko: 자신을 잘 보세요.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Take a good look at yourself.

217.pun_sentence: There was an orchestra conductor who threw tempo tantrums.

meaning_1.description: The speed at which a piece of music is played.

translations.de: Es gab einen Orchesterleiter, der Tempowutanfälle hatte.
translations.fr: Il y avait un chef d'orchestre qui lançait des crises de tempo.
translations.ko: 템포에 화를 내던 오케스트라 지휘자가 있었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: There was an orchestra conductor who threw tempo tantrums.

meaning_2.description: A person's state of mind in terms of being angry or calm.

translations.de: Es gab einen Orchesterdirigenten, der Wutanfälle warf.
translations.fr: Il y avait un chef d'orchestre qui faisait des crises de colère.
translations.ko: 성질을 던지는 오케스트라 지휘자가 있었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: There was an orchestra conductor who threw temper tantrums.

meaning_1.description: To estimate or suppose something without sufficient information to be sure of being correct

translations.de: Die Firma kommt, vermutete Tom.
translations.fr: La société arrive, a supposé Tom.
translations.ko: 회사가 온다, 톰이 추측했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Company's coming, Tom guessed.

meaning_2.description: A person who is invited to visit or stay in someone's home or attend a particular social occasion

translations.de: Die Gesellschaft kommt, Tom ist zu Gast.
translations.fr: La compagnie arrive, Tom est invité.
translations.ko: 회사가 오고 있어, 톰이 손님입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Company's coming, Tom guest.

219.pun_sentence: Wanting to buy his girlfriend a gift that she was sure to appreciate, Bugs Bunny decided that something on the order of twenty-four carats would be about right.

meaning_1.description: A unit of weight for precious stones and pearls, equivalent to 200 milligrams.

translations.de: In der Absicht, seiner Freundin ein Geschenk zu kaufen, das sie sicherlich schätzen würde, entschied Bugs Bunny, dass etwas in der Größenordnung von vierundzwanzig Karat etwa richtig wäre.
translations.fr: Voulant acheter à sa petite amie un cadeau qu'elle saurait apprécier, Bugs Bunny a décidé que quelque chose de l'ordre de vingt-quatre carats serait à peu près juste.
translations.ko: 그녀가 분명히 좋아할 선물을 여자친구에게 사주고 싶어하는 버그스 버니는 대략 스물네 캐럿 정도가 적당할 것이라고 결정했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Wanting to buy his girlfriend a gift that she was sure to appreciate, Bugs Bunny decided that something on the order of twenty-four carats would be about right.

meaning_2.description: A tapering orange-colored root eaten as a vegetable.

translations.de: In dem Wunsch, seiner Freundin ein Geschenk zu kaufen, das sie sicher zu schätzen wusste, entschied Bugs Bunny, dass etwas in der Größenordnung von vierundzwanzig Karotten etwa richtig wäre.
translations.fr: Voulant acheter à sa petite amie un cadeau qu'elle apprécierait sûrement, Bugs Bunny a décidé que quelque chose de l'ordre de vingt-quatre carottes serait à peu près correct.
translations.ko: 그의 여자친구에게 반드시 고마워할 선물을 사고 싶어하는 벅스 버니는 대략 스물네 개의 당근이 적당할 것으로 결정했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Wanting to buy his girlfriend a gift that she was sure to appreciate, Bugs Bunny decided that something on the order of twenty-four carrots would be about right.

220.pun_sentence: As they looked at the recreation of the Greek temple on Rodeo Drive while a freak ice storm was occurring, Emily and Henry were astonished by the very unusual frieze.

meaning_1.description: A broad horizontal band of sculpted or painted decoration in the upper part of a wall

translations.de: Während sie die Nachbildung des griechischen Tempels auf dem Rodeo Drive während eines auftretenden Eissturmes betrachteten, waren Emily und Henry von dem sehr ungewöhnlichen Fries erstaunt.
translations.fr: Alors qu'ils regardaient la reconstitution du temple grec sur Rodeo Drive pendant qu'une tempête de glace survenait, Emily et Henry étaient étonnés par la frise très inhabituelle.
translations.ko: 무작위로 발생한 얼음 폭풍이 일어나는 동안 로데오 드라이브에서 그리스 신전의 재현을 보면서, Emily와 Henry는 매우 이상한 프리즈에 놀랐습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: As they looked at the recreation of the Greek temple on Rodeo Drive while a freak ice storm was occurring, Emily and Henry were astonished by the very unusual frieze.

meaning_2.description: A period of below-freezing temperature causing water to turn into ice.

translations.de: Während sie die Nachbildung des griechischen Tempels auf der Rodeo Drive während eines seltsamen Eissturms betrachteten, waren Emily und Henry von dem sehr ungewöhnlichen Frost erstaunt.
translations.fr: Alors qu'ils regardaient la reconstitution du temple grec sur Rodeo Drive pendant qu'une tempête de glace étrange se produisait, Emily et Henry étaient stupéfaits par le gel très inhabituel.
translations.ko: 이상한 얼음 폭풍이 일어나는 동안 로데오 드라이브에서 그리스 신전의 재현을 보면서, Emily와 Henry는 매우 이상한 동상에 놀랐다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: As they looked at the recreation of the Greek temple on Rodeo Drive while a freak ice storm was occurring, Emily and Henry were astonished by the very unusual freeze.

221.pun_sentence: A tangled bell ringer tolled himself off.

meaning_1.description: To toll means to ring a bell, often solemnly or for a special occasion.

translations.de: Ein verworrener Glockenläuter hat sich selbst geläutet.
translations.fr: Un sonneur de cloche emmêlé s'est sonné lui-même.
translations.ko: 얽힌 종소리꾼이 스스로를 울렸다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A tangled bell ringer tolled himself off.

translations.fr: Un sonneur de cloches emmêlé s'est réprimandé.
translations.ko: 얽히고 설킨 종소리꾼이 자신을 꾸짖었다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A tangled bell ringer told himself off.

222.pun_sentence: Don't believe what you hear about fleas and ticks - it's all lice.

meaning_1.description: A small, wingless, parasite insect that infests the skin.

translations.de: Glauben Sie nicht, was Sie über Flöhe und Zecken hören - - es sind alles Läuse.
translations.fr: Ne croyez pas ce que vous entendez sur les puces et les tiques - - c'est tous des poux.
translations.ko: 벼룩과 진드기에 대해 듣는 것을 믿지 마십시오 - - 모두 이는 모두 이는 모두 이가입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Don't believe what you hear about fleas and ticks - it's all lice.

meaning_2.description: An intentionally false statement.

translations.de: Glauben Sie nicht, was Sie über Flöhe und Zecken hören - es sind alles Lügen.
translations.fr: Ne croyez pas ce que vous entendez sur les puces et les tiques - ce sont tous des mensonges.
translations.ko: 벼룩과 진드기에 대해 들은 것을 믿지 마세요 - 그것은 모두 거짓말입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Don't believe what you hear about fleas and ticks - it's all lies.

223.pun_sentence: I feel empty inside, Tom hollered.

meaning_1.description: To shout or an outcry.

translations.de: Ich fühle mich innerlich leer, schrie Tom.
translations.fr: Je me sens vide à l'intérieur, Tom a hurlé.
translations.ko: 나는 내 안이 텅 빈 것 같아, 톰이 소리쳤다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I feel empty inside, Tom hollered.

meaning_2.description: Having a hole or a space inside; being without substance or character.

translations.fr: Je me sens vide à l'intérieur, Tom creux.
translations.ko: 나는 속이 텅 비어 있어, 톰이 텅 비었다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I feel empty inside, Tom hollowed.

224.pun_sentence: Did you hear about the father that was difficult to see? He was transparent.

meaning_1.description: Allowing light to pass through so that objects behind can be distinctly seen.

translations.de: Haben Sie von dem Vater gehört, der schwer zu sehen war? Er war transparent.
translations.fr: Avez-vous entendu parler du père qui était difficile à voir? Il était transparent.
translations.ko: 볼 수 없는 아버지에 대해 들어 보셨나요? 그는 투명했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Did you hear about the father that was difficult to see? He was transparent.

meaning_2.description: One's biological or adoptive mother or father.

translations.de: Haben Sie von dem Vater gehört, der schwer zu sehen war? Er war ein transparenter Elternteil.
translations.fr: Avez-vous entendu parler du père qui était difficile à voir ? Il était un parent transparent.
translations.ko: 보기 어려운 아버지에 대해 들어 보셨나요? 그는 투명한 부모였습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Did you hear about the father that was difficult to see? He was a transparent parent.

225.pun_sentence: Selling gasoline too cheaply would be fuelish.

meaning_1.description: Material such as gas or oil that is burned to produce heat or power

translations.de: Benzin zu billig zu verkaufen, wäre unklug.
translations.fr: Vendre de l'essence trop bon marché serait insensé.
translations.ko: 가솔린을 너무 싸게 팔면 바보 같을 것이다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Selling gasoline too cheaply would be fuelish.

meaning_2.description: Lacking good sense or judgment; unwise.

translations.de: Es wäre unklug, Benzin zu billig zu verkaufen.
translations.fr: Il serait insensé de vendre de l'essence trop bon marché.
translations.ko: 너무 싸게 가솔린을 팔면 바보 같은 일이 될 것이다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Selling gasoline too cheaply would be foolish.

226.pun_sentence: 'I'm just an ordinary soldier,' Tom admitted privately.

meaning_1.description: In a manner meant for or open to only one or a select few, not publicly, confidentially.

translations.de: 'Ich bin nur ein gewöhnlicher Soldat', gestand Tom privat.
translations.fr: 'Je ne suis qu'un soldat ordinaire', a admis Tom en privé.
translations.ko: '나는 그저 평범한 병사일 뿐이야,' 톰이 비공개로 인정했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: 'I'm just an ordinary soldier,' Tom admitted privately.

meaning_2.description: The lowest rank in the army.

translations.de: "Ich bin nur ein gewöhnlicher Soldat", gab Tom privat zu.
translations.fr: "Je suis juste un simple soldat", a admis Tom en privé.
translations.ko: "나는 그저 평범한 병사일 뿐이야," 톰이 비공개로 인정했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: "I'm just an ordinary soldier," Tom admitted private.

227.pun_sentence: Having too many vowels is a consonant struggle in the game of Scrabble.

meaning_1.description: A type of letter in the alphabets used in written languages, specifically one that is not a vowel.

translations.ko: 모음이 너무 많으면 스크래블 게임에서 자음과의 싸움이됩니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Having too many vowels is a consonant struggle in the game of Scrabble.

meaning_2.description: A state of being unchanging or unwavering over time.

translations.fr: Avoir trop de voyelles est une lutte constante dans le jeu de Scrabble.
translations.ko: 스크래블 게임에서 모음이 너무 많은 것은 끊임없는 고충입니다.

228.pun_sentence: The triangular computer monitor business was just a big pyramid screen.

meaning_1.description: A flat panel or area on an electronic device or piece of equipment where images and data are displayed.

translations.de: Das Geschäft mit dreieckigen Computermonitoren war nur ein großer Pyramidenbildschirm.
translations.fr: L'entreprise de moniteurs d'ordinateur triangulaires n'était qu'un grand écran pyramidal.
translations.ko: 삼각형 컴퓨터 모니터 사업은 단지 큰 피라미드 스크린이었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The triangular computer monitor business was just a big pyramid screen.

meaning_2.description: A plan or program with a specific aim or purpose in mind. In the context of business, it often refers to a fraudulent practice where profit is earned from recruiting others to invest, rather than from any actual product or service.

translations.de: Das Geschäft mit dreieckigen Computermonitoren war nur ein großes Pyramidenschema.
translations.fr: L'entreprise de moniteurs d'ordinateurs triangulaires n'était qu'une grande arnaque pyramidale.
translations.ko: 삼각형 컴퓨터 모니터 사업은 단지 큰 피라미드 스킴이었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The triangular computer monitor business was just a big pyramid scheme.

229.pun_sentence: The psychotic florist created many flower derangements.

meaning_1.description: A state of mental confusion or disorder.

translations.de: Der psychotische Florist hat viele Blumenverwirrungen geschaffen.
translations.fr: Le fleuriste psychotique a créé de nombreux désordres de fleurs.
translations.ko: 정신병 걸린 꽃장수가 많은 꽃의 혼란을 만들었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The psychotic florist created many flower derangements.

meaning_2.description: An organized and attractive display or grouping of things, typically flowers.

translations.de: Der psychotische Florist hat viele Blumenarrangements erstellt.
translations.fr: Le fleuriste psychotique a créé de nombreux arrangements de fleurs.
translations.ko: 정신병적인 꽃장식사가 많은 꽃 배열을 만들었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The psychotic florist created many flower arrangements.

230.pun_sentence: Don't expect to eat something fancy when you're flying because it's plane food.

meaning_1.description: In the context of this sentence, "plane" is short for airplane.

translations.de: Erwarten Sie nicht, etwas Besonderes zu essen, wenn Sie fliegen, weil es Flugzeugessen ist.
translations.fr: Ne vous attendez pas à manger quelque chose de sophistiqué lorsque vous volez parce que c'est de la nourriture d'avion.
translations.ko: 비행기를 탈 때 화려한 것을 먹을 것을 기대하지 마세요, 왜냐하면 그것은 비행기 음식이기 때문입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Don't expect to eat something fancy when you're flying because it's plane food.

meaning_2.description: Plain, in this context, means simple, basic, or not fancy.

translations.de: Erwarten Sie nicht, etwas Phantasievolles zu essen, wenn Sie fliegen, weil es einfaches Essen ist.
translations.fr: Ne vous attendez pas à manger quelque chose de sophistiqué lorsque vous volez car c'est de la nourriture simple.
translations.ko: 비행 중에는 화려한 것을 먹을 것으로 기대하지 마세요, 왜냐하면 그것은 단순한 음식이기 때문입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Don't expect to eat something fancy when you're flying because it's plain food.

231.pun_sentence: Did you hear about the nervous preacher? He had sweaty psalms.

meaning_1.description: A song or hymn used in Christian and Jewish worship, often taken from the Book of Psalms in the Bible.

translations.de: Hast du von dem nervösen Prediger gehört? Er hatte verschwitzte Psalmen.
translations.fr: As-tu entendu parler du prédicateur nerveux? Il avait des psaumes en sueur.
translations.ko: 신경질적인 설교자에 대해 들어봤어요? 그는 땀 흘리는 시편이 있었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Did you hear about the nervous preacher? He had sweaty psalms.

meaning_2.description: The inner surface of the hand between the wrist and the fingers.

translations.de: Haben Sie von dem nervösen Prediger gehört? Er hatte schweißnasse Handflächen.
translations.fr: As-tu entendu parler du prêtre nerveux? Il avait les paumes des mains moites.
translations.ko: 긴장한 목사에 대해 들어보셨나요? 그는 땀이 나는 손바닥을 가지고 있었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Did you hear about the nervous preacher? He had sweaty palms.

232.pun_sentence: The winter drive-by shooting was a slay ride.

meaning_1.description: To kill someone or something.

translations.de: Die Winter-Drive-by-Schießerei war ein tödlicher Ritt.
translations.fr: Le drive-by shooting en hiver était une balade mortelle.
translations.ko: 겨울 드라이브 바이 총격은 살인의 질주였다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The winter drive-by shooting was a slay ride.

meaning_2.description: A type of vehicle typically ridden in the snow, often by horses or reindeers; a large sled.

translations.de: Die winterliche Vorbeifahrt-Schießerei war eine Schlittenfahrt.
translations.fr: La fusillade hivernale en voiture était une balade en traîneau.
translations.ko: 겨울 드라이브 바이 총격은 썰매 타기였다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The winter drive-by shooting was a sleigh ride.

233.pun_sentence: On the old trains the engineer had a lot of esteem.

meaning_1.description: To regard highly; respect.

translations.de: In den alten Zügen wurde der Ingenieur sehr geschätzt.
translations.fr: Dans les anciens trains, l'ingénieur était très respecté.
translations.ko: 옛날 기차에서 기관사는 많이 존경 받았습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: On the old trains the engineer had a lot of esteem.

meaning_2.description: Vapor generated by boiling water, used to power old trains.

translations.de: In den alten Zügen hatte der Ingenieur viel Dampf.
translations.fr: Sur les vieux trains, l'ingénieur avait beaucoup de vapeur.
translations.ko: 옛날 기차에서는 엔지니어가 많은 양의 증기를 가지고 있었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: On the old trains the engineer had a lot of steam.

234.pun_sentence: Why are Italians so good at making coffee? Because they really know how to espresso themselves.

meaning_1.description: A type of strong black coffee made by forcing steam through ground coffee beans.

translations.de: Warum sind Italiener so gut im Kaffee machen? Weil sie wirklich wissen, wie sie sich ausdrücken können.
translations.fr: Pourquoi les Italiens sont-ils si bons pour faire du café ? Parce qu'ils savent vraiment comment s'exprimer.
translations.ko: 이탈리아인들이 커피를 만드는 데 왜 이렇게 뛰어난가요? 그들은 정말로 어떻게 표현해야 하는지 알고 있습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Why are Italians so good at making coffee? Because they really know how to espresso themselves.

meaning_2.description: To convey (a thought or feeling) in words or by gestures and conduct.

translations.de: Warum sind Italiener so gut darin, Kaffee zu machen? Weil sie wirklich wissen, wie sie sich ausdrücken können.
translations.fr: Pourquoi les Italiens sont-ils si doués pour faire du café ? Parce qu'ils savent vraiment comment s'exprimer.
translations.ko: 이탈리아인들이 커피를 만드는 데 왜 이렇게 뛰어난 걸까요? 그들은 정말로 자신의 생각이나 감정을 말이나 행동으로 전달하는 법을 잘 알기 때문입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Why are Italians so good at making coffee? Because they really know how to express themselves.

235.pun_sentence: Two coin collectors got together for old dimes sake.

meaning_1.description: A dime is a type of coin in the United States worth ten cents.

translations.de: Zwei Münzsammler trafen sich um der alten Dime-Münzen willen.
translations.fr: Deux collectionneurs de pièces se sont réunis pour le bien des anciens dimes.
translations.ko: 두 명의 동전 수집가가 오래된 다임을 위해 모였습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Two coin collectors got together for old dimes sake.

meaning_2.description: In this context, 'time' refers to the past or a specific moment or period in the past.

translations.de: Zwei Münzsammler trafen sich um der alten Zeiten willen.
translations.fr: Deux collectionneurs de pièces se sont retrouvés pour le bon vieux temps.
translations.ko: 두 명의 동전 수집가가 옛날을 추억하기 위해 만났습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Two coin collectors got together for old times sake.

236.pun_sentence: The stress of having his beloved pet bunny die caused a man to go bald - he was very upset about losing his hare.

meaning_1.description: A fast-running, long-eared mammal that resembles a large rabbit.

translations.de: Der Stress, seinen geliebten Haustierhasen sterben zu sehen, ließ einen Mann seine Haare verlieren - er war sehr verärgert über den Verlust seines Hasen.
translations.fr: Le stress causé par la mort de son lapin de compagnie bien-aimé a fait perdre ses cheveux à un homme - il était très contrarié de perdre son lièvre.
translations.ko: 그의 사랑하는 반려동물 토끼가 죽는 과정으로 인한 스트레스가 남자에게 탈모를 일으켰습니다 - 그는 그의 토끼를 잃는 것에 매우 화가 났다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The stress of having his beloved pet bunny die caused a man to go bald - he was very upset about losing his hare.

meaning_2.description: The thin threadlike strands growing from the skin of people.

translations.de: Der Stress, den ein Mann durch den Tod seines geliebten Haustierkaninchens erlebte, führte dazu, dass er seine Haare verlor - er war sehr verärgert, seine Haare zu verlieren.
translations.fr: Le stress causé par la mort de son lapin de compagnie bien-aimé a fait perdre ses cheveux à un homme - il était très contrarié de perdre ses cheveux.
translations.ko: 그의 사랑하는 애완 토끼가 죽는 스트레스 때문에 한 남자가 머리카락을 모두 잃었다. 그는 머리카락을 잃는 것에 대해 매우 화가 났다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The stress of having his beloved pet bunny die caused a man to go bald - - he was very upset about losing his hair.

237.pun_sentence: Getting soap in your eyes is no lathering matter.

meaning_1.description: To create a froth or foam, usually by agitating a liquid like soap and water.

translations.de: Seife in die Augen zu bekommen, ist keine Schaumfrage.
translations.fr: Avoir du savon dans les yeux n'est pas une affaire de mousse.
translations.ko: 비누를 눈에 넣는 것은 거품을 내는 문제가 아닙니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Getting soap in your eyes is no lathering matter.

meaning_2.description: To express mirth, pleasure, derision, or nervousness with an audible vocal expulsion.

translations.de: Seife in den Augen zu bekommen, ist kein lachendes Thema.
translations.fr: Avoir du savon dans les yeux n'est pas une chose à prendre à la légère.
translations.ko: 눈에 비누가 들어가는 것은 웃을 일이 아닙니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Getting soap in your eyes is no laughing matter.

238.pun_sentence: I was fighting a Dragon, easier slayed then done.

meaning_1.description: To kill, especially in a violent or dramatic fashion.

translations.de: Ich kämpfte gegen einen Drachen, einfacher getötet als getan.
translations.fr: Je combattais un dragon, plus facile à tuer qu'à faire.
translations.ko: 나는 드래곤과 싸우고 있었는데, 죽이는 것은 하기보다 쉽다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I was fighting a Dragon, easier slayed then done.

meaning_2.description: To utter words or express a thought, opinion, or suggestion.

translations.de: Ich kämpfte gegen einen Drachen, leichter gesagt als getan.
translations.fr: Je combattais un dragon, plus facile à dire qu'à faire.
translations.ko: 나는 드래곤과 싸우고 있었어요, 말하기는 쉬운데 실제로는 그렇지 않아요.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I was fighting a Dragon, easier said than done.

239.pun_sentence: My family scoffed when I had a divine inspiration I'd get rich selling my 'Beets Brule,' but after I made my first million, they had to admit I made quite a prophet.

meaning_1.description: A prophet is a person who claims they have been contacted by a divine entity to deliver a message or teaching to others.

translations.de: Meine Familie spottete, als ich eine göttliche Eingebung hatte, dass ich reich werden würde, indem ich meine 'Rote Bete Brule' verkaufe, aber nachdem ich meine erste Million gemacht hatte, mussten sie zugeben, dass ich ein ziemlicher Prophet geworden war.
translations.fr: Ma famille a raillé quand j'ai eu une inspiration divine que je deviendrais riche en vendant mes 'Betteraves Brule', mais après avoir fait mon premier million, ils ont dû admettre que j'étais devenu un véritable prophète.
translations.ko: 나는 내 '비트 브류이'를 팔아서 부자가 될 것이라는 천진한 영감을 받았을 때 가족들이 모두 비웃었지만, 첫 백만을 벌었을 때 그들은 인정해야 했다. 나는 꽤나 예언자가 되었다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: My family scoffed when I had a divine inspiration I'd get rich selling my 'Beets Brule,' but after I made my first million, they had to admit I made quite a prophet.

meaning_2.description: Profit refers to the financial gain obtained when the amount earned from a business activity exceeds the expenses, costs, and taxes.

translations.de: Meine Familie spottete, als ich die göttliche Inspiration hatte, dass ich reich werden würde, indem ich meine "Beets Brule" verkaufte, aber nachdem ich meine erste Million gemacht hatte, mussten sie zugeben, dass ich einen erheblichen Gewinn gemacht hatte.
translations.fr: Ma famille a raillé quand j'ai eu une inspiration divine que je deviendrais riche en vendant mon "Beets Brule", mais après avoir gagné mon premier million, ils ont dû admettre que j'avais fait un bon profit.
translations.ko: 나가 "Beets Brule"를 팔아서 부자가 될 거라는 신의 영감을 받았을 때 나의 가족은 모두 비웃었다. 하지만 나는 첫 백만을 벌었을 때, 그들은 인정할 수밖에 없었다. 나는 상당한 이익을 남겼다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: My family scoffed when I had a divine inspiration I'd get rich selling my "Beets Brule," but after I made my first million, they had to admit I made quite a profit.

240.pun_sentence: The little green men told me it was the Dog Star. I told them they can't be Sirius.

meaning_1.description: Sirius is a star system and the brightest star in the Earth's night sky.

translations.de: Die kleinen grünen Männer sagten mir, es sei der Hundsstern. Ich sagte ihnen, sie könnten nicht Sirius sein.
translations.fr: Les petits hommes verts m'ont dit que c'était l'étoile du Chien. Je leur ai dit qu'ils ne pouvaient pas être Sirius.
translations.ko: 작은 녹색 인간들이 그것이 개성(狗星)이라고 말했습니다. 나는 그들에게 그들이 시리우스일 수는 없다고 말했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The little green men told me it was the Dog Star. I told them they can't be Sirius.

meaning_2.description: Serious means solemn or not joking.

translations.de: Die kleinen grünen Männer haben mir gesagt, dass es der Hundsstern ist. Ich habe ihnen gesagt, dass sie nicht ernst sein können.
translations.fr: Les petits hommes verts m'ont dit que c'était l'étoile du Chien. Je leur ai dit qu'ils ne pouvaient pas être sérieux.
translations.ko: 작은 녹색 인간들이 그것이 개성이라고 말했습니다. 그들에게 그들이 진지할 수 없다고 말했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The little green men told me it was the Dog Star. I told them they can't be serious.

241.pun_sentence: Old chicken farmers never die, they just have a dozen aches.

meaning_1.description: A chronic or continuous pain in any part of the body

translations.de: Alte Hühnerbauern sterben nie, sie haben nur ein Dutzend Schmerzen.
translations.fr: Les vieux éleveurs de poulets ne meurent jamais, ils ont juste une douzaine de douleurs.
translations.ko: 오래된 닭 농부들은 절대 죽지 않고, 그들은 단지 십여 개의 통증을 느낍니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Old chicken farmers never die, they just have a dozen aches.

meaning_2.description: An oval or round object laid by a female bird, often used as food

translations.de: Alte Hühnerbauern sterben nie, sie haben nur ein Dutzend Eier.
translations.fr: Les vieux éleveurs de poules ne meurent jamais, ils ont juste une douzaine d'œufs.
translations.ko: 늙은 닭 농부들은 절대 죽지 않아, 그들은 단지 십이 개의 계란을 가지고 있을 뿐이야.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Old chicken farmers never die, they just have a dozen eggs.

242.pun_sentence: She was only a Carpenter's daughter, but she knows every vise.

meaning_1.description: A metal tool with movable jaws that are used to hold an object firmly in place while work is done on it.

translations.de: Sie war nur die Tochter eines Tischlers, aber sie kennt jeden Schraubstock.
translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'un menuisier, mais elle connaît chaque étau.
translations.ko: 그녀는 단지 목수의 딸이었지만, 그녀는 모든 탁자를 알고 있습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: She was only a Carpenter's daughter, but she knows every vise.

meaning_2.description: A moral failing or bad habit.

translations.de: Sie war nur die Tochter eines Zimmermanns, aber sie kennt jede Laster.
translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'un charpentier, mais elle connaît tous les vices.
translations.ko: 그녀는 단지 목수의 딸이었지만, 모든 악습을 알고 있습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: She was only a Carpenter's daughter, but she knows every vice.

243.pun_sentence: Little Bo Peep grew tired of the daily search for her lost sheep and decided to keep them in the garden area close to her house. Since she no longer had to spend her days tracking down her wayward herd, Bo decided to take up the hobby of flower gardening. Now every morning Bo Peep goes out to tend her phlox.

meaning_1.description: Phlox is a type of plant that produces large amounts of fragrant flowers.

translations.de: Klein Bo Peep wurde müde von der täglichen Suche nach ihren verlorenen Schafen und beschloss, sie im Gartenbereich in der Nähe ihres Hauses zu halten. Da sie ihre Tage nicht mehr mit der Verfolgung ihrer verirrten Herde verbringen musste, beschloss Bo, das Hobby der Blumengärtnerei aufzunehmen. Jetzt geht Bo Peep jeden Morgen hinaus, um ihre Phlox zu pflegen.
translations.fr: Petite Bo Peep s'est lassée de la recherche quotidienne de ses moutons perdus et a décidé de les garder dans la zone de jardin près de sa maison. Comme elle n'avait plus à passer ses jours à traquer son troupeau égaré, Bo a décidé de se mettre au jardinage de fleurs. Maintenant, tous les matins, Bo Peep sort pour s'occuper de ses phlox.
translations.ko: 작은 보 피프는 매일 자신의 잃어버린 양을 찾는 것에 지쳐 집 근처의 정원에 그들을 두기로 결정했습니다. 그녀가 더 이상 자신의 길을 잃은 무리를 추적하는 데 하루를 보내지 않아야 했기 때문에, 보는 꽃 가꾸기라는 취미를 시작하기로 했습니다. 이제 매일 아침 보 피프는 자신의 플록스를 돌보러 나갑니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Little Bo Peep grew tired of the daily search for her lost sheep and decided to keep them in the garden area close to her house. Since she no longer had to spend her days tracking down her wayward herd, Bo decided to take up the hobby of flower gardening. Now every morning Bo Peep goes out to tend her phlox.

meaning_2.description: Flock in this context means a group of animals such as sheep.

translations.de: Little Bo Peep war es leid, täglich nach ihren verlorenen Schafen zu suchen, und entschied sich, sie im Gartenbereich in der Nähe ihres Hauses zu halten. Da sie ihre Tage nicht mehr damit verbringen musste, ihre abtrünnige Herde aufzuspüren, beschloss Bo, das Hobby des Blumengärtnerns aufzunehmen. Jetzt geht Bo Peep jeden Morgen hinaus, um ihre Herde zu versorgen.
translations.fr: La petite Bo Peep en avait marre de la recherche quotidienne pour ses moutons perdus et a décidé de les garder dans le jardin près de sa maison. Comme elle n'avait plus à passer ses journées à retrouver son troupeau égaré, Bo a décidé de se mettre au jardinage de fleurs comme hobby. Maintenant, chaque matin, Bo Peep sort pour s'occuper de son troupeau.
translations.ko: 리틀 보 피프는 매일 잃어버린 양을 찾는 것에 지쳤고, 그녀의 집 근처의 정원 지역에 그들을 두기로 결정했습니다. 그녀는 더 이상 방랑하는 떼를 추적하는 데 하루를 보내지 않아도 되었기 때문에, 보는 꽃 가꾸기 취미를 취하기로 결정했습니다. 이제 매일 아침 보 피프는 외출하여 그녀의 떼를 돌볼 것입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Little Bo Peep grew tired of the daily search for her lost sheep and decided to keep them in the garden area close to her house. Since she no longer had to spend her days tracking down her wayward herd, Bo decided to take up the hobby of flower gardening. Now every morning Bo Peep goes out to tend her flock.

244.pun_sentence: Shopaholics never die, they just sale away.

meaning_1.description: The act of selling goods at a reduced or lower price.

translations.de: Kaufsüchtige sterben nie, sie verkaufen einfach weg.
translations.fr: Les accros du shopping ne meurent jamais, ils se contentent de faire des soldes.
translations.ko: 쇼핑 중독자들은 결코 죽지 않습니다, 그들은 그냥 세일을 합니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Shopaholics never die, they just sale away.

meaning_2.description: The act of moving smoothly through water, typically referring to ships or boats.

translations.de: Shopaholics sterben nie, sie segeln einfach davon.
translations.fr: Les accros du shopping ne meurent jamais, ils naviguent tout simplement.
translations.ko: 쇼핑 중독자들은 결코 죽지 않습니다, 그들은 그냥 떠나가버립니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Shopaholics never die, they just sail away.

245.pun_sentence: We Are Not Dairy Queen… But We Have Great Sundays

meaning_1.description: Sunday is the day of the week before Monday and following Saturday.

translations.de: Wir sind nicht Dairy Queen ... Aber wir haben tolle Sonntage
translations.fr: Nous ne sommes pas Dairy Queen ... Mais nous avons de superbes dimanches
translations.ko: 우리는 디어리 퀸이 아닙니다 ... 하지만 우리는 멋진 일요일을 보냅니다

heterographic.pun_sentence: We Are Not Dairy Queen… But We Have Great Sundays

meaning_2.description: A sundae is a sweet ice cream dish that is topped with sauce or syrup, and often fruit and nuts.

translations.de: Wir sind nicht Dairy Queen ... Aber wir haben großartige Eisbecher.
translations.fr: Nous ne sommes pas Dairy Queen ... Mais nous avons d'excellents coupes glacées.
translations.ko: 우리는 데이리퀸이 아닙니다... 하지만 우리는 훌륭한 선대를 가지고 있습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: We Are Not Dairy Queen … But We Have Great Sundaes.

246.pun_sentence: Making your own hard liquor is a whiskey business.

meaning_1.description: Whiskey is a type of distilled alcoholic beverage made from fermented grain mash.

translations.de: Ihren eigenen Schnaps zu machen, ist ein Whisky-Geschäft.
translations.fr: Faire votre propre alcool fort est une affaire de whisky.
translations.ko: 자신만의 독한 술을 만드는 것은 위스키 사업입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Making your own hard liquor is a whiskey business.

meaning_2.description: Risky refers to situations involving risk or danger; potentially leading to harm or other negative outcomes.

translations.de: Selbstgemachter Hochprozentiger zu machen ist ein riskantes Geschäft.
translations.fr: Fabriquer votre propre alcool fort est une entreprise risquée.
translations.ko: 자신만의 독주를 만드는 것은 위험한 사업입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Making your own hard liquor is a risky business.

247.pun_sentence: When she made Mario Puzo's books required reading for her class, she made him an author they couldn't refuse.

meaning_1.description: A person who has written a book or who writes books as a profession.

translations.de: Als sie die Bücher von Mario Puzo zur Pflichtlektüre für ihre Klasse machte, machte sie ihn zu einem Autor, den sie nicht ablehnen konnten.
translations.fr: Quand elle a fait des livres de Mario Puzo une lecture obligatoire pour sa classe, elle a fait de lui un auteur qu'ils ne pouvaient pas refuser.
translations.ko: 그녀가 그녀의 클래스에서 마리오 푸조의 책을 필수 읽기로 만들었을 때, 그녀는 그들이 거부할 수 없는 작가를 만들었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: When she made Mario Puzo's books required reading for her class, she made him an author they couldn't refuse.

meaning_2.description: To present something for someone to accept or decline.

translations.de: Als sie die Bücher von Mario Puzo zur Pflichtlektüre für ihre Klasse machte, machte sie ihnen ein Angebot, das sie nicht ablehnen konnten.
translations.fr: Quand elle a rendu les livres de Mario Puzo obligatoires pour sa classe, elle leur a fait une offre qu'ils ne pouvaient pas refuser.
translations.ko: 그녀가 클래스에서 마리오 푸조의 책을 필수 독서로 지정했을 때, 그녀는 그들이 거절할 수 없는 제안을 했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: When she made Mario Puzo's books required reading for her class, she made him an offer they couldn't refuse.

248.pun_sentence: Those who find bargain antiques like to junk for joy.

meaning_1.description: To search through waste or discarded material, hoping to find something useful or valuable.

translations.de: Diejenigen, die Schnäppchen-Antiquitäten finden, durchsuchen gerne Müll zur Freude.
translations.fr: Ceux qui trouvent des antiquités bon marché aiment fouiller les déchets pour le plaisir.
translations.ko: 저렴한 골동품을 찾는 사람들은 즐거움을 위해 쓰레기를 뒤져보는 것을 좋아합니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Those who find bargain antiques like to junk for joy.

meaning_2.description: Leap or spring, often due to excitement or joy.

translations.de: Diejenigen, die Schnäppchen-Antiquitäten finden, springen gerne vor Freude.
translations.fr: Ceux qui trouvent des antiquités à bon marché aiment sauter de joie.
translations.ko: 특가로 구한 골동품을 찾은 사람들은 기쁨으로 인해 도약하거나 뛰어오르는 것을 좋아한다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Those who find bargain antiques like to jump for joy.

249.pun_sentence: The body builder worried too much about the lifting contest and his trainer concluded that the mind is a terrible thing to weights.

meaning_1.description: The heaviness of the thing being lifted, usually a piece of equipment for exercise or physical training.

translations.de: Der Bodybuilder machte sich zu viele Sorgen um den Hebewettbewerb und sein Trainer kam zu dem Schluss, dass der Geist ein schreckliches Ding zum Wiegen ist.
translations.fr: Le bodybuilder s'est trop inquiété du concours de levage et son entraîneur a conclu que l'esprit est une chose terrible à peser.
translations.ko: 보디빌더는 무거운 물건 들기 대회를 너무 걱정했고 그의 트레이너는 마음이 무거운 것을 들기에는 끔찍한 것이라고 결론 내렸다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The body builder worried too much about the lifting contest and his trainer concluded that the mind is a terrible thing to weights.

meaning_2.description: To use carelessly, extravagantly, or to no purpose.

translations.de: Der Bodybuilder machte sich zu viele Gedanken über den Gewichtheberwettkampf und sein Trainer kam zu dem Schluss, dass es schrecklich ist, den Verstand zu vergeuden.
translations.fr: Le culturiste s'inquiétait trop du concours d'haltérophilie et son entraîneur a conclu que l'esprit est une chose terrible à gaspiller.
translations.ko: 보디빌더는 웨이트 리프팅 대회에 대해 너무 걱정했고, 그의 트레이너는 마음을 함부로 사용하는 것은 끔찍한 일이라는 결론을 내렸습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The body builder worried too much about the lifting contest and his trainer concluded that the mind is a terrible thing to waste.

250.pun_sentence: On the way to the church our car broke down. I desperately tried to find some succor to help us resume our journey.

meaning_1.description: Assistance or help, especially in time of difficulty.

translations.de: Auf dem Weg zur Kirche ist unser Auto kaputt gegangen. Ich habe verzweifelt versucht, irgendeine Hilfe zu finden, um unsere Reise fortsetzen zu können.
translations.fr: En chemin vers l'église, notre voiture est tombée en panne. J'ai désespérément essayé de trouver de l'aide pour nous aider à reprendre notre voyage.
translations.ko: 교회로 가는 길에 우리 차가 고장났습니다. 나는 우리의 여행을 계속할 수 있도록 도움을 절실히 찾으려고 노력했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: On the way to the church our car broke down. I desperately tried to find some succor to help us resume our journey.

meaning_2.description: In informal usage, it refers to a person who is gullible or can be easily fooled or manipulated.

translations.de: Auf dem Weg zur Kirche ging unser Auto kaputt. Ich versuchte verzweifelt, irgendeinen leichtgläubigen Menschen zu finden, der uns helfen könnte, unsere Reise fortzusetzen.
translations.fr: Sur le chemin de l'église, notre voiture est tombée en panne. J'ai désespérément essayé de trouver quelqu'un assez crédule pour nous aider à reprendre notre voyage.
translations.ko: 교회 가는 길에 우리 차가 고장났다. 나는 필사적으로 우리의 여행을 계속할 수 있도록 도와줄 수 있는 쉽게 속아넘어가는 사람을 찾으려고 했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: On the way to the church our car broke down. I desperately tried to find some sucker to help us resume our journey.

251.pun_sentence: Pink satin was perfect for her gown, yet the debutante appeared even more charming with beaux on either side.

meaning_1.description: A beau is a boyfriend or male admirer.

translations.de: Rosa Satin war perfekt für ihr Kleid, doch die Debütantin wirkte noch bezaubernder mit ihren Verehrern an ihrer Seite.
translations.fr: Le satin rose était parfait pour sa robe, pourtant la débutante semblait encore plus charmante avec des beaux de chaque côté.
translations.ko: 분홍색 사틴이 그녀의 드레스에 완벽했지만, 데뷔한 그녀는 양쪽에 남자 친구들이 있을 때 더 매력적으로 보였습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Pink satin was perfect for her gown, yet the debutante appeared even more charming with beaux on either side.

meaning_2.description: A bow usually refers to a knot with loops and loose ends made with ribbon or similar material.

translations.de: Rosa Satin war perfekt für ihr Kleid, doch die Debütantin wirkte mit Schleifen auf beiden Seiten noch reizender.
translations.fr: Le satin rose était parfait pour sa robe, pourtant la débutante semblait encore plus charmante avec des nœuds de chaque côté.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Pink satin was perfect for her gown, yet the debutante appeared even more charming with bows on either side.

252.pun_sentence: Staying at the trendy, new hotel was the inn thing to do.

translations.ko: 트렌디한 새 호텔에 머무는 것이 유행하는 일이었습니다.

253.pun_sentence: The Spaniard's wife was always up before the Don.

translations.fr: La femme de l'Espagnol se levait toujours avant l'aube.
translations.ko: 스페인 사람의 아내는 항상 새벽 전에 일어났습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The Spaniard's wife was always up before the dawn.

254.pun_sentence: If children were allowed to dig for coal, would they still be miners?

meaning_1.description: A person who works in a mine, removing minerals or other resources.

heterographic.pun_sentence: If children were allowed to dig for coal, would they still be miners?

translations.ko: 만약 어린이들이 석탄을 캐도록 허용된다면, 그들은 여전히 미성년자가 될까요?

meaning_1.description: At the present time or moment.

256.pun_sentence: At some executive meetings there is a chairman of the bored.

257.pun_sentence: It's a lengthy article on Japanese Sword Fighters but I can Samurais it for you.

translations.fr: C'est un long article sur les combattants à l'épée japonais mais je peux te le résumer à l'essentiel.
translations.ko: 이것은 일본의 검투사에 대한 긴 글입니다만, 저는 그것을 당신을 위해 요약해드릴 수 있습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: It's a lengthy article on Japanese Sword Fighters but I can Samurais it for you.

258.pun_sentence: I went to prom with a broken leg. During the slow dances my date could tell that I had a crutch on her.

translations.de: Ich ging mit einem gebrochenen Bein zum Abschlussball. Während der langsamen Tänze konnte mein Date erkennen, dass ich mich auf sie stützte.
translations.fr: Je suis allé au bal avec une jambe cassée. Pendant les danses lentes, mon rendez-vous pouvait dire que j'avais une béquille sur elle.
translations.ko: 나는 다리를 부러뜨리고 프롬에 갔습니다. 느린 댄스 동안 내 데이트는 나가 그녀를 지탱하는 목판이 있다는 것을 알 수 있었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I went to prom with a broken leg. During the slow dances my date could tell that I had a crutch on her.

meaning_2.description: A crush refers to a strong feeling of romantic love for someone, usually someone you have not had a relationship with.

translations.de: Ich ging mit einem gebrochenen Bein zum Abschlussball. Während der langsamen Tänze konnte mein Date erkennen, dass ich in sie verknallt war.
translations.fr: Je suis allé au bal avec une jambe cassée. Pendant les danses lentes, mon rendez-vous pouvait dire que j'étais amoureux d'elle.
translations.ko: 나는 다리를 부러뜨려서 무도회에 갔습니다. 느린 댄스 동안 내 데이트는 나가 그녀에게 반했다는 것을 알 수 있었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I went to prom with a broken leg. During the slow dances my date could tell that I had a crush on her.

259.pun_sentence: She was small, slender with doe like eyes. 'Oh, my deer,' he whispered.

translations.de: Sie war klein, schlank mit rehähnlichen Augen. 'Oh, mein Reh,' flüsterte er.
translations.fr: Elle était petite, mince avec des yeux de biche. 'Oh, ma biche,' murmura-t-il.
translations.ko: 그녀는 작고, 날씬하며 사슴 같은 눈을 가졌다. '오, 내 사슴아,' 그는 속삭였다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: She was small, slender with doe-like eyes. 'Oh, my dear,' he whispered.

261.pun_sentence: Dorothy and Toto found to their horror that tornadoes really could raze a house.

meaning_1.description: To completely destroy or demolish something, typically a building.

translations.de: Dorothy und Toto stellten entsetzt fest, dass Tornados wirklich ein Haus dem Erdboden gleichmachen konnten.

264.pun_sentence: If a dog was computer literate, would his bark be worse than his byte?

266.pun_sentence: Doctor, doctor, I keep thinking I'm a billiard ball. - Get back in the queue. Next.

267.pun_sentence: An alien landed at a soft drink company and said 'take me to your liter'.

heterographic.pun_sentence: An alien landed at a soft drink company and said 'take me to your liter'.

translations.ko: 태양은 영원히 당신을 따뜻하게 할 수 있습니다.

269.pun_sentence: He crashed through several windows, but felt no pane.

270.pun_sentence: His wife loved pottery making but for him it was just kiln time.

272.pun_sentence: When a problem or dilemma arises : 'As plumbers say, it's not drain surgery.'
