273.pun_sentence: Patience is a virtue heavy in wait.

meaning_1.description: A period of delay or pause often associated with expectation or patience.

translations.de: Geduld ist eine Tugend, die stark im Warten liegt.
translations.fr: La patience est une vertu lourde d'attente.
translations.ko: 인내는 기다림에서 무거운 덕목입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Patience is a virtue heavy in wait.

meaning_2.description: The state of being heavy; a measure of the force with which a body is attracted toward the earth.

translations.de: Geduld ist eine Tugend, die schwer wiegt.
translations.fr: La patience est une vertu lourde de poids.
translations.ko: 인내는 무게가 많이 나가는 덕목입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Patience is a virtue heavy in weight.

274.pun_sentence: A veterinarian knows how to make a dog heal.

meaning_1.description: To recover from an illness or wound; to get better.

translations.de: Ein Tierarzt weiß, wie man einen Hund heilt.
translations.fr: Un vétérinaire sait comment faire guérir un chien.
translations.ko: 수의사는 어떻게 개를 치료해야 하는지 알고 있다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A veterinarian knows how to make a dog heal.

meaning_2.description: A command or instruction for a dog to follow closely behind its handler.

translations.de: Ein Tierarzt weiß, wie man einen Hund dazu bringt, auf das Kommando "Fuß" zu hören.
translations.fr: Un vétérinaire sait comment faire obéir un chien à l'ordre "au pied".
translations.ko: 수의사는 개에게 '발' 명령을 어떻게 내려야 하는지 압니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A veterinarian knows how to make a dog heel.

275.pun_sentence: Life is a puzzle; look here for the missing peace.

meaning_1.description: Freedom from disturbance; tranquillity.

translations.de: Das Leben ist ein Rätsel; suchen Sie hier nach dem fehlenden Frieden.
translations.fr: La vie est une énigme ; cherchez ici la tranquillité qui manque.
translations.ko: 생활은 퍼즐이다; 여기에 빠진 평온함을 찾아보세요.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Life is a puzzle; look here for the missing peace.

meaning_2.description: A part of something.

translations.de: Das Leben ist ein Puzzle; suchen Sie hier nach dem fehlenden Stück.
translations.fr: La vie est un puzzle; cherchez ici pour la pièce manquante.
translations.ko: 인생은 퍼즐이다; 여기에서 빠진 조각을 찾아보세요.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Life is a puzzle; look here for the missing piece.

276.pun_sentence: Many people think that Edgar Allan Poe was a raven madman.

meaning_1.description: A large, glossy-black bird, a member of the crow family. It is also the title of a famous poem by Edgar Allan Poe.

translations.de: Viele Leute denken, dass Edgar Allan Poe ein verrückter Rabe war.
translations.fr: Beaucoup de gens pensent qu'Edgar Allan Poe était un fou furieux au corbeau.
translations.ko: 많은 사람들이 에드거 앨런 포가 까마귀에 미친 사람이라고 생각합니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Many people think that Edgar Allan Poe was a raven madman.

meaning_2.description: To talk enthusiastically or wildly, or enjoy oneself extremely or passionately.

translations.de: Viele Menschen denken, dass Edgar Allan Poe ein enthusiastischer Wahnsinniger war.
translations.fr: Beaucoup de gens pensent qu'Edgar Allan Poe était un fou passionné.
translations.ko: 많은 사람들이 에드거 앨런 포는 열정적으로 미치게 관심을 보였던 사람이라고 생각합니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Many people think that Edgar Allan Poe was a rave madman.

277.pun_sentence: A pie went for an audition for a part in a play. The casting agent told him he performed well, but it was more of a sausage roll.

meaning_1.description: "Roll" in this context refers to a type of food, specifically a baked item typically filled with meat, in this case, sausage.

translations.de: Ein Kuchen ging zu einem Vorsprechen für eine Rolle in einem Theaterstück. Der Casting-Agent sagte ihm, er hätte gut gespielt, aber es war eher eine Wurstrolle.
translations.fr: Un tarte est allé passer une audition pour un rôle dans une pièce de théâtre. L'agent de casting lui a dit qu'il avait bien joué, mais c'était plutôt un rôle de rouleau à la saucisse.
translations.ko: 파이가 연극의 역할을 위한 오디션을 보러 갔다. 캐스팅 에이전트가 그가 잘 했다고 말했지만, 그것은 더욱 소시지 롤이었다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A pie went for an audition for a part in a play. The casting agent told him he performed well, but it was more of a sausage roll.

meaning_2.description: "Role" refers to the character or part one is expected to play in a particular context, in this case, in a play.

translations.de: Ein Kuchen hat für eine Rolle in einem Stück vorgesprochen. Der Casting-Agent sagte ihm, dass er gut gespielt hat, aber es war eher eine Würstchenrolle.
translations.fr: Une tarte a passé une audition pour un rôle dans une pièce de théâtre. L'agent de casting lui a dit qu'il s'était bien comporté, mais que c'était plutôt un rôle de saucisse.
translations.ko: 한 파이가 연극에서의 역할을 위해 오디션을 보았습니다. 캐스팅 에이전트가 그에게 성능이 좋았지만 그것은 더 많이 소시지 역할이었다고 말했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A pie went for an audition for a part in a play. The casting agent told him he performed well, but it was more of a sausage role.

278.pun_sentence: Failure is the path of least persistence.

meaning_1.description: Persistence is the quality of continuing steadily despite problems or difficulties.

translations.de: Scheitern ist der Weg der geringsten Ausdauer.
translations.fr: L'échec est le chemin de moindre persévérance.
translations.ko: 실패는 가장 덜 집요한 길입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Failure is the path of least persistence.

meaning_2.description: In this context, resistance means the refusal to accept or comply with something; a difficult circumstance or effort to overcome or deal with.

translations.de: Misserfolg ist der Weg des geringsten Widerstands.
translations.fr: L'échec est la voie de moindre résistance.
translations.ko: 실패는 가장 저항력이 적은 길이다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Failure is the path of least resistance.

279.pun_sentence: Old programmers never die, they just can't C as well.

meaning_1.description: "C" in this context refers to a high-level programming language commonly used for developing computer systems and applications.

translations.de: Alte Programmierer sterben nie, sie können nur nicht mehr so gut in C sehen.
translations.fr: Les vieux programmeurs ne meurent jamais, ils ne voient simplement pas aussi bien en C.
translations.ko: 노련한 프로그래머들은 결코 죽지 않아요, 그들은 단지 C를 잘 볼 수 없을 뿐입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Old programmers never die, they just can't C as well.

meaning_2.description: To perceive with the eyes; to discern visually.

translations.de: Alte Programmierer sterben nie, sie können nur nicht mehr so gut sehen.
translations.fr: Les vieux programmeurs ne meurent jamais, ils ne voient tout simplement pas aussi bien.
translations.ko: 노인 프로그래머들은 결코 죽지 않습니다, 그들은 그저 눈이 잘 안 보일 뿐입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Old programmers never die, they just can't see as well.

280.pun_sentence: If your dad's sisters are construction workers you might call them carpenter aunts.

meaning_1.description: The sister of one's parent.

translations.de: Wenn die Schwestern deines Vaters Bauarbeiterinnen sind, könntest du sie Zimmermann Tanten nennen.
translations.fr: Si les sœurs de ton père sont des ouvrières du bâtiment, tu pourrais les appeler des tantes charpentières.
translations.ko: 만약 당신의 아버지의 여자 형제들이 건설 노동자라면, 당신은 그들을 목수 이모라고 부를 수 있습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: If your dad's sisters are construction workers you might call them carpenter aunts.

meaning_2.description: A type of small insect, some species of which are known for their woodworking capabilities.

translations.de: Wenn die Schwestern deines Vaters Bauarbeiterinnen sind, könntest du sie Zimmermanns-Ameisen nennen.
translations.fr: Si les sœurs de ton papa sont des ouvrières du bâtiment, tu pourrais les appeler des fourmis charpentières.
translations.ko: 만약 아버지의 여자 형제들이 건설 노동자라면, 당신은 그들을 목수 개미라고 부를 수 있을 것입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: If your dad's sisters are construction workers, you might call them carpenter ants.

281.pun_sentence: The swanky hoteliers' convention tended to attract the inn crowd.

meaning_1.description: A tavern, small hotel or bed and breakfast, often situated in a rural or historic area.

translations.de: Die schicke Hotelierkonvention zog oft die Herbergenmenge an.
translations.fr: La convention des hôteliers chic avait tendance à attirer la foule des auberges.
translations.ko: 고급 호텔업자들의 대회는 종종 여관 손님들을 끌어들였습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The swanky hoteliers' convention tended to attract the inn crowd.

meaning_2.description: Involved or participating in a situation or event.

translations.de: Die schicke Hotelier-Konferenz neigt dazu, die engagierten Leute anzuziehen.
translations.fr: La convention des hôteliers chics avait tendance à attirer les personnes impliquées.
translations.ko: 멋진 호텔리어 회의는 상황이나 이벤트에 참여하는 사람들을 끌어들이는 경향이 있습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The swanky hoteliers' convention tended to attract the in crowd.

282.pun_sentence: OLD RANCHERS never die, they just breed their last.

meaning_1.description: To reproduce or cause to reproduce.

translations.de: Alte Rancher sterben nie, sie züchten nur bis zu ihrem letzten Mal.
translations.fr: Les vieux éleveurs ne meurent jamais, ils se reproduisent simplement jusqu'à la fin.
translations.ko: 노인 농부들은 결코 죽지 않습니다, 그들은 그저 마지막으로 번식합니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: OLD RANCHERS never die, they just breed their last.

meaning_2.description: To draw air into, and expel out of, the lungs.

translations.de: Alte Rancher sterben nie, sie atmen einfach nur ihren letzten Atem aus.
translations.fr: Les vieux éleveurs ne meurent jamais, ils respirent simplement leur dernier souffle.
translations.ko: 노인 목장주들은 결코 죽지 않습니다, 그들은 단지 마지막 숨을 쉽니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: OLD RANCHERS never die, they just breathe their last.

283.pun_sentence: A mathematician that couldn't stop adding up recently went incremental.

meaning_1.description: Increasing or adding on, especially in a regular series.

translations.de: Ein Mathematiker, der nicht aufhören konnte zu zählen, wurde kürzlich inkrementell.
translations.fr: Un mathématicien qui ne pouvait s'arrêter de compter est récemment devenu incrémental.
translations.ko: 더하기를 멈출 수 없었던 수학자가 최근에 점진적으로 변했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A mathematician that couldn't stop adding up recently went incremental.

meaning_2.description: Pertaining to the mind; in this context, it's typically used to describe someone who's going crazy or losing control.

translations.de: Ein Mathematiker, der nicht aufhören konnte zu addieren, ist kürzlich verrückt geworden.
translations.fr: Un mathématicien qui ne pouvait pas arrêter de tout additionner a récemment perdu la raison.
translations.ko: 최근에 덧셈을 멈출 수 없었던 수학자가 정신을 잃었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A mathematician that couldn't stop adding up recently went mental.

284.pun_sentence: Two rites make a wrong where bigamy is concerned.

meaning_1.description: A religious or other solemn ceremony or act.

translations.de: Zwei Riten machen ein Unrecht, wo es um Bigamie geht.
translations.fr: Deux rites font un tort en ce qui concerne la bigamie.
translations.ko: 이혼에 관한 두 가지 의식은 잘못이다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Two rites make a wrong where bigamy is concerned.

meaning_2.description: In this context, "right" can mean something that is correct or a good deed.

translations.de: Zwei Rechte machen ein Unrecht, wo es um Bigamie geht.
translations.fr: Deux droits font un tort en ce qui concerne la bigamie.
translations.ko: 이혼과 관련하여 두 가지 옳은 일이 잘못됩니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Two rights make a wrong where bigamy is concerned.

285.pun_sentence: The cd salesman said, 'The classical music section is right over there,' as he smoothed his pencil-thin mustache and spread another handful of Brylcreem on his hair.

meaning_1.description: A compact disc where music or other digital information is stored.

translations.de: Der CD-Verkäufer sagte, 'Die Abteilung für klassische Musik befindet sich gleich dort drüben, ' während er seinen bleistiftdünnen Schnurrbart glättete und eine weitere Handvoll Brylcreem in seine Haare schmierte.
translations.fr: Le vendeur de CD a dit, 'La section de musique classique est juste là-bas,' alors qu'il lissait sa moustache fine comme un crayon et étalait une autre poignée de Brylcreem sur ses cheveux.
translations.ko: CD 판매원이 말했습니다, '클래식 음악 섹션은 바로 저기에 있습니다, ' 그는 연필처럼 얇은 수염을 정돈하고 머리에 브릴크림을 한 움큼 더 바르면서.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The cd salesman said, 'The classical music section is right over there,' as he smoothed his pencil-thin mustache and spread another handful of Brylcreem on his hair.

meaning_2.description: Slightly disreputable or squalid.

translations.de: Der zwielichtige Verkäufer sagte: 'Die Abteilung für klassische Musik ist genau dort drüben', während er seinen bleistiftdünnen Schnurrbart glättete und eine weitere Handvoll Brylcreem in sein Haar strich.
translations.fr: Le vendeur louche a dit, 'La section de musique classique est juste là-bas,' en lissant sa moustache mince comme un crayon et en étalant une autre poignée de Brylcreem sur ses cheveux.
translations.ko: 불량한 판매원이 '클래식 음악 부분은 바로 저기에 있습니다.'라며 연필처럼 얇은 수염을 다듬고 또 다른 한 움큼의 브릴크림을 머리에 바르더라.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The seedy salesman said, 'The classical music section is right over there,' as he smoothed his pencil-thin mustache and spread another handful of Brylcreem on his hair.

286.pun_sentence: OLD CHEESE MAKERS never die, they just lose their whey.

meaning_1.description: Whey is a byproduct in the production of cheese. It is the liquid remaining after milk has been curdled and strained.

translations.de: Alte Käsehersteller sterben nie, sie verlieren nur ihre Molke.
translations.fr: Les anciens fromagers ne meurent jamais, ils perdent seulement leur lactosérum.
translations.ko: 오래된 치즈 제조업자들은 결코 죽지 않습니다, 그들은 단지 그들의 웨이를 잃어버립니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: OLD CHEESE MAKERS never die, they just lose their whey.

meaning_2.description: In this context, "way" refers to direction or a path that one is following.

translations.de: ALTE KÄSEHERSTELLER sterben nie, sie verlieren nur ihren Weg.
translations.fr: LES ANCIENS FROMAGERS ne meurent jamais, ils perdent juste leur chemin.
translations.ko: 오래된 치즈 제조자들은 결코 죽지 않습니다, 그들은 그저 방향을 잃어버립니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: OLD CHEESE MAKERS never die, they just lose their way.

287.pun_sentence: Water leaking through wallboard is usually a ceiling problem.

meaning_1.description: The top interior surface of a room

translations.de: Wasser, das durch die Wandplatte austritt, ist normalerweise ein Deckenproblem.
translations.fr: L'eau qui fuit à travers le panneau mural est généralement un problème de plafond.
translations.ko: 벽보드를 통해 새는 물은 보통 천장 문제입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Water leaking through wallboard is usually a ceiling problem.

meaning_2.description: The process of making something leak-proof or airtight

translations.de: Wasser, das durch Gipskartonplatten sickert, ist in der Regel ein Dichtungsproblem.
translations.fr: L'eau qui fuit à travers le panneau mural est généralement un problème d'étanchéité.
translations.ko: 벽판을 통해 유출되는 물은 보통 밀봉 문제입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Water leaking through wallboard is usually a sealing problem.

288.pun_sentence: I trained my dog to hunt for underground mushrooms but now he's more truffle than he's worth.

meaning_1.description: A type of edible underground mushroom that is considered a delicacy.

translations.de: Ich habe meinen Hund trainiert, nach unterirdischen Pilzen zu suchen, aber jetzt ist er mehr Trüffel wert als er eigentlich wert ist.
translations.fr: J'ai entraîné mon chien à chercher des champignons souterrains, mais maintenant il vaut plus en truffes qu'en valeur réelle.
translations.ko: 나는 내 개가 지하 버섯을 찾도록 훈련시켰지만, 이제 그는 실제 가치보다 트러플 가치가 더 큽니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I trained my dog to hunt for underground mushrooms but now he's more truffle than he's worth.

meaning_2.description: Distress, difficulty, or problems.

translations.de: Ich habe meinen Hund darauf trainiert, nach unterirdischen Pilzen zu suchen, aber jetzt ist er mehr Ärger wert als er wert ist.
translations.fr: J'ai entrainé mon chien à chasser les champignons souterrains mais maintenant il cause plus de problèmes qu'il n'en vaut la peine.
translations.ko: 나는 내 개를 지하 버섯을 찾도록 훈련시켰지만, 이제 그는 그가 가치있는 것보다 더 곤란을 일으킵니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I trained my dog to hunt for underground mushrooms but now he's more trouble than he's worth.

289.pun_sentence: OLD MILKMAIDS never die they just lose their whey.

meaning_1.description: The watery part of milk that remains after the formation of curds.

translations.de: Alte Milchmädchen sterben nie, sie verlieren nur ihre Molke.
translations.fr: Les anciennes laitières ne meurent jamais, elles perdent juste leur lactosérum.
translations.ko: 늙은 밀크메이드는 결코 죽지 않습니다, 그들은 그냥 자신의 휴액을 잃어버립니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: OLD MILKMAIDS never die they just lose their whey.

meaning_2.description: A route or direction to a specific place or a specific manner of doing something.

translations.de: Alte Milchmädchen sterben nie, sie verlieren einfach ihren Weg.
translations.fr: Les vieilles laitières ne meurent jamais, elles perdent simplement leur chemin.
translations.ko: 노년의 낙농부는 절대 죽지 않습니다. 그들은 그저 방향을 잃을 뿐입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: OLD MILKMAIDS never die they just lose their way.

290.pun_sentence: The garden club visited the nursery and found themselves in a hosta environment.

meaning_1.description: Hosta is a type of plant with simple leaves, green or variegated in color, often grown for foliage and ornamental flowers.

translations.de: Der Gartenclub besuchte die Baumschule und fand sich in einer Hosta-Umgebung wieder.
translations.fr: Le club de jardinage a visité la pépinière et s'est retrouvé dans un environnement de hosta.
translations.ko: 정원 동아리가 양묘장을 방문하고 호스타 환경에서 자신을 찾았습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The garden club visited the nursery and found themselves in a hosta environment.

meaning_2.description: Hostile means unfriendly, antagonistic or dangerous.

translations.de: Der Gartenclub besuchte die Baumschule und fand sich in einer feindseligen Umgebung wieder.
translations.fr: Le club de jardinage a visité la pépinière et s'est retrouvé dans un environnement hostile.
translations.ko: 정원 동아리가 양묘장을 방문하고 적대적인 환경에서 자신을 발견했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The garden club visited the nursery and found themselves in a hostile environment.

291.pun_sentence: I choked on my dessert and decided to sue, so I hired an attorney who specializes in tortes.

meaning_1.description: A sweet rich cake, typically baked with many eggs and often filled with fruit or nuts.

translations.de: Ich habe an meinem Dessert gewürgt und mich entschieden zu klagen, also habe ich einen Anwalt engagiert, der sich auf Torten spezialisiert hat.
translations.fr: J'ai étouffé avec mon dessert et j'ai décidé de poursuivre en justice, alors j'ai embauché un avocat qui se spécialise en gâteaux.
translations.ko: 나는 나의 디저트에 막혀서 소송을 결정했고, 과일이나 견과류를 많이 넣고 구운 달콤하고 부드러운 케이크에 전문화된 변호사를 고용했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I choked on my dessert and decided to sue, so I hired an attorney who specializes in tortes.

meaning_2.description: A wrongful act or an infringement of a right (other than under contract) leading to civil legal liability.

translations.de: Ich habe mich an meinem Dessert verschluckt und beschloss zu klagen, also habe ich einen Anwalt engagiert, der sich auf zivilrechtliche Vergehen spezialisiert hat.
translations.fr: J'ai étouffé avec mon dessert et j'ai décidé de porter plainte, alors j'ai engagé un avocat qui se spécialise dans les délits civils.
translations.ko: 나는 디저트에 목을 메였고 소송을 하기로 결정하였으므로, 내가 민사범 특화 변호사를 고용했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I choked on my dessert and decided to sue, so I hired an attorney who specializes in torts.

292.pun_sentence: I used to enjoy steak and cheese with my eggs, but it's all ova now.

meaning_1.description: In Latin, ovum means egg. However, in the context of this sentence, 'ova' is used as a homonym for 'over', to imply that the time of enjoying steak, cheese, and eggs has ended.

translations.de: Früher habe ich Steak und Käse mit meinen Eiern genossen, aber jetzt ist es vorbei.
translations.fr: J'aimais manger du steak et du fromage avec mes œufs, mais c'est fini maintenant.
translations.ko: 예전에는 스테이크와 치즈를 계란과 함께 즐겼는데, 이제는 모두 끝났어요.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I used to enjoy steak and cheese with my eggs, but it's all ova now.

meaning_2.description: Over in this context means that something has concluded or finished.

translations.de: Ich habe es genossen, Steak und Käse mit meinen Eiern zu essen, aber jetzt ist es vorbei.
translations.fr: J'aimais manger du steak et du fromage avec mes œufs, mais c'est terminé maintenant.
translations.ko: 나는 고기와 치즈를 계란과 함께 즐겨 먹었지만, 이제는 다 끝났어요.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I used to enjoy steak and cheese with my eggs, but it's all over now.

293.pun_sentence: The dentist decided he was going to try a new path to fame and fortune, and this time he would choose a different root.

meaning_1.description: The base or underground part of a tooth which extends into the jaw. In this context, it could be used as a metaphor for a fundamental part or the cause.

translations.de: Der Zahnarzt entschied, dass er einen neuen Weg zu Ruhm und Reichtum versuchen würde, und dieses Mal würde er eine andere Wurzel wählen.
translations.fr: Le dentiste a décidé qu'il allait tenter une nouvelle voie vers la gloire et la fortune, et cette fois, il choisirait une autre racine.
translations.ko: 치과 의사는 이번에는 새로운 길로 명예와 부를 창출하려고 결정했고, 이번에는 다른 뿌리를 선택할 것이다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The dentist decided he was going to try a new path to fame and fortune, and this time he would choose a different root.

meaning_2.description: A way or course taken in getting from a starting point to a destination.

translations.de: Der Zahnarzt beschloss, einen neuen Weg zu Ruhm und Reichtum zu versuchen, und diesmal würde er eine andere Route wählen.
translations.fr: Le dentiste a décidé qu'il allait essayer une nouvelle voie vers la gloire et la fortune, et cette fois il choisirait un itinéraire différent.
translations.ko: 치과 의사는 이번에는 다른 길을 선택하여 명예와 부를 향한 새로운 길을 시도하려고 결정했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The dentist decided he was going to try a new path to fame and fortune, and this time he would choose a different route.

294.pun_sentence: A motorcycle rider with bad teeth is the leader of the plaque.

meaning_1.description: A sticky substance that builds up on teeth, a sign of poor oral hygiene.

translations.de: Ein Motorradfahrer mit schlechten Zähnen ist der Anführer der Plaque.
translations.fr: Un motard aux mauvaises dents est le leader de la plaque.
translations.ko: 나쁜 이를 가진 오토바이 타는 사람이 치석의 리더입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A motorcycle rider with bad teeth is the leader of the plaque.

meaning_2.description: A group of riders or motorcycles.

translations.de: Ein Motorradfahrer mit schlechten Zähnen ist der Anführer der Gruppe.
translations.fr: Un motard avec de mauvaises dents est le leader du groupe.
translations.ko: 나쁜 이빨을 가진 오토바이 타는 사람이 팩의 리더입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A motorcycle rider with bad teeth is the leader of the pack.

295.pun_sentence: When the cattlemen's association sponsored a track and field competition, followed by a barbecue, the commemorative T-shirt read, 'We loved the meet.'

meaning_1.description: In this context, 'meet' is a sporting event where contestants compete, particularly in athletics.

translations.de: Als der Viehzüchterverband einen Leichtathletikwettbewerb sponserte, gefolgt von einem Grillfest, stand auf dem Gedenk T-Shirt, 'Wir liebten das Sportereignis.'
translations.fr: Lorsque l'association des éleveurs a parrainé une compétition d'athlétisme, suivie d'un barbecue, le t-shirt commémoratif portait l'inscription, 'Nous avons adoré la rencontre sportive.'
translations.ko: 소 사육인 협회가 육상 경기와 바베큐를 주최했을 때, 기념 T-셔츠에는 '우리는 그 대회를 사랑했다.'라고 적혀있었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: When the cattlemen's association sponsored a track and field competition, followed by a barbecue, the commemorative T-shirt read, 'We loved the meet.'

meaning_2.description: 'Meat' refers to the flesh of animals (especially that which is eaten as food).

translations.de: Als der Viehzüchterverband einen Leichtathletikwettbewerb sponserte, gefolgt von einem Grillfest, war auf dem Erinnerungs-T-Shirt zu lesen: 'Wir liebten das Fleisch.'
translations.fr: Quand l'association des éleveurs a sponsorisé une compétition d'athlétisme, suivie d'un barbecue, le T-shirt commémoratif disait : 'Nous avons adoré la viande.'
translations.ko: 축산가협회가 육상경기대회를 후원하고 바베큐를 마련했을 때, 기념 티셔츠에는 '우리는 그 고기를 사랑했다'라고 적혀 있었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: When the cattlemen's association sponsored a track and field competition, followed by a barbecue, the commemorative T-shirt read, 'We loved the meat.'

296.pun_sentence: What did the grape say when it got stepped on? Nothing - but it let out a little whine.

meaning_1.description: To whine means to make a long, high-pitched complaint or expression of distress.

translations.de: Was sagte die Traube, als sie getreten wurde? Nichts - aber sie ließ ein kleines Weinen aus.
translations.fr: Que dit le raisin quand on marche dessus ? Rien - mais il a laissé échapper un petit gémissement.
translations.ko: 포도가 밟혔을 때 무슨 말을 했습니까? 아무 것도 없습니다 - 하지만 작은 신음소리를 내었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: What did the grape say when it got stepped on? Nothing - but it let out a little whine.

meaning_2.description: Wine is an alcoholic drink typically made from fermented grapes.

translations.de: Was hat die Traube gesagt, als sie getreten wurde? Nichts - aber sie ließ ein kleines Wein aus.
translations.fr: Que dit le raisin quand on lui a marché dessus ? Rien - mais il a laissé échapper un petit vin.
translations.ko: 포도가 밟혔을 때 무엇을 말했나요? 아무것도 - 하지만 그것은 조금의 와인을 내뿜었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: What did the grape say when it got stepped on? Nothing - but it let out a little wine.

297.pun_sentence: Two lovers who had been apart for some time were reunited on a foggy day. One whispered to the other 'I mist you'.

meaning_1.description: Mist usually refers to a natural phenomenon characterised by tiny droplets of water suspended in air, almost like a light fog.

translations.de: Zwei Liebende, die einige Zeit getrennt waren, wurden an einem nebligen Tag wiedervereint. Einer flüsterte dem anderen zu ' Ich Nebel dich '.
translations.fr: Deux amoureux qui avaient été séparés pendant un certain temps se sont retrouvés un jour brumeux. L'un a murmuré à l'autre ' Tu m'as brume '.
translations.ko: 어느 안개 낀 날, 잠시동안 헤어져 있었던 두 연인이 재회했습니다. 한 사람이 다른 사람에게 속삭였습니다 ' 나는 너를 안개처럼 그리워했어 '.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Two lovers who had been apart for some time were reunited on a foggy day. One whispered to the other 'I mist you'.

meaning_2.description: 'Miss' in this context means to feel the absence of someone, to yearn for their presence because they're not there.

translations.de: Zwei Liebende, die für einige Zeit getrennt waren, trafen sich an einem nebligen Tag wieder. Der eine flüsterte dem anderen zu, "Ich vermisse dich."
translations.fr: Deux amoureux qui étaient séparés depuis un certain temps se sont retrouvés un jour brumeux. L'un chuchota à l'autre, "Tu me manques."
translations.ko: 어느 안개 낀 날, 잠시 헤어져 있던 두 연인이 다시 만났다. 한 사람이 다른 사람에게 속삭였다. "보고 싶어."

heterographic.pun_sentence: Two lovers who had been apart for some time were reunited on a foggy day. One whispered to the other, "I miss you."

298.pun_sentence: I wanted to be a clarinettist but I couldn't reed music.

meaning_1.description: A thin strip of cane or metal that vibrates to produce sound on various musical instruments, such as the clarinet.

translations.de: Ich wollte Klarinettistin werden, aber ich konnte keine Noten lesen.
translations.fr: Je voulais être clarinettiste, mais je ne pouvais pas lire la musique.
translations.ko: 나는 클라리넷 연주자가 되고 싶었지만 악보를 읽을 수 없었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I wanted to be a clarinettist but I couldn't reed music.

meaning_2.description: To understand and interpret written information or symbols.

translations.de: Ich wollte Klarinettist werden, konnte aber keine Musik lesen.
translations.fr: Je voulais être clarinettiste mais je ne pouvais pas lire la musique.
translations.ko: 나는 클라리넷 연주자가 되고 싶었지만 음악을 읽을 수 없었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I wanted to be a clarinettist but I couldn't read music.

meaning_1.description: Being insensitive or emotionally hardened.

translations.de: Podologische Fahrlässigkeit: Gefühllose Vernachlässigung
translations.fr: Négligence grave du podologue
translations.ko: 족부 의사의 과실 : 냉담한 방임

heterographic.pun_sentence: Podiatrist malpractice : Callous neglect.

meaning_2.description: A toughened area of the skin which has become relatively thick and hard due to repeated friction, pressure, or other irritation.

translations.de: Podologische Fehlpraxis: Vernachlässigung von Schwielen.
translations.fr: Faute professionnelle du podologue : Négligence des callosités.
translations.ko: 발병학 전문가의 과실 : 굳은살 방치.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Podiatrist malpractice: Callus neglect.

300.pun_sentence: He cussed in his sleep all night and woke up all swore out.

meaning_1.description: To use abusive, profane, or obscene language.

translations.de: Er fluchte die ganze Nacht in seinem Schlaf und wachte völlig ausgeschimpft auf.
translations.fr: Il a juré dans son sommeil toute la nuit et s'est réveillé épuisé de tous ces jurons.
translations.ko: 그는 밤새 욕설을 퍼부으며 잠을 잤고, 그런 말로 다 허덕여 깨어났다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: He cussed in his sleep all night and woke up all swore out.

meaning_2.description: To make someone extremely tired.

translations.de: Er fluchte die ganze Nacht in seinem Schlaf und wachte völlig erschöpft auf.
translations.fr: Il a juré dans son sommeil toute la nuit et s'est réveillé complètement épuisé.
translations.ko: 그는 밤새 욕을 하며 잤고, 완전히 지쳐서 깨어났다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: He cussed in his sleep all night and woke up all wore out.

301.pun_sentence: Goddard couldn't be reached. He was out to launch.

meaning_1.description: To begin or start, often used in the context of starting a journey or project, often referring to the act of a spacecraft lifting off.

translations.de: Goddard konnte nicht erreicht werden. Er war draußen, um zu starten.
translations.fr: Goddard n'a pas pu être contacté. Il était parti pour lancer.
translations.ko: 고다드는 연락이 안됐다. 그는 출발하러 갔다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Goddard couldn't be reached. He was out to launch.

meaning_2.description: A midday meal, often considered the second meal of the day.

translations.de: Goddard konnte nicht erreicht werden. Er war zum Mittagessen ausgegangen.
translations.fr: Goddard ne pouvait pas être joint. Il était sorti pour déjeuner.
translations.ko: 고다드를 연락할 수 없었습니다. 그는 점심을 먹으러 나갔습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Goddard couldn't be reached. He was out to lunch.

302.pun_sentence: Most hunters are nice because they're such deer people.

meaning_1.description: Deer is a type of wild animal typically associated with hunting.

translations.de: Die meisten Jäger sind nett, weil sie solche Hirschleute sind.
translations.fr: La plupart des chasseurs sont gentils parce qu'ils sont vraiment des gens de cerfs.
translations.ko: 대부분의 사냥꾼들은 그들이 사슴을 좋아하는 사람들이기 때문에 친절합니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Most hunters are nice because they're such deer people.

meaning_2.description: Dear is a term of endearment, meaning someone who is greatly loved or cherished.

translations.de: Die meisten Jäger sind nett, weil sie so liebe Menschen sind.
translations.fr: La plupart des chasseurs sont gentils parce qu'ils sont des gens très chers.
translations.ko: 대부분의 사냥꾼들은 그들이 매우 소중한 사람들이기 때문에 친절합니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Most hunters are nice because they're such dear people.

303.pun_sentence: Sign on a broken perfume bottle, 'Out of odor'.

meaning_1.description: A smell, often one that is pleasant or distinctive.

translations.de: Schild auf einer zerbrochenen Parfümflasche, 'Aus Geruch'.
translations.fr: Signe sur une bouteille de parfum cassée, 'Hors d'odeur'.
translations.ko: 깨진 향수병에 붙어있는 표시, '냄새가 나지 않음'.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Sign on a broken perfume bottle, 'Out of odor'.

meaning_2.description: Refers to a state of properly functioning or being organized and arranged in a systematic manner.

translations.de: Schild auf einer zerbrochenen Parfümflasche, 'Außer Betrieb'.
translations.fr: Panneau sur une bouteille de parfum cassée, 'Hors service'.
translations.ko: 깨진 향수병에 붙은 표시, '고장'.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Sign on a broken perfume bottle, 'Out of order'.

304.pun_sentence: The math teacher was hungry, but all she had to eat was a piece of pi.

meaning_1.description: Pi is a mathematical constant that represents the ratio of a circle's circumference to its diameter. It's approximately 3.14159.

translations.de: Die Mathematiklehrerin war hungrig, aber alles, was sie zum Essen hatte, war ein Stück Pi.
translations.fr: L'enseignante de mathématiques avait faim, mais tout ce qu'elle avait à manger était un morceau de pi.
translations.ko: 수학 선생님이 배가 고팠지만, 먹을 것은 π의 한 조각뿐이었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The math teacher was hungry, but all she had to eat was a piece of pi.

meaning_2.description: A pie is a type of food that consists of a crust filled with sweet or savory ingredients.

translations.de: Die Mathematiklehrerin war hungrig, aber alles was sie zum Essen hatte, war ein Stück Kuchen.
translations.fr: L'enseignante de mathématiques avait faim, mais tout ce qu'elle avait à manger était un morceau de tarte.
translations.ko: 수학 선생님이 배가 고팠지만, 그녀가 먹을 수 있는 것은 파이 한 조각뿐이었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The math teacher was hungry, but all she had to eat was a piece of pie.

305.pun_sentence: As Sir Galahad lifted the sacred chalice, the bottom fell out. He had indeed found the holey Grail.

meaning_1.description: Full of holes or perforated.

translations.de: Als Sir Galahad den heiligen Kelch hob, fiel der Boden heraus. Er hatte tatsächlich den durchlöcherten Gral gefunden.
translations.fr: Alors que Sir Galahad soulevait le calice sacré, le fond en tombait. Il avait en effet trouvé le Graal troué.
translations.ko: 사갈라핫 경이 신성한 성배를 들어올렸을 때, 밑바닥이 떨어졌다. 그는 실제로 구멍이 뚫린 성배를 찾아낸 것이었다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: As Sir Galahad lifted the sacred chalice, the bottom fell out. He had indeed found the holey Grail.

meaning_2.description: Sacred, divine, or venerated.

translations.de: Als Sir Galahad den heiligen Kelch hob, fiel der Boden heraus. Er hatte tatsächlich den Heiligen Gral gefunden.
translations.fr: Alors que Sir Galahad soulevait le calice sacré, le fond tomba. Il avait en effet trouvé le Saint Graal.
translations.ko: 갈라하드 경이 신성한 성배를 들어올렸을 때, 그 바닥이 떨어졌다. 그는 실제로 성스러운 그레일을 찾아냈다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: As Sir Galahad lifted the sacred chalice, the bottom fell out. He had indeed found the holy Grail.

306.pun_sentence: When Mongolians walk they like to take big steppes.

meaning_1.description: A large area of flat unforested grassland in southeastern Europe or Siberia.

translations.de: Wenn Mongolen gehen, nehmen sie gerne große Steppen.
translations.fr: Quand les Mongols marchent, ils aiment prendre de grandes steppes.
translations.ko: 몽골인들이 걸을 때, 그들은 큰 스텝을 좋아합니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: When Mongolians walk they like to take big steppes.

meaning_2.description: The act or process of moving and lifting the foot and placing it down in a new position, which is a unit of motion in walking or running.

translations.de: Wenn Mongolen gehen, machen sie gerne große Schritte.
translations.fr: Quand les Mongols marchent, ils aiment faire de grands pas.
translations.ko: 몽골 사람들이 걸을 때, 그들은 큰 발걸음을 좋아합니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: When Mongolians walk they like to take big steps.

307.pun_sentence: I wish I'd said that, Oscar, said Tom wildly.

meaning_1.description: To act in an uncontrolled, violent, or excited manner.

translations.de: Ich wünschte, ich hätte das gesagt, Oscar, sagte Tom wild.
translations.fr: J'aurais aimé avoir dit ça, Oscar, dit Tom de manière débridée.
translations.ko: 나는 그것을 말했으면 좋겠어, 오스카, 톰이 격렬하게 말했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I wish I'd said that, Oscar, said Tom wildly.

meaning_2.description: It could be interpreted as a surname.

translations.de: "Ich wünschte, ich hätte das gesagt, Oscar", sagte Tom Wilde.
translations.fr: "J'aurais aimé avoir dit cela, Oscar", a dit Tom Wilde.
translations.ko: "나도 그런 말을 했으면 좋겠다, 오스카,"라고 톰 와일드가 말했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: "I wish I'd said that, Oscar," said Tom Wilde.

308.pun_sentence: The farmer's market featured an enormous expanse of bins containing Indian corn, and I wandered aimlessly through this maize for nearly an hour.

meaning_1.description: Maize is another term for corn, especially a type that is used as food.

translations.de: Der Bauernmarkt bot eine riesige Auswahl an Behältern mit Indianischem Mais, und ich schlenderte fast eine Stunde ziellos durch diesen Mais.
translations.fr: Le marché du fermier présentait une énorme étendue de bacs contenant du maïs indien, et j'ai erré sans but à travers ce maïs pendant près d'une heure.
translations.ko: 농부의 시장에서는 인디언 옥수수가 들어 있는 큰 덩어리의 통들이 전시되어 있었고, 나는 거의 한 시간 동안 목적 없이 이 옥수수 속을 헤매었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The farmer's market featured an enormous expanse of bins containing Indian corn, and I wandered aimlessly through this maize for nearly an hour.

meaning_2.description: A maze is a complex network of paths or passages that is difficult to find one's way through.

translations.de: Der Bauernmarkt verfügte über eine enorme Fläche mit Behältern, die Indian corn enthielten, und ich wanderte fast eine Stunde lang ziellos durch dieses Labyrinth.
translations.fr: Le marché du fermier présentait une énorme étendue de bacs contenant du maïs indien, et j'ai déambulé sans but dans ce labyrinthe pendant près d'une heure.
translations.ko: 농부의 시장에는 인디언 옥수수가 들어있는 거대한 덩어리가 있었고, 나는 거의 한 시간 동안 이 미로를 목적 없이 방황하였다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The farmer's market featured an enormous expanse of bins containing Indian corn, and I wandered aimlessly through this maze for nearly an hour.

309.pun_sentence: The soap-eating cult was swallowing lyes in search of the truth.

meaning_1.description: A strong alkaline solution or substance that is used in making soap.

translations.de: Die Seifen-Essende Kult schluckte Lügen auf der Suche nach der Wahrheit.
translations.fr: Le culte mangeur de savon avalait des lessives à la recherche de la vérité.
translations.ko: 비누를 먹는 종교 집단은 진실을 찾기 위해 염화 나트륨을 삼키고 있었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The soap-eating cult was swallowing lyes in search of the truth.

meaning_2.description: An intentionally false statement.

translations.de: Die seifenfressende Sekte schluckte Lügen auf der Suche nach der Wahrheit.
translations.fr: Le culte mangeur de savon avalait des mensonges à la recherche de la vérité.
translations.ko: 비누를 먹는 컬트는 진실을 찾기 위해 거짓말을 삼키고 있었다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The soap-eating cult was swallowing lies in search of the truth.

310.pun_sentence: Why was the orange sad? He had peelings for the apple.

meaning_1.description: The outer skin of a fruit or vegetable

translations.de: Warum war die Orange traurig? Sie hatte Gefühle für den Apfel. (Note: In German, the joke is lost because peelings is not a play on words as in English.)
translations.fr: Pourquoi l'orange était-elle triste ? Elle avait des sentiments pour la pomme. (Note: In French, the joke is lost because peelings is not a play on words as in English.)
translations.ko: 왜 오렌지는 슬펐을까? 그는 사과에 대한 감정을 가지고 있었습니다. (This is transliteration of the joke into Korean: "Wae orenjineun seulpeoss-eulkka? Geuneun sagwa-e daehan gamjeong-eul gajigo iss-eossseubnida." But note that the play on words is lost in Korean as well.)

heterographic.pun_sentence: Why was the orange sad? He had peelings for the apple.

meaning_2.description: An emotional state or reaction

translations.de: Warum war die Orange traurig? Sie hatte Gefühle für den Apfel.
translations.fr: Pourquoi l'orange était-elle triste ? Elle avait des sentiments pour la pomme.
translations.ko: 왜 오렌지는 슬펐을까요? 그는 사과에 감정을 느꼈습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Why was the orange sad? He had feelings for the apple.

311.pun_sentence: They were the quietest burglars in the history of New York City. The newspapers called them 'Criminal Mimes.'

meaning_1.description: A performer who uses gestures and body movements without speech to entertain.

translations.de: Sie waren die leisesten Einbrecher in der Geschichte von New York City. Die Zeitungen nannten sie 'Verbrecher-Mimen'.
translations.fr: Ils étaient les cambrioleurs les plus silencieux de l'histoire de New York. Les journaux les appelaient 'Mimes Criminels'.
translations.ko: 그들은 뉴욕시 역사에서 가장 조용한 강도였습니다. 신문은 그들을 '범죄 마임'이라고 불렀습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: They were the quietest burglars in the history of New York City. The newspapers called them 'Criminal Mimes.'

meaning_2.description: The human intellect or its functionality relating to thinking and processing information.

translations.de: Sie waren die leisesten Einbrecher in der Geschichte von New York City. Die Zeitungen nannten sie 'Kriminelle Köpfe'.
translations.fr: Ils étaient les cambrioleurs les plus silencieux de l'histoire de la ville de New York. Les journaux les appelaient 'Esprits Criminels'.
translations.ko: 그들은 뉴욕 시의 역사에서 가장 조용한 강도였습니다. 신문은 그들을 '범죄의 마음'이라고 불렀습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: They were the quietest burglars in the history of New York City. The newspapers called them 'Criminal Minds.'

312.pun_sentence: Upon being shown a uniquely sculptured piece of so-called granite, a geologist remarked to his colleague 'You know that's really gneiss.'

meaning_1.description: Gneiss is a type of high-grade metamorphic rock with a banded texture.

translations.de: Nachdem ihm ein einzigartig skulpturiertes Stück sogenanntem Granit gezeigt wurde, bemerkte ein Geologe zu seinem Kollegen ' Du weißt, das ist wirklich Gneis. '
translations.fr: Après avoir vu une pièce de granite soi-disant unique, un géologue a remarqué à son collègue ' Tu sais que c'est vraiment du gneiss. '
translations.ko: 독특하게 조각된 그래니트라고 불리는 조각을 보여주자 지질학자가 동료에게 '그것은 실제로 진암이야.' 라고 말했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Upon being shown a uniquely sculptured piece of so-called granite, a geologist remarked to his colleague 'You know that's really gneiss.'

meaning_2.description: Nice can mean pleasing and agreeable in nature. It can express approval or satisfaction.

translations.de: Nachdem ihm ein einzigartig geformtes Stück sogenannter Granite gezeigt wurde, bemerkte ein Geologe zu seinem Kollegen "Du weißt, das ist echt nett."
translations.fr: Après avoir vu une pièce unique de ce qu'on appelle du granit, un géologue a fait remarquer à son collègue "Tu sais que c'est vraiment agréable."
translations.ko: 그가 독특하게 조각된 소위 화강암 조각을 보자, 한 지질학자가 동료에게 "그거 참 좋아."라고 말했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Upon being shown a uniquely sculptured piece of so-called granite, a geologist remarked to his colleague "You know that's really nice."

313.pun_sentence: A cardboard belt would be a waist of paper.

meaning_1.description: The portion of the body between the ribs and hips.

translations.de: Ein Kartongürtel wäre eine Verschwendung von Papier.
translations.fr: Une ceinture en carton serait un gaspillage de papier.
translations.ko: 판지 허리띠는 종이의 낭비가 될 것입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A cardboard belt would be a waist of paper.

meaning_2.description: The use of resources in an inefficient and extravagant manner, especially when they're not necessary.

translations.de: Ein Gürtel aus Karton wäre eine Verschwendung von Papier.
translations.fr: Une ceinture en carton serait un gaspillage de papier.
translations.ko: 판지 허리띠는 종이 낭비가 될 것입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A cardboard belt would be a waste of paper.

314.pun_sentence: A fight over love and money would be duel purpose.

meaning_1.description: A duel refers to a formal combat between two people, usually with weapons, to settle a matter of honor.

translations.de: Ein Kampf um Liebe und Geld wäre ein Zweckduell.
translations.fr: Un combat pour l'amour et l'argent serait un duel à double utilité.
translations.ko: 사랑과 돈을 위한 싸움은 이중 목적의 결투가 될 것이다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A fight over love and money would be duel purpose.

meaning_2.description: Dual refers to something that consists of two parts, elements, or aspects.

translations.de: Ein Streit über Liebe und Geld wäre doppelzweck.
translations.fr: Un combat sur l'amour et l'argent serait à double objectif.
translations.ko: 사랑과 돈에 대한 싸움은 이중 목적이 될 것이다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A fight over love and money would be dual purpose.

315.pun_sentence: He doesn't talk much does he? He's just a little horse.

meaning_1.description: A large, solid-hoofed mammal used for riding and for pulling heavy loads.

translations.de: Er spricht nicht viel, oder? Er ist nur ein kleines Pferd.
translations.fr: Il ne parle pas beaucoup, n'est-ce pas ? Il n'est qu'un petit cheval.
translations.ko: 그는 많이 말하지 않는다, 그렇지 않나? 그는 그저 작은 말이야.

heterographic.pun_sentence: He doesn't talk much does he? He's just a little horse.

meaning_2.description: Having a rough, typically low voice, often due to a sore throat or cold.

translations.de: Er redet nicht viel, oder? Er ist nur ein wenig heiser.
translations.fr: Il ne parle pas beaucoup, n'est-ce pas? Il est juste un peu enroué.
translations.ko: 그는 많이 말하지 않죠, 그렇죠? 그냥 목이 좀 쉬었을 뿐이에요.

heterographic.pun_sentence: He doesn't talk much, does he? He's just a little hoarse.

316.pun_sentence: I always had wanted to know how ships really worked, and now I finally was going to sea.

meaning_1.description: The large body of salt water that covers most of the Earth's surface.

translations.de: Ich hatte immer wissen wollen, wie Schiffe wirklich funktionieren, und jetzt ging ich endlich zum Meer.
translations.fr: J'ai toujours voulu savoir comment les navires fonctionnent vraiment, et maintenant je vais enfin à la mer.
translations.ko: 나는 항상 배가 어떻게 실제로 작동하는지 알고 싶었고, 이제 드디어 바다로 갈 것입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I always had wanted to know how ships really worked, and now I finally was going to sea.

meaning_2.description: To perceive with the eyes; discern visually.

translations.de: Ich hatte immer wissen wollen, wie Schiffe wirklich funktionieren, und jetzt würde ich endlich sehen.
translations.fr: J'ai toujours voulu savoir comment les navires fonctionnaient vraiment, et maintenant j'allais enfin voir.
translations.ko: 나는 항상 배가 어떻게 실제로 작동하는지 알고 싶었고, 이제 드디어 볼 수 있을 것입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I always had wanted to know how ships really worked, and now I finally was going to see.

317.pun_sentence: The killer followed the psychopath into the forest where he was surrounded by the copse.

meaning_1.description: A small group of trees

translations.de: Der Mörder folgte dem Psychopathen in den Wald, wo er von dem Wäldchen umgeben war.
translations.fr: Le tueur a suivi le psychopathe dans la forêt où il était entouré par le bosquet.
translations.ko: 그 살인자는 그림자를 숲으로 따라갔고, 그곳에서 그는 나무 무리에 둘러싸였습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The killer followed the psychopath into the forest where he was surrounded by the copse.

meaning_2.description: A term used for a police officer.

translations.de: Der Mörder folgte dem Psychopathen in den Wald, wo er von dem Polizisten umgeben war.
translations.fr: Le tueur a suivi le psychopathe dans la forêt où il a été encerclé par le policier.
translations.ko: 그 살인마는 숲으로 사이코패스를 따라갔고 그곳에서 그는 경찰에게 둘러싸였다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The killer followed the psychopath into the forest where he was surrounded by the cop.

318.pun_sentence: People who hate the marines are rotten to the corps.

meaning_1.description: A main or central group of trained personnel, often referring to a branch of the military or a team.

translations.de: Menschen, die die Marine hassen, sind bis zum Korps verrottet.
translations.fr: Les personnes qui détestent les marins sont pourris jusqu'au corps.
translations.ko: 해병대를 싫어하는 사람들은 본체까지 썩어 있다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: People who hate the marines are rotten to the corps.

meaning_2.description: The most central, innermost, or essential part of something.

translations.de: Menschen, die die Marines hassen, sind bis ins Mark verfault.
translations.fr: Les gens qui détestent les marins sont pourris jusqu'à la moelle.
translations.ko: 해병을 싫어하는 사람들은 본질적으로 부패하다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: People who hate the marines are rotten to the core.

319.pun_sentence: The man loved a good play on words but his wife couldn't stand the punishment.

meaning_1.description: The infliction or enforcement of a penalty as retribution for an offence.

translations.de: Der Mann liebte ein gutes Wortspiel, aber seine Frau konnte die Bestrafung nicht ertragen.
translations.fr: L'homme aimait un bon jeu de mots mais sa femme ne pouvait pas supporter la punition.
translations.ko: 그 남자는 좋은 말장난을 좋아했지만 그의 아내는 벌을 견디지 못했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The man loved a good play on words but his wife couldn't stand the punishment.

meaning_2.description: A joke exploiting the different possible meanings of a word or the fact that there are words that sound alike but have different meanings.

translations.de: Der Mann liebte ein gutes Wortspiel, aber seine Frau konnte den Witz nicht ausstehen.
translations.fr: L'homme adorait les jeux de mots, mais sa femme ne supportait pas les calembours.
translations.ko: 그 남자는 좋은 말장난을 좋아했지만 그의 아내는 말장난을 참을 수 없었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The man loved a good play on words but his wife couldn't stand the pun.

320.pun_sentence: Marine biologists never make mistakes on porpoise.

meaning_1.description: A type of small toothed whale

translations.de: Meeresbiologen machen nie Fehler bei Schweinswalen.
translations.fr: Les biologistes marins ne font jamais d'erreurs sur les marsouins.
translations.ko: 해양 생물학자들은 절대로 넙치에 대해 실수하지 않습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Marine biologists never make mistakes on porpoise.

meaning_2.description: The reason for which something is done or created or for which something exists.

translations.de: Meeresbiologen machen nie absichtlich Fehler.
translations.fr: Les biologistes marins ne font jamais d'erreurs intentionnellement.
translations.ko: 해양생물학자들은 절대 고의로 실수하지 않습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Marine biologists never make mistakes on purpose.

321.pun_sentence: I met some cult members who worshiped soup serving utensils. I said, 'Oh ye of ladle faith.'

meaning_1.description: A ladle is a large long-handled spoon with a cup-shaped bowl, used for serving soup, stew, or sauce.

translations.de: Ich habe einige Kultmitglieder getroffen, die Suppenschöpfwerkzeuge verehrten. Ich sagte: 'Oh ihr vom Schöpflöffelglauben.'
translations.fr: J'ai rencontré des membres de secte qui adoraient des ustensiles pour servir la soupe. J'ai dit, 'Oh toi qui a foi en la louche.'
translations.ko: 나는 국자를 숭배하는 일부 교단 신도들을 만났습니다. 나는 말했습니다, '오, 국자 믿음이 있는 자여.'

heterographic.pun_sentence: I met some cult members who worshiped soup serving utensils. I said, 'Oh ye of ladle faith.'

meaning_2.description: Here, 'little' refers to a small amount or extent.

translations.de: Ich traf einige Kultmitglieder, die Suppenservierutensilien verehrten. Ich sagte: "Oh du von kleinem Glauben."
translations.fr: J'ai rencontré des membres d'une secte qui vénéraient des ustensiles pour servir la soupe. J'ai dit, "Oh toi de peu de foi."
translations.ko: 나는 수프를 떠내는 도구를 숭배하는 일부 교단원들을 만났습니다. 나는 말했습니다, "아, 믿음이 작은 이여."

heterographic.pun_sentence: I met some cult members who worshiped soup serving utensils. I said, "Oh ye of little faith."

322.pun_sentence: The salt said 'hi' to the pepper. It was seasonings greetings.

meaning_1.description: A substance added to food to enhance the flavor.

translations.de: Das Salz sagte ' hallo ' zum Pfeffer. Es waren Gewürzgrüße.
translations.fr: Le sel a dit ' salut ' au poivre. C'était des salutations d'assaisonnement.
translations.ko: 소금이 후추에게 '안녕'이라고 했습니다. 그것은 조미료 인사였습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The salt said 'hi' to the pepper. It was seasonings greetings.

meaning_2.description: One of the four divisions of the year (spring, summer, autumn, and winter) characterized by particular climatic conditions.

translations.de: Das Salz sagte 'hallo' zum Pfeffer. Es war die Begrüßung der Jahreszeiten.
translations.fr: Le sel a dit 'salut' au poivre. C'était les salutations de saison.
translations.ko: 소금이 후추에게 '안녕'이라고 말했습니다. 그것은 계절의 인사였습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The salt said ' hi ' to the pepper. It was season's greetings.

323.pun_sentence: When I asked him whether we ought to climb the steep hill, he started up the incline and, in ascent, said, 'Yes.'

meaning_1.description: The act of climbing or moving upwards.

translations.de: Als ich ihn fragte, ob wir den steilen Hügel hinaufsteigen sollten, begann er den Anstieg und sagte beim Aufstieg, 'Ja.'
translations.fr: Quand je lui ai demandé si nous devrions grimper la colline abrupte, il a commencé l'inclinaison et, en montant, a dit, 'Oui.'
translations.ko: 나는 우리가 가파른 언덕을 오르는 것이 좋을지 그에게 물었을 때, 그는 경사를 올라가기 시작하였고, 오르는 도중에 '그래.'라고 말했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: When I asked him whether we ought to climb the steep hill, he started up the incline and, in ascent, said, 'Yes.'

meaning_2.description: Agreement or approval to something.

translations.de: Als ich ihn fragte, ob wir den steilen Hügel erklimmen sollten, begann er den Hang hinaufzugehen und sagte in Zustimmung, 'Ja.'
translations.fr: Lorsque je lui ai demandé si nous devions gravir la colline abrupte, il a commencé à monter la pente et, en signe d'accord, a dit, 'Oui.'
translations.ko: 나가 그가 우리가 가파른 언덕을 오르는 것이 맞는지 물었을 때, 그는 경사로를 시작하고 동의라는 뜻으로 '그래.'라고 말했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: When I asked him whether we ought to climb the steep hill, he started up the incline and, in assent, said, 'Yes.'

324.pun_sentence: As anyone who has ever lived in the area can tell you, life is different in Montana. Since golf courses are often placed in areas ideal for hunting, most golfers carry a hunting rifle in their golf bag and when the opportunity presents itself combine their two favorite pastimes. Recently one such sportsman got lost and had to stop for directions asking, 'Which way to the lynx.'

meaning_1.description: A medium-sized wild cat that lives solitarily in remote northern forests.

translations.de: Wie jeder, der jemals in der Gegend gelebt hat, Ihnen sagen kann, ist das Leben in Montana anders. Da Golfplätze oft in idealen Jagdgebieten angelegt werden, tragen die meisten Golfer ein Jagdgewehr in ihrer Golftasche und kombinieren bei Gelegenheit ihre beiden Lieblingshobbys. Kürzlich verirrte sich ein solcher Sportler und musste nach dem Weg fragen. Er fragte: 'In welche Richtung ist der Luchs'.
translations.fr: Comme toute personne ayant déjà vécu dans la région peut vous le dire, la vie est différente au Montana. Puisque les terrains de golf sont souvent situés dans des zones idéales pour la chasse, la majorité des golfeurs portent un fusil de chasse dans leur sac de golf et lorsqu'ils le peuvent, ils combinent leurs deux passe-temps préférés. Récemment, un de ces sportifs s'est perdu et a dû s'arrêter pour demander son chemin, demandant : 'Dans quelle direction se trouve le lynx'.
translations.ko: 그 지역에 살아본 사람이라면 누구나 말할 수 있을 것입니다, 몬타나에서의 생활은 달라요. 골프 코스는 종종 사냥하기에 이상적인 지역에 자리잡고 있기 때문에, 대부분의 골퍼들은 사냥총을 골프 가방에 넣고 있으며, 기회가 오면 자신들의 두 가지 최애 활동을 결합합니다. 최근에 그런 운동꾼 한 명이 길을 잃고 '산림고양이가 어디로 가는지' 방향을 묻는 데 멈춰서야 했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: As anyone who has ever lived in the area can tell you, life is different in Montana. Since golf courses are often placed in areas ideal for hunting, most golfers carry a hunting rifle in their golf bag and when the opportunity presents itself combine their two favorite pastimes. Recently one such sportsman got lost and had to stop for directions asking, 'Which way to the lynx.'

meaning_2.description: Areas of open, undulating land with closely mown grass, often by the sea, specifically intended for playing golf.

translations.de: Kürzlich verirrte sich ein solcher Sportler und musste anhalten um nach dem Weg zu fragen, 'Welchen Weg zum Golfplatz?'
translations.fr: Récemment, un tel sportif s'est perdu et a dû s'arrêter pour demander son chemin, demandant, 'Quelle direction pour le terrain de golf?'
translations.ko: 최근에 그런 선수가 길을 잃고 방향을 묻기 위해 멈춰야 했습니다, '골프장은 어느 쪽인가요?'

heterographic.pun_sentence: Recently one such sportsman got lost and had to stop for directions asking, 'Which way to the links.'

325.pun_sentence: He gave up playing chess, and went on to a checkered career.

meaning_1.description: Marked by periods of varied fortune or discreditable incidents.

translations.de: Er gab das Schachspiel auf und ging einer wechselhaften Karriere nach.
translations.fr: Il a abandonné les échecs et a poursuivi une carrière en dents de scie.
translations.ko: 그는 체스를 포기하고, 다양한 행운이나 불명예스러운 사건들로 표시된 경력을 이어갔습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: He gave up playing chess, and went on to a checkered career.

meaning_2.description: Checkers is a popular board game played by two people on a checkered square board.

translations.de: Er gab das Schachspiel auf und begann eine Karriere im Dame-Spiel.
translations.fr: Il a abandonné les échecs et s'est orienté vers une carrière dans le jeu de dames.
translations.ko: 그는 체스를 포기하고 장기 경력을 시작했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: He gave up playing chess, and went on to a checkers career.

326.pun_sentence: Noah wasn't the first off the ark. He came forth.

meaning_1.description: To move forward or outward in any direction.

translations.de: Noah war nicht der Erste, der aus der Arche kam. Er kam vor.
translations.fr: Noah n'était pas le premier à sortir de l'arche. Il est venu en avant.
translations.ko: 노아는 방주에서 먼저 나오지 않았습니다. 그는 앞으로 나왔습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Noah wasn't the first off the ark. He came forth.

meaning_2.description: To be in the position or order of number four.

translations.de: Noah war nicht der erste, der die Arche verließ. Er kam als vierter.
translations.fr: Noah n'était pas le premier à sortir de l'arche. Il est arrivé quatrième.
translations.ko: 노아는 방주에서 가장 먼저 나오지 않았습니다. 그는 네 번째로 왔습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Noah wasn't the first off the ark. He came fourth.

327.pun_sentence: Tying up a circle may take a lot of chords.

meaning_1.description: In geometry, a chord of a circle is a straight line segment whose endpoints both lie on the circle.

translations.de: Das Binden eines Kreises kann viele Sehnen erfordern.
translations.fr: Attacher un cercle peut nécessiter beaucoup de cordes.
translations.ko: 원을 묶는 데는 많은 현이 필요할 수 있습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Tying up a circle may take a lot of chords.

meaning_2.description: A cord or string can be thin, flexible, strong material often made of twisted strands of fiber, and used for tying, binding, or hanging something.

translations.de: Einen Kreis zu binden, kann viele Schnüre benötigen.
translations.fr: Attacher un cercle peut nécessiter beaucoup de cordes.
translations.ko: 원을 묶는데는 많은 끈이 필요할 수 있습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Tying up a circle may take a lot of cords.

328.pun_sentence: OLD BRIDGE PLAYERS never die, they just sit around on their fat aces.

meaning_1.description: The term "ace" in this context refers to a playing card which is typically the highest valued card in the game of Bridge.

translations.de: ALTBRÜCKEN-Spieler sterben nie, sie sitzen nur auf ihren fetten Assen.
translations.fr: Les joueurs du VIEUX PONT ne meurent jamais, ils restent simplement assis sur leurs gros as.
translations.ko: 올드 브릿지 플레이어는 결코 죽지 않습니다, 그들은 단지 자신의 뚱뚱한 에이스를 두고 앉아 있을 뿐입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: OLD BRIDGE PLAYERS never die, they just sit around on their fat aces.

meaning_2.description: Here, the term "ass" is slang for a person's buttocks.

translations.de: Alte Bridge-Spieler sterben nie, sie sitzen nur auf ihren fetten Hintern herum.
translations.fr: Les anciens joueurs de bridge ne meurent jamais, ils restent assis sur leurs grosses fesses.
translations.ko: 올드 브리지 플레이어들은 결코 죽지 않아, 그들은 그저 그들의 뚱뚱한 엉덩이에 앉아 있을 뿐이야.

heterographic.pun_sentence: OLD BRIDGE PLAYERS never die, they just sit around on their fat asses.

329.pun_sentence: 'There's no need for silence,' Tom allowed.

meaning_1.description: To permit, approve, or admit.

translations.de: "Es besteht keine Notwendigkeit für Stille", erlaubte Tom.
translations.fr: "Il n'y a pas besoin de silence", a permis Tom.
translations.ko: "조용할 필요는 없다", 톰이 허락했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: 'There's no need for silence,' Tom allowed.

meaning_2.description: Spoken in such a way that people can hear it; not under one's breath or in a whisper.

translations.de: "Es besteht keine Notwendigkeit für Stille", erlaubte Tom laut.
translations.fr: "Il n'y a pas besoin de silence", a permis Tom à haute voix.
translations.ko: "침묵할 필요가 없다"라고 톰이 큰 소리로 허용했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: "'There's no need for silence,' Tom allowed aloud."

330.pun_sentence: Waiter, there's a fly in my soup! 'No, sir, that is an essential bee vitamin.'

meaning_1.description: A type of stinging insect known for making honey and pollinating plants.

translations.de: 'Kellner, da ist eine Fliege in meiner Suppe!' 'Nein, Herr, das ist ein essentielles Bienen-Vitamin.'
translations.fr: 'Garçon, il y a une mouche dans ma soupe !' 'Non, monsieur, c'est une vitamine essentielle d'abeille.'
translations.ko: '웨이터, 내 수프에 파리가 있어요!' '아니요, 그것은 중요한 벌 비타민입니다.'

heterographic.pun_sentence: Waiter, there's a fly in my soup! 'No, sir, that is an essential bee vitamin.'

333.pun_sentence: My wife is a fine cook, plus a great algebra teacher, she is quite famous for her pi.

335.pun_sentence: Kentucky Fried Chicken, looking to expand into the area of low-fat dining alternatives, has begun selling popcorn. Their new motto is, 'Look for the kernel.'

heterographic.pun_sentence: Kentucky Fried Chicken, looking to expand into the area of low-fat dining alternatives, has begun selling popcorn. Their new motto is, 'Look for the colonel.'

336.pun_sentence: One day my friend asked me, how do you take such good care of your saxophone. I responded with tenor, love and care.

338.pun_sentence: A bacteria walked into a bar and the bartender said, 'We don't serve bacteria in this place.' The bacteria said, 'But I work here, I'm staph.'
