translations.de: Betty Crocker war ein Blumenkind.
translations.fr: Betty Crocker était un enfant des fleurs.
translations.ko: 베티 크록커는 꽃 아이였습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Betty Crocker was a flower child.

350.pun_sentence: He rose through the ranks of the International Corn Growers association, eventually becoming a kernel.

meaning_1.description: The central or most important part of something; here it also refers to a seed or grain of corn.

translations.de: Er stieg durch die Reihen der Internationalen Maiszüchtervereinigung auf und wurde schließlich zu einem Kern.
translations.fr: Il a gravi les échelons de l'association internationale des cultivateurs de maïs, finissant par devenir un noyau.
translations.ko: 그는 국제 옥수수 재배자 협회의 계급을 빠르게 올라, 결국 핵심이 되었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: He rose through the ranks of the International Corn Growers association, eventually becoming a kernel.

meaning_2.description: A high-ranking officer in the military, typically above a lieutenant colonel and below a brigadier general.

translations.de: Er arbeitete sich durch die Reihen des Internationalen Maiszüchterverbandes hoch und wurde schließlich Oberst.
translations.fr: Il a gravi les échelons de l'association des producteurs internationaux de maïs, devenant finalement colonel.
translations.ko: 그는 국제 옥수수 재배자 협회의 계급을 빠르게 올라가 결국 대령이 되었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: He rose through the ranks of the International Corn Growers association, eventually becoming a colonel.

351.pun_sentence: My friends call me Mesa because of my big butte.

meaning_1.description: A butte is an isolated hill with steep sides and a flat top, smaller than a mesa.

translations.de: Meine Freunde nennen mich Mesa wegen meiner großen Butte.
translations.fr: Mes amis m'appellent Mesa à cause de ma grande butte.
translations.ko: 친구들은 내 큰 뷰트 때문에 나를 메사라고 부릅니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: My friends call me Mesa because of my big butte.

meaning_2.description: In this context, butt refers to the bottom or posterior of a person.

translations.de: Meine Freunde nennen mich Mesa wegen meinem großen Hintern.
translations.fr: Mes amis m'appellent Mesa à cause de mes grosses fesses.
translations.ko: 친구들은 나의 큰 엉덩이 때문에 나를 메사라고 부릅니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: My friends call me Mesa because of my big butt.

352.pun_sentence: Nothing can compare to picnicking on a French hillside and savoring the bries.

meaning_1.description: Brie is a type of soft, mild French cheese.

translations.de: Nichts kann sich mit einem Picknick auf einem französischen Hügel und dem Genuss von Bries vergleichen.
translations.fr: Rien ne peut se comparer à pique-niquer sur une colline française et savourer les bries.
translations.ko: 프랑스 언덕에서의 피크닉과 브리 치즈의 맛을 즐기는 것에는 비교할 수 있는 것이 없습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Nothing can compare to picnicking on a French hillside and savoring the bries.

meaning_2.description: Breeze means a light wind.

translations.de: Nichts kann mit einem Picknick auf einem französischen Hügel und dem Genießen der Brise verglichen werden.
translations.fr: Rien ne peut comparer à faire un pique-nique sur une colline française et savourer la brise.
translations.ko: 프랑스 언덕에서의 피크닉이나 가벼운 바람을 즐기는 것에 비교할 수 있는 것은 없습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Nothing can compare to picnicking on a French hillside and savoring the breeze.

353.pun_sentence: At a pet store: 'buy one dog, get one flea'.

meaning_1.description: A tiny wingless jumping insect that feeds on the blood of mammals and birds.

translations.de: In einem Haustiergeschäft: 'kaufen Sie einen Hund, bekommen Sie einen Floh'.
translations.fr: Dans une animalerie : 'achetez un chien, obtenez une puce'.
translations.ko: 애완 동물 가게에서 : '개를 하나 사면 벼룩을 하나 얻습니다'.

heterographic.pun_sentence: At a pet store: 'buy one dog, get one flea'.

meaning_2.description: Without cost, complimentary or given away as part of a promotional offer.

translations.de: In einem Tiergeschäft: "Kaufen Sie einen Hund, erhalten Sie einen kostenlos."
translations.fr: Dans une animalerie: "achetez un chien, obtenez-en un gratuitement."
translations.ko: 애완동물 상점에서 : "강아지 하나를 사면 하나를 무료로 드립니다."

heterographic.pun_sentence: At a pet store: "buy one dog, get one free."

354.pun_sentence: The other day I held the door open for a clown. I thought it was a nice jester.

meaning_1.description: A professional entertainer who amuses by joking, antics, and tricks in past medieval times; used in this context to refer to the clown.

translations.de: Neulich hielt ich die Tür für einen Clown auf. Ich dachte, es war eine nette Geste.
translations.fr: L'autre jour, j'ai tenu la porte ouverte pour un clown. J'ai pensé que c'était un beau geste.
translations.ko: 그날 다른 날에 나는 문을 열어서 어떤 광대를 위해 문을 열어 놓았다. 나는 그것이 멋진 짓이라고 생각했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The other day I held the door open for a clown. I thought it was a nice jester.

meaning_2.description: A movement of part of the body, especially a hand or the head, to express an idea or meaning.

translations.de: Neulich hielt ich die Tür für einen Clown offen. Ich dachte, es war eine nette Geste.
translations.fr: L'autre jour, j'ai tenu la porte ouverte pour un clown. J'ai pensé que c'était un beau geste.
translations.ko: 어느 날 나는 문을 열어서 흔적에게 문을 열어두었습니다. 나는 그것이 좋은 제스처라고 생각했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The other day I held the door open for a clown. I thought it was a nice gesture.

355.pun_sentence: A letter carrier career is a mail dominated profession.

meaning_1.description: Items sent or to be sent by post.

translations.de: Eine Karriere als Briefträger ist ein von der Post dominiertes Berufsfeld.
translations.fr: Une carrière de facteur est une profession dominée par le courrier.
translations.ko: 우편 배달원이라는 직업은 우편 업무가 지배적인 직업입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A letter carrier career is a mail dominated profession.

meaning_2.description: Referring to the sex that can't bear offspring or produce eggs, distinguished biologically by the production of small, mobile sperm cells.

translations.de: Eine Karriere als Briefträger ist ein von Männern dominiertes Berufsfeld.
translations.fr: Une carrière de facteur est une profession dominée par les hommes.
translations.ko: 우체부 직업은 남성이 지배하는 직업입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A letter carrier career is a male dominated profession.

356.pun_sentence: When I was starving to death, my children gave me a raisin to keep on living.

meaning_1.description: A dried grape

translations.de: Als ich am Verhungern war, gaben mir meine Kinder eine Rosine, um weiterzuleben.
translations.fr: Quand je mourais de faim, mes enfants m'ont donné un raisin sec pour continuer à vivre.
translations.ko: 나가 굶주릴 때, 나의 아이들은 나에게 건포도 한 개를 주었어 나의 생명을 이어가기 위해.

heterographic.pun_sentence: When I was starving to death, my children gave me a raisin to keep on living.

meaning_2.description: A cause, explanation, or justification for an action or event.

translations.de: Als ich am Verhungern war, gaben mir meine Kinder einen Grund weiterzuleben.
translations.fr: Quand je mourais de faim, mes enfants m'ont donné une raison de continuer à vivre.
translations.ko: 나가 굶주릴 때, 나의 아이들이 살아갈 이유를 주었다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: When I was starving to death, my children gave me a reason to keep on living.

357.pun_sentence: The magician got so mad he pulled his hare out.

meaning_1.description: A hare is a type of fast-running animal similar to a rabbit but larger and with longer ears.

translations.de: Der Zauberer wurde so wütend, dass er seinen Hasen herauszog.
translations.fr: Le magicien était tellement en colère qu'il a sorti son lièvre.
translations.ko: 마술사가 너무 화나서 그의 토끼를 끄집어냈습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The magician got so mad he pulled his hare out.

meaning_2.description: Hair refers to the thin threadlike strands growing from the skin of humans, mammals, and some other animals.

translations.de: Der Zauberer wurde so wütend, dass er sich die Haare auszog.
translations.fr: Le magicien était tellement en colère qu'il s'arrachait les cheveux.
translations.ko: 마술사가 너무 화가 나서 머리카락을 뽑았다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The magician got so mad he pulled his hair out.

358.pun_sentence: 'I can't budge this huge box!' I exclaimed. 'Of course not,' the office supply warehouse clerk replied, 'it's stationery.'

meaning_1.description: Stationery refers to writing materials, such as paper, pens, pencils, envelopes, etc.

translations.de: 'Ich kann diese riesige Kiste nicht bewegen!' rief ich aus. 'Natürlich nicht,' antwortete der Büromateriallagerverkäufer, 'es ist Schreibwaren.'
translations.fr: 'Je ne peux pas bouger cette énorme boîte !' ai-je exclamé. 'Bien sûr que non,' a répondu le commis de l'entrepôt de fournitures de bureau, 'c'est de la papeterie.'
translations.ko: '나는 이 거대한 상자를 움직일 수 없어!' 나는 외쳤다. '당연하지, ' 사무용품 창고 점원이 대답했다, '그것은 문구용품이야.'

heterographic.pun_sentence: 'I can't budge this huge box!' I exclaimed. 'Of course not,' the office supply warehouse clerk replied, 'it's stationery.'

meaning_2.description: Stationary means not moving or not intended to be moved.

translations.de: "Ich kann diese riesige Kiste nicht bewegen!" rief ich aus. "Natürlich nicht", antwortete der Angestellte im Bürobedarfslager, "sie ist unbeweglich."
translations.fr: "Je ne peux pas bouger cette énorme boîte !" ai-je exclamé. "Bien sûr que non," a répondu le commis de l'entrepôt de fournitures de bureau, "elle est immobile."
translations.ko: "나는 이 거대한 상자를 움직일 수 없어!"라고 나는 소리쳤다. "당연히 그럴 수 없지," 사무용품 창고 점원이 대답했다, "그것은 움직이지 않아."

heterographic.pun_sentence: "I can't budge this huge box!" I exclaimed. "Of course not," the office supply warehouse clerk replied, "it's stationary."

359.pun_sentence: She dumped him because of all their lousy dates. After all, whining and dining does get tiresome after a while.

meaning_1.description: To complain in a prolonged, high-pitched, plaintive way.

translations.de: Sie trennte sich von ihm wegen all ihrer miserablen Dates. Schließlich wird ständiges Jammern und Speisen nach einer Weile ermüdend.
translations.fr: Elle l'a largué à cause de toutes leurs rendez-vous minables. Après tout, se plaindre et dîner finit par devenir fatiguant après un moment.
translations.ko: 그녀는 그들의 형편없는 데이트 때문에 그를 차버렸어요. 결국 지속적으로 불평하며 식사하는 것은 한동안 후에 지루해지게 됩니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: She dumped him because of all their lousy dates. After all, whining and dining does get tiresome after a while.

meaning_2.description: An alcoholic beverage made from fermented grape juice.

translations.de: Sie trennte sich von ihm wegen all ihren miserablen Verabredungen. Schließlich wird Wein und Speisen nach einer Weile anstrengend.
translations.fr: Elle l'a largué à cause de toutes leurs mauvaises sorties. Après tout, se délecter et dîner peut devenir fatigant après un certain temps.
translations.ko: 그녀는 그들의 형편없는 데이트 때문에 그를 차버렸다. 결국, 식사와 와인을 즐기는 것도 어느 새 지겹게 느껴진다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: She dumped him because of all their lousy dates. After all, wining and dining does get tiresome after a while.

360.pun_sentence: In middle east outdoor markets you can find bazaar items for sale.

meaning_1.description: A market in a Middle Eastern country.

translations.de: In Nahost-Outdoormärkten können Sie Basarartikel zum Verkauf finden.
translations.fr: Dans les marchés en plein air du Moyen-Orient, vous pouvez trouver des articles de bazar à vendre.
translations.ko: 중동 야외 시장에서는 바자회 아이템을 판매하고 있습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: In middle east outdoor markets you can find bazaar items for sale.

meaning_2.description: Very strange or unusual.

translations.de: In Nahost Freiluftmärkten können Sie sehr seltsame oder ungewöhnliche Artikel zum Verkauf finden.
translations.fr: Dans les marchés en plein air du Moyen-Orient, vous pouvez trouver des articles très étranges ou inhabituels à vendre.
translations.ko: 중동의 야외 시장에서는 매우 이상하거나 흔치 않은 물품을 판매하고 있습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: In middle east outdoor markets you can find bizarre items for sale.

361.pun_sentence: I was studying in an apiary class. This resulted in me receiving a bee on my exam.

meaning_1.description: A bee is an insect that produces honey, often kept in large numbers by humans in beehives.

translations.de: Ich studierte in einem Imkerei-Kurs. Dies führte dazu, dass ich eine Biene auf meiner Prüfung erhielt.
translations.fr: J'étudiais dans un cours d'apiculture. Cela a abouti à recevoir une abeille sur mon examen.
translations.ko: 나는 양봉학 클래스에서 공부했습니다. 그 결과 시험지에 벌이 나타났습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I was studying in an apiary class. This resulted in me receiving a bee on my exam.

meaning_2.description: In this context, "B" refers to a letter grade in an academic setting, which stands for good performance in a course or exam.

translations.de: Ich studierte in einem Imkerei Unterricht. Dadurch erhielt ich ein B auf meiner Prüfung.
translations.fr: J'étudiais dans une classe d'apiculture. Cela a abouti à moi recevant un B sur mon examen.
translations.ko: 나는 벌봉수업에서 공부했다. 그 결과 나는 시험에서 B를 받았다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I was studying in an apiary class. This resulted in me receiving a b on my exam.

362.pun_sentence: She was only a Quarryman's daughter, but she took everything for granite.

meaning_1.description: Granite is a type of coarse-grained, igneous rock.

translations.de: Sie war nur die Tochter eines Steinbrucharbeiters, aber sie nahm alles für Granit.
translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'un carrier, mais elle prenait tout pour du granite.
translations.ko: 그녀는 단지 채석장 근로자의 딸이었지만, 그녀는 모든 것을 화강암으로 생각했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: She was only a Quarryman's daughter, but she took everything for granite.

meaning_2.description: To acknowledge or admit that something is true or assumed as fact.

translations.de: Sie war nur die Tochter eines Steinbrechers, aber sie nahm alles als gegeben hin.
translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'un carrier, mais elle prenait tout pour acquis.
translations.ko: 그녀는 단지 채석장 근로자의 딸이었지만, 그녀는 모든 것을 당연하게 여겼다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: She was only a Quarryman's daughter, but she took everything for granted.

363.pun_sentence: There are a lot of bakeries on the yeast coast.

meaning_1.description: A type of fungus that is used in making bread dough rise.

translations.de: Es gibt viele Bäckereien an der Hefeküste.
translations.fr: Il y a beaucoup de boulangeries sur la côte de levure.
translations.ko: 효모 해안에는 빵집이 많습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: There are a lot of bakeries on the yeast coast.

meaning_2.description: A cardinal direction on the compass that is to the right when facing north.

translations.de: Es gibt viele Bäckereien an der Ostküste.
translations.fr: Il y a beaucoup de boulangeries sur la côte est.
translations.ko: 동해안에는 빵집이 많습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: There are a lot of bakeries on the east coast.

364.pun_sentence: The candle-making machine broke down when someone threw a spanner in the wax.

meaning_1.description: A substance used in the production of candles, usually derived from petroleum or bees.

translations.de: Die Kerzenherstellungsmaschine brach zusammen, als jemand einen Schraubenschlüssel in das Wachs warf.
translations.fr: La machine à fabriquer des bougies est tombée en panne quand quelqu'un a jeté une clé dans la cire.
translations.ko: 누군가 왁스에 스패너를 던져 양초 제작 기계가 고장났습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The candle-making machine broke down when someone threw a spanner in the wax.

meaning_2.description: The mechanism or internal workings of a machine.

translations.de: Die Kerzenherstellungsmaschine ging kaputt, als jemand einen Schraubenschlüssel in die Mechanismen warf.
translations.fr: La machine à fabriquer les bougies est tombée en panne quand quelqu'un a jeté un wrench dans les mécanismes.
translations.ko: 누군가가 기계의 내부 작동 메커니즘에 스패너를 던져서 촛불 만드는 기계가 고장났습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The candle-making machine broke down when someone threw a spanner in the works.

365.pun_sentence: He wasn't supposed to eat the pie but he kept pecan at it.

meaning_1.description: A nut of the hickory tree, smooth brown oval in shape, originating in North America and the state nut of Texas.

translations.de: Er sollte den Kuchen eigentlich nicht essen, aber er hat weiter daran geknabbert.
translations.fr: Il n'était pas censé manger la tarte mais il continuait à y picorer.
translations.ko: 그는 그 파이를 먹지 않아야 했지만 계속해서 그것을 깎아 먹었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: He wasn't supposed to eat the pie but he kept pecan at it.

meaning_2.description: To eat or pick up food in small amounts, typically like a bird.

translations.de: Er sollte den Kuchen nicht essen, aber er hat immer wieder daran geknabbert.
translations.fr: Il n'était pas censé manger la tarte mais il continuait à la picorer.
translations.ko: 그는 파이를 먹지 않아야 했지만 계속해서 조금씩 먹었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: He wasn't supposed to eat the pie but he kept pecking at it.

366.pun_sentence: When the Pequod with its crew went down, Ishmael remembered, a great wail came up from the sea.

meaning_1.description: A prolonged, high-pitched cry of pain, grief or sorrow.

translations.de: Als die Pequod mit ihrer Besatzung unterging, erinnerte sich Ishmael, kam ein großer Klageschrei aus dem Meer.
translations.fr: Lorsque le Pequod avec son équipage a coulé, se souvint Ishmaël, un grand cri de douleur s'est élevé de la mer.
translations.ko: 페콰드호와 그 승무원들이 가라앉았을 때, 이스마엘은 기억했습니다, 바다로부터 큰 슬픔의 울음소리가 들려왔습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: When the Pequod with its crew went down, Ishmael remembered, a great wail came up from the sea.

meaning_2.description: A very large marine mammal that breathes air through a blowhole on the top of its head.

translations.de: Als die Pequod mit ihrer Besatzung unterging, erinnerte sich Ishmael, ein großer Wal kam aus dem Meer.
translations.fr: Quand le Pequod avec son équipage a coulé, Ishmael se souvient, une grande baleine est sortie de la mer.
translations.ko: 페콰드와 그 선원들이 가라앉았을 때, 이슈마엘은 기억했습니다, 큰 고래가 바다에서 올라왔습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: When the Pequod with its crew went down, Ishmael remembered, a great whale came up from the sea.

367.pun_sentence: Be kind to your dentist because he has fillings too.

meaning_1.description: A substance used to fill the cavities in one's tooth done by a dentist.

translations.de: Seien Sie nett zu Ihrem Zahnarzt, denn er hat auch Füllungen.
translations.fr: Soyez gentil avec votre dentiste car il a aussi des plombages.
translations.ko: 치과 의사에게 친절하게 대하십시오, 왜냐하면 그들 역시 충전물이 있기 때문입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Be kind to your dentist because he has fillings too.

meaning_2.description: An emotional state or reaction.

translations.de: Seien Sie nett zu Ihrem Zahnarzt, denn er hat auch Gefühle.
translations.fr: Soyez gentil avec votre dentiste parce qu'il a des sentiments aussi.
translations.ko: 그도 감정이 있는 사람이니, 당신의 치과 의사에게 친절하게 대하십시오.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Be kind to your dentist because he has feelings too.

368.pun_sentence: The bullfighter's display of timidity left macho to be desired.

meaning_1.description: Macho typically means showing aggressive pride in one's masculinity.

translations.de: Die Zurückhaltung des Stierkämpfers ließ an Männlichkeit zu wünschen übrig.
translations.fr: La démonstration de timidité du matador laissait à désirer en terme de machisme.
translations.ko: 투우사의 소심한 행동은 남성미가 더 필요하다는 생각을 하게 만들었다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The bullfighter's display of timidity left macho to be desired.

meaning_2.description: In this context, "much" stands for a large amount.

translations.de: Die Schau der Scheu des Stierkämpfers ließ viel zu wünschen übrig.
translations.fr: La manifestation de timidité du matador laissait beaucoup à désirer.
translations.ko: 투우사의 소심함은 많이 아쉬웠습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The bullfighter's display of timidity left much to be desired.

369.pun_sentence: OLD LAWN CARE WORKERS never die, they just recede.

meaning_1.description: To move back or further away from a previous position.

translations.de: Alte Rasenpfleger sterben nie, sie ziehen sich nur zurück.
translations.fr: Les anciens jardiniers ne meurent jamais, ils se retirent simplement.
translations.ko: 노인 잔디 관리 작업자들은 결코 죽지 않습니다, 그들은 그저 물러납니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: OLD LAWN CARE WORKERS never die, they just recede.

meaning_2.description: To plant seeds in a place or surface again.

translations.de: Alte Rasenpfleger sterben nie, sie säen einfach neu.
translations.fr: Les anciens travailleurs de l'entretien des pelouses ne meurent jamais, ils se contentent de ressemer.
translations.ko: 오래된 잔디 관리 작업자들은 결코 죽지 않습니다, 그들은 단지 다시 씨를 뿌립니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: OLD LAWN CARE WORKERS never die, they just reseed.

370.pun_sentence: If you're dying to purchase cropland in Thailand, then you've baht the farm.

meaning_1.description: "Baht" is the currency of Thailand.

translations.de: Wenn Sie unbedingt Ackerland in Thailand kaufen möchten, dann haben Sie die Farm in Baht gekauft.
translations.fr: Si vous mourez d'envie d'acheter des terres agricoles en Thaïlande, alors vous avez misé le farm en bahts.
translations.ko: 만약 당신이 태국에서 농지를 사고 싶어 죽겠다면, 당신은 ฿으로 농장을 샀습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: If you're dying to purchase cropland in Thailand, then you've baht the farm.

meaning_2.description: Acquire in exchange for payment.

translations.de: Wenn Sie sterben, um Ackerland in Thailand zu kaufen, dann haben Sie die Farm gekauft.
translations.fr: Si vous mourez d'envie d'acheter des terres cultivables en Thaïlande, alors vous avez acheté la ferme.
translations.ko: 만약 당신이 태국의 농지를 구매하는 것에 목말라 있다면, 그럼 당신은 이미 농장을 샀을 것입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: If you're dying to purchase cropland in Thailand, then you've bought the farm.

371.pun_sentence: You can't trust a tiger. You never know when he might be lion.

meaning_1.description: A lion is a large, carnivorous, wild cat chiefly found in Africa and northwest India, known for its strength and power.

translations.de: Du kannst einem Tiger nicht trauen. Man weiß nie, wann er vielleicht ein Löwe sein könnte.
translations.fr: Vous ne pouvez pas faire confiance à un tigre. Vous ne savez jamais quand il pourrait être un lion.
translations.ko: 당신은 호랑이를 신뢰할 수 없습니다. 그가 언제 사자가 될지 모릅니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: You can't trust a tiger. You never know when he might be lion.

meaning_2.description: Lying refers to the act of intentionally making a false statement, or deception.

translations.de: Sie können einem Tiger nicht vertrauen. Sie wissen nie, wann er lügen könnte.
translations.fr: Vous ne pouvez pas faire confiance à un tigre. Vous ne savez jamais quand il pourrait mentir.
translations.ko: 당신은 호랑이를 믿을 수 없습니다. 그가 거짓말을 할지 언제인지 모릅니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: You can't trust a tiger. You never know when he might be lying.

372.pun_sentence: I heard about this new governing document that says people can only go to the bathroom one per day. It's called the Constipation.

meaning_1.description: A health condition in which a person has fewer than three bowel movements a week or his/her stool is hard, dry, small, and painful or difficult to pass.

translations.de: Ich habe von diesem neuen Regierungsdokument gehört, das besagt, dass Menschen nur einmal am Tag auf die Toilette gehen können. Es wird die Verstopfung genannt.
translations.fr: J'ai entendu parler de ce nouveau document gouvernemental qui dit que les gens ne peuvent aller aux toilettes qu'une fois par jour. On l'appelle la Constipation.
translations.ko: 나는 사람들이 하루에 한 번만 화장실에 갈 수 있다고 말하는 새로운 정부 문서에 대해 들었습니다. 이것을 변비라고 합니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I heard about this new governing document that says people can only go to the bathroom one per day. It's called the Constipation.

meaning_2.description: A written set of principles and laws that a country or organization operates under.

translations.de: Ich habe von diesem neuen Regierungsdokument gehört, das besagt, dass Menschen nur einmal am Tag auf die Toilette gehen dürfen. Es heißt die Verfassung.
translations.fr: J'ai entendu parler de ce nouveau document de gouvernance qui stipule que les gens ne peuvent aller aux toilettes qu'une fois par jour. Il s'appelle la Constitution.
translations.ko: 사람들이 하루에 한 번만 화장실에 갈 수 있다는 새로운 관리 규정에 대해 들었습니다. 그것은 헌법이라고 불립니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I heard about this new governing document that says people can only go to the bathroom one per day. It's called the Constitution.

373.pun_sentence: A bunch of robins followed the priest wherever he went. Birds of a father flock together.

meaning_1.description: In this context, 'father' is a term often used to refer to a priest or a religious figurehead.

translations.de: Eine Schar von Rotkehlchen folgte dem Priester, wohin er auch ging. Vögel eines Vaters scharen sich zusammen.
translations.fr: Un groupe de rouges-gorges suivait le prêtre partout où il allait. Les oiseaux d'un père se rassemblent.
translations.ko: 여러 마리의 로빈이 어디든지 그 사제를 따라다녔다. 같은 아버지의 새들은 같이 모인다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A bunch of robins followed the priest wherever he went. Birds of a father flock together.

meaning_2.description: 'Feather' in this context is used metaphorically to refer to individuals with similar characteristics or interests.

translations.de: Eine Schar von Rotkehlchen folgte dem Priester, wo immer er hin ging. Gleich und gleich gesellt sich gern.
translations.fr: Un groupe de rouges-gorges suivait le prêtre où qu'il aille. Qui se ressemble s'assemble.
translations.ko: 로빈의 무리가 사제를 어디든지 따라 다녔다. 비슷한 깃털끼리 모인다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A bunch of robins followed the priest wherever he went. Birds of a feather flock together.

374.pun_sentence: OLD ELVIS IMPERSONATORS never die, they just get out of sequins.

meaning_1.description: A small shiny disc sewn as one of many onto clothing for decoration.

translations.de: Alte Elvis-Imitatoren sterben nie, sie steigen einfach aus den Pailletten aus.
translations.fr: Les imitateurs d'Elvis âgés ne meurent jamais, ils se débarrassent simplement des paillettes.
translations.ko: 노년의 엘비스 모방자들은 결코 죽지 않습니다, 그들은 그냥 시퀸을 벗어나기만 합니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: OLD ELVIS IMPERSONATORS never die, they just get out of sequins.

meaning_2.description: An ordered set of connected events or steps within a particular process or timeline.

translations.fr: Les vieux imitateurs d'Elvis ne meurent jamais, ils sortent juste des séquences.

heterographic.pun_sentence: OLD ELVIS IMPERSONATORS never die, they just get out of sequences.

375.pun_sentence: Did you hear about the film editor at Hollywood who had a part-time job at a pizza parlor? He used to ask customers whether they wanted one splice or two.

meaning_1.description: To join two pieces of tape, film or other similar materials together end-to-end.

translations.de: Haben Sie von dem Filmeditor in Hollywood gehört, der einen Teilzeitjob in einer Pizzeria hatte? Er fragte die Kunden, ob sie einen oder zwei Klebestreifen wollten.
translations.fr: Avez-vous entendu parler du monteur de film à Hollywood qui avait un emploi à temps partiel dans une pizzeria ? Il demandait aux clients s'ils voulaient une jonction ou deux.
translations.ko: 할리우드의 영화 편집자가 피자 가게에서 파트타임 직장을 가지고 있었다는 것을 들어 보셨나요? 그는 고객에게 테이프나 필름 등을 이음하고 싶은지 하나인지 두 개인지 물어보곤 했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Did you hear about the film editor at Hollywood who had a part-time job at a pizza parlor? He used to ask customers whether they wanted one splice or two.

meaning_2.description: A part or portion of a larger whole, especially a part of food that has been cut, torn, or otherwise divided from the rest. In this case, it referred to a piece of pizza.

translations.de: Haben Sie von dem Filmredakteur in Hollywood gehört, der einen Teilzeitjob in einer Pizzeria hatte? Er fragte die Kunden, ob sie ein Stück oder zwei möchten.
translations.fr: Avez-vous entendu parler du monteur de films à Hollywood qui avait un emploi à temps partiel dans une pizzeria? Il demandait aux clients s'ils voulaient une part ou deux.
translations.ko: 할리우드의 필름 편집자가 피자 팔러에서 파트타임 직업을 가졌던 것을 들어보셨나요? 그는 고객에게 피자를 한 조각 할지 두 조각 할지 물었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Did you hear about the film editor at Hollywood who had a part-time job at a pizza parlor? He used to ask customers whether they wanted one slice or two.

376.pun_sentence: The male pig puts everyone to sleep. You could say he's quite the boar.

meaning_1.description: A wild or feral pig, especially a male pig

translations.de: Der Eber bringt alle zum Schlafen. Man könnte sagen, er ist ein ziemlicher Wildschwein.
translations.fr: Le porc mâle endort tout le monde. On pourrait dire qu'il est vraiment un sanglier.
translations.ko: 수돼지가 모든 사람을 재우고 있습니다. 그는 꽤 흉포한 돼지라고 할 수 있습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The male pig puts everyone to sleep. You could say he's quite the boar.

meaning_2.description: Someone or something that is tedious, dull or uninspiring.

translations.de: Der männliche Schwein bringt alle zum Schlafen. Man könnte sagen, er ist ziemlich langweilig.
translations.fr: Le cochon mâle endort tout le monde. On pourrait dire qu'il est vraiment ennuyeux.
translations.ko: 수돼지가 모두를 잠들게 합니다. 그는 꽤 지루할 수 있다고 말할 수 있습니다.

377.pun_sentence: If a Monk throws a hissy fit, is it a temple tantrum?

meaning_1.description: The building where religious practices are conducted. It is a place of worship for Buddhists and certain other religions.

translations.de: Wenn ein Mönch einen Wutanfall hat, ist es ein Tempeltobsuch?
translations.fr: Si un moine fait une crise de colère, est-ce une crise de tempérament au temple ?
translations.ko: 만약 승려가 발작을 일으킨다면, 그건 사원에서의 발작인가요?

heterographic.pun_sentence: If a Monk throws a hissy fit, is it a temple tantrum?

meaning_2.description: Temper refers to someone's emotional state, particularly their anger or lack of control over their emotions.

translations.de: Wenn ein Mönch einen Wutanfall hat, ist es dann ein Temperamentsausbruch?
translations.fr: Si un moine pique une crise, est-ce une crise de colère?
translations.ko: 승려가 성질을 부리면, 그것은 성질 내는 것인가요?

heterographic.pun_sentence: If a Monk throws a hissy fit, is it a temper tantrum?

378.pun_sentence: OLD SLAVS never die, they just czech out.

meaning_1.description: Czech is a nationality, it refers to people from the Czech Republic, a Slavic country.

translations.ko: 오래된 슬라브 사람들은 결코 죽지 않습니다, 그들은 그저 체코 사람처럼 체크 아웃합니다.

translations.ko: 오래된 슬라브 사람들은 결코 죽지 않습니다, 그들은 그냥 떠납니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: OLD SLAVS never die, they just check out.

379.pun_sentence: She was only a Poet's daughter, but I've seen verse.

meaning_1.description: Verse refers to a collection of lines that follow a certain rhythm and meter or a specific section of a song or poem.

translations.de: Sie war nur die Tochter eines Dichters, aber ich habe Verse gesehen.
translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'un poète, mais j'ai vu des vers.
translations.ko: 그녀는 단지 시인의 딸이었지만, 나는 구절을 봤습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: She was only a Poet's daughter, but I've seen verse.

meaning_2.description: Worse is an adjective that implies something is less good, less appropriate or less favorable.

translations.de: Sie war nur die Tochter eines Dichters, aber ich habe Schlimmeres gesehen.
translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'un poète, mais j'ai vu pire.
translations.ko: 그녀는 단지 시인의 딸이었지만, 나는 더 나쁜 것을 본 적이 있다.

380.pun_sentence: Why did the pig quit running the marathon? He had a problem with his hamstring.

meaning_1.description: A hamstring refers to one of three posterior thigh muscles in between the hip and the knee.

translations.de: Warum hat das Schwein aufgehört, den Marathon zu laufen? Es hatte ein Problem mit seinem Oberschenkelmuskel.
translations.fr: Pourquoi le cochon a-t-il arrêté de courir le marathon ? Il avait un problème avec son ischio-jambier.
translations.ko: 돼지가 왜 마라톤을 뛰는 것을 그만뒀을까요? 햄스트링에 문제가 있었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Why did the pig quit running the marathon? He had a problem with his hamstring.

meaning_2.description: In this context, 'ham' refers to the cut of meat from the thigh of the hind leg of a pig.

translations.de: Warum hat das Schwein aufgehört, den Marathon zu laufen? Er hatte ein Problem mit seinem Schinken.
translations.fr: Pourquoi le cochon a-t-il arrêté de courir le marathon ? Il avait un problème avec son jambon.
translations.ko: 그 돼지는 왜 마라톤을 달리는 것을 그만두었나요? 그는 그의 햄에 문제가 있었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Why did the pig quit running the marathon? He had a problem with his ham.

381.pun_sentence: OLD HYPOCHONDRIACS never die they just lose their grippe.

meaning_1.description: Grippe is an old-fashioned term for influenza or flu.

translations.de: Alte Hypochonder sterben nie, sie verlieren nur ihre Grippe.
translations.fr: Les vieux hypocondriaques ne meurent jamais, ils perdent juste leur grippe.
translations.ko: 오래된 건강관념이란 사람들은 절대 죽지 않아요, 그냥 그들의 독감을 잃어버립니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: OLD HYPOCHONDRIACS never die they just lose their grippe.

meaning_2.description: Grip generally refers to a firm grasp or hold, both physically and metaphorically.

translations.de: Alte Hypochonder sterben nie, sie verlieren nur ihren Griff.
translations.fr: Les vieux hypocondriaques ne meurent jamais, ils perdent juste leur emprise.
translations.ko: 노년의 건강관념증 환자들은 결코 죽지 않습니다, 그들은 그저 그들의 통제력을 잃을 뿐입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: OLD HYPOCHONDRIACS never die they just lose their grip.

382.pun_sentence: Waiting for her photos to be developed a young girl sang 'Some day my prints will come.'

meaning_1.description: The visible impression transferred to paper or another surface by a camera, reproduced from a negative or digital data.

translations.de: Während sie darauf wartete, dass ihre Fotos entwickelt wurden, sang ein junges Mädchen ' Eines Tages werden meine Abzüge kommen . '
translations.fr: En attendant que ses photos soient développées, une jeune fille a chanté ' Un jour, mes tirages viendront . '
translations.ko: 그녀의 사진이 현상되기를 기다리는 동안 어린 소녀가 ' 언젠가 내 인화물들이 올 것이다 . ' 라고 노래했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Waiting for her photos to be developed a young girl sang 'Some day my prints will come.'

meaning_2.description: A royal member of a family who is a likely or potential successor to a throne.

translations.de: Während sie darauf wartete, dass ihre Fotos entwickelt wurden, sang ein junges Mädchen 'Eines Tages wird mein Prinz kommen'.
translations.fr: En attendant que ses photos soient développées, une jeune fille a chanté 'Un jour mon prince viendra'.
translations.ko: 그녀의 사진이 현상되기를 기다리는 동안 어린 소녀가 '언젠가 나의 왕자님께서 오실 것이다'라고

heterographic.pun_sentence: Waiting for her photos to be developed a young girl sang ' Some day my princes will come.'

383.pun_sentence: The sun was bright on a dry, cloudless morning, but later it waned.

meaning_1.description: To decrease gradually in intensity, power, or amount.

translations.de: Die Sonne war hell an einem trockenen, wolkenlosen Morgen, aber später ließ sie nach.
translations.fr: Le soleil était brillant lors d'une matinée sèche et sans nuages, mais plus tard il a diminué.
translations.ko: 건조하고 구름 한 점 없는 아침, 태양이 밝게 빛났지만 나중에는 점차 약해졌다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The sun was bright on a dry, cloudless morning, but later it waned.

meaning_2.description: The falling of water droplets from the sky in significant quantity.

translations.de: Die Sonne war hell an einem trockenen, wolkenlosen Morgen, aber später regnete es.
translations.fr: Le soleil était brillant un matin sec et sans nuages, mais plus tard il a plu.
translations.ko: 건조하고 구름 한 점 없는 아침에 태양이 밝게 빛났지만, 나중에는 비가 내렸다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The sun was bright on a dry, cloudless morning, but later it rained.

384.pun_sentence: A baker always put too much flour in his bread because he was a gluten for punishment.

meaning_1.description: Gluten is a mixture of proteins found in wheat and related grains, giving elasticity to dough.

translations.de: Ein Bäcker gab immer zu viel Mehl in sein Brot, weil er eine Gluten für Bestrafung war.
translations.fr: Un boulanger mettait toujours trop de farine dans son pain parce qu'il était un gluten pour la punition.
translations.ko: 빵사람은 항상 그의 빵에 너무 많은 밀가루를 넣었는데, 그는 처벌을 위한 글루텐이었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A baker always put too much flour in his bread because he was a gluten for punishment.

meaning_2.description: A glutton is a person who indulges in something to excess.

translations.de: Ein Bäcker hat immer zu viel Mehl in seinem Brot, weil er ein Vielfraß für Bestrafung war.
translations.fr: Un boulanger a toujours mis trop de farine dans son pain parce qu'il était un glouton pour la punition.
translations.ko: 그 빵사람은 항상 빵에 밀가루를 너무 많이 넣었습니다 왜냐하면 그는 과도하게 후회하는 사람이었기 때문입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A baker always put too much flour in his bread because he was a glutton for punishment.

385.pun_sentence: The marine biology seminars weren't for entertainment, but were created for educational porpoises.

meaning_1.description: A small species of aquatic mammals often mistaken for dolphins.

translations.de: Die Meeresbiologie-Seminare waren nicht zur Unterhaltung gedacht, sondern wurden für Bildungszwecke für Kleinwale erstellt.
translations.fr: Les séminaires de biologie marine n'étaient pas pour le divertissement, mais étaient créés pour des porpoises éducatifs.
translations.ko: 해양 생물학 세미나는 오락용이 아니라 교육적인 목적의 작은 종류의 수생 포유류를 위해 만들어졌습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The marine biology seminars weren't for entertainment, but were created for educational porpoises.

meaning_2.description: The reason for which something is done or created or for which something exists.

translations.de: Die Meeresbiologie-Seminare waren nicht zur Unterhaltung gedacht, sondern wurden zu Bildungszwecken erstellt.
translations.fr: Les séminaires de biologie marine n'étaient pas pour le divertissement, mais étaient créés à des fins éducatives.
translations.ko: 해양 생물학 세미나는 엔터테인먼트를 위한 것이 아니라 교육 목적으로 만들어졌습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The marine biology seminars weren't for entertainment, but were created for educational purposes.

386.pun_sentence: My chronically runny-nosed friend, who staunchly opposes all independent emirates, was bothered by catarrh on his trip around the world.

meaning_1.description: Catarrh refers to excessive discharge or buildup of mucus in the nose or throat.

translations.de: Mein chronisch schnupfender Freund, der sich standhaft gegen alle unabhängigen Emirate stellt, wurde auf seiner Weltreise von Katarrh belästigt.
translations.fr: Mon ami qui a constamment le nez qui coule, qui s'oppose fermement à tous les émirats indépendants, a été dérangé par du catarrhe lors de son voyage autour du monde.
translations.ko: 모든 독립적인 에미리트에 대해 굳건히 반대하는, 만성적으로 코가 계속 흐르는 친구가 세계 여행 중에 카타르에 고통 받았습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: My chronically runny-nosed friend, who staunchly opposes all independent emirates, was bothered by catarrh on his trip around the world.

meaning_2.description: Qatar is a country in the Middle East, specifically, an independent emirate on the coast of the Arabian Peninsula.

translations.de: Mein chronisch schnupfender Freund, der sich vehement gegen alle unabhängigen Emirate ausspricht, wurde auf seiner Weltreise von Katar gestört.
translations.fr: Mon ami à la rhinite chronique, qui s'oppose fermement à tous les émirats indépendants, a été dérangé par le Qatar lors de son voyage autour du monde.
translations.ko: 만성적으로 콧물이 나는 친구는 모든 독립 에미리트에 강하게 반대하는데, 세계 여행 중에 카타르 때문에 괴로워했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: My chronically runny-nosed friend, who staunchly opposes all independent emirates, was bothered by Qatar on his trip around the world.

387.pun_sentence: The first scientists who studied fog were mistified.

meaning_1.description: To completely puzzle or confuse.

translations.de: Die ersten Wissenschaftler, die den Nebel studierten, waren völlig verwirrt.
translations.fr: Les premiers scientifiques qui ont étudié le brouillard étaient complètement déconcertés.
translations.ko: 안개를 연구한 첫 번째 과학자들은 완전히 혼란스러웠습니다.

389.pun_sentence: The Egyptian cinema usherette sold religious icons in the daytime. Sometimes she got confused and called out, 'Get your choc isis here!'

399.pun_sentence: You should always use basil the day you buy it - as they say, herb today, gone tomorrow.

404.pun_sentence: The celebration of the royal wedding progressed well into the night.As he stumbled outside to await his ride home one inebriated nobleman, attracted by the bright lights, made his way to the theater district and sat down below one of the brightly illuminated theater signs to await his car. The driver, unfamiliar with both the nobleman and the area, was instructed to look for a well-lit marquis.

meaning_1.description: A nobleman ranked above a count and below a duke in the peerage system of France and certain other European countries.

translations.de: Die Feier der königlichen Hochzeit ging weit in die Nacht hinein. Als ein betrunkenen Adliger nach draußen taumelte, um auf seine Heimfahrt zu warten, wurde er von den hellen Lichtern angezogen, machte sich auf den Weg ins Theater Viertel und setzte sich unter einem der hell beleuchteten Theaterschilder, um auf sein Auto zu warten. Der Fahrer, der weder den Adeligen noch die Gegend kannte, wurde angewiesen, nach einem gut beleuchteten Marquis zu suchen.
translations.fr: La célébration du mariage royal s'est prolongée jusqu'à tard dans la nuit. Alors qu'il trébuchait à l'extérieur pour attendre son retour à domicile, un noble éméché, attiré par les lumières vives, s'est frayé un chemin jusqu'au quartier des théâtres et s'est assis sous l'un des panneaux de théâtre brillamment éclairés pour attendre sa voiture. Le chauffeur, ne connaissant ni le noble ni la région, a reçu pour instruction de chercher un marquis bien éclairé.
translations.ko: 왕립 결혼식의 축하가 밤 늦게까지 계속되었다. 술에 취한 귀족 한 사람이 밖으로 비틀거리며 집으로 돌아가기 위해 기다리고 있을 때, 밝은 불빛에 이끌려 그는 극장가로 가서 눈부신 극장 간판 아래에 앉아 자동차를 기다렸다. 운전사는 귀족과 지역 모두에 익숙하지 않아서 밝게 불을 밝힌 막부를 찾으라는 지시를 받았다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The celebration of the royal wedding progressed well into the night.As he stumbled outside to await his ride home one inebriated nobleman, attracted by the bright lights, made his way to the theater district and sat down below one of the brightly illuminated theater signs to await his car. The driver, unfamiliar with both the nobleman and the area, was instructed to look for a well-lit marquis.

meaning_2.description: A sign usually over the entrance of a hotel, theatre, or other public building, designed to attract attention.

translations.de: Der Fahrer, der weder den Adligen noch die Gegend kannte, wurde angewiesen, nach einem gut beleuchteten Vordach zu suchen.
translations.fr: Le chauffeur, qui ne connaissait ni le noble ni la région, a reçu pour instruction de chercher une marquise bien éclairée.
translations.ko: 기사가 귀족도 지역도 익숙하지 않아서 눈에 잘 띄는 간판을 찾으라는 지시를 받았습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The driver, unfamiliar with both the nobleman and the area, was instructed to look for a well-lit marquee.

405.pun_sentence: Did you hear about the vampire who used to torture his victims with music? His Bach was worse than his bite.

meaning_1.description: "Bach" in this sentence refers to Johann Sebastian Bach, a well-known German composer of the Baroque period.

translations.de: Haben Sie von dem Vampir gehört, der seine Opfer mit Musik folterte? Sein Bach war schlimmer als sein Biss.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Did you hear about the vampire who used to torture his victims with music? His bark was worse than his bite.

406.pun_sentence: One item contributed was a picture of a pretty, kimono-clad girl; it bore the inscription : 'Maid in Japan'.

meaning_1.description: A young, unmarried woman, often used in the context of a servant.

translations.fr: Un article contribué était une image d'une jolie fille vêtue d'un kimono ; elle portait l'inscription : 'Jeune fille au Japon'.
translations.ko: 기여된 아이템 중 하나는 김노를 입은 예쁜 소녀의 그림이었고, '일본에서 서식하는 소녀'라는 글귀가 새겨져 있었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: One item contributed was a picture of a pretty, kimono-clad girl; it bore the inscription : 'Maid in Japan'.

meaning_2.description: Produced or manufactured by someone or something.

translations.de: Ein beigetragener Artikel war ein Bild von einem hübschen Mädchen im Kimono; es trug die Inschrift: 'Hergestellt in Japan'.
translations.fr: Un des articles contribués était une image d'une jolie fille vêtue d'un kimono; il portait l'inscription: 'Fabriqué au Japon'.
translations.ko: 기여된 항목 중 하나는 김노를 입은 예쁜 소녀의 그림이었으며, 그 위엔 '일본 제작'이라는 문구가 적혀 있었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: One item contributed was a picture of a pretty, kimono-clad girl; it bore the inscription: 'Made in Japan'.

407.pun_sentence: I have always wanted to hand out carts at Wal-Mart. I cannot imagine a greeter job.

meaning_1.description: A person who welcomes or acknowledges people at the entrance of a store or establishment.

translations.de: Ich wollte schon immer Wagen bei Wal-Mart aushändigen. Ich kann mir keinen Begrüßungsjob vorstellen.
translations.fr: J'ai toujours voulu distribuer des chariots à Wal-Mart. Je ne peux pas imaginer un travail d'accueil.
translations.ko: 나는 항상 월마트에서 카트를 나눠주고 싶었습니다. 접객 직원의 일을 상상할 수 없습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I have always wanted to hand out carts at Wal-Mart. I cannot imagine a greeter job.

meaning_2.description: Larger in size, amount, degree, or importance.

translations.fr: J'ai toujours voulu distribuer des chariots chez Wal-Mart. Je ne peux pas imaginer un travail plus grand.
translations.ko: 나는 항상 월마트에서 카트를 배부하는 일을 원했습니다. 더 큰 일은 상상할 수 없습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I have always wanted to hand out carts at Wal-Mart. I cannot imagine a greater job.

408.pun_sentence: The port was very beautiful. The sailors said it was haven on earth.

meaning_1.description: A place of safety or refuge.

translations.fr: Le port était très beau. Les marins disaient que c'était un havre sur terre.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The port was very beautiful. The sailors said it was haven on earth.

meaning_2.description: A place regarded in various religions as the abode of God and the angels, and of the good after death, often traditionally depicted as being above the sky; paradise.

translations.fr: Le port était très beau. Les marins disaient que c'était le paradis sur terre.
translations.ko: 항구는 매우 아름다웠습니다. 선원들은 그것이 지상낙원이라고 말했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The port was very beautiful. The sailors said it was heaven on earth.

409.pun_sentence: She was only a Horseman's daughter, but she didn't know how to say neigh.

meaning_1.description: The characteristic high-pitched sound made by a horse.

translations.de: Sie war nur die Tochter eines Reiters, aber sie wusste nicht, wie man wiehern sagt.
translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'un cavalier, mais elle ne savait pas comment dire hennir.
translations.ko: 그녀는 단지 기수의 딸이었지만, 말의 울음 소리를 어떻게 하는지 몰랐습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: She was only a Horseman's daughter, but she didn't know how to say neigh.

translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'un cavalier, mais elle ne savait pas dire non.
translations.ko: 그녀는 단지 기수의 딸이었지만, 아니라고 말하는 방법을 몰랐습니다.

410.pun_sentence: We believe in separation of church and hate.

translations.ko: 우리는 교회와 국가의 분리를 믿습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: We believe in separation of church and state.

411.pun_sentence: The veterinarian had a great deal of trouble getting his dog to heel.

meaning_1.description: To follow closely behind its owner or trainer, as a command for dogs.

translations.de: Der Tierarzt hatte große Schwierigkeiten damit, seinen Hund dazu zu bringen, ihm dicht zu folgen.
translations.fr: Le vétérinaire a eu beaucoup de mal à faire suivre son chien de près.
translations.ko: 수의사는 그의 개에게 밀착해서 따르라는 명령을 지키게 하는데 많은 어려움을 겪었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The veterinarian had a great deal of trouble getting his dog to heel.

translations.ko: 수의사는 그의 개를 치료하는데 많은 어려움을 겪었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The veterinarian had a great deal of trouble getting his dog to heal.

412.pun_sentence: A band of teenagers cruised past my neighbor's house and pelted it with rotten tomatoes. Police described it as a drive-by fruiting.

meaning_1.description: The mature product of a flowering plant.

translations.de: Eine Bande von Teenagern fuhr am Haus meines Nachbarn vorbei und bewarf es mit faulen Tomaten. Die Polizei bezeichnete es als Fruchtüberfall im Vorbeifahren.
translations.fr: Une bande d'adolescents a défilé devant la maison de mon voisin et l'a bombardée de tomates pourries. La police a décrit cela comme un délit de fuite fruitée.
translations.ko: 한 무리의 청소년들이 내 이웃 집 앞을 지나가며 썩은 토마토로 집을 향해 던졌습니다. 경찰은 이를 드라이브 스루 과일 공격이라고 설명했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A band of teenagers cruised past my neighbor's house and pelted it with rotten tomatoes. Police described it as a drive-by fruiting.

meaning_2.description: Firing bullets from a gun.

translations.de: Eine Gruppe von Teenagern fuhr am Haus meines Nachbarn vorbei und bewarf es mit faulen Tomaten. Die Polizei bezeichnete es als Drive-by-Shooting.
translations.fr: Une bande d'adolescents a défilé devant la maison de mon voisin et l'a bombardée de tomates pourries. La police a décrit cela comme un fusillade au volant.
translations.ko: 한 청소년들의 밴드가 제 이웃의 집을 지나가며 그 집에 썩은 토마토를 투척했습니다. 경찰은 그것을 드라이브 바이 총격으로 설명했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A band of teenagers cruised past my neighbor's house and pelted it with rotten tomatoes. Police described it as a drive-by shooting.

413.pun_sentence: Why was six afraid of seven? Because seven eight nine.

meaning_1.description: It is a cardinal number and also one digit in the Arabic numeral system, the most commonly used numeral system worldwide.

translations.de: Warum hatte sechs Angst vor sieben? Weil sieben acht neun.
translations.fr: Pourquoi six avait-il peur de sept ? Parce que sept huit neuf.
translations.ko: 왜 여섯은 일곱을 두려워했나요? 왜냐하면 일곱이 팔을 아홉으로 만들었기 때문입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Why was six afraid of seven? Because seven eight nine.

translations.fr: Pourquoi six avait-il peur de sept? Parce que sept a mangé neuf.

414.pun_sentence: The Ennui Society elected a new chairman of the bored.

415.pun_sentence: The other animals shunned the kangaroo. They treated him like a leaper.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The other animals shunned the kangaroo. They treated him like a leaper.

416.pun_sentence: When Caesar entered the Senate all hail broke loose.

translations.ko: 시저가 상원에 들어갔을 때, 모든 것이 혼돈스럽게 변했습니다.

417.pun_sentence: The book about Teflon contained no frictional characters.

meaning_1.description: Pertaining to resistance in motion due to the contact of surfaces

translations.ko: 테플론에 관한 책에는 마찰력을 나타내는 캐릭터가 없었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The book about Teflon contained no frictional characters.

418.pun_sentence: Those who drink too much at night have to worry about the mourning after.

meaning_1.description: Mourning refers to the expression of deep sorrow for someone who has died, typically involving following certain conventions such as wearing black clothes.

translations.de: Diejenigen, die nachts zu viel trinken, müssen sich um die Trauer am nächsten Morgen sorgen.
translations.fr: Ceux qui boivent trop le soir doivent se soucier du deuil le lendemain.
translations.ko: 밤에 너무 많이 마시는 사람들은 다음날의 애도를 걱정해야 합니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Those who drink too much at night have to worry about the mourning after.

meaning_2.description: Morning is the period of time from sunrise to noon. It's often considered the start of the day.

translations.de: Diejenigen, die nachts zu viel trinken, müssen sich um den nächsten Morgen sorgen.
translations.fr: Ceux qui boivent trop le soir doivent se soucier du lendemain matin.
translations.ko: 밤에 너무 많이 마시는 사람들은 다음날 아침을 걱정해야 합니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Those who drink too much at night have to worry about the morning after.

419.pun_sentence: Scrambling for cover amid the chaos caused by the rebel forces' attack and the 'coincidental' breakout of the zoo animals, I stumbled into the face of a hostile guerrilla!

meaning_1.description: A member of a small independent group taking part in irregular fighting, typically against larger regular forces.

translations.de: Auf der Suche nach Deckung inmitten des Chaos, verursacht durch den Angriff der Rebellenkräfte und die "zufällige" Ausbruch der Zoo-Tiere, stolperte ich ins Gesicht eines feindlichen Guerillakämpfers!
translations.fr: Cherchant à me couvrir au milieu du chaos provoqué par l'attaque des forces rebelles et l'évasion "coïncidente" des animaux du zoo, je suis tombé sur le visage d'un guérillero hostile !
translations.ko: 반란군의 공격과 '우연히' 동물원 동물들이 탈출함으로 인한 혼란 속에서 보호를 찾으려 노력하다가, 나는 적대적인 게릴라의 얼굴에 걸려 넘어졌습니다!

heterographic.pun_sentence: Scrambling for cover amid the chaos caused by the rebel forces' attack and the 'coincidental' breakout of the zoo animals, I stumbled into the face of a hostile guerrilla!

meaning_2.description: A powerfully built great ape with a large head and short neck, found in the forests of central Africa.

translations.de: Auf der Suche nach Deckung inmitten des Chaos, das durch den Angriff der Rebellenkräfte und den "zufälligen" Ausbruch der Zootiere verursacht wurde, stolperte ich ins Gesicht eines feindseligen Gorillas!
translations.fr: En recherchant une couverture en plein chaos provoqué par l'attaque des forces rebelles et la libération "coïncidente" des animaux du zoo, je suis tombé sur le visage d'un gorille hostile !
translations.ko: 반란군의 공격과 '우연히' 동물원의 동물들이 도망친 혼란 속에서 피신하며, 나는 적대적인 고릴라의 얼굴에 걸려 넘어졌다!

heterographic.pun_sentence: Scrambling for cover amid the chaos caused by the rebel forces' attack and the 'coincidental' breakout of the zoo animals, I stumbled into the face of a hostile gorilla!

420.pun_sentence: Baseball on a foggy day is all about hit and mist.

meaning_1.description: A visible mass of particles suspended in the air, typically seen in the mornings or in foggy conditions.

translations.de: Baseball an einem nebligen Tag handelt alles von schlagen und Nebel.
translations.fr: Le baseball par temps de brouillard, c'est tout une question de frapper et de brume.
translations.ko: 안개 낀 날의 야구는 모두 치고 미스트에 대한 것입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Baseball on a foggy day is all about hit and mist.

meaning_2.description: To fail to hit, reach, catch, or otherwise make contact with something.

translations.de: Baseball an einem nebligen Tag dreht sich alles um Treffen und Verfehlen.
translations.fr: Le baseball par un jour de brouillard se résume à des coups réussis et des coups manqués.
translations.ko: 안개 낀 날의 야구는 모두 명중과 불명중에 관한 것입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Baseball on a foggy day is all about hit and miss.

421.pun_sentence: When Martha Stewart was on trial, New York Times columnist Clyde Haberman reported on her arrival at the courthouse, where a group of supporters had assembled to greet her. 'They included a man in a chef's hat who stood with the others behind a metal barrier — one toque over the line.'

meaning_1.description: A toque is a type of hat with a narrow brim or no brim at all, often worn by chefs.

translations.de: Als Martha Stewart vor Gericht stand, berichtete der New York Times-Kolumnist Clyde Haberman über ihre Ankunft am Gerichtsgebäude, wo eine Gruppe von Unterstützern zusammengekommen war, um sie zu begrüßen. Darunter befand sich ein Mann mit einer Kochmütze, der mit den anderen hinter einer Metallbarriere stand - eine Kochmütze zu viel.
translations.fr: Lorsque Martha Stewart était en procès, le chroniqueur du New York Times, Clyde Haberman, a rapporté son arrivée au tribunal, où un groupe de partisans s'était rassemblé pour l'accueillir. Parmi eux se trouvait un homme portant un chapeau de chef qui se tenait avec les autres derrière une barrière métallique - un toque au-delà de la ligne.
translations.ko: 마사 스튜어트가 재판을 받던 때, 뉴욕타임스의 칼럼니스트 클라이드 하버먼은 그녀가 법원에 도착하면서 그녀를 인사하기 위해 모인 지지자들의 모습을 보도했습니다. 그들 중에는 요리사의 모자인 토크를 쓴 한 남자가 있었는데, 그는 나머지 사람들과 함께 금속 장벽 뒤에 서 있었습니다 - 한 줄 넘는 토크.

heterographic.pun_sentence: When Martha Stewart was on trial, New York Times columnist Clyde Haberman reported on her arrival at the courthouse, where a group of supporters had assembled to greet her. 'They included a man in a chef's hat who stood with the others behind a metal barrier — one toque over the line.'

meaning_2.description: In the context of slang, a 'toke' is a puff of a marijuana cigarette or pipe.

translations.de: Als Martha Stewart vor Gericht stand, berichtete Clyde Haberman, Kolumnist der New York Times, über ihr Eintreffen am Gerichtsgebäude, wo eine Gruppe von Unterstützern zusammengekommen war, um sie zu begrüßen. "Zu ihnen gehörte ein Mann mit einer Kochmütze, der mit den anderen hinter einer Metallbarrikade stand - ein Zug zu viel."
translations.fr: Lorsque Martha Stewart était en procès, le chroniqueur du New York Times, Clyde Haberman, a rapporté son arrivée au tribunal, où un groupe de partisans s'était rassemblé pour l’accueillir. "Parmi eux se trouvait un homme portant un chapeau de chef qui se tenait avec les autres derrière une barrière métallique - une bouffée de trop."
translations.ko: 마사 스튜어트가 재판을 받았을 때, 뉴욕 타임스 칼럼니스트인 클라이드 하베르만은 그녀가 법원에 도착한 것을 보도했습니다. 그녀를 맞이하기 위해 지지자들이 모여 있었습니다. "그들 중에는 요리사 모자를 쓴 한 남자가 있었습니다. 그는 다른 사람들과 함께 금속 장벽 뒤에 서 있었습니다 - 한 대 불면서 선을 넘었습니다."

heterographic.pun_sentence: "When Martha Stewart was on trial, New York Times columnist Clyde Haberman reported on her arrival at the courthouse, where a group of supporters had assembled to greet her. 'They included a man in a chef's hat who stood with the others behind a metal barrier — one toke over the line.'"

422.pun_sentence: To keep someone from stealing your shipments of smoked salmon, secure them with lox.

meaning_1.description: A type of brine-cured salmon, often used in Jewish cuisine.

translations.de: Um zu verhindern, dass jemand Ihre Lieferungen von geräuchertem Lachs stiehlt, sichern Sie sie mit Lox.
translations.fr: Pour empêcher quelqu'un de voler vos envois de saumon fumé, sécurisez-les avec des lox.
translations.ko: 여러분의 훈제 연어 배송품을 훔쳐가는 것을 방지하기 위해, 락스로 보안하세요.

heterographic.pun_sentence: To keep someone from stealing your shipments of smoked salmon, secure them with lox.

meaning_2.description: A device used for preventing access and ensuring security, typically operated with a key.

translations.fr: Pour empêcher quelqu'un de voler vos envois de saumon fumé, sécurisez-les avec des serrures.
translations.ko: 연어를 훔치지 않도록 하려면 잠금장치로 화물을 보호하십시오.

heterographic.pun_sentence: To keep someone from stealing your shipments of smoked salmon, secure them with locks.

423.pun_sentence: Those who live beyond their means should act their wage.

meaning_1.description: The amount of money that a person regularly earns for doing work.

translations.de: Diejenigen, die über ihre Verhältnisse leben, sollten ihrem Lohn entsprechend handeln.
translations.fr: Ceux qui vivent au-delà de leurs moyens devraient agir selon leur salaire.
translations.ko: 자신의 수입을 초과하여 살아가는 사람들은 자신의 월급에 맞게 행동해야 합니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Those who live beyond their means should act their wage.

meaning_2.description: The length of time that a person has lived or a thing has existed.

translations.de: Diejenigen, die über ihre Verhältnisse leben, sollten sich ihrem Alter entsprechend verhalten.
translations.fr: Ceux qui vivent au-delà de leurs moyens devraient agir en fonction de leur âge.
translations.ko: 자신의 수입을 초과하여 살아가는 사람들은 자신의 나이에 맞게 행동해야 합니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Those who live beyond their means should act their age.

424.pun_sentence: OLD SCHOOL SUPERINTENDENTS never die, they just lose their principals.

meaning_1.description: The term principal in this sentence refers to the head of a school.

translations.de: ALTE SCHULLEITER sterben nie, sie verlieren nur ihre Schulleiter.
translations.fr: LES ANCIENS DIRECTEURS D'ÉCOLE ne meurent jamais, ils perdent simplement leurs principaux.
translations.ko: 올드 스쿨 교장들은 절대로 죽지 않아요. 그들은 그저 자신의 교장을 잃을 뿐입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: OLD SCHOOL SUPERINTENDENTS never die, they just lose their principals.

meaning_2.description: In this sentence, the word principle refers to a fundamental truth or proposition that serves as the foundation for a system of belief or behavior or for a chain of reasoning.

translations.de: Alte Schuldirektoren sterben nie, sie verlieren einfach ihre Grundsätze.
translations.fr: Les anciens surintendants d'école ne meurent jamais, ils perdent simplement leurs principes.
translations.ko: 옛 학교 교장들은 결코 죽지 않습니다, 그들은 그저 그들의 원칙을 잃어버립니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: OLD SCHOOL SUPERINTENDENTS never die, they just lose their principles.

425.pun_sentence: They were married by candle-light, but the marriage lasted only a wick.

meaning_1.description: The string part of a candle that you light which burns to produce light.

translations.de: Sie wurden bei Kerzenlicht verheiratet, aber die Ehe hielt nur so lange wie ein Docht.
translations.fr: Ils se sont mariés à la lueur des bougies, mais le mariage n'a duré que le temps d'une mèche.
translations.ko: 그들은 촛불 아래에서 결혼했지만, 그 결혼은 심지가 타는 동안만 지속되었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: They were married by candle-light, but the marriage lasted only a wick.

meaning_2.description: A period of seven consecutive days.

translations.de: Sie heirateten bei Kerzenlicht, aber die Ehe dauerte nur eine Woche.
translations.fr: Ils se sont mariés à la lumière des bougies, mais le mariage n'a duré qu'une semaine.
translations.ko: 그들은 촛불 아래에서 결혼했지만, 그 결혼은 단지 일주일 만에 끝났다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: They were married by candle-light, but the marriage lasted only a week.

426.pun_sentence: The Turkish soldier refused to eat cottage cheese, because he didn't trust the kurds.

meaning_1.description: A member of a mainly pastoral Islamic people living in Kurdistan.

translations.de: Der türkische Soldat weigerte sich, Hüttenkäse zu essen, weil er den Kurden nicht traute.
translations.fr: Le soldat turc a refusé de manger du fromage cottage, parce qu'il ne faisait pas confiance aux Kurdes.
translations.ko: 터키 군인은 쿠르드인을 신뢰하지 않기 때문에 카지 치즈를 먹는 것을 거부했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The Turkish soldier refused to eat cottage cheese, because he didn't trust the kurds.

meaning_2.description: Curd is a dairy product obtained by coagulating milk in a process called curdling which is a fundamental step in making cheese.

translations.de: Der türkische Soldat weigerte sich, Hüttenkäse zu essen, weil er den Quark nicht vertraute.
translations.fr: Le soldat turc a refusé de manger du fromage cottage parce qu'il ne faisait pas confiance aux caillés.
translations.ko: 터키 군인이 치즈를 만드는 데 필수적인 공정인 응고 과정에서 얻은 유제품인 카드를 믿지 않아서 코티지 치즈를 먹을 거부했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The Turkish soldier refused to eat cottage cheese because he didn't trust the curds.

427.pun_sentence: The astronomer's research project didn't win him the coveted Galaxy Award, but he did receive a constellation prize.

meaning_1.description: A group or configuration of stars usually having a name and often recognized as a shape or pattern.

translations.de: Das Forschungsprojekt des Astronomen hat ihm nicht den begehrten Galaxy Award eingebracht, aber er erhielt einen Konstellationspreis.
translations.fr: Le projet de recherche de l'astronome ne lui a pas valu le convoité Prix de la Galaxie, mais il a reçu un prix de constellation.
translations.ko: 천문학자의 연구 프로젝트는 그에게 탐내는 은하상을 가져다주지 못했지만, 그는 별자리 상을 받았습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The astronomer's research project didn't win him the coveted Galaxy Award, but he did receive a constellation prize.

meaning_2.description: Comfort received by a person after a loss or disappointment; a prize given to those who do not win the top prizes.

translations.de: Das Forschungsprojekt des Astronomen gewann nicht den begehrten Galaxy Award, aber er erhielt einen Trostpreis.
translations.fr: Le projet de recherche de l'astronome ne lui a pas valu le convoité Prix Galaxy, mais il a reçu un prix de consolation.
translations.ko: 천문학자의 연구 프로젝트는 갈망하던 갤럭시 상을 못 받았지만, 위로의 상은 받았다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The astronomer's research project didn't win him the coveted Galaxy Award, but he did receive a consolation prize.

428.pun_sentence: Seven days without a pun makes one weak.

meaning_1.description: Lacking physical strength or vigor; frail; feeble.

translations.de: Sieben Tage ohne Wortspiel macht einen schwach.
translations.fr: Sept jours sans jeu de mots rendent une personne faible.
translations.ko: 농담 없는 일주일은 사람을 약하게 만듭니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Seven days without a pun makes one weak.

meaning_2.description: A period of seven days.

translations.de: Sieben Tage ohne ein Wortspiel machen eine Woche.
translations.fr: Sept jours sans un jeu de mots rendent une personne semaine.
translations.ko: 말장난 없는 일주일은 한 주를 만듭니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Seven days without a pun makes one week.

429.pun_sentence: That soil scientist always travels by himself. He's a loam ranger.

meaning_1.description: A rich, fertile soil that is composed of a balanced mixture of sand, silt, and clay.

translations.de: Dieser Bodenwissenschaftler reist immer alleine. Er ist ein Lehm-Ranger.
translations.fr: Ce pédologue voyage toujours seul. Il est un gardien du loam.
translations.ko: 그 토양 과학자는 항상 혼자 여행합니다. 그는 로암 레인저입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: That soil scientist always travels by himself. He's a loam ranger.

meaning_2.description: Alone; solitary; without company or companions.

translations.de: Dieser Bodenwissenschaftler reist immer alleine. Er ist ein einsamer Ranger.
translations.fr: Ce spécialiste des sols voyage toujours seul. Il est un ranger solitaire.
translations.ko: 그 토양 과학자는 항상 혼자 여행합니다. 그는 외로운 레인저입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: That soil scientist always travels by himself. He's a lone ranger.

430.pun_sentence: If you spend too much time in the coffee shop you'll be latte for work.

meaning_1.description: A type of coffee drink made with espresso and hot steamed milk.

translations.de: Wenn du zu viel Zeit im Café verbringst, wirst du spät für die Arbeit sein.
translations.fr: Si tu passes trop de temps dans le café, tu seras latte pour le travail.
translations.ko: 커피숍에서 너무 많은 시간을 보내면 일에 늦게 도착할 것입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: If you spend too much time in the coffee shop you'll be latte for work.

meaning_2.description: Not arriving at or for something at the expected or designated time.

translations.de: Wenn du zu viel Zeit im Kaffeehaus verbringst, wirst du zu spät zur Arbeit kommen.
translations.fr: Si tu passes trop de temps dans le café, tu seras en retard pour le travail.
translations.ko: 커피숍에서 너무 많은 시간을 보내면 일에 늦게 도착하게 될 것입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: If you spend too much time in the coffee shop you'll be late for work.

431.pun_sentence: The optical scientist who stole his colleague's bifocals was sentenced to three years in a state prism.

meaning_1.description: A transparent optical element with flat, polished surfaces that refract light.

translations.de: Der optische Wissenschaftler, der die Bifokalbrille seines Kollegen gestohlen hat, wurde zu drei Jahren in einem staatlichen Prisma verurteilt.
translations.fr: Le scientifique optique qui a volé les lunettes bifocales de son collègue a été condamné à trois ans dans un prisme d'État.
translations.ko: 동료의 쌍안경을 도난한 광학 과학자는 국가 프리즘에서 세 년의 형을 선고받았다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The optical scientist who stole his colleague's bifocals was sentenced to three years in a state prism.

meaning_2.description: A facility where people are legally held as a punishment for crimes they have committed.

translations.de: Der Optikwissenschaftler, der die Bifokalbrille seines Kollegen gestohlen hat, wurde zu drei Jahren in einem staatlichen Gefängnis verurteilt.
translations.fr: Le scientifique optique qui a volé les lunettes bifocales de son collègue a été condamné à trois ans dans une prison d'État.
translations.ko: 동료의 쌍안경을 훔친 광학 과학자는 국가 교도소에서 3년의 형을 선고받았다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The optical scientist who stole his colleague's bifocals was sentenced to three years in a state prison.

432.pun_sentence: A church fair is a bazaar experience.

meaning_1.description: A market consisting of rows of shops or stalls selling miscellaneous goods.

translations.de: Ein Kirchenfest ist eine Basarerfahrung.
translations.fr: Une foire d'église est une expérience de bazar.
translations.ko: 교회 박람회는 바자회 경험이다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A church fair is a bazaar experience.

meaning_2.description: Very strange or unusual.

translations.de: Eine Kirchenmesse ist ein sehr seltsames oder ungewöhnliches Erlebnis.
translations.fr: Un carnaval d'église est une expérience très étrange ou inhabituelle.
translations.ko: 교회 박람회는 매우 이상하거나 흔치 않은 경험이다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A church fair is a bizarre experience.

433.pun_sentence: On Independence day, may the fourth be with you.

meaning_1.description: The numerical position in a sequence that corresponds to the number four, often referred to in terms of dates, as in July 4th.

translations.de: Am Unabhängigkeitstag, möge der Vierte mit Ihnen sein.
translations.fr: Le jour de l'indépendance, que le quatrième soit avec vous.
translations.ko: 독립 기념일에, 4일이 당신과 함께하길 바랍니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: On Independence day, may the fourth be with you.

meaning_2.description: An unseen energy or power often attributed to the universe or a higher power. In the Star Wars franchise, 'the force' is a metaphysical and ubiquitous power.

translations.de: Am Unabhängigkeitstag, möge die Macht mit Ihnen sein.
translations.fr: Le jour de l'Indépendance, que la force soit avec vous.
translations.ko: 독립 기념일에, 힘을 기원합니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: On Independence day, may the force be with you.

434.pun_sentence: At shearing time there are some sheep thrills.

meaning_1.description: A domesticated ruminant animal with a thick woolly coat and (typically only in the male) curving horns.

translations.de: Zur Scherzeit gibt es einige Schaf-Aufregungen.
translations.fr: Au moment de la tonte, il y a quelques frissons de mouton.
translations.ko: 이빨 깎는 시간에는 양에서 몇 가지 전율이 있습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: At shearing time there are some sheep thrills.

meaning_2.description: Costing little money or less than is usual or expected.

translations.de: Zur Scherzeit gibt es einige billige Nervenkitzel.
translations.fr: Au moment de la tonte, il y a quelques frissons bon marché.
translations.ko: 이발 시간에는 예상보다 싼 쾌감이 있습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: At shearing time there are some cheap thrills.

435.pun_sentence: Our theft of raw gold from the mine site was a fiasco because, as we jumped into the getaway boat, we dropped the ore.

meaning_1.description: A naturally occurring solid material from which a metal or valuable mineral is extracted.

translations.de: Unser Diebstahl von Rohgold von der Minenstätte war ein Fiasko, weil wir, als wir in das Fluchtboot sprangen, das Erz fallen ließen.
translations.fr: Notre vol d'or brut sur le site de la mine a été un fiasco car, en sautant dans le bateau de fuite, nous avons laissé tomber le minerai.
translations.ko: 우리가 광산에서 원금을 훔치려 했던 것은 실패했으며, 도망칠 보트에 뛰어들면서 광석을 떨어뜨렸습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Our theft of raw gold from the mine site was a fiasco because, as we jumped into the getaway boat, we dropped the ore.

meaning_2.description: A pole with a flat blade, pivoting or fixed, that is used for rowing or steering a boat.

translations.de: Unser Diebstahl von Rohgold von der Bergbaustelle war ein Fiasko, denn als wir ins Fluchtboot sprangen, ließen wir das Ruder fallen.
translations.fr: Notre vol d'or brut sur le site de la mine a été un fiasco car, lorsque nous avons sauté dans le canot de fuite, nous avons oublié la rame.
translations.ko: 우리가 광산에서 날것의 금을 훔쳤던 것은 실패였다. 왜냐하면, 우리가 도주용 보트에 뛰어들 때, 우리는 노를 떨어뜨렸기 때문이다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Our theft of raw gold from the mine site was a fiasco because, as we jumped into the getaway boat, we dropped the oar.

436.pun_sentence: I'm going to fix the roof, Tom translated.

meaning_1.description: To interpret or express the words in another language.

translations.de: Ich werde das Dach reparieren, übersetzte Tom.
translations.fr: Je vais réparer le toit, a traduit Tom.
translations.ko: 나는 지붕을 고칠 거야, 톰이 번역했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I'm going to fix the roof, Tom translated.

meaning_2.description: To plan or schedule something for a particular time.

translations.de: Ich werde das Dach reparieren, Tom hat geplant.
translations.fr: Je vais réparer le toit, Tom a programmé.
translations.ko: 나는 지붕을 고칠 것이다, Tom이 예정했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I'm going to fix the roof, Tom slated.

437.pun_sentence: A cloth maker's daughter told him she was too young to dye.

meaning_1.description: To change the color of something, especially by soaking it in a colored solution

translations.de: Die Tochter eines Tuchmachers sagte ihm, sie sei zu jung zum Färben.
translations.fr: La fille d'un fabricant de tissus lui a dit qu'elle était trop jeune pour teindre.
translations.ko: 천업자의 딸이 그에게 자신이 염색하기에 너무 어리다고 말했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A cloth maker's daughter told him she was too young to dye.

meaning_2.description: To cease to live.

translations.de: Die Tochter des Tuchmachers sagte ihm, sie sei zu jung, um zu sterben.
translations.fr: La fille du fabricant de tissu lui a dit qu'elle était trop jeune pour mourir.
translations.ko: 천 짜는 사람의 딸이 그에게 자신이 죽기에는 너무 어리다고 말했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A cloth maker's daughter told him she was too young to die.

438.pun_sentence: To stay fit the priest exorcises.

meaning_1.description: To expel or remove, especially of evil spirits, using prayers or religious rites.

translations.de: Um fit zu bleiben, führt der Priester Exorzismen durch.
translations.fr: Pour rester en forme, le prêtre pratique des exorcismes.
translations.ko: 건강을 유지하기 위해 신부님은 퇴마를 시행합니까.

heterographic.pun_sentence: To stay fit the priest exorcises.

meaning_2.description: To engage in physical activity for the purpose of improving health and fitness.

translations.de: Um fit zu bleiben, treibt der Priester Sport.
translations.fr: Pour rester en forme, le prêtre fait de l'exercice.
translations.ko: 건강을 유지하기 위해, 신부는 운동을 합니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: To stay fit, the priest exercises.

439.pun_sentence: She was only a Postman's daughter, but she sure knew her males.

meaning_1.description: The term "male" refers to a man or boy; a member of the sex that does not bear offspring.

translations.de: Sie war nur die Tochter eines Postboten, aber sie kannte ihre Männer sicherlich gut.
translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'un facteur, mais elle connaissait sûrement ses hommes.
translations.ko: 그녀는 단지 우체부의 딸이었지만, 그녀는 확실히 그녀의 남자들을 잘 알고 있었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: She was only a Postman's daughter, but she sure knew her males.

meaning_2.description: The term "mail" refers to letters, parcels, etc., that are delivered by the post office.

translations.de: Sie war nur die Tochter eines Briefträgers, aber sie kannte ihre Post sicher gut.
translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'un facteur, mais elle connaissait très bien son courrier.
translations.ko: 그녀는 단지 우체부의 딸이었지만, 편지에 대해서는 확실히 잘 알고 있었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: She was only a Postman's daughter, but she sure knew her mail.

meaning_1.description: The term 'sum' refers to the result obtained by adding two or more numbers.

translations.de: Mathematiker sind Summenanbeter.
translations.fr: Les mathématiciens sont des adorateurs de somme.
translations.ko: 수학자들은 합을 숭배합니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Mathematicians are sum worshippers.

meaning_2.description: The word 'sun' refers to the star around which the earth orbits, which provides heat and light to the planet.

translations.de: Mathematiker sind Sonnenanbeter.
translations.fr: Les mathématiciens sont des adorateurs du soleil.
translations.ko: 수학자들은 태양을 숭배합니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Mathematicians are sun worshippers.

441.pun_sentence: Undertakers have to get up early in the mourning.

meaning_1.description: To express sadness or grief over a loss or tragedy.

translations.de: Bestattungsunternehmer müssen früh aufstehen, um zu trauern.
translations.fr: Les croque-morts doivent se lever tôt pour faire leur deuil.
translations.ko: 장의사들은 애도를 위해 이른 아침에 일어나야 합니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Undertakers have to get up early in the mourning.

meaning_2.description: The period of time from sunrise to noon.

translations.de: Bestatter müssen früh am Morgen aufstehen.
translations.fr: Les fossoyeurs doivent se lever tôt le matin.
translations.ko: 장의사들은 아침 일찍 일어나야 합니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Undertakers have to get up early in the morning.

442.pun_sentence: The trucker was always irritated at an inspection station, it was the weight that bothered him.

meaning_1.description: The measure of how heavy something is, especially in relation to a standard measure, like a kilogram or pound.

translations.de: Der Trucker war immer genervt an einer Inspektionsstation, es war das Gewicht, das ihn störte.
translations.fr: Le camionneur était toujours irrité à un poste d'inspection, c'était le poids qui le dérangeait.
translations.ko: 트럭 운전사는 항상 검사소에서 짜증났고, 그것은 무게가 그를 괴롭혔습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The trucker was always irritated at an inspection station, it was the weight that bothered him.

meaning_2.description: A period of time in which one is forced to remain in one place, often without doing anything or without anything happening.

translations.de: Der Lastwagenfahrer war immer an einer Inspektionsstation gereizt, es war das Warten, was ihn störte.
translations.fr: Le camionneur était toujours irrité à un poste d'inspection, c'était l'attente qui le dérangeait.
translations.ko: 트럭 운전사는 항상 검사소에서 언짢아했는데, 그를 괴롭히는 것은 기다리는 시간이었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The trucker was always irritated at an inspection station, it was the wait that bothered him.

443.pun_sentence: Upon discovering the deadly virus carried by Surinamese toads, the herpetologist contemplated how best to protect the pipal.

meaning_1.description: A type of fig tree, sacred in Indian subcontinent and East Asia.

translations.de: Nachdem sie das tödliche Virus entdeckt hatten, das von Surinam-Kröten übertragen wird, überlegte der Herpetologe, wie er den Pipal am besten schützen könnte.
translations.fr: Après avoir découvert le virus mortel porté par les crapauds surinamiens, l'herpétologue a réfléchi à la meilleure façon de protéger le pipal.
translations.ko: 숲속에서 데드리 바이러스를 발견한 후, 파충류학자는 도무송이 어떻게 가장 잘 보호할 수 있는지에 대해 고민했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Upon discovering the deadly virus carried by Surinamese toads, the herpetologist contemplated how best to protect the pipal.

meaning_2.description: Individuals, humans, or society as a whole.

translations.de: Nachdem er das tödliche Virus entdeckt hatte, das von Surinam-Kröten getragen wird, überlegte der Herpetologe, wie er die Menschen am besten schützen könnte.
translations.fr: Après avoir découvert le virus mortel porté par les crapauds du Suriname, l'herpétologiste a réfléchi à la meilleure façon de protéger les gens.
translations.ko: 수리남 미끄러기가 실어 온 치명적인 바이러스를 발견한 후에, 파충류 전문가는 사람들을 어떻게 가장 잘 보호할 수 있을지에 대해 고민하였다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Upon discovering the deadly virus carried by Surinamese toads, the herpetologist contemplated how best to protect the people.

444.pun_sentence: New years resolution for the bankrupt gardener was to forget the past and rely on the fuchsia.

meaning_1.description: Fuchsia is a type of flowering plant.

translations.de: Der Neujahrsvorsatz für den bankrotten Gärtner war, die Vergangenheit zu vergessen und auf die Fuchsie zu verlassen.
translations.fr: La résolution du nouvel an pour le jardinier en faillite était d'oublier le passé et de compter sur le fuchsia.
