translations.ko: 파산한 정원사의 새해 결심은 과거를 잊고 퓨쳐시아에 의존하는 것이었다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: New years resolution for the bankrupt gardener was to forget the past and rely on the fuchsia.

meaning_2.description: The period of time that will come after the present.

translations.de: Der Neujahrsvorsatz für den bankrotten Gärtner war, die Vergangenheit zu vergessen und auf die Zukunft zu vertrauen.
translations.fr: La résolution du Nouvel An pour le jardinier en faillite était d'oublier le passé et de compter sur l'avenir.
translations.ko: 파산한 원예가의 새해 결심은 과거를 잊고 미래에 의존하는 것이었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: New years resolution for the bankrupt gardener was to forget the past and rely on the future.

445.pun_sentence: OLD SCOTSMEN never die, but they can be kilt.

meaning_1.description: A type of traditional Scottish garment, typically worn by men.

translations.de: Alte Schotten sterben nie, aber sie können einen Kilt tragen.
translations.fr: Les vieux Écossais ne meurent jamais, mais ils peuvent être en kilt.
translations.ko: 노인 스코틀랜드 사람들은 결코 죽지 않지만, 그들은 킬트를 입을 수 있습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: OLD SCOTSMEN never die, but they can be kilt.

meaning_2.description: To end someone's life, to cause the death of.

translations.de: Alte Schotten sterben nie, aber sie können getötet werden.
translations.fr: Les vieux Écossais ne meurent jamais, mais ils peuvent être tués.
translations.ko: 노인 스코틀랜드 사람들은 결코 죽지 않지만, 그들은 죽일 수 있습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: OLD SCOTSMEN never die, but they can be killed.

446.pun_sentence: OLD GARDENERS never die, they just spade away.

meaning_1.description: To dig into or through with a spade; typically refers to gardening or farming activity.

translations.de: Alte Gärtner sterben nie, sie graben einfach weiter.
translations.fr: Les vieux jardiniers ne meurent jamais, ils se contentent de bêcher.
translations.ko: 노인 정원사들은 결코 죽지 않습니다, 그들은 그냥 삽질을 계속합니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: OLD GARDENERS never die, they just spade away.

meaning_2.description: To slowly disappear, lose importance, or become weaker.

translations.de: Alte Gärtner sterben nie, sie verschwinden einfach langsam.
translations.fr: Les vieux jardiniers ne meurent jamais, ils disparaissent juste progressivement.
translations.ko: 노인 원예가들은 결코 죽지 않습니다, 그들은 그저 서서히 사라집니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: OLD GARDENERS never die, they just fade away.

447.pun_sentence: Asked by a waiter if she would like a drink the lady replied 'wine not?'

meaning_1.description: An alcoholic beverage made from fermented grapes or other fruits.

translations.de: Gefragt von einem Kellner, ob sie etwas trinken möchte, antwortete die Dame 'warum nicht Wein?'.
translations.fr: Demandée par un serveur si elle aimerait boire quelque chose, la dame a répondu 'pourquoi pas du vin?'.
translations.ko: 웨이터에게 음료를 원하는지 물었을 때, 그 여성은 '와인이 어때?'라고 답했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Asked by a waiter if she would like a drink the lady replied 'wine not?'

meaning_2.description: Used to offer or request explanation or justification.

translations.de: Gefragt von einem Kellner, ob sie etwas trinken möchte, antwortete die Dame, "Warum nicht?"
translations.fr: Interrogée par un serveur si elle aimerait boire quelque chose, la dame a répondu, "Pourquoi pas?"
translations.ko: 웨이터에게 음료를 원하는지 물어본 데 대해 여성은 "왜 아니죠?"라고 답했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Asked by a waiter if she would like a drink the lady replied, "Why not?"

448.pun_sentence: OLD PRAGUE RESIDENTS never die, they just Czech out.

meaning_1.description: In this case, "Czech" refers to the nationality or ethnic group from the Czech Republic, a country in Central Europe.

translations.de: Alte Prager Bewohner sterben nie, sie Tschechen einfach aus.
translations.fr: Les anciens résidents de Prague ne meurent jamais, ils se retirent simplement à la tchèque.
translations.ko: 올드 프라하 주민들은 결코 죽지 않습니다, 그들은 그저 체코식으로 떠납니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: OLD PRAGUE RESIDENTS never die, they just Czech out.

meaning_2.description: "Check_out" in this case could mean to die or to leave a place.

translations.de: ALTE PRAGER BEWOHNER sterben nie, sie gehen nur weg.
translations.fr: LES ANCIENS RÉSIDENTS DE PRAGUE ne meurent jamais, ils se contentent de partir.
translations.ko: 오래된 프라하 주민들은 결코 죽지 않고, 그저 떠납니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: OLD PRAGUE RESIDENTS never die, they just check_out.

449.pun_sentence: The percussionist was very good at analyzing symbols.

meaning_1.description: A sign, emblem, or other thing that represents something else.

translations.de: Der Schlagzeuger war sehr gut darin, Symbole zu analysieren.
translations.fr: Le percussionniste était très doué pour analyser les symboles.
translations.ko: 그 타악기 연주자는 상징을 분석하는 데 매우 뛰어났습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The percussionist was very good at analyzing symbols.

meaning_2.description: A musical instrument of the percussion family consisting of a circular, flat, metal disc that is struck with a drumstick or used in pairs by striking them together.

translations.de: Der Schlagzeuger war sehr gut darin, Becken zu analysieren.
translations.fr: Le percussionniste était très doué pour analyser les cymbales.
translations.ko: 그 타악기 연주자는 심벌을 분석하는 데 매우 뛰어났습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The percussionist was very good at analyzing cymbals.

450.pun_sentence: For children to eat without washing their hands would be a grime.

meaning_1.description: Dirt, filth, or a layer of dirt.

translations.de: Dass Kinder ohne Händewaschen essen, wäre Schmutz.
translations.fr: Pour que les enfants mangent sans se laver les mains, ce serait une saleté.
translations.ko: 아이들이 손을 씻지 않고 음식을 먹는 것은 더러움이 될 것입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: For children to eat without washing their hands would be a grime.

meaning_2.description: An action that is against the moral or penal laws.

translations.de: Es wäre ein Verbrechen, wenn Kinder essen würden, ohne sich die Hände zu waschen.
translations.fr: Pour les enfants de manger sans se laver les mains serait un crime.
translations.ko: 아이들이 손을 씻지 않고 먹는 것은 범죄가 될 것이다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: For children to eat without washing their hands would be a crime.

451.pun_sentence: Royal chairs are rarely throne out.

meaning_1.description: The seat that a king or queen uses on official occasions.

translations.de: Königliche Thronstühle werden selten weggeworfen.
translations.fr: Les trônes royaux sont rarement jetés.
translations.ko: 왕좌는 드물게 버려진다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Royal chairs are rarely throne out.

meaning_2.description: To physically propel or cast in a specific direction, here it means to get rid of.

translations.de: Königliche Stühle werden selten weggeworfen.
translations.fr: Les chaises royales sont rarement jetées.
translations.ko: 왕좌는 거의 버려지지 않습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Royal chairs are rarely thrown out.

452.pun_sentence: In ancient times, seagoing vessels were much more fuel efficient. They got thousands of miles to the galleon.

meaning_1.description: A galleon is a large, multi-decked sailing ship used primarily by European states from the 16th to 18th centuries.

translations.de: In der Antike waren Seeschiffe viel kraftstoffeffizienter. Sie kamen Tausende von Meilen mit einem Galeonenschiff aus.
translations.fr: Dans l'Antiquité, les navires de mer étaient beaucoup plus économes en carburant. Ils parcouraient des milliers de miles par galion.
translations.ko: 고대에는 해상선박이 훨씬 더 연료 효율적이었습니다. 그들은 한 갤리온으로 수천 마일을 갔습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: In ancient times, seagoing vessels were much more fuel efficient. They got thousands of miles to the galleon.

meaning_2.description: A gallon is a unit of measurement for volume, commonly used to measure liquids such as fuel.

translations.de: In der Antike waren Seeschiffe viel treibstoffeffizienter. Sie schafften tausende von Meilen pro Gallone.
translations.fr: Dans l'ancien temps, les navires de mer étaient beaucoup plus économes en carburant. Ils parcouraient des milliers de miles par gallon.
translations.ko: 고대에는 해상 선박이 훨씬 연료 효율적이었습니다. 그들은 갤런당 수천 마일을 갔습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: In ancient times, seagoing vessels were much more fuel efficient. They got thousands of miles to the gallon.

453.pun_sentence: When the glazier was sent to the hospital room to check the cracked window, he told the patient in the body cast, 'I've come to feel your pane.'

meaning_1.description: A single sheet of glass in a window or door.

translations.de: Als der Glaser in das Krankenhauszimmer geschickt wurde, um das gebrochene Fenster zu überprüfen, sagte er zum Patienten im Gipsverband, 'Ich bin gekommen, um Ihren Schmerz zu fühlen.'
translations.fr: Lorsque le vitrier a été envoyé à la chambre d'hôpital pour vérifier la fenêtre fissurée, il a dit au patient dans le plâtre, 'Je suis venu ressentir votre peine.'
translations.ko: 유리 수리공이 금간 창문을 확인하러 병원 방으로 보내졌을 때, 그는 몸에 깁스를 한 환자에게 말했습니다. '저는 당신의 유리판을 만져보러 왔습니다.'

heterographic.pun_sentence: When the glazier was sent to the hospital room to check the cracked window, he told the patient in the body cast, 'I've come to feel your pane.'

meaning_2.description: Physical or emotional discomfort or distress.

translations.de: Als der Glaser in das Krankenzimmer geschickt wurde, um das gerissene Fenster zu überprüfen, sagte er dem Patienten im Gips, "Ich bin gekommen, um Ihren Schmerz zu spüren."
translations.fr: Lorsque le vitrier a été envoyé à la chambre d'hôpital pour vérifier la fenêtre fissurée, il a dit au patient dans le plâtre, "Je suis venu pour ressentir votre douleur."
translations.ko: 유리공이 깨진 창문을 확인하기 위해 병실로 보내졌을 때, 그는 몸에 깁스를 한 환자에게 "당신의 고통을 느끼러 왔습니다."라고 말하였습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: When the glazier was sent to the hospital room to check the cracked window, he told the patient in the body cast, "I've come to feel your pain."

454.pun_sentence: 'I'm on social security,' said Tom dolefully.

meaning_1.description: Expressing sorrow or melancholy; mournful.

translations.de: "Ich bin in der Sozialversicherung", sagte Tom traurig.
translations.fr: "Je suis à la sécurité sociale", a dit Tom avec tristesse.
translations.ko: "나는 사회 보장을 받고 있어.", 톰이 슬프게 말했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: 'I'm on social security,' said Tom dolefully.

meaning_2.description: In a British context, 'dole' can mean a benefit paid by the government to the unemployed. In general, it can also refer to a portion of money or goods that has been distributed.

translations.de: "Ich beziehe Sozialhilfe", sagte Tom bedrückt.
translations.fr: "Je suis à la Sécurité sociale," dit Tom d'un air triste.
translations.ko: "나는 사회보장에 있어,"라고 톰이 우울하게 말했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: "I'm on social security," said Tom dolefully.

455.pun_sentence: Did Gregor Mendel ever win the Nobel Peas Prize?

meaning_1.description: A small spherical seed produced by a plant, especially the edible green seed of a legume such as a pea.

translations.de: Hat Gregor Mendel jemals den Nobelpreis für Erbsen gewonnen?
translations.fr: Gregor Mendel a-t-il jamais remporté le Prix Nobel des Pois ?
translations.ko: 그레고르 멘델은 이제껏 노벨 완두콩 상을 받은 적이 있나요?

heterographic.pun_sentence: Did Gregor Mendel ever win the Nobel Peas Prize?

meaning_2.description: The absence of war or other hostilities; freedom from disputes or disagreements; public order and security.

translations.de: Hat Gregor Mendel jemals den Friedensnobelpreis gewonnen?
translations.fr: Gregor Mendel a-t-il jamais remporté le prix Nobel de la paix?
translations.ko: 그레고르 멘델은 노벨 평화상을 받은 적이 있습니까?

heterographic.pun_sentence: Did Gregor Mendel ever win the Nobel Peace Prize?

456.pun_sentence: Mothers everywhere want their children to give peas a chance.

meaning_1.description: A pea is a small spherical green seed that is widely consumed as a vegetable.

translations.de: Mütter überall wollen, dass ihre Kinder Erbsen eine Chance geben.
translations.fr: Les mères partout désirent que leurs enfants donnent une chance aux petits pois.
translations.ko: 어디에서나 엄마들은 자녀들이 완두콩에 기회를 줄 것을 원합니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Mothers everywhere want their children to give peas a chance.

meaning_2.description: Peace refers to a state of tranquility, harmony or a lack of violence and conflict.

translations.de: Mütter überall wollen, dass ihre Kinder dem Frieden eine Chance geben.
translations.fr: Partout, les mères veulent que leurs enfants donnent une chance à la paix.
translations.ko: 어디서나 엄마들은 자녀들이 평화에 기회를 줄 것을 원합니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Mothers everywhere want their children to give peace a chance.

457.pun_sentence: 'This is all from memory,' Tom wrote.

meaning_1.description: To inscribe words, symbols, etc. on a surface, typically paper, using a pen, pencil or similar implement. This could also mean to create a piece of text such as a letter or manuscript.

translations.de: 'Das ist alles aus dem Gedächtnis,' schrieb Tom.
translations.fr: 'C'est tout de mémoire,' Tom a écrit.
translations.ko: '이것은 모두 기억에서입니다,' 톰이 썼습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: 'This is all from memory,' Tom wrote.

meaning_2.description: A method of learning that involves repeating information without understanding, usually in a continual way.

translations.de: "Das ist alles aus dem Gedächtnis," wiederholte Tom.
translations.fr: "C'est tout de mémoire," dit Tom, en répétant.
translations.ko: "이것은 모두 기억에서 나온 것입니다," 톰이 반복했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: "This is all from memory," Tom rote.

458.pun_sentence: Car salesmen compete trying to sell for the lease amount.

meaning_1.description: A contract by which one party conveys land, property, services, etc., to another for a specified time, usually in return for a periodic payment.

translations.de: Autoverkäufer konkurrieren darum, für den geringsten Leasingbetrag zu verkaufen.
translations.fr: Les vendeurs de voitures sont en concurrence pour essayer de vendre pour le montant du bail.
translations.ko: 차 판매사원들은 최소의 임대 금액에 팔려고 경쟁합니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Car salesmen compete trying to sell for the lease amount.

meaning_2.description: Smallest in size, amount, degree, or rank.

translations.de: Autoverkäufer konkurrieren darum, für den geringsten Betrag zu verkaufen.
translations.fr: Les vendeurs de voitures se font concurrence en essayant de vendre pour le montant le plus bas.
translations.ko: 자동차 판매사원들은 가장 적은 금액으로 판매하기 위해 경쟁합니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Car salesmen compete trying to sell for the least amount.

459.pun_sentence: When told his design for a stadium was too grandiose, the architect shed a tier.

meaning_1.description: A level or row of seating in a sports stadium

translations.de: Als ihm gesagt wurde, dass sein Stadionentwurf zu prunkvoll war, hat der Architekt eine Sitzreihe entfernt.
translations.fr: Quand on lui a dit que son projet de stade était trop grandiose, l'architecte a supprimé une rangée de sièges.
translations.ko: 그의 경기장 디자인이 너무 웅장하다는 말을 들은 건축가는 좌석 한 줄을 없앴다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: When told his design for a stadium was too grandiose, the architect shed a tier.

meaning_2.description: A droplet of water secreted by the eye as a result of emotion, irritation, or a reflex.

translations.de: Als man ihm sagte, sein Entwurf für ein Stadion sei zu großartig, vergoss der Architekt eine Träne.
translations.fr: Lorsqu'on lui a dit que son design pour un stade était trop grandiose, l'architecte a versé une larme.
translations.ko: 그의 경기장 디자인이 너무 거창하다고 전해졌을 때, 그 건축가는 눈물을 흘렸다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: When told his design for a stadium was too grandiose, the architect shed a tear.

460.pun_sentence: How do farmers make crop circles? With a protractor.

meaning_1.description: A protractor is a semicircular or circular tool, typically made of transparent plastic, used for measuring angles.

translations.de: Wie machen Bauern Kornkreise? Mit einem Winkelmesser.
translations.fr: Comment les agriculteurs font-ils des cercles de culture ? Avec un rapporteur.
translations.ko: 농부들은 어떻게 농작물 원을 만드는가? 각도계를 이용하여.

heterographic.pun_sentence: How do farmers make crop circles? With a protractor.

meaning_2.description: A tractor is a powerful motor vehicle with large rear wheels, used chiefly on farms for hauling equipment and trailers.

translations.de: Wie machen Bauern Kornkreise? Mit einem Traktor.
translations.fr: Comment les agriculteurs font-ils des cercles de cultures ? Avec un tracteur.
translations.ko: 농부들은 어떻게 농작물 원을 만드나요? 트랙터로.

heterographic.pun_sentence: How do farmers make crop circles? With a tractor.

461.pun_sentence: It was an emotional wedding. Even the cake was in tiers.

meaning_1.description: A level or grade within a structure

translations.de: Es war eine emotionale Hochzeit. Sogar die Torte war in Stufen.
translations.fr: C'était un mariage émotionnel. Même le gâteau était en étages.
translations.ko: 그것은 감동적인 결혼식이었습니다. 케이크조차도 층으로 이루어져 있었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: It was an emotional wedding. Even the cake was in tiers.

meaning_2.description: The liquid that flows from the eyes as a result of emotion, such as sadness or joy.

translations.de: Es war eine emotionale Hochzeit. Sogar der Kuchen war zu Tränen gerührt.
translations.fr: C'était un mariage émotionnel. Même le gâteau était en larmes.
translations.ko: 감성적인 결혼식 이었어요. 케이크까지 눈물을 흘렸어요.

heterographic.pun_sentence: It was an emotional wedding. Even the cake was in tears.

462.pun_sentence: Mourning has broken on Easter Sunday.

meaning_1.description: The expression of deep sorrow for someone who has died, typically involving following certain conventions such as wearing black clothes.

translations.de: Die Trauer hat am Ostersonntag begonnen.
translations.fr: Le deuil a commencé le dimanche de Pâques.
translations.ko: 부활절 일요일에 애도가 시작되었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Mourning has broken on Easter Sunday.

meaning_2.description: The period of time from sunrise to noon; the start of the day.

translations.de: Der Morgen hat am Ostersonntag angebrochen.
translations.fr: Le matin s'est levé le dimanche de Pâques.
translations.ko: 부활절 일요일에 아침이 밝았습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Morning has broken on Easter Sunday.

463.pun_sentence: A little boy found out from his mother that grime does not pay.

meaning_1.description: Dirt, filth, or a layer of dirt that is visible but difficult to remove.

translations.de: Ein kleiner Junge erfuhr von seiner Mutter, dass Schmutz sich nicht auszahlt.
translations.fr: Un petit garçon a découvert de sa mère que la saleté ne paie pas.
translations.ko: 어린 소년이 엄마로부터 노력해도 잘 지워지지 않는 먼지나 더러움이 보람이 없다는 것을 알게 되었다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A little boy found out from his mother that grime does not pay.

meaning_2.description: An illegal act for which someone can be punished by the government.

translations.de: Ein kleiner Junge erfuhr von seiner Mutter, dass Verbrechen sich nicht auszahlt.
translations.fr: Un petit garçon a découvert de sa mère que le crime ne paie pas.
translations.ko: 어린 소년이 그의 어머니로부터 범죄는 보상받지 못한다는 것을 알게 되었다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A little boy found out from his mother that crime does not pay.

464.pun_sentence: John plans to retire in the spring and, like the trees around us, will be leafing.

meaning_1.description: To produce leaves; the process of a tree or plant developing leaves.

translations.de: John plant im Frühling in den Ruhestand zu gehen, und wie die Bäume um uns herum, wird er blättern.
translations.fr: John prévoit de prendre sa retraite au printemps et, comme les arbres autour de nous, sortira des feuilles.
translations.ko: 존은 봄에 은퇴하려고 계획하고 있으며, 주변의 나무들처럼 잎이 피게 될 것입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: John plans to retire in the spring and, like the trees around us, will be leafing.

meaning_2.description: To go away or depart from a place.

translations.de: John plant, im Frühling in den Ruhestand zu gehen und, wie die Bäume um uns herum, wird er gehen.
translations.fr: John prévoit de prendre sa retraite au printemps et, comme les arbres autour de nous, il partira.
translations.ko: 존은 봄에 은퇴할 계획이고, 우리 주변의 나무들처럼, 그는 떠날 것입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: John plans to retire in the spring and, like the trees around us, will be leaving.

465.pun_sentence: 'I can tell which way the wind blows,' said Tom vainly.

meaning_1.description: Without success or achieving no result; futilely

translations.de: "Ich kann sagen, in welche Richtung der Wind weht", sagte Tom vergeblich.
translations.fr: "Je peux dire dans quelle direction le vent souffle", a dit Tom en vain.
translations.ko: "나는 바람이 어느 방향으로 불고 있는지 알 수 있어," 톰이 헛되이 말했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: 'I can tell which way the wind blows,' said Tom vainly.

meaning_2.description: A type of device that is moved by air or fluid, typically to measure wind direction or speed.

translations.de: "Ich kann sagen, in welche Richtung der Wind weht," sagte Tom Windfahne.
translations.fr: "Je peux dire dans quelle direction le vent souffle," a déclaré Tom vane.
translations.ko: "바람이 어느 방향으로 불고 있는지 알 수 있어," 톰 바네가 말했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: "I can tell which way the wind blows," said Tom vane.

466.pun_sentence: When two bakers traded buns they had a roll reversal.

meaning_1.description: In this sentence, "roll" refers to a round or elliptical shape piece of bread.

translations.de: Wenn zwei Bäcker Brötchen tauschten, hatten sie eine Rollenumkehr.
translations.fr: Quand deux boulangers échangeaient des petits pains, ils avaient un échange de rôle.
translations.ko: 두 명의 제빵사가 빵을 교환했을 때, 그들은 롤 리버설(빵 교환)을 가졌다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: When two bakers traded buns they had a roll reversal.

meaning_2.description: "Role" refers to a character played by an actor or a part or function performed by someone.

translations.de: Wenn zwei Bäcker Brötchen tauschten, hatten sie eine Rollenumkehr.
translations.fr: Quand deux boulangers ont échangé des pains, ils ont eu un renversement de rôle.
translations.ko: 두 제빵사가 빵을 거래할 때 그들은 역할 전환을 가졌습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: When two bakers traded buns they had a role reversal.

467.pun_sentence: When asked whether or not I was bilingual, I was about to say I knew sign language, but I figured it was sort of a mute point.

meaning_1.description: Silent or refraining from speech.

translations.de: Als man mich fragte, ob ich zweisprachig sei oder nicht, wollte ich gerade sagen, dass ich Gebärdensprache kann, aber ich dachte, es wäre irgendwie ein stummer Punkt.
translations.fr: Lorsqu'on m'a demandé si j'étais bilingue ou non, j'étais sur le point de dire que je connaissais la langue des signes, mais j'ai pensé que c'était un peu un point muet.
translations.ko: 나에게 나가 이중 언어 사용자인지 아닌지 물었을 때, 나는 수화를 알고 있다고 말하려고 했지만, 그것이 다소 무의미한 포인트라고 생각했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: When asked whether or not I was bilingual, I was about to say I knew sign language, but I figured it was sort of a mute point.

meaning_2.description: Debatable or subject to discussion, but ultimately of no practical importance.

translations.de: Als man mich fragte, ob ich zweisprachig sei oder nicht, wollte ich gerade sagen, dass ich die Gebärdensprache beherrsche, aber ich fand, dass es irgendwie ein diskutierbarer Punkt war, aber letztlich von keiner praktischen Bedeutung.
translations.fr: Lorsqu'on m'a demandé si j'étais bilingue ou non, j'étais sur le point de dire que je connaissais la langue des signes, mais j'ai jugé que c'était en quelque sorte un point discutable mais finalement sans importance pratique.
translations.ko: 나에게 나가 두 언어 사용자인지 아닌지 물었을 때, 나는 수화를 알고 있다고 말하려고 했지만, 그것이 사실상 논의의 여지가 있지만 결국은 실질적인 중요성이 없는 문제라고 생각했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: When asked whether or not I was bilingual, I was about to say I knew sign language, but I figured it was sort of a moot point.

468.pun_sentence: When I was in my cabin on the ship I got sick. Someone told me once I got to the doc, I'd feel better.

meaning_1.description: It is a shortened term for doctor.

translations.de: Als ich in meiner Kabine auf dem Schiff war, wurde ich krank. Jemand hat mir gesagt, dass ich mich besser fühlen würde, sobald ich beim Arzt angekommen bin.
translations.fr: Quand j'étais dans ma cabine sur le bateau, je suis tombé malade. On m'a dit qu'une fois arrivé chez le médecin, je me sentirais mieux.
translations.ko: 나는 배의 나의 객실에 있을 때 아팠습니다. 누군가가 의사에게 가면 나아질 것이라고 말했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: When I was in my cabin on the ship I got sick. Someone told me once I got to the doc, I'd feel better.

meaning_2.description: The place where a ship is usually stored or parked or the act of arriving there.

translations.de: Als ich in meiner Kabine auf dem Schiff war, wurde ich krank. Jemand hat mir gesagt, dass ich mich besser fühlen würde, sobald ich am Dock angekommen bin.
translations.fr: Quand j'étais dans ma cabine sur le bateau, je suis tombé malade. Quelqu'un m'a dit qu'une fois arrivé au quai, je me sentirais mieux.
translations.ko: 배의 내 캐빈에 있을 때, 나는 아팠습니다. 누군가가 저에게 도크에 도착하면 더 나아질 것이라고 말했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: When I was in my cabin on the ship I got sick. Someone told me once I got to the dock I'd feel better.

469.pun_sentence: A pickle maker fell into one of the vats at work. At hospital it was determined he had a brine injury.

meaning_1.description: Brine is a high-concentration solution of salt in water, particularly used in the pickling process.

translations.de: Ein Gurkenhersteller fiel bei der Arbeit in eine der Wannen. Im Krankenhaus wurde festgestellt, dass er eine Soleverletzung hatte.
translations.fr: Un fabricant de cornichons est tombé dans l'une des cuves au travail. A l'hôpital, il a été déterminé qu'il avait une blessure due à la saumure.
translations.ko: 피클 제조업자가 일하는 중에 한 가지 양조 통에 빠졌습니다. 병원에서 그의 상처가 염수로 인한 것이라고 판정되었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A pickle maker fell into one of the vats at work. At hospital it was determined he had a brine injury.

meaning_2.description: Brain in this context refers to the organ in the head that controls the body’s functions.

translations.de: Ein Gewürzgurkenhersteller fiel bei der Arbeit in eines der Fässer. Im Krankenhaus wurde festgestellt, dass er eine Hirnverletzung hatte.
translations.fr: Un fabricant de cornichons est tombé dans l'une des cuves au travail. À l'hôpital, il a été déterminé qu'il avait une lésion cérébrale.
translations.ko: 피클 제조사가 일하는 중에 양조기에 빠졌습니다. 병원에서 그의 뇌 손상이 확인되었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A pickle maker fell into one of the vats at work. At the hospital, it was determined he had a brain injury.

470.pun_sentence: Bee keepers always manage to keep buzzy.

meaning_1.description: A low, continuous humming or murmuring sound made by bees.

translations.de: Imker schaffen es immer, beschäftigt zu bleiben.
translations.fr: Les apiculteurs parviennent toujours à rester occupés.
translations.ko: 벌집 신호들은 항상 분주하게 지내는 데 성공합니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Bee keepers always manage to keep buzzy.

meaning_2.description: To be actively and fully engaged in work or tasks.

translations.de: Imker schaffen es immer, sich beschäftigt zu halten.
translations.fr: Les apiculteurs parviennent toujours à rester occupés.
translations.ko: 꿀벌 사육사는 항상 바쁘게 지내는 데 성공합니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Bee keepers always manage to keep busy.

471.pun_sentence: Despite the repressive restrictions in force against all of the fine arts, students in Kabul often gathered secretly to listen to band music.

meaning_1.description: A group of musicians who play music together.

translations.de: Trotz der repressiven Einschränkungen gegen alle bildenden Künste versammelten sich Studenten in Kabul oft heimlich, um Bandmusik zu hören.
translations.fr: Malgré les restrictions répressives en vigueur contre tous les beaux-arts, les étudiants à Kaboul se réunissaient souvent en secret pour écouter de la musique de groupe.
translations.ko: 모든 미술에 대한 억압적인 제한에도 불구하고, 카불의 학생들은 종종 비밀리에 밴드 음악을 듣기 위해 모였습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Despite the repressive restrictions in force against all of the fine arts, students in Kabul often gathered secretly to listen to band music.

meaning_2.description: To officially or legally prohibit something or someone.

translations.de: Trotz der repressiven Einschränkungen gegen alle bildenden Künste, trafen sich Studenten in Kabul oft heimlich, um verbotene Musik zu hören.
translations.fr: Malgré les restrictions répressives en vigueur contre tous les beaux-arts, les étudiants à Kaboul se rassemblaient souvent en secret pour écouter de la musique interdite.
translations.ko: 모든 미술에 대한 억압적인 제한에도 불구하고, 카불의 학생들은 종종 비밀리에 금지된 음악을 듣기 위해 모였습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Despite the repressive restrictions in force against all of the fine arts, students in Kabul often gathered secretly to listen to ban music.

472.pun_sentence: My computer is so slow it hertz.

meaning_1.description: Hertz is a unit of frequency, signifying one cycle per second.

translations.de: Mein Computer ist so langsam, dass es in Hertz weh tut.
translations.fr: Mon ordinateur est si lent que ça fait mal en Hertz.
translations.ko: 내 컴퓨터가 너무 느려서 헤르츠로 아프다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: My computer is so slow it hertz.

meaning_2.description: Hurt means to cause pain or discomfort.

translations.de: Mein Computer ist so langsam, dass es weh tut.
translations.fr: Mon ordinateur est tellement lent que ça fait mal.
translations.ko: 내 컴퓨터가 너무 느려서 아프다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: My computer is so slow it hurts.

473.pun_sentence: I witnessed the attack on the castle and saw the queen's robe torn and the king's throne under the horses' feet.

meaning_1.description: The ceremonial seat for a sovereign, bishop, or similar figure.

translations.de: Ich beobachtete den Angriff auf die Burg und sah das zerrissene Kleid der Königin und den Thron des Königs unter den Füßen der Pferde.
translations.fr: J'ai été témoin de l'attaque sur le château et j'ai vu la robe de la reine déchirée et le trône du roi sous les pieds des chevaux.
translations.ko: 나는 성을 공격하는 것을 목격하고 여왕의 옷이 찢어지고 왕의 왕좌가 말들의 발 밑에 있는 것을 봤다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I witnessed the attack on the castle and saw the queen's robe torn and the king's throne under the horses' feet.

meaning_2.description: To toss or hurl something.

translations.de: Ich sah den Angriff auf die Burg und sah, wie das Gewand der Königin zerrissen und der Wurf des Königs unter den Füßen der Pferde lag.
translations.fr: J'ai été témoin de l'attaque sur le château et j'ai vu la robe de la reine déchirée et le lancement du roi sous les pieds des chevaux.
translations.ko: 나는 성을 공격하는 것을 목격하고 여왕의 로브가 찢어지고 왕이 말들의 발 아래로 던지는 것을 보았다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I witnessed the attack on the castle and saw the queen's robe torn and the king's throw under the horses' feet.

474.pun_sentence: 'Would anyone like some Parmesan?' asked Tom gratingly.

meaning_1.description: In an irritating or annoying manner.

translations.de: "Möchte jemand etwas Parmesan?" fragte Tom auf eine ärgerliche Art und Weise.
translations.fr: "Quelqu'un voudrait-il du parmesan ?" demanda Tom d'une manière irritante.
translations.ko: "누군가 파르마산 치즈를 좋아하십니까?" 톰이 성가시게 물었다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: 'Would anyone like some Parmesan?' asked Tom gratingly.

meaning_2.description: To reduce food to small shreds by rubbing it on a grater.

translations.de: "Möchte jemand Parmesan?" fragte Tom, während er ihn rieb.
translations.fr: "Quelqu'un veut-il du parmesan?" demanda Tom en le râpant.
translations.ko: "누군가 파르마산 치즈를 원하십니까?" 톰이 물었다가 갈아 넣었다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: 'Would anyone like some Parmesan?' asked Tom grate.

475.pun_sentence: Ancient scribes who hired Aztec writers had to make sure the Inca was dry.

meaning_1.description: A member of a South American Indian people living in the central Andes before the Spanish conquest.

translations.de: Alte Schreiber, die Aztekische Schriftsteller eingestellt haben, mussten sicherstellen, dass der Inka trocken war.
translations.fr: Les scribes anciens qui engageaient des écrivains aztèques devaient s'assurer que l'Inca était sec.
translations.ko: 고대 서기관들이 아즈텍 작가를 고용할 때, 인카가 건조한지 확인해야 했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Ancient scribes who hired Aztec writers had to make sure the Inca was dry.

meaning_2.description: A colored fluid used for writing, drawing, printing, or duplicating.

translations.de: Alte Schreiber, die Aztekische Schriftsteller anstellten, mussten sicherstellen, dass die Tinte trocken war.
translations.fr: Les scribes anciens qui engageaient des écrivains aztèques devaient s'assurer que l'encre était sèche.
translations.ko: 고대 서기관들이 아즈텍 작가를 고용할 때는 잉크가 마른지 확인해야 했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Ancient scribes who hired Aztec writers had to make sure the ink was dry.

476.pun_sentence: I used to think I'd hate Italian food, but I finally decided to give pizza a chance.

meaning_1.description: Pizza refers to a popular Italian dish made of thin, typically round bread covered with tomatoes, cheese, and often other toppings, such as vegetables or meat, and then baked.

translations.de: Ich dachte immer, ich würde italienisches Essen hassen, aber ich habe mich schließlich dazu entschlossen, Pizza eine Chance zu geben.
translations.fr: Je pensais détester la cuisine italienne, mais j'ai finalement décidé de donner une chance à la pizza.
translations.ko: 나는 이탈리아 음식을 싫어할 것이라고 생각했지만, 결국 피자에게 기회를 주기로 결정했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I used to think I'd hate Italian food, but I finally decided to give pizza a chance.

meaning_2.description: Peace refers to a state of tranquillity or quiet, free from conflict or disagreement among people or groups.

translations.de: Ich dachte immer, ich würde italienisches Essen hassen, aber ich habe mich schließlich entschieden, Frieden eine Chance zu geben.
translations.fr: Je pensais détester la cuisine italienne, mais j'ai finalement décidé de donner une chance à la paix.
translations.ko: 나는 이탈리아 음식을 싫어할 것이라고 생각했지만, 결국에는 평화에 기회를 주기로 결정했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I used to think I'd hate Italian food, but I finally decided to give peace a chance.

477.pun_sentence: Chicken farmers will often share a good yolk.

meaning_1.description: The yellow internal part of a bird's egg, which is surrounded by the white, maintains the embryo, and provides it with food in the form of fats and proteins.

translations.de: Hühnerfarmer teilen oft ein gutes Eigelb.
translations.fr: Les éleveurs de poulets partagent souvent un bon jaune d'œuf.
translations.ko: 닭 농가는 종종 좋은 노른자를 공유합니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Chicken farmers will often share a good yolk.

meaning_2.description: Something that is said or done to stimulate laughter or amusement or cause amusement, as a witticism or short, funny story, often with a punch line.

translations.de: Hühnerfarmer teilen oft einen guten Witz.
translations.fr: Les éleveurs de poulets partagent souvent une bonne blague.
translations.ko: 닭 농부들은 종종 좋은 농담을 공유합니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Chicken farmers will often share a good joke.

478.pun_sentence: There was a snake that gave birth to a bouncing baby boa.

meaning_1.description: A type of large, nonvenomous, heavy-bodied snake in the family Boidae.

translations.de: Es gab eine Schlange, die eine hüpfende Baby-Boa zur Welt brachte.
translations.fr: Il y avait un serpent qui a donné naissance à un vigoureux bébé boa.
translations.ko: 거대한 보아뱀이 우왕좌왕하는 새끼 보아뱀을 낳았습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: There was a snake that gave birth to a bouncing baby boa.

meaning_2.description: A young male human.

translations.de: Es gab eine Schlange, die einen vitalen, menschlichen Jungen auf die Welt brachte.
translations.fr: Il y avait un serpent qui a donné naissance à un garçon humain plein de vitalité.
translations.ko: 거기에 한 마리의 뱀이 체력이 넘치는 아기 남자 아이를 낳았습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: There was a snake that gave birth to a bouncing baby boy.

479.pun_sentence: After getting pranked by his friends and getting hit with a basket, Aron knew they had a wickerd sense of humour.

meaning_1.description: Wicker is a material made of woven wooden twigs, used especially for making furniture or baskets.

translations.de: Nachdem er von seinen Freunden hereingelegt und mit einem Korb beworfen wurde, wusste Aron, dass sie einen geflochtenen Sinn für Humor hatten.
translations.fr: Après avoir été victime d'une farce de ses amis et avoir été frappé avec un panier, Aron savait qu'ils avaient un sens de l'humour tressé.
translations.ko: 친구들에게 장난을 당하고 바구니로 맞은 후, 아론은 그들이 광포한 유머 감각을 가지고 있다는 것을 알았다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: After getting pranked by his friends and getting hit with a basket, Aron knew they had a wickerd sense of humour.

meaning_2.description: Wicked, in this context, refers to something or someone that is playful, roguish, or slightly mischievous. It's often used to describe a sense of humor that is teasing, ironic, or even a little cruel.

translations.de: Nachdem er von seinen Freunden reingelegt wurde und mit einem Korb getroffen wurde, wusste Aron, dass sie einen schelmischen Sinn für Humor hatten.
translations.fr: Après avoir été victime d'une farce de ses amis et avoir été frappé par un panier, Aron savait qu'ils avaient un sens de l'humour diabolique.
translations.ko: 친구들에게 장난을 당하고 바구니로 맞은 후, 아론은 그들이 까칠한 유머 감각을 가지고 있다는 것을 알았다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: After getting pranked by his friends and getting hit with a basket, Aron knew they had a wicked sense of humour.

480.pun_sentence: The statistician attended the dance stag. He didn't have any data.

meaning_1.description: The factual information or values processed or stored by a computer.

translations.de: Der Statistiker besuchte den Tanz ohne Begleitung. Er hatte keine Daten.
translations.fr: Le statisticien a assisté à la danse seul. Il n'avait aucune donnée.
translations.ko: 통계학자는 춤에 혼자 참석했습니다. 그는 어떠한 데이터도 가지고 있지 않았습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The statistician attended the dance stag. He didn't have any data.

meaning_2.description: In this context, "date" refers to a person one is going out with romantically or socially.

translations.de: Der Statistiker ging alleine zum Tanz. Er hatte kein Date.
translations.fr: Le statisticien a assisté au bal sans accompagnateur. Il n'avait de rendez-vous avec personne.
translations.ko: 통계학자가 무도회에 혼자 참석했습니다. 그는 데이트 상대가 없었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The statistician attended the dance stag. He didn't have any date.

meaning_1.description: Serious, solemn, or very important.

translations.de: Frohes Halloween! sagte Tom ernsthaft.
translations.fr: Joyeux Halloween! dit Tom sérieusement.
translations.ko: 행복한 할로윈! 톰이 심각하게 말했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Happy Halloween! Tom said gravely.

meaning_2.description: A pit or hole in the ground where a dead body is placed or buried.

translations.de: Frohes Halloween! sagte Tom, ernst.
translations.fr: Joyeux Halloween! a déclaré Tom, sérieux.
translations.ko: 행복한 할로윈! 톰은 무덤에서 말했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Happy Halloween! Tom said grave.

482.pun_sentence: A cannibal's favourite game is 'swallow the leader'.

meaning_1.description: To consume or ingest typically by means of chewing and swallowing.

translations.de: Das Lieblingsspiel eines Kannibalen ist 'schlucke den Anführer'.
translations.fr: Le jeu préféré d'un cannibale est 'avale le leader'.
translations.ko: 식인종의 가장 좋아하는 게임은 '리더를 삼키다'.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A cannibal's favourite game is 'swallow the leader'.

meaning_2.description: To go or come after a person or thing proceeding ahead; move or travel behind.

translations.de: Das Lieblingsspiel eines Kannibalen ist 'dem Anführer folgen'.
translations.fr: Le jeu préféré d'un cannibale est 'suivre le leader'.
translations.ko: 식인종의 가장 좋아하는 게임은 '리더를 따르다'.

heterographic.pun_sentence: A cannibal's favorite game is 'follow the leader'.

483.pun_sentence: Kings sometimes found that uprisings were a peasant surprise.

meaning_1.description: A peasant is a low-status person, usually a farmer or agricultural laborer in historical or developing contexts.

translations.de: Könige stellten manchmal fest, dass Aufstände eine Bauernüberraschung waren.
translations.fr: Les rois découvraient parfois que les soulèvements étaient une surprise de paysan.
translations.ko: 왕들은 때때로 봉기가 농민들의 뜻밖의 일이었다는 것을 발견했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Kings sometimes found that uprisings were a peasant surprise.

meaning_2.description: Pleasant refers to something agreeable, enjoyable or satisfying.

translations.de: Könige fanden manchmal, dass Aufstände eine angenehme Überraschung waren.
translations.fr: Les rois trouvaient parfois que les soulèvements étaient une agréable surprise.
translations.ko: 왕들은 때때로 반란이 즐거운 놀람이었다고 발견했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Kings sometimes found that uprisings were a pleasant surprise.

484.pun_sentence: I felt sick after I ate the scallopini. I didn't veal well at all.

meaning_1.description: Veal is the meat of a calf, typically used in Italian dishes such as scallopini.

translations.de: Ich fühlte mich krank, nachdem ich das Scaloppini gegessen hatte. Mir bekam das Kalbfleisch überhaupt nicht gut.
translations.fr: Je me suis senti malade après avoir mangé le scaloppini. Je n'ai pas du tout bien digéré le veau.
translations.ko: 나는 스칼로피니를 먹고 나서 몸이 안 좋았습니다. 나는 송아지 고기를 전혀 잘 못 먹었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I felt sick after I ate the scallopini. I didn't veal well at all.

meaning_2.description: Feel is the experience of a particular sensation, especially the ability to perceive physical well-being or discomfort.

translations.de: Ich fühlte mich krank, nachdem ich das Scallopini gegessen hatte. Ich fühlte mich überhaupt nicht gut.
translations.fr: Je me suis senti malade après avoir mangé le scallopini. Je ne me sentais pas bien du tout.
translations.ko: 나는 스칼로피니를 먹은 후에 몸이 아팠다. 전혀 기분이 좋지 않았다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: I felt sick after I ate the scallopini. I didn't feel well at all.

485.pun_sentence: When the orchard owner went to trial he was judged by a jury of his pears.

meaning_1.description: A pear refers to a type of fruit from a tree of the same name.

translations.de: Als der Obstgartenbesitzer vor Gericht ging, wurde er von einer Jury seiner Birnen beurteilt.
translations.fr: Quand le propriétaire du verger est allé en procès, il a été jugé par un jury de ses poires.
translations.ko: 과수원 주인이 재판에 나갔을 때, 그는 그의 배들의 배심원에게 심판 받았다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: When the orchard owner went to trial he was judged by a jury of his pears.

meaning_2.description: A peer refers to a person who shares equal status with another in a particular respect, typically in terms of age, background, or social status.

translations.de: Als der Obstgartenbesitzer vor Gericht ging, wurde er von einer Jury seiner Gleichen beurteilt.
translations.fr: Lorsque le propriétaire du verger est allé en procès, il a été jugé par un jury de ses pairs.
translations.ko: 과수원 소유주가 재판에 나섰을 때, 그는 동등한 신분을 가진 사람들로 구성된 배심원에 의해 심판을 받았다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: When the orchard owner went to trial he was judged by a jury of his peers.

486.pun_sentence: She became a lifeguard at the beach and kept the buoys in line.

meaning_1.description: A buoy is a floating device that can have many purposes. It can be anchored (stationary) or allowed to drift with ocean currents (in the context of the sentence, it refers to a floating object used in the sea for direction or safety).

translations.de: Sie wurde Rettungsschwimmerin am Strand und hielt die Bojen in einer Linie.
translations.fr: Elle est devenue sauveteuse à la plage et a maintenu les bouées en ligne.
translations.ko: 그녀는 해변에서 구조요원이 되어 부표를 일렬로 유지했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: She became a lifeguard at the beach and kept the buoys in line.

meaning_2.description: A boy is a young male of human, generally child or teenager.

translations.de: Sie wurde eine Rettungsschwimmerin am Strand und hielt die Jungen in Schach.
translations.fr: Elle est devenue sauveteuse à la plage et a gardé les garçons en ligne.
translations.ko: 그녀는 해변에서 구조요원이 되어 소년들을 통제했습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: She became a lifeguard at the beach and kept the boys in line.

487.pun_sentence: 'I have to fix the car,' said Tom mechanically.

meaning_1.description: In a manner that is automatic and unthinking, without personal involvement, sympathy, or emotion.

translations.de: "Ich muss das Auto reparieren", sagte Tom mechanisch.
translations.fr: "Je dois réparer la voiture", a déclaré Tom de manière automatique.
translations.ko: "나는 차를 고쳐야 해,"라고 톰이 무감정하게 말했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: 'I have to fix the car,' said Tom mechanically.

meaning_2.description: A person who fixes or repairs machines, especially cars.

translations.de: "Ich muss das Auto reparieren," sagte Tom, der Mechaniker.
translations.fr: "Je dois réparer la voiture," a dit Tom, le mécanicien.
translations.ko: "나는 차를 고쳐야 해,"라고 톰 수리공이 말했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: "I have to fix the car," said Tom mechanic.

meaning_1.description: To make a harsh, grating noise.

translations.de: "Was sind das für Beeren?" krächzte Tom.
translations.fr: "Quelles sont ces baies ?" gronda Tom.
translations.ko: "이것들은 어떤 열매인가요?" 톰이 쉰 소리로 물었다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: 'What are these berries?' Tom rasped.

meaning_2.description: A sweet edible soft fruit, typically red, yellow or black, consisting of a cluster of soft drupelets.

translations.de: "Was sind diese Beeren?" Tom Himbeere.
translations.fr: "Quelles sont ces baies?" Tom framboise.
translations.ko: "이것들은 어떤 베리인가요?" 톰 라즈베리.

heterographic.pun_sentence: "What are these berries?" Tom raspberry.

meaning_1.description: In an embarrassed manner due to shame or a lack of self-confidence.

translations.de: Du Lamm! sagte Tom schüchtern.
translations.fr: Tu es un agneau! dit Tom d'une manière embarrassée.
translations.ko: 너 양이구나! 톰이 부끄러운 표정으로 말했다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: You lamb! said Tom sheepishly.

meaning_2.description: A woolly domesticated ruminant animal that typically produces both meat and wool. In this specific context, it's used as a slang term for a naive or easily led person.

translations.de: "Du Lamm! sagte Tom Schaf."
translations.fr: "Vous agneau ! dit Tom Mouton."
translations.ko: "너 양이야! 톰이 양이라고 말했어."

heterographic.pun_sentence: You lamb! said Tom sheep.

490.pun_sentence: The mime wanted to say something, but he wasn't aloud.

meaning_1.description: To speak or read something in a voice that can be clearly heard.

translations.de: Der Mime wollte etwas sagen, aber er durfte nicht laut sprechen.
translations.fr: Le mime voulait dire quelque chose, mais il n'était pas autorisé à parler.
translations.ko: 빙의 여자가 무언가를 말하고 싶었지만, 소리내어 말할 수는 없었습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The mime wanted to say something, but he wasn't aloud.

meaning_2.description: To permit something to happen or to give permission.

translations.de: Der Mime wollte etwas sagen, aber er durfte nicht.
translations.fr: Le mime voulait dire quelque chose, mais il n'était pas autorisé.
translations.ko: 그 마임은 무언가 말하고 싶었지만, 그에게는 허용되지 않았습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The mime wanted to say something, but he wasn't allow.

491.pun_sentence: Some foolish people gain by experience many perils of wisdom.

meaning_1.description: A serious or immediate danger.

translations.de: Einige törichte Leute gewinnen durch Erfahrung viele Gefahren der Weisheit.
translations.fr: Certains insensés gagnent par expérience de nombreux périls de la sagesse.
translations.ko: 일부 어리석은 사람들은 경험을 통해 지혜의 많은 위험을 얻습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Some foolish people gain by experience many perils of wisdom.

meaning_2.description: A precious thing; the finest example of something.

translations.de: Einige törichte Menschen gewinnen durch Erfahrung viele Perlen der Weisheit.
translations.fr: Certains imbéciles acquièrent par l'expérience de nombreux joyaux de sagesse.
translations.ko: 어떤 어리석은 사람들은 경험으로 많은 지혜의 진주를 얻습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Some foolish people gain by experience many pearls of wisdom.

meaning_1.description: A gardening tool with a thin metal blade, used to remove weeds or prepare the soil for planting.

translations.de: Der Gärtner brachte seine Hacken mit.
translations.fr: Le jardinier a apporté ses houes.
translations.ko: 정원사가 그의 호미를 가져왔습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The gardener brought his hoes.

meaning_2.description: A flexible tube designed to carry water from a source to a destination.

translations.de: Der Gärtner brachte seine Schläuche.
translations.fr: Le jardinier a apporté ses tuyaux.
translations.ko: 정원사가 그의 호스를 가져왔습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The gardener brought his hoses.

493.pun_sentence: To become a pilot requires a good altitude.

meaning_1.description: The height above the ground or above the sea level.

translations.de: Pilot werden erfordert eine gute Höhe.
translations.fr: Devenir pilote nécessite une bonne altitude.
translations.ko: 파일럿이 되기 위해서는 좋은 고도가 필요합니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: To become a pilot requires a good altitude.

meaning_2.description: The settled way of thinking or feeling about something; one's disposition.

translations.de: Ein Pilot zu werden erfordert eine gute Einstellung.
translations.fr: Devenir pilote nécessite une bonne attitude.
translations.ko: 파일럿이 되려면 좋은 태도가 필요합니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: To become a pilot requires a good attitude.

494.pun_sentence: Treat yourself to one of our Sundays.

meaning_1.description: Sunday refers to the day of the week between Saturday and Monday.

translations.de: Gönnen Sie sich einen unserer Sonntage.
translations.fr: Offrez-vous l'un de nos dimanches.
translations.ko: 저희의 일요일 중 하나를 선물로 가져 보세요.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Treat yourself to one of our Sundays.

meaning_2.description: A sundae is a type of dessert made of ice cream with sauce or syrup and often other toppings.

translations.de: Gönnen Sie sich eines unserer Sundaes.
translations.fr: Offrez-vous l'un de nos sundae.
translations.ko: 우리의 선데이 중 하나를 즐겨보세요.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Treat yourself to one of our sundaes.

495.pun_sentence: To crack open the walnuts, several officers foolishly pounded them with hand grenades, scattering the colonels everywhere.

meaning_1.description: A military rank in the armed forces, typically above a lieutenant colonel and below a brigadier general.

translations.de: Um die Walnüsse zu knacken, schlugen mehrere Offiziere sie törichterweise mit Handgranaten, wodurch überall die Obersten verstreut wurden.
translations.fr: Pour ouvrir les noix, plusieurs officiers ont stupidement les martelées avec des grenades à main, éparpillant les colonels partout.
translations.ko: 호두를 깨기 위해, 몇몇 장교들은 어리석게 수류탄으로 그것들을 내리치며 대령들을 도처에 흩뿌렸다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: To crack open the walnuts, several officers foolishly pounded them with hand grenades, scattering the colonels everywhere.

meaning_2.description: The edible part of a walnut that is contained within the hard shell.

translations.de: Um die Walnüsse zu knacken, schlugen mehrere Offiziere sie dummerweise mit Handgranaten, was dazu führte, dass die Kerne überall verstreut wurden.
translations.fr: Pour ouvrir les noix, plusieurs officiers les ont stupidement martelés avec des grenades à main, dispersant les cerneaux partout.
translations.ko: 호두를 깨기 위해, 몇몇 경찰관들은 어리석게도 수류탄으로 그것들을 내리쳤고, 그 결과 원두가 곳곳에 흩어졌습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: To crack open the walnuts, several officers foolishly pounded them with hand grenades, scattering the kernels everywhere.

496.pun_sentence: Herb gardeners who work extra get thyme and a half.

meaning_1.description: Thyme is a type of herb used in cooking and gardening.

translations.de: Kräutergärtner, die Überstunden machen, bekommen Thymian und eine Hälfte.
translations.fr: Les jardiniers d'herbes qui travaillent en plus reçoivent du thym et demi.
translations.ko: 추가로 일하는 허브 정원사들은 타임과 반을 받습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Herb gardeners who work extra get thyme and a half.

meaning_2.description: Time in this context refers to the calculated, continuous, measurable period in which events happen, used for comparing the durations of events and the intervals between them.

translations.de: Kräutergärtner, die Überstunden machen, bekommen anderthalb Mal so viel Zeit.
translations.fr: Les jardiniers d'herbes qui travaillent en plus reçoivent le temps et demi.
translations.ko: 추가로 일하는 허브 정원사는 1.5배 시간을 받습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: Herb gardeners who work extra get time and a half.

497.pun_sentence: The size a dieter would like to get to is the sighs of relief.

meaning_1.description: A deep or heavy exhalation typically indicating relief or frustration.

translations.de: Die Größe, zu der ein Diätetiker gerne kommen möchte, sind die Seufzer der Erleichterung.
translations.fr: La taille à laquelle un régimeur aimerait arriver est le soupir de soulagement.
translations.ko: 다이어터가 도달하고 싶어하는 크기는 안도의 한숨입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The size a dieter would like to get to is the sighs of relief.

meaning_2.description: It refers to how big or small something or someone is. In this context, it pertains to the clothing size a dieter aims to reach.

translations.de: Die Größe, die ein Diätetiker erreichen möchte, ist die Größe der Erleichterung.
translations.fr: La taille qu'un régimeur aimerait atteindre est la taille du soulagement.
translations.ko: 다이어트하는 사람이 원하는 사이즈는 안도의 사이즈입니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: The size a dieter would like to get to is the sizes of relief.

498.pun_sentence: She was only a Carpenter's daughter, but you should have seen her circular sores!

meaning_1.description: A wound, abrasion, or area of the skin that is tender or painful.

translations.de: Sie war nur die Tochter eines Zimmermanns, aber Sie hätten ihre kreisförmigen Wunden sehen sollen!
translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'un charpentier, mais vous auriez dû voir ses plaies circulaires !
translations.ko: 그녀는 단지 목수의 딸이었을 뿐인데, 그녀의 원형 상처를 보셨어야 했어요!

heterographic.pun_sentence: She was only a Carpenter's daughter, but you should have seen her circular sores!

meaning_2.description: A tool with a circular blade for cutting wood, often used by carpenters.

translations.de: Sie war nur eine Tischlerstochter, aber du hättest ihre Kreissägen sehen sollen!
translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'un charpentier, mais vous auriez dû voir ses scies circulaires!
translations.ko: 그녀는 단지 목수의 딸이었지만, 그녀의 원형 톱을 봤어야 했습니다!

heterographic.pun_sentence: She was only a Carpenter's daughter, but you should have seen her circular saws!

499.pun_sentence: In a billiard hall life can be pretty rough at the wrong end of the queue.

meaning_1.description: A line or sequence of people or vehicles awaiting their turn to be attended to or to proceed.

translations.de: In einer Billardhalle kann das Leben am falschen Ende der Schlange ziemlich hart sein.
translations.fr: Dans une salle de billard, la vie peut être plutôt rude à la mauvaise extrémité de la file.
translations.ko: 당구장에서는 줄의 끝에서는 삶이 꽤 힘들 수 있습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: In a billiard hall life can be pretty rough at the wrong end of the queue.

meaning_2.description: In this context, cue refers to the rod or stick used in billiard to strike the balls.

translations.de: In einer Billardhalle kann das Leben am falschen Ende des Queue ziemlich hart sein.
translations.fr: Dans une salle de billard, la vie peut être assez rude à la mauvaise extrémité de la queue.
translations.ko: 당구장에서는 큐의 잘못된 끝에서 인생이 꽤 힘들 수 있습니다.

heterographic.pun_sentence: In a billiard hall life can be pretty rough at the wrong end of the cue.

500.pun_sentence: Can honeybee abuse lead to a sting operation?

meaning_1.description: the sharp pain caused by the venomous injection of an insect, such as a bee or wasp.

translations.de: Kann Missbrauch von Honigbienen zu einem Stich führen?
translations.fr: L'abus d'abeilles peut-il conduire à une opération de piqûre?
translations.ko: 꿀벌 학대는 쏘는 일을 초래할 수 있을까요?

meaning_2.description: a carefully planned and secretive operation, often conducted by law enforcement, to catch criminals.

translations.de: Kann Missbrauch von Honigbienen zu einer verdeckten Operation führen?
translations.fr: L'abus d'abeilles peut-il conduire à une opération secrète soigneusement planifiée?
translations.ko: 꿀벌 학대는 치밀하게 계획된 비밀 연산을 초래할 수 있을까요?

501.pun_sentence: My advanced geometry class is full of squares.

meaning_1.description: geometric shapes with four equal sides and four right angles.

translations.de: Mein Fortgeschrittener Geometrieunterricht ist voller Quadrate.
translations.fr: Ma classe de géométrie avancée est pleine de carrés.
translations.ko: 내 고급 기하학 수업은 사각형으로 가득해.

meaning_2.description: boring or uninteresting individuals.

translations.de: Mein Fortgeschrittener Geometrieunterricht ist voller Langweiler.
translations.fr: Ma classe de géométrie avancée est pleine d'individus ennuyeux.
translations.ko: 내 고급 기하학 수업은 지루한 사람들로 가득해.

502.pun_sentence: A bank manager who was also a high jumper spent most of his time in the vault.

meaning_1.description: a secure room or compartment, typically used for storing valuables.

translations.de: Ein Bankmanager, der auch Hochspringer war, verbrachte die meiste Zeit im Tresor.
translations.fr: Un directeur de banque qui était aussi sauteur en hauteur passait la plupart de son temps dans la salle des coffres.
translations.ko: 은행 지배인이자 높이뛰기 선수였던 사람이 대부분의 시간을 금고에서 보냈습니다.

meaning_2.description: an athletic event in which competitors must jump or pole-vault over a high bar.

translations.de: Ein Bankmanager, der auch Hochspringer war, verbrachte die meiste Zeit am Stabhochsprung.
translations.fr: Un directeur de banque qui était aussi sauteur en hauteur passait la plupart de son temps au saut à la perche.
translations.ko: 은행 지배인이자 높이뛰기 선수였던 사람이 대부분의 시간을 높이뛰기에서 보냈습니다.

503.pun_sentence: They threw a party for the inventor of the toaster. And he was toasted.

meaning_1.description: Cooked or browned by exposure to heat.

translations.de: Sie haben eine Party für den Erfinder des Toasters geworfen. Und er wurde geröstet.
translations.fr: Ils ont organisé une fête pour l'inventeur du grille-pain. Et il a été grillé.
translations.ko: 그들은 토스터의 발명가를 위한 파티를 열었습니다. 그리고 그 사람은 구워졌습니다.

meaning_2.description: Intoxicated or drunk, often from alcohol consumption.

translations.de: Sie haben eine Party für den Erfinder des Toasters geworfen. Und er war betrunken.
translations.fr: Ils ont organisé une fête pour l'inventeur du grille-pain. Et il était ivre.
translations.ko: 그들은 토스터의 발명가를 위한 파티를 열었습니다. 그리고 그 사람은 취했습니다.

504.pun_sentence: If you're a gardener you might call yourself a 'plant manager'.

meaning_1.description: a living organism, such as a tree, that grows in the ground and typically has leaves, stems, and roots.

translations.de: Wenn Sie ein Gärtner sind, könnten Sie sich selbst als 'Pflanzenmanager' bezeichnen.
translations.fr: Si vous êtes jardinier, vous pourriez vous appeler un 'gestionnaire de plantes'.
translations.ko: 만약 당신이 원예가이라면, 당신은 스스로를 '식물 관리자'라고 부를 수 있겠네요.

meaning_2.description: A large industrial facility where various processes and manufacturing activities take place.

translations.de: Wenn Sie ein Gärtner sind, könnten Sie sich selbst als 'Fabrikmanager' bezeichnen.
translations.fr: Si vous êtes jardinier, vous pourriez vous appeler un 'gestionnaire d'usine'.
translations.ko: 만약 당신이 원예가이라면, 당신은 스스로를 '공장 관리자'라고 부를 수 있겠네요.

505.pun_sentence: She was only a Blacksmith's daughter, but she knew how to forge ahead.

meaning_1.description: to shape or create something, especially by hammering metal.

translations.de: Sie war nur die Tochter eines Schmieds, aber sie wusste, wie man voranschmiedet.
translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'un forgeron, mais elle savait comment forger de l'avant.
translations.ko: 그녀는 단지 대장장이의 딸이었지만, 어떻게 앞으로 나아가야 하는지 알고 있었어요.

meaning_2.description: to produce or create something with deceitful intentions, such as a signature or document.

translations.de: Sie war nur die Tochter eines Schmieds, aber sie wusste, wie man Fälschungen vornimmt.
translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'un forgeron, mais elle savait comment forger (falsifier) de l'avant.
translations.ko: 그녀는 단지 대장장이의 딸이었지만, 어떻게 위조해야 하는지 알고 있었어요.

506.pun_sentence: I got angry when my cell phone battery died. My counselor suggested I find an outlet.

meaning_1.description: a place where one can plug in an electrical device to recharge it or provide power.

translations.de: Ich wurde wütend, als mein Handy-Akku leer war. Mein Berater schlug vor, ich suche eine Steckdose.
translations.fr: Je me suis énervé lorsque la batterie de mon téléphone portable est morte. Mon conseiller a suggéré que je trouve une prise.
translations.ko: 나는 내 휴대폰 배터리가 다 됐을 때 화가 났어. 내 상담자는 나에게 콘센트를 찾으라고 제안했다.

meaning_2.description: a way to express or release emotions or frustrations.

translations.de: Ich wurde wütend, als mein Handy-Akku leer war. Mein Berater schlug vor, ich finde ein Ventil.
translations.fr: Je me suis énervé lorsque la batterie de mon téléphone portable est morte. Mon conseiller a suggéré que je trouve une issue.
translations.ko: 나는 내 휴대폰 배터리가 다 됐을 때 화가 났어. 내 상담자는 나에게 감정이나 고민을 표현하거나 해소할 수 있는 방법을 찾으라고 제안했다.

507.pun_sentence: A cowboy who was also an artist could draw fast.

meaning_1.description: to create a picture or image using a pen, pencil, or other artistic tools.

translations.de: Ein Cowboy, der auch ein Künstler war, konnte schnell zeichnen.
translations.fr: Un cowboy qui était aussi un artiste pouvait dessiner rapidement.
translations.ko: 예술가인 카우보이는 빠르게 그릴 수 있었습니다.

meaning_2.description: to pull or move something towards oneself or in a particular direction.

translations.de: Ein Cowboy, der auch ein Künstler war, konnte schnell ziehen.
translations.fr: Un cowboy qui était aussi un artiste pouvait dégainer rapidement.
translations.ko: 예술가인 카우보이는 빠르게 뽑을 수 있었습니다.

508.pun_sentence: If you leave alphabet soup on the stove and go out, it could spell disaster.

meaning_1.description: The act of forming words by arranging letters.

translations.de: Wenn du Buchstabensuppe auf dem Herd lässt und ausgehst, könnte es Katastrophe buchstabieren.
translations.fr: Si vous laissez une soupe d'alphabets sur le poêle et vous sortez, cela pourrait épeler un désastre.
translations.ko: 알파벳 수프를 불 위에 두고 나가면, 그것은 재앙을 철자하게 될 수 있어.

meaning_2.description: To indicate or predict a future outcome or result.

translations.de: Wenn du Buchstabensuppe auf dem Herd lässt und ausgehst, könnte es eine Katastrophe andeuten.
translations.fr: Si vous laissez une soupe d'alphabets sur le poêle et vous sortez, cela pourrait présager un désastre.
translations.ko: 알파벳 수프를 불 위에 두고 나가면, 그것은 재앙을 예상하게 될 수 있어.

509.pun_sentence: OLD BUNGEE JUMPERS sometimes die but they can still bounce back/

meaning_1.description: to rebound or spring back after hitting a surface

translations.de: ALTE BUNGEESPRINGER sterben manchmal, aber sie können noch zurückprallen.
translations.fr: LES ANCIENS SAUTEURS À L'ÉLASTIQUE meurent parfois mais ils peuvent toujours rebondir.
translations.ko: 노인 번지점퍼들이 가끔 죽지만 아직도 튕겨 나올 수 있어.

meaning_2.description: to resurface or come back from a setback or failure

translations.de: ALTE BUNGEESPRINGER sterben manchmal, aber sie können noch zurückkommen.
translations.fr: LES ANCIENS SAUTEURS À L'ÉLASTIQUE meurent parfois mais ils peuvent toujours revenir.
translations.ko: 노인 번지점퍼들이 가끔 죽지만 아직도 다시 일어날 수 있어.

510.pun_sentence: The gunman took a shot at new opportunities.

meaning_1.description: Discharging a firearm or other weapon, typically to hit a target.

translations.de: Der Schütze hat eine Schuss auf neue Möglichkeiten abgegeben.
translations.fr: Le tireur a tiré sur de nouvelles opportunités.
translations.ko: 그 총잡이는 새로운 기회에 총을 쏘았어.

meaning_2.description: a small drink of liquor.

translations.de: Der Schütze hat einen Schluck auf neue Möglichkeiten genommen.
translations.fr: Le tireur a bu un coup pour de nouvelles opportunités.
translations.ko: 그 총잡이는 새로운 기회에 한 잔을 들었어.

meaning_1.description: to flow out rapidly and in large quantities

translations.de: Ich habe Öl gefunden! Tom sprudelte heraus.
translations.fr: J'ai trouvé du pétrole ! Tom a jailli.
translations.ko: 나는 기름을 찾았다! 톰이 샘처럼 솟구쳤어.

meaning_2.description: to speak or write with exaggerated enthusiasm or effusiveness.

translations.de: Ich habe Öl gefunden! Tom schwärmte.
translations.fr: J'ai trouvé du pétrole ! Tom s'est enthousiasmé.
translations.ko: 나는 기름을 찾았다! 톰이 열심히 말했어.

512.pun_sentence: Two astronauts who were dating put an end to it because they both needed their space.

meaning_1.description: The physical expanse that exists beyond Earth's atmosphere, typically associated with outer space.

translations.de: Zwei Astronauten, die dateten, beendeten es, weil sie beide ihren Raum brauchten.
translations.fr: Deux astronautes qui sortaient ensemble ont mis fin à leur relation car ils avaient tous les deux besoin de leur espace.
translations.ko: 사귀고 있던 두 명의 우주 비행사가 서로의 우주가 필요해서 그만뒀어.

meaning_2.description: personal freedom or independence.

translations.de: Zwei Astronauten, die dateten, beendeten es, weil sie beide ihren Freiraum brauchten.
translations.fr: Deux astronautes qui sortaient ensemble ont mis fin à leur relation car ils avaient tous les deux besoin de leur liberté.
translations.ko: 사귀고 있던 두 명의 우주 비행사가 서로의 공간이 필요해서 그만뒀어.

513.pun_sentence: A kettle on the stove was singing 'Home on the Range'.

meaning_1.description: a cooking appliance with a flat metal cooking surface and often with an oven, used for cooking food.

translations.de: Ein Wasserkocher auf dem Herd sang ' Home on the Range '.
translations.fr: Une bouilloire sur la cuisinière chantait ' Home on the Range '.
translations.ko: 가스레인지 위의 주전자가 ' Home on the Range '를 불렀어요.

meaning_2.description: an area or extent of land or space.

translations.de: Ein Wasserkocher auf dem Kochfeld sang ' Home on the Range '.
translations.fr: Une bouilloire sur le poêle chantait ' Home on the Range '.
translations.ko: 들판 위의 주전자가 ' Home on the Range '를 불렀어요.

514.pun_sentence: Hubble wanted to bring the idea into better focus.

meaning_1.description: Concentration or center of attention on a specific topic or subject.

translations.de: Hubble wollte die Idee stärker in den Vordergrund rücken.
translations.fr: Hubble voulait mettre l'idée en meilleure perspective.
translations.ko: 허블은 그 아이디어에 더 집중하고 싶었다.

meaning_2.description: the adjusting of a visual lens to make something clearer or sharper in vision.

translations.de: Hubble wollte die Idee schärfer einstellen.
translations.fr: Hubble voulait améliorer la mise au point de l'idée.
translations.ko: 허블은 그 아이디어를 더 명확하게 보여주기 위해 렌즈를 조정하고 싶었다.

515.pun_sentence: OLD QUILTERS never die, they just go under cover.

meaning_1.description: A disguise or false identity, often used in espionage or undercover work.

translations.de: Alte Quilter sterben nie, sie gehen einfach undercover.
translations.fr: Les vieux quiltmakers ne meurent jamais, ils se mettent juste sous couverture.
translations.ko: 늙은 퀼트 제작자는 결코 죽지 않아, 그들은 단지 잠복하는 거야.

meaning_2.description: A protective covering or layer.

translations.de: Alte Quilter sterben nie, sie gehen einfach unter die Abdeckung.
translations.fr: Les vieux quiltmakers ne meurent jamais, ils passent simplement sous la housse.
translations.ko: 늙은 퀼트 제작자는 결코 죽지 않아, 그들은 그냥 커버 아래로 가.

516.pun_sentence: When cannibals ate a missionary they got a taste of religion.

meaning_1.description: the sensation of flavor perceived in the mouth.

translations.de: Als Kannibalen einen Missionar aßen, bekamen sie einen Geschmack von Religion.
translations.fr: Quand les cannibales ont mangé un missionnaire, ils ont goûté à la religion.
translations.ko: 식인족이 선교사를 먹었을 때, 그들은 종교의 맛을 느꼈습니다.

meaning_2.description: a small sample or experience of something.

translations.de: Als Kannibalen einen Missionar aßen, bekamen sie eine kleine Erfahrung von Religion.
translations.fr: Quand les cannibales ont mangé un missionnaire, ils ont eu un aperçu de la religion.
translations.ko: 식인족이 선교사를 먹었을 때, 그들은 종교의 일부를 경험했습니다.

517.pun_sentence: Careless stair dancers are heading for a heavy landing.

meaning_1.description: the act of coming down or touching the ground after being in the air.

translations.de: Unvorsichtige Treppentänzer steuern auf eine harte Landung zu.
translations.fr: Les danseurs d'escaliers imprudents se préparent à un atterrissage brutal.
translations.ko: 부주의한 계단 춤추는 사람들은 무거운 착지를 향해 가고 있습니다.

meaning_2.description: a platform or area where people can disembark from a vehicle or aircraft.

translations.de: Unvorsichtige Treppentänzer steuern auf ein hartes Landeplatz zu.
translations.fr: Les danseurs d'escaliers imprudents se dirigent vers une plateforme d'arrivée brutale.
translations.ko: 부주의한 계단 춤추는 사람들은 무거운 승강장을 향해 가고 있습니다.

518.pun_sentence: Lawyers have to like alcohol because they're always being called to the bar.

meaning_1.description: A place where alcoholic beverages are served and consumed.

translations.de: Anwälte müssen Alkohol mögen, weil sie immer zur Bar gerufen werden.
translations.fr: Les avocats doivent aimer l'alcool parce qu'ils sont toujours appelés au bar.
translations.ko: 변호사들은 항상 바에 호출되기 때문에 술을 좋아해야 합니다.

meaning_2.description: being admitted to practice law in a given jurisdiction

translations.de: Anwälte müssen Alkohol mögen, weil sie immer zur Anwaltschaft aufgerufen werden.
translations.fr: Les avocats doivent aimer l'alcool parce qu'ils sont toujours appelés au barreau.
translations.ko: 변호사들은 항상 사법을 행사할 권한이 인정되기 때문에 술을 좋아해야 합니다.

519.pun_sentence: Baseball players are expected to perform well right off the bat.

meaning_1.description: a wooden or metal club used to hit the ball in baseball.

translations.de: Baseballspieler werden erwartet, gleich mit dem Schläger gut zu performen.
translations.fr: On attend des joueurs de baseball qu'ils performent bien d'entrée de jeu.
translations.ko: 야구 선수들은 곧바로 배트로 잘해야 하기를 기대하는 것이다.

meaning_2.description: a flying nocturnal mammal with leathery wings.

translations.de: Baseballspieler werden erwartet, gleich mit der Fledermaus gut zu performen.
translations.fr: On attend des joueurs de baseball qu'ils performent bien dès la chauve-souris.
translations.ko: 야구 선수들은 곧바로 박쥐로 잘해야 하기를 기대하는 것이다.

520.pun_sentence: The man brought an umbrella with him into the ice cream store because he heard there was a chance of sprinkles.

meaning_1.description: Small candy or sugar pieces that are used as toppings on ice cream or desserts.

translations.de: Der Mann brachte einen Regenschirm mit in das Eiscremegeschäft, weil er gehört hatte, dass es Streusel geben könnte.
translations.fr: L'homme a apporté un parapluie dans le magasin de glaces parce qu'il avait entendu dire qu'il y aurait des vermicelles de sucre.
translations.ko: 그 사람은 아이스크림 가게에 우산을 가져갔어요. 왜냐하면 스프링클이 있을 수 있다고 들었기 때문이에요.

meaning_2.description: Light rain or drizzle.

translations.de: Der Mann brachte einen Regenschirm mit in das Eiscremegeschäft, weil er gehört hatte, dass es nieseln könnte.
translations.fr: L'homme a apporté un parapluie dans le magasin de glaces parce qu'il avait entendu dire qu'il pourrait y avoir une bruine.
translations.ko: 그 사람은 아이스크림 가게에 우산을 가져갔어요. 왜냐하면 이슬비가 올 수 있다고 들었기 때문이에요.

521.pun_sentence: OLD ACADEMICIANS never die, they just lose their faculties.

meaning_1.description: abilities or skills possessed by someone.

translations.de: Alte Akademiker sterben nie, sie verlieren einfach ihre Fähigkeiten.
translations.fr: Les vieux académiciens ne meurent jamais, ils perdent simplement leurs capacités.
translations.ko: 노경학자는 결코 죽지 않아, 그들은 그저 그들의 능력을 잃을 뿐이야.

meaning_2.description: departments or divisions within a university or academic institution.

translations.de: Alte Akademiker sterben nie, sie verlieren einfach ihre Fakultäten.
translations.fr: Les vieux académiciens ne meurent jamais, ils perdent simplement leurs facultés.
translations.ko: 노경학자는 결코 죽지 않아, 그들은 그저 그들의 학부를 잃을 뿐이야.

522.pun_sentence: Bring me a rubber band and make it snappy!

meaning_1.description: quick or prompt, often used when someone wants something done immediately.

translations.de: Bring mir ein Gummiband und mach es schnell!
translations.fr: Apporte-moi un élastique et fais-le rapidement !
translations.ko: 고무줄을 가져와. 그리고 신속하게 해라!

meaning_2.description: smart and fashionable, often used to describe clothing or style.

translations.de: Bring mir ein Gummiband und mach es schick!
translations.fr: Apporte-moi un élastique et fais-le élégant !
translations.ko: 고무줄을 가져와. 그리고 멋지게 해라!

523.pun_sentence: When a thief stole several volumes from the library he was quickly booked.

meaning_1.description: Recorded the details of someone's arrest or detainment in an official register or log.

translations.de: Als ein Dieb mehrere Bände aus der Bibliothek stahl, wurde er schnell gebucht.
translations.fr: Lorsqu'un voleur a volé plusieurs volumes à la bibliothèque, il a rapidement été fiché.
translations.ko: 도둑이 도서관에서 몇 권의 책을 훔쳤을 때, 그는 빠르게 기록되었습니다.

meaning_2.description: Made a reservation or appointment, especially for travel or accommodation.

translations.de: Als ein Dieb mehrere Bände aus der Bibliothek stahl, wurde er schnell resaviert.
translations.fr: Lorsqu'un voleur a volé plusieurs volumes à la bibliothèque, il a rapidement été réservé.
translations.ko: 도둑이 도서관에서 몇 권의 책을 훔쳤을 때, 그는 빠르게 예약되었습니다.

524.pun_sentence: When potato chips don't sell fast enough, the maker knows it will soon be crunch time.

meaning_1.description: The sound or act of crushing something with force, typically making a loud noise.

translations.de: Wenn Kartoffelchips nicht schnell genug verkauft werden, weiß der Hersteller, dass es bald Knirschzeit sein wird.
translations.fr: Lorsque les chips de pommes de terre ne se vendent pas assez vite, le fabricant sait qu'il sera bientôt l'heure du craquement.
translations.ko: 감자칩이 충분히 빨리 팔리지 않으면, 제조사는 곧 식빵 시간이 될 것을 알게 됩니다.

meaning_2.description: A critical or decisive moment.

translations.de: Wenn Kartoffelchips nicht schnell genug verkauft werden, weiß der Hersteller, dass bald eine entscheidende Zeit kommen wird.
translations.fr: Lorsque les chips de pommes de terre ne se vendent pas assez vite, le fabricant sait qu'il sera bientôt l'heure critique.
translations.ko: 감자칩이 충분히 빨리 팔리지 않으면, 제조사는 곧 결정적인 시간이 될 것을 알게 됩니다.

525.pun_sentence: OLD HIKERS never die they just get the boot.

meaning_1.description: a type of footwear, typically covering the foot and ankle and often made of leather or rubber.

translations.de: Alte Wanderer sterben nie, sie bekommen nur den Stiefel.
translations.fr: Les vieux randonneurs ne meurent jamais, ils reçoivent juste la botte.
translations.ko: 늙은 등산객들은 절대 죽지 않아, 그들은 단지 부츠를 얻을 뿐이야.

meaning_2.description: To be dismissed or fired from a job or position.

translations.de: Alte Wanderer sterben nie, sie werden nur rausgeschmissen.
translations.fr: Les vieux randonneurs ne meurent jamais, ils sont juste licenciés.
translations.ko: 늙은 등산객들은 절대 죽지 않아, 그들은 단지 해고되는 거야.

526.pun_sentence: A contest held by fire fighters is called a 'match'.

meaning_1.description: a small wooden stick with a flammable head, used for lighting fires.

translations.de: Ein von Feuerwehrleuten abgehaltener Wettbewerb wird als " Streichholz " bezeichnet.
translations.fr: Un concours organisé par les pompiers est appelé un " allumette ".
translations.ko: 소방관들이 진행하는 대회를 ' 성냥 '이라고 부릅니다.

meaning_2.description: a competition or game, often used in the context of sports.

translations.de: Ein von Feuerwehrleuten abgehaltener Wettbewerb wird als " Match " bezeichnet.
translations.fr: Un concours organisé par les pompiers est appelé un " match ".
translations.ko: 소방관들이 진행하는 대회를 ' 매치 '라고 부릅니다.

527.pun_sentence: No one chills out in the fires of hell.

meaning_1.description: feeling cold or shivering.

translations.de: Niemand friert in den Feuern der Hölle.
translations.fr: Personne ne frissonne dans les feux de l'enfer.
translations.ko: 아무도 지옥의 불길에서 추위를 느끼지 않아.

meaning_2.description: feeling frightened or scared.

translations.de: Niemand bekommt kalte Füße in den Feuern der Hölle.
translations.fr: Personne n'est effrayé dans les feux de l'enfer.
translations.ko: 아무도 지옥의 불길에서 두려움을 느끼지 않아.

528.pun_sentence: OLD PILOTS never die, they just get more turbulent.

meaning_1.description: Full of unrest, disorder, or upheaval

translations.de: Alte Piloten sterben nie, sie werden einfach unruhiger.
translations.fr: Les vieux pilotes ne meurent jamais, ils deviennent simplement plus agités.
translations.ko: 노련한 비행사들은 절대 죽지 않아, 그들은 단지 더욱 동요하기만 해.

meaning_2.description: the state of the atmosphere with irregular, disruptive air currents.

translations.de: Alte Piloten sterben nie, ihre Flüge werden einfach turbulenter.
translations.fr: Les vieux pilotes ne meurent jamais, ils rencontrent simplement plus de turbulences.
translations.ko: 노련한 비행사들은 절대 죽지 않아, 그들은 단지 더 터뷸런스를 겪게 돼.

529.pun_sentence: Don’t let adversity get you down unless you are on your knees/

meaning_1.description: Physically lowered to a kneeling or prostrate position

translations.de: Lass dich nicht von Widrigkeiten niederdrücken, es sei denn, du bist auf deinen Knien.
translations.fr: Ne laisse pas l'adversité te mettre à genoux, sauf si tu es déjà sur tes genoux.
translations.ko: 고난이 당신을 굴복하게 하지 마세요, 당신이 무릎을 꿇었다면 그러라.

meaning_2.description: sad or depressed.

translations.de: Lass dich nicht von Widrigkeiten niederschlagen, es sei denn, du bist auf deinen Knien.
translations.fr: Ne laisse pas l'adversité te rendre triste, sauf si tu es déjà à genoux.
translations.ko: 고난이 당신을 우울하게 만들지 않게 하세요, 당신이 무릎을 꿇었다면 그러라.

530.pun_sentence: She was only a Wrestler's daughter, but you oughtta see her box./

meaning_1.description: a container, typically made of cardboard or plastic, used for storing or transporting items.

translations.de: Sie war nur die Tochter eines Wrestlers, aber du solltest ihre Box sehen.
translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'un lutteur, mais tu devrais voir sa boîte.
translations.ko: 그녀는 단지 레슬러의 딸이었지만, 그녀의 상자를 보세요.

meaning_2.description: to fight in a boxing match.

translations.de: Sie war nur die Tochter eines Wrestlers, aber du solltest sie boxen sehen.
translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'un lutteur, mais tu devrais la voir boxer.
translations.ko: 그녀는 단지 레슬러의 딸이었지만, 그녀가 복싱하는 걸 보세요.

531.pun_sentence: I was against the construction of tennis courts in the park as I thought they would cause too much racket.

meaning_1.description: a loud noise or disturbance.

translations.de: Ich war gegen den Bau von Tennisplätzen im Park, weil ich dachte, sie würden zu viel Lärm verursachen.
translations.fr: J'étais contre la construction de terrains de tennis dans le parc car je pensais qu'ils causeraient trop de bruit.
translations.ko: 나는 공원에 테니스 코트를 건설하는 것에 반대했어요, 그것이 너무 많은 소음을 야기할 것이라고 생각했거든요.

meaning_2.description: A type of sports equipment used in various ball games, such as tennis or badminton, typically consisting of a handled frame with strings or a net used to hit the ball.

translations.de: Ich war gegen den Bau von Tennisplätzen im Park, weil ich dachte, es gäbe schon zu viele Schläger.
translations.fr: J'étais contre la construction de terrains de tennis dans le parc car je pensais qu'il y aurait trop de raquettes.
translations.ko: 나는 공원에 테니스 코트를 건설하는 것에 반대했어요, 그것이 라켓이 너무 많아질 것이라고 생각했거든요.

532.pun_sentence: Wilbur Wright said he'd take a flier on it.

meaning_1.description: a person or thing that flies or is capable of flying, such as an airplane or bird.

translations.de: Wilbur Wright sagte, er würde darauf fliegen.
translations.fr: Wilbur Wright a dit qu'il allait voler avec.
translations.ko: 윌버 라이트는 그것에 대해 비행을 할 것이라고 말했다.

meaning_2.description: a handbill or leaflet that is usually used for advertising or promotion.

translations.de: Wilbur Wright sagte, er würde einen Flyer dafür nehmen.
translations.fr: Wilbur Wright a dit qu'il prendrait un prospectus dessus.
translations.ko: 윌버 라이트는 그것에 대한 전단지를 받을 것이라고 말했다.
