533.pun_sentence: A man brought his retriever to the vet for some tests and had to pay a lab fee.

meaning_1.description: a place where scientific experiments, tests, and research are conducted

translations.de: Ein Mann brachte seinen Retriever zum Tierarzt für einige Tests und musste ein Laborgebühr bezahlen.
translations.fr: Un homme a amené son retriever chez le vétérinaire pour quelques tests et a dû payer des frais de laboratoire.
translations.ko: 한 남자가 검사를 위해 리트리버를 수의사에게 가져갔고 실험실 비용을 지불해야 했다.

meaning_2.description: Labrador Retriever, a breed of dog.

translations.de: Ein Mann brachte seinen Retriever zum Tierarzt für einige Tests und musste eine Gebühr für seinen Labrador bezahlen.
translations.fr: Un homme a amené son retriever chez le vétérinaire pour quelques tests et a dû payer des frais pour son Labrador.
translations.ko: 한 남자가 검사를 위해 리트리버를 수의사에게 가져갔고 래브라도리트리버 비용을 지불해야 했다.

534.pun_sentence: They replaced the baseball with an orange to add zest to the game.

meaning_1.description: Enthusiasm, energy, or a lively and enjoyable quality that adds interest or excitement to something.

translations.de: Sie haben den Baseball durch eine Orange ersetzt, um dem Spiel mehr Schwung zu verleihen.
translations.fr: Ils ont remplacé la balle de baseball par une orange pour ajouter du piquant au jeu.

meaning_2.description: the outermost colored part of the peel of citrus fruit, used as flavoring.

translations.fr: Ils ont remplacé la balle de baseball par une orange pour ajouter du zeste au jeu.

535.pun_sentence: If you operate a drill press you have a boring job.

meaning_1.description: dull or uninteresting.

536.pun_sentence: OLD PRINTERS never die they're just not the type

translations.ko: 노란 프린터는 결코 죽지 않아요, 그들은 그저 타이핑을 하지 않아요.

537.pun_sentence: Some people find fire drills quite Alarming.

translations.ko: 몇몇 사람들은 화재 연습을 꽤 불안하게 느낀다.

translations.fr: Certaines personnes trouvent les exercices d'incendie plutôt alarmants.
translations.ko: 몇몇 사람들은 화재 연습을 꽤 공포스럽게 느낀다.

538.pun_sentence: She was only a Pitcher's daughter, but you should have seen her curves.

translations.ko: 그녀는 그저 투수의 딸이었지만, 그녀의 커브볼을 봤어야 했어요.

539.pun_sentence: A baseball player can sell himself to a new team if he has a good pitch.

translations.de: Ein Baseballspieler kann sich an ein neues Team verkaufen, wenn er einen guten Wurf hat.

540.pun_sentence: OLD BAKERS never die, they just stop making lots of dough.

meaning_1.description: a mixture of flour, water, and other ingredients to make bread or pastry.

translations.de: ALTE BÄCKER sterben nie, sie hören einfach auf, viel Teig zu machen.

translations.ko: 늙은 제빵사들은 결코 죽지 않아요, 그들은 그냥 많은 반죽을 만들지 않아요.

meaning_2.description: money or cash.

translations.de: ALTE BÄCKER sterben nie, sie hören einfach auf, viel Geld zu verdienen.

541.pun_sentence: The couple grew fruit trees and lived to a ripe old age.

meaning_1.description: Fully matured or developed, often referring to fruit that is ready to be eaten.

translations.de: Das Paar zog Obstbäume groß und lebte bis zu einem reifen Alter. (Referring to the maturity of the fruit)
translations.fr: Le couple a cultivé des arbres fruitiers et a vécu jusqu'à un âge mûr. (Referring to the maturity of the fruit)
translations.ko: 그 부부는 과일 나무를 키우고 성숙한 나이에 이르렀다. (나이가 성숙하다는 의미에서 성숙한)

translations.ko: 그 부부는 과일 나무를 키우고 높은 나이에 이르렀다. (나이가 많다는 의미에서 높은)

542.pun_sentence: If you sing while playing baseball, you won't get a good pitch.

translations.de: Wenn du beim Baseballspielen singst, bekommst du keinen guten Wurf.

544.pun_sentence: She was only a Weatherman's daughter, but she sure had a warm front.

translations.ko: 의사인데 바텐더가 된 사람은 항상 술을 내놓고 있었어!

translations.fr: Un médecin qui est devenu barman faisait toujours des piqûres!
translations.ko: 의사인데 바텐더가 된 사람은 항상 주사를 하고 있었어!

546.pun_sentence: OLD ELECTRICIANS never die they just lose contact.

547.pun_sentence: The comedian stopped at the fabric store on his way to a comedy gig.He was looking for new material.

translations.ko: 그 코미디언은 코미디 공연길에 재봉틀 가게에서 멈춰 섰어요. 그는 새로운 재료를 찾고 있었어요.

548.pun_sentence: - Call me a taxi.- OK, you're a taxi.

meaning_1.description: To request or summon something or someone

translations.de: "Ruf mir ein Taxi. - OK, du bist ein Taxi."
translations.fr: "Appelle-moi un taxi. - D'accord, tu es un taxi."
translations.ko: "나에게 택시를 불러줘. - OK, 너 택시야."

meaning_2.description: To label or identify someone as something

translations.ko: "나를 택시로 불러줘. - OK, 너 택시야."

549.pun_sentence: Someone who sells old chess pieces is a pawn broker.

translations.de: Jemand, der alte Schachfiguren verkauft, ist ein Bauer-Verkäufer.

translations.ko: 오래된 체스 피스를 판매하는 사람은 폰 판매자입니다.

translations.fr: Quelqu'un qui vend des pièces d'échecs anciennes est un prêteur sur gages.

550.pun_sentence: The model who joined the air force was a bombshell.

translations.fr: La modèle qui a rejoint la force aérienne était une bombasse.
translations.ko: 공군에 입대한 모델은 굉장히 매력적인 사람이었다.

translations.ko: 공군에 가입한 모델은 충격적인 사건이었다.

551.pun_sentence: The surgeon really did not know how to perform quick surgeries on insects, but he did one on the fly.

meaning_1.description: a common insect.

translations.de: Der Chirurg wusste wirklich nicht, wie man schnelle Operationen an Insekten durchführt, aber er hat eine an der Fliege durchgeführt.
translations.fr: Le chirurgien ne savait vraiment pas comment effectuer des chirurgies rapides sur les insectes, mais il en a fait une sur la mouche.
translations.ko: 외과 의사는 정말로 곤충에게 빠른 수술을 어떻게 해야 하는지 모르고 있었지만, 그는 파리에 하나를 했습니다.

translations.ko: 외과 의사는 정말로 곤충에게 빠른 수술을 어떻게 해야 하는지 모르고 있었지만, 그는 급히 하나를 했습니다.

552.pun_sentence: We went to the owls convention and it was a real hoot.

translations.de: Wir gingen zur Eulenkonvention und es war ein echter Laut.
translations.fr: Nous sommes allés à la convention des hiboux et c'était un vrai hululement.
translations.ko: 우리는 부엉이 컨벤션에 갔고, 그곳은 정말로 꽥대는 소리였어요.

translations.fr: Nous sommes allés à la convention des hiboux et c'était un vrai idiot.
translations.ko: 우리는 부엉이 컨벤션에 갔고, 그곳은 정말로 바보 같은 사람이었어요.

553.pun_sentence: He and his partner made knives, and they shared a cut.

meaning_1.description: The action of dividing or separating something with a sharp object.

translations.de: Er und sein Partner stellten Messer her, und sie teilten einen Schnitt.
translations.fr: Lui et son partenaire faisaient des couteaux, et ils partageaient une coupe.
translations.ko: 그와 그의 파트너는 칼을 만들었고, 그들은 한 번의 절단을 공유했다.

meaning_2.description: portion or share of the profits or earnings from a business or endeavor.

translations.de: Er und sein Partner stellten Messer her, und sie teilten einen Anteil.
translations.fr: Lui et son partenaire faisaient des couteaux, et ils partageaient une partie des bénéfices.
translations.ko: 그와 그의 파트너는 칼을 만들었고, 그들은 이익의 일부를 나눴다.

554.pun_sentence: A baseball player was a thief.He was always trying to steal.

meaning_1.description: to take someone else's property without their permission or knowledge.

translations.de: Ein Baseballspieler war ein Dieb. Er versuchte immer zu stehlen.
translations.fr: Un joueur de baseball était un voleur. Il essayait toujours de voler.
translations.ko: 야구선수가 도둑이었어요. 그는 항상 훔치려고 했어요.

meaning_2.description: to successfully take the ball or base from the opposing team

translations.de: Ein Baseballspieler war ein Dieb. Er versuchte immer eine Base zu stehlen.
translations.fr: Un joueur de baseball était un voleur. Il essayait toujours de voler une base.
translations.ko: 야구선수가 도둑이었어요. 그는 항상 베이스를 훔치려고 했어요.

555.pun_sentence: "I make the armour out of chain links," Tom replied by mail.

meaning_1.description: postal or electronic communication sent through the postal system or internet.

translations.de: "Ich fertige eine Rüstung aus Kettengliedern an," antwortete Tom per Post.
translations.fr: "'Je fabrique l'armure avec des anneaux de chaîne,' répondit Tom par courrier."
translations.ko: "'"나는 체인링으로 갑옷을 만들어.",' 톰이 메일로 답했다."

meaning_2.description: armor made from interlinked rings, typically worn by medieval knights.

translations.de: "Ich fertige eine Rüstung aus Kettenhemd an," antwortete Tom per Post.
translations.fr: "'Je fabrique l'armure avec des mailles de chaîne,' répondit Tom par courrier."
translations.ko: "'"나는 체인링으로 쇠사슬 갑옷을 만들어.",' 톰이 메일로 답했다."

556.pun_sentence: He became an astronaut and had a blast.

meaning_1.description: An explosion or a powerful burst of energy.

translations.de: Er wurde Astronaut und es gab eine Explosion.
translations.fr: Il est devenu astronaute et il y a eu une explosion.
translations.ko: 그는 우주비행사가 되어 폭발했다.

meaning_2.description: having a great time, enjoying oneself immensely, or having a lot of fun.

translations.de: Er wurde Astronaut und hatte einen Riesenspaß.
translations.fr: Il est devenu astronaute et il s'est énormément amusé.
translations.ko: 그는 우주비행사가 되어 너무 재미있었다.

557.pun_sentence: I couldn't figure out how to fasten my seatbelt. Then it clicked.

meaning_1.description: the sound that a seatbelt makes when it is fastened securely.

translations.de: Ich konnte nicht herausfinden, wie man meinen Sicherheitsgurt befestigt. Dann hat er geklickt.
translations.fr: Je ne pouvais pas comprendre comment attacher ma ceinture de sécurité. Puis ça a cliqué.
translations.ko: 나는 내 안전벨트를 어떻게 매야하는지 알아내지 못했어. 그 후에 '딸깍'하는 소리가 나왔어.

meaning_2.description: to suddenly understand or comprehend something.

translations.de: Ich konnte nicht herausfinden, wie man meinen Sicherheitsgurt befestigt. Dann ist es mir klar geworden.
translations.fr: Je ne pouvais pas comprendre comment attacher ma ceinture de sécurité. Puis ça m'est apparu.
translations.ko: 나는 내 안전벨트를 어떻게 매야하는지 알아내지 못했어. 그 후에 문득 이해가 되었어.

558.pun_sentence: The trapeze artist had to buy his own safety equipment. Every Friday he drew his net wages.

meaning_1.description: a type of fabric that has a pattern of evenly spaced holes and is used mainly for fishing or catching objects.

translations.de: Der Trapezkünstler musste seine eigene Sicherheitsausrüstung kaufen. Jeden Freitag zog er sein Netz-Lohn.
translations.fr: L'artiste de trapèze a dû acheter son propre équipement de sécurité. Chaque vendredi, il a tiré ses salaires nets.
translations.ko: 공중곡예사는 자신의 안전 장비를 직접 구입해야 했어. 매주 금요일마다 그는 그의 순수 임금을 그렸어.

meaning_2.description: remaining amount after deductions or taxes have been taken out, typically referring to income.

translations.de: Der Trapezkünstler musste seine eigene Sicherheitsausrüstung kaufen. Jeden Freitag erhielt er sein Nettoeinkommen.
translations.fr: L'artiste de trapèze a dû acheter son propre équipement de sécurité. Chaque vendredi, il a obtenu son salaire net.
translations.ko: 공중곡예사는 자신의 안전 장비를 직접 구입해야 했어. 매주 금요일마다 그는 그의 순수 임금을 받았어.

559.pun_sentence: Dentists on death fill their last cavity.

meaning_1.description: a hole or empty space in something, typically in a tooth.

translations.de: Zahnärzte füllen auf dem Todesbett ihre letzte Höhlung.
translations.fr: Les dentistes sur le point de mourir remplissent leur dernière cavité.
translations.ko: 죽음의 치과의사들은 마지막 구멍을 채웁니다.

meaning_2.description: a grave or burial site.

translations.de: Zahnärzte füllen auf dem Todesbett ihr letztes Grab.
translations.fr: Les dentistes sur le point de mourir remplissent leur dernière tombe.
translations.ko: 죽음의 치과의사들은 마지막 무덤을 채웁니다.

560.pun_sentence: Her exam was on the human skeleton, so she decided to bone up.

meaning_1.description: The hard, dense tissue that forms the skeletal structure of the body.

translations.de: Ihre Prüfung war über das menschliche Skelett, also entschied sie sich dazu, Knochen zu lernen.
translations.fr: Son examen portait sur le squelette humain, donc elle a décidé d'apprendre les os.
translations.ko: 그녀의 시험은 인간의 뼈 구조에 관한 것이었기 때문에, 그녀는 뼈를 공부하기로 결정했다.

meaning_2.description: to study or review intensively, often with the goal of improving one's knowledge or skills.

translations.de: Ihre Prüfung war über das menschliche Skelett, also entschied sie sich dazu, intensiv zu lernen.
translations.fr: Son examen portait sur le squelette humain, donc elle a décidé de se mettre à étudier intensivement.
translations.ko: 그녀의 시험은 인간의 뼈 구조에 관한 것이었기 때문에, 그녀는 집중적으로 공부하기로 결정했다.

561.pun_sentence: Sign on an electrician's truck : Let us remove your shorts.

meaning_1.description: Garments worn on the lower body, covering the hips and thighs.

translations.de: Schild auf einem Elektriker-LKW Lassen Sie uns Ihre Shorts entfernen.
translations.fr: Panneau sur un camion d'électricien Laissez-nous enlever vos shorts.
translations.ko: 전기공의 트럭에 붙은 표지 당신의 반바지를 제거해 드리겠습니다.

meaning_2.description: short circuits in electrical systems

translations.de: Schild auf einem Elektriker-LKW Lassen Sie uns Ihre Kurzschlüsse beseitigen.
translations.fr: Panneau sur un camion d'électricien Laissez-nous éliminer vos courts-circuits.
translations.ko: 전기공의 트럭에 붙은 표지 당신의 단락을 제거해 드리겠습니다.

562.pun_sentence: I like marching songs, in any month.

meaning_1.description: The action or activity of walking or moving in a coordinated rhythm to a beat, typically in a military or ceremonial context.

translations.de: Ich mag Marschlieder, in jedem Monat.
translations.fr: J'aime les chansons de marche, peu importe le mois.
translations.ko: 나는 어느 달이든 행진 노래를 좋아해.

meaning_2.description: the third month of the year

translations.de: Ich mag März-Lieder, in jedem Monat.
translations.fr: J'aime les chansons de mars, peu importe le mois.
translations.ko: 나는 어느 달이든 3월의 노래를 좋아해.

563.pun_sentence: Our Boy Scouts'knot - tying class went off without a hitch.

meaning_1.description: a temporary difficulty or problem.

translations.de: Unser Pfadfinder-Knoten-Bindekurs lief ohne Schwierigkeiten ab.
translations.fr: Notre cours de nouage de noeuds pour nos scouts s'est déroulé sans accroc.
translations.ko: 우리 소년 스카우트의 매듭 묶기 수업이 걸림돌 없이 진행되었다.

meaning_2.description: a type of knot used to secure a rope to an object or another rope.

translations.de: Unser Pfadfinder-Knoten-Bindekurs lief ohne einen einzigen Knoten ab.
translations.fr: Notre cours de nouage de noeuds pour nos scouts s'est déroulé sans faire un seul noeud.
translations.ko: 우리 소년 스카우트의 매듭 묶기 수업이 하나의 매듭도 묶지 않고 진행되었다.

564.pun_sentence: I used to have a fear of hurdles, but I got over it.

meaning_1.description: To overcome or conquer something, often referring to overcoming a fear, obstacle, or difficulty

translations.de: Ich hatte früher Angst vor Hürden, aber ich habe es überwunden.
translations.fr: J'avais auparavant peur des haies, mais je l'ai surmonté.
translations.ko: 나는 이전에 허들이 무서웠지만, 그것을 극복했어.

meaning_2.description: physically clearing or passing over an obstacle, such as jumping over hurdles.

translations.de: Ich hatte früher Angst vor Hürden, aber ich bin darüber gesprungen.
translations.fr: J'avais auparavant peur des haies, mais je les ai franchies.
translations.ko: 나는 이전에 허들이 무서웠지만, 그것을 뛰어넘었어.

565.pun_sentence: A group called the Balloons sings pop music.

meaning_1.description: a genre of popular music characterized by a catchy melody and upbeat rhythm.

translations.de: Eine Gruppe namens The Balloons singt Popmusik.
translations.fr: Un groupe appelé Les Balloons chante de la musique pop.
translations.ko: 'Balloons'라는 그룹이 팝 음악을 부릅니다.

meaning_2.description: the sound made when something bursts or pops.

translations.de: Eine Gruppe namens The Balloons erzeugt Pop-Musik.
translations.fr: Un groupe appelé Les Balloons fait éclater de la musique.
translations.ko: 'Balloons'라는 그룹이 터뜨리는 소리로 음악을 만듭니다.

566.pun_sentence: "I have to check the score on this exam again," Tom remarked.

meaning_1.description: to make a comment or express an opinion about something.

translations.de: "Ich muss die Punktzahl in dieser Prüfung noch einmal überprüfen", bemerkte Tom.
translations.fr: "Je dois vérifier à nouveau le score de cet examen", a remarqué Tom.
translations.ko: "나는 이 시험의 점수를 다시 확인해야 돼", 톰이 말했다.

meaning_2.description: to check or change the way in which points have been given in an examination or test

translations.de: "Ich muss die Punktzahl in dieser Prüfung noch einmal korrigieren", bemerkte Tom.
translations.fr: "Je dois revoir la notation de cet examen", a remarqué Tom.
translations.ko: "나는 이 시험의 점수를 다시 채점해야 돼", 톰이 말했다.

567.pun_sentence: She was only a Gardener's daughter, but she knows all the rakes.

meaning_1.description: a tool with teeth or prongs used for gathering leaves or loosening soil.

translations.de: Sie war nur die Tochter eines Gärtners, aber sie kennt alle Rechen.
translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'un jardinier, mais elle connaît tous les râteaux.
translations.ko: 그녀는 그저 정원사의 딸이었지만, 그녀는 모든 갈퀴를 알고 있습니다.

translations.de: Sie war nur die Tochter eines Gärtners, aber sie kennt alle Frauenhelden.
translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'un jardinier, mais elle connaît tous les coureurs de jupons.
translations.ko: 그녀는 그저 정원사의 딸이었지만, 그녀는 모든 바람둥이를 알고 있습니다.

568.pun_sentence: The teacher asked a question and the students were all up in arms.

meaning_1.description: limbs on the upper part of the human body used for movement and manipulation.

translations.de: Der Lehrer stellte eine Frage und die Schüler waren alle hocherhobene Arme.
translations.fr: L'enseignant a posé une question et tous les élèves étaient levés les bras en l'air.
translations.ko: 선생님은 질문을 했고, 학생들은 모두 팔을 들었습니다.

meaning_2.description: weapons or firearms used in warfare or conflict.

translations.de: Der Lehrer stellte eine Frage und die Schüler waren alle bewaffnet.
translations.fr: L'enseignant a posé une question et tous les élèves étaient armés.
translations.ko: 선생님은 질문을 했고, 학생들은 모두 무장했습니다.

569.pun_sentence: She was only a Real estate agent"s daughter, but she gave a lot away.

meaning_1.description: a plot of land or a parcel of real estate.

translations.de: Sie war nur die Tochter eines Immobilienmaklers, aber sie gab viel Grundstück weg.
translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'un agent immobilier, mais elle a cédé beaucoup de terrains.
translations.ko: 그녀는 단지 부동산 중개인의 딸이었지만, 그녀는 많은 토지를 많이 내어 주었다.

meaning_2.description: a large quantity or number of something.

translations.de: Sie war nur die Tochter eines Immobilienmaklers, aber sie gab viel weg.
translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'un agent immobilier, mais elle a beaucoup donné.
translations.ko: 그녀는 단지 부동산 중개인의 딸이었지만, 그녀는 많은 것을 많이 주었다.

570.pun_sentence: Old bakers never die, they just keep making lots of dough.

meaning_1.description: A mixture of flour, water, and other ingredients, used as the basis for baking bread or pastry.

translations.de: Alte Bäcker sterben nie, sie machen einfach weiter viel Teig.
translations.fr: Les vieux boulangers ne meurent jamais, ils continuent simplement à faire beaucoup de pâte.
translations.ko: 오래된 제빵사는 결코 죽지 않아요, 그들은 그냥 계속 많은 반죽을 만들어요.

meaning_2.description: Money.

translations.de: Alte Bäcker sterben nie, sie machen einfach weiter viel Geld.
translations.fr: Les vieux boulangers ne meurent jamais, ils continuent simplement à gagner beaucoup d'argent.
translations.ko: 오래된 제빵사는 결코 죽지 않아요, 그들은 그냥 계속 많은 돈을 벌어요.

571.pun_sentence: Airline pilots make many friends in high places.

meaning_1.description: elevated or tall in stature or position.

translations.de: Flugzeugpiloten machen viele Freunde an hohen Orten.
translations.fr: Les pilotes de ligne se font de nombreux amis en hautes altitudes.
translations.ko: 항공사 조종사들은 높은 곳에서 많은 친구들을 사귀죠.

meaning_2.description: having much power within a social or professional hierarchy

translations.de: Flugzeugpiloten knüpfen viele Kontakte in hohen Stellungen.
translations.fr: Les pilotes de ligne se font beaucoup d'amis dans des positions élevées.
translations.ko: 항공사 조종사들은 고위급에서 많은 친구들을 사귀죠.

572.pun_sentence: His business plan to manufacture scissors just didn't cut it.

meaning_1.description: To make an incision or divide something with a sharp tool

translations.de: Sein Geschäftsplan zur Herstellung von Scheren hat es einfach nicht geschnitten.
translations.fr: Son projet d'entreprise pour fabriquer des ciseaux ne le coupait tout simplement pas.
translations.ko: 그의 가위 제조 사업 계획은 그냥 자르지 못했다.

meaning_2.description: to meet expectations, standards, or requirements.

translations.de: Sein Geschäftsplan zur Herstellung von Scheren war einfach nicht auf der Höhe.
translations.fr: Son projet d'entreprise pour fabriquer des ciseaux n'était tout simplement pas à la hauteur.
translations.ko: 그의 가위 제조 사업 계획은 기대치를 충족시키지 못했다.

573.pun_sentence: She was only a Globetrotter's daughter, but she manages to get around.

meaning_1.description: to travel, move, or go to different places.

translations.de: Sie war nur die Tochter eines Globetrotters, schaffte es aber, sich fortzubewegen.
translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'un globe-trotter, mais elle parvient à se déplacer.
translations.ko: 그녀는 그저 세계 여행자의 딸이었지만, 이동하는 데에는 문제가 없었어요.

meaning_2.description: to understand or comprehend something.

translations.de: Sie war nur die Tochter eines Globetrotters, versteht es aber, herumzukommen.
translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'un globe-trotter, mais elle parvient à comprendre.
translations.ko: 그녀는 그저 세계 여행자의 딸이었지만, 이해하는 데에는 문제가 없었어요.

574.pun_sentence: We’ve got children’s church because we know how to kid around.

meaning_1.description: A young child or offspring.

translations.de: Wir haben eine Kinderkirche, weil wir wissen, wie man mit den Kleinen umgeht.
translations.fr: Nous avons une église pour enfants parce que nous savons comment s'y prendre avec les petits.
translations.ko: 우리는 어린이 교회를 가지고 있어요, 왜냐하면 우리는 어떻게 아이들을 돌보는지 잘 알고 있기 때문이죠.

meaning_2.description: To joke or tease in a light-hearted manner.

translations.de: Wir haben eine Kinderkirche, weil wir wissen, wie man herumalbert.
translations.fr: Nous avons une église pour enfants parce que nous savons comment plaisanter.
translations.ko: 우리는 어린이 교회를 가지고 있어요, 왜냐하면 우리는 어떻게 흥겨운 농담을 하는지 잘 알고 있기 때문이죠.

575.pun_sentence: There was a massive outcry against the plan to build a power line across a nature preserve. The public couldn't bear the tension.

meaning_1.description: Mental or emotional strain.

translations.de: Es gab einen massiven Aufschrei gegen den Plan, eine Stromleitung durch ein Naturschutzgebiet zu bauen. Die Öffentlichkeit konnte die Anspannung nicht ertragen.
translations.fr: Il y a eu un tollé massif contre le projet de construire une ligne électrique à travers une réserve naturelle. Le public ne pouvait pas supporter la tension.
translations.ko: 자연 보호 구역을 가로질러 전력선을 설치하는 계획에 대한 대규모의 항의가 있었습니다. 일반 대중은 그 긴장감을 견디지 못했습니다.

meaning_2.description: The physical condition of being stretched or strained, in this context it relates to electricity.

translations.de: Es gab einen massiven Aufschrei gegen den Plan, eine Stromleitung durch ein Naturschutzgebiet zu bauen. Die Öffentlichkeit konnte die Spannung nicht ertragen.
translations.fr: Il y a eu un tollé massif contre le projet de construire une ligne électrique à travers une réserve naturelle. Le public ne pouvait pas supporter la tension électrique.
translations.ko: 자연 보호 구역을 가로질러 전력선을 설치하는 계획에 대한 대규모의 항의가 있었습니다. 일반 대중은 그 전압을 견디지 못했습니다.

576.pun_sentence: OLD PILOTS never die, they just buzz off.

meaning_1.description: A noise that a bee or an aircraft makes.

translations.de: Alte Piloten sterben nie, sie summen nur weg.
translations.fr: Les vieux pilotes ne meurent jamais, ils bourdonnent juste.
translations.ko: 고령의 파일럿은 결코 죽지 않아, 그들은 그냥 '왕왕' 소리를 내며 사라져.

meaning_2.description: To leave quickly or go away in a casual or lighthearted manner.

translations.de: Alte Piloten sterben nie, sie verschwinden einfach.
translations.fr: Les vieux pilotes ne meurent jamais, ils s'éclipsent juste.
translations.ko: 고령의 파일럿은 결코 죽지 않아, 그들은 그냥 가볍게 사라져.

577.pun_sentence: My name is Emmy, I'm a T.V.star

meaning_1.description: common female first name.

translations.de: Mein Name ist Emmy, ich bin ein Fernsehstar.
translations.fr: Mon nom est Emmy, je suis une star de T.V.
translations.ko: 내 이름은 에미야, 나는 텔레비전 스타야.

meaning_2.description: Emmy Awards, which are prestigious awards for excellence in the television industry.

translations.de: Ich bin Emmy, ich bin ein TV-Preis.
translations.fr: Je suis Emmy, je suis une récompense télévisée.
translations.ko: 나는 에미야, 나는 텔레비전 산업의 명예를 위한 상이다.

578.pun_sentence: OLD TREE SURGEONS never die, they are just uprooted.

meaning_1.description: To remove or extract something from its original location, like a tree from the ground.

translations.de: ÄLTERE BAUMCHIRURGEN sterben nie, sie werden nur entwurzelt.
translations.fr: Les anciens chirurgiens arboristes ne meurent jamais, ils sont simplement déracinés.
translations.ko: 노련한 나무수술사들은 절대로 죽지 않아요, 그들은 그저 뽑혀나가게 됩니다.

meaning_2.description: Forced to leave or dismissed from a situation or position.

translations.de: ÄLTERE BAUMCHIRURGEN sterben nie, sie werden nur aus ihrer Position entfernt.
translations.fr: Les anciens chirurgiens arboristes ne meurent jamais, ils sont simplement forcés de quitter leur position.
translations.ko: 노련한 나무수술사들은 절대로 죽지 않아요, 그들은 그저 자리를 잃게 됩니다.

579.pun_sentence: A lawyer asked his dentist to give him a retainer.

meaning_1.description: A device used by orthodontists to keep teeth in position.

translations.de: Ein Anwalt bat seinen Zahnarzt, ihm eine Zahnspange zu geben.
translations.fr: Un avocat a demandé à son dentiste de lui donner un appareil dentaire.
translations.ko: 변호사가 그의 치과 의사에게 구강 보정기를 달라고 요청했습니다.

meaning_2.description: A fee paid in advance to someone, especially an attorney, in order to secure or maintain their services on call when required.

translations.de: Ein Anwalt bat seinen Zahnarzt, ihm ein Vorschusshonorar zu geben.
translations.fr: Un avocat a demandé à son dentiste de lui verser des honoraires en avance.
translations.ko: 변호사가 그의 치과 의사에게 선불로 고용하기 위한 비용을 달라고 요청했습니다.

580.pun_sentence: The weatherman who forecasted snow in July was a bit of a flake.

meaning_1.description: a small, loose piece often referring to snow.

translations.de: Der Wetterfrosch, der Schnee im Juli vorausgesagt hat, war ein bisschen ein Flocke.
translations.fr: Le météorologue qui a prévu de la neige en juillet était un peu un flocon.
translations.ko: 7월에 눈이 올 것이라고 예보한 날씨 예보사는 약간의 눈송이였다.

meaning_2.description: someone who is odd, unreliable, or acts unusually.

translations.de: Der Wetterfrosch, der Schnee im Juli vorausgesagt hat, war ein bisschen ein Sonderling.
translations.fr: Le météorologue qui a prévu de la neige en juillet était un peu un excentrique.
translations.ko: 7월에 눈이 올 것이라고 예보한 날씨 예보사는 약간의 별난 사람이었다.

581.pun_sentence: Two brothers collaborated on haunted stories, but one was a ghost writer.

meaning_1.description: a spirit of a dead person that can appear to the living.

translations.de: Zwei Brüder arbeiteten an Gespenstergeschichten, aber einer war ein Geist.
translations.fr: Deux frères ont collaboré sur des histoires hantées, mais l'un était un fantôme.
translations.ko: 두 형제가 유령 이야기를 함께 작성했지만, 한명은 유령이었어.

meaning_2.description: someone who writes a book or other content for someone else, who is officially credited as the author.

translations.de: Zwei Brüder arbeiteten an Gespenstergeschichten, aber einer war ein Ghostwriter.
translations.fr: Deux frères ont collaboré sur des histoires hantées, mais l'un était un écrivain fantôme.
translations.ko: 두 형제가 유령 이야기를 함께 작성했지만, 한명은 유령작가였어.

582.pun_sentence: I'm a sap for tree jokes.

meaning_1.description: A foolish or gullible person.

translations.de: Ich bin ein Trottel für Baumwitze.
translations.fr: Je suis un imbécile pour les blagues d'arbres.
translations.ko: 나는 나무 농담에 대한 바보야.

meaning_2.description: A fluid transported in xylem cells (vessel elements or tracheids) or phloem sieve tube elements of a plant.

translations.de: Ich bin ein Saft für Baumwitze.
translations.fr: Je suis une sève pour les blagues d'arbres.
translations.ko: 나는 나무 농담에 대한 수액이야.

583.pun_sentence: Cowboys in a rodeo can be sure to get a few bucks.

meaning_1.description: Adult male deer or animals

translations.de: Cowboys in einem Rodeo können sicher sein, ein paar Hirsche zu bekommen.
translations.fr: Les cow-boys dans un rodéo peuvent s’attendre à obtenir quelques cerfs.
translations.ko: 로데오에서의 카우보이들은 수사슴 몇 마리를 얻을 수 있을 것이다 확신할 수 있다.

meaning_2.description: dollars or money

translations.de: Cowboys in einem Rodeo können sicher sein, ein paar Dollar zu bekommen.
translations.fr: Les cow-boys dans un rodéo peuvent s’attendre à gagner quelques dollars.
translations.ko: 로데오에서의 카우보이들은 몇 달러를 벌 수 있는 것에 확신할 수 있다.

584.pun_sentence: Never lie to an x - ray technician.They can see right through you.

meaning_1.description: to perceive or observe something with one's eyes.

translations.de: Lüge nie einem Röntgentechniker. Sie können direkt durch dich hindurchsehen.
translations.fr: Ne mentez jamais à un technicien en radiographie. Ils peuvent voir à travers vous.
translations.ko: 절대로 X-레이 기사에게 거짓말하지 마세요. 그들은 당신을 통해 볼 수 있습니다.

meaning_2.description: to understand or discern something

translations.de: Lüge nie einem Röntgentechniker. Sie können dich sofort durchschauen.
translations.fr: Ne mentez jamais à un technicien en radiographie. Ils peuvent vous percer à jour
translations.ko: 절대로 X-레이 기사에게 거짓말하지 마세요. 그들은 당신을 바로 알아볼 수 있습니다.

585.pun_sentence: He bought a rope factory to tie into his empire.

meaning_1.description: To fasten something with a knot or a loop.

translations.de: Er kaufte eine Seilfabrik, um sie in sein Imperium zu binden.
translations.fr: Il a acheté une fabrique de cordes pour l'attacher à son empire.
translations.ko: 그는 그의 제국에 매다 붙이기 위해 밧줄 공장을 샀다.

meaning_2.description: integration or consolidation of different businesses or components

translations.de: Er kaufte eine Seilfabrik, um sie in sein Imperium zu integrieren.
translations.fr: Il a acheté une fabrique de cordes pour l'intégrer à son empire.
translations.ko: 그는 그의 제국에 통합하기 위해 밧줄 공장을 샀다.

586.pun_sentence: He took a nail to the volleyball game because he wanted to spike it.

meaning_1.description: To forcibly strike or smash downward, as in volleyball.

translations.de: Er brachte einen Nagel zum Volleyballspiel, weil er ihn schlagen wollte.
translations.fr: Il a apporté un clou au match de volley-ball parce qu'il voulait le smasher.
translations.ko: 그는 배구 경기에 못을 가져갔다, 왜냐하면 그는 그것을 강하게 찌르려고 했기 때문이다.

meaning_2.description: A pointed piece of metal, like a nail.

translations.de: Er brachte einen Nagel zum Volleyballspiel, weil er ihn einhämmern wollte.
translations.fr: Il a apporté un clou au match de volley-ball parce qu'il voulait le planter.
translations.ko: 그는 배구 경기에 못을 가져갔다, 왜냐하면 그는 그것을 박으려고 했기 때문이다.

587.pun_sentence: Pharmacists find their work to be very encapsulating.

meaning_1.description: to summarize, embody or encompass something.

translations.de: Apotheker finden ihre Arbeit sehr zusammenfassend.
translations.fr: Les pharmaciens trouvent leur travail très englobant.
translations.ko: 약사들은 그들의 일을 아주 요약적으로 느껴요.

meaning_2.description: creation or use of capsules in pharmacy, as with medications.

translations.de: Apotheker finden ihre Arbeit sehr mit Kapsulerstellung verbunden.
translations.fr: Les pharmaciens trouvent leur travail très encapsulant.
translations.ko: 약사들은 그들의 일을 아주 캡슐화에 관련되어 느껴요.

588.pun_sentence: OLD KEY PUNCH OPERATORS never die they just punch out.

meaning_1.description: To strike or press something forcefully, often used in the context of operating a key punch machine

translations.de: ALTE SCHLÜSSELLOCHOPERATOREN sterben nie, sie schlagen einfach aus.
translations.fr: LES ANCIENS OPÉRATEURS DE PERFORATION DE CLÉ ne meurent jamais, ils frappent juste.
translations.ko: 옛 키 입력 작업자들은 결코 죽지 않아, 그들은 그냥 강하게 누르거나.

meaning_2.description: to clock out or leave work, marking the end of one's work shift

translations.de: ALTE SCHLÜSSELLOCHOPERATOREN sterben nie, sie stempeln einfach aus.
translations.fr: LES ANCIENS OPÉRATEURS DE PERFORATION DE CLÉ ne meurent jamais, ils pointent simplement en fin de journée.
translations.ko: 옛 키 입력 작업자들은 결코 죽지 않아, 그들은 그냥 퇴근해.

589.pun_sentence: A basketball player couldn't control his saliva but he could sure dribble.

meaning_1.description: to let saliva or other liquid flow from the mouth.

translations.de: Ein Basketballspieler konnte seinen Speichel nicht kontrollieren, aber er konnte sicherlich sabbern.
translations.fr: Un joueur de basket-ball ne pouvait pas contrôler sa salive mais il pouvait bien baver.
translations.ko: 농구 선수는 침을 제어할 수 없었지만, 그는 분명 찔끔거리다 할 수 있었습니다.

meaning_2.description: to control and move along slowly (in terms of a sports ball, i.e., basketball).

translations.de: Ein Basketballspieler konnte seinen Speichel nicht kontrollieren, aber er konnte sicherlich den Ball dribbeln.
translations.fr: Un joueur de basket-ball ne pouvait pas contrôler sa salive mais il pouvait sûrement dribbler.
translations.ko: 농구 선수는 침을 제어할 수 없었지만, 그는 분명 드리블을 할 수 있었습니다.

590.pun_sentence: If you work in a forestry company you will probably have to log your time.

meaning_1.description: record events, incidents, or observations regularly or as they occur.

translations.de: Wenn Sie in einem Forstunternehmen arbeiten, müssen Sie wahrscheinlich Ihre Zeit protokollieren.
translations.fr: Si vous travaillez dans une entreprise forestière, vous devrez probablement enregistrer votre temps.
translations.ko: 만약 당신이 임업 회사에서 일한다면, 아마도 당신의 시간을 기록해야 할 것입니다.

meaning_2.description: A part of a tree trunk, especially when cut for use.

translations.de: Wenn du in einem Forstunternehmen arbeitest, musst du wahrscheinlich deinen eigenen Stamm haben.
translations.fr: Si vous travaillez dans une entreprise forestière, vous devez probablement avoir votre propre tronc.
translations.ko: 만약 당신이 임업 회사에서 일한다면, 아마도 당신은 나무의 통나무를 확보해야 할 것입니다.

591.pun_sentence: A job circumcising elephants isn't so bad. The base salary is small but the tips are big.

meaning_1.description: the part removed during a circumcision

translations.de: Ein Job, bei dem Elefanten beschnitten werden, ist nicht so schlecht. Das Grundgehalt ist klein, aber die Spitzen sind groß.
translations.fr: Un travail de circoncision d'éléphants n'est pas si mal. Le salaire de base est faible, mais les bouts sont importants.
translations.ko: 코끼리 할례하는 일이 그리 나쁘지 않아. 기본 급여는 적지만 팁이 클거든.

meaning_2.description: Additional amount of money given as a gratuity.

translations.de: Ein Job, bei dem Elefanten beschnitten werden, ist nicht so schlecht. Das Grundgehalt ist klein, aber die Trinkgelder sind groß.
translations.fr: Un travail de circoncision d'éléphants n'est pas si mal. Le salaire de base est faible, mais les pourboires sont importants.
translations.ko: 코끼리 할례하는 일이 그리 나쁘지 않아. 기본 급여는 적지만 팁(봉사료)이 커.

592.pun_sentence: I never have understood how you're supposed to hit anything with a bat.....it keeps flying away.

meaning_1.description: A type of sports equipment with which you hit a ball.

translations.de: Ich habe nie verstanden, wie man mit einem Schläger etwas treffen soll... er fliegt immer weg.
translations.fr: Je n'ai jamais compris comment on est supposé frapper quelque chose avec une batte... elle s'envole toujours.
translations.ko: 나는 어떻게 배트로 무언가를 칠 수 있다는 것을 결코 이해하지 못했어... 배트가 계속 날아가 버려.

meaning_2.description: A nocturnal mammal that can fly.

translations.de: Ich habe nie verstanden, wie du mit einer Fledermaus etwas treffen sollst... sie fliegt immer weg.
translations.fr: Je n'ai jamais compris comment on est supposé frapper quelque chose avec une chauve-souris... elle s'envole toujours.
translations.ko: 나는 어떻게 박쥐로 무언가를 칠 수 있다는 것을 결코 이해하지 못했어... 박쥐가 계속 날아가 버려.

593.pun_sentence: "How long will I have to wait for a table?" asked Tom without reservation.

meaning_1.description: An arrangement made in advance to have something (like a table in a restaurant) kept for your use.

translations.de: "Wie lange muss ich auf einen Tisch warten?" fragte Tom ohne Reservierung.
translations.fr: "Combien de temps vais-je devoir attendre une table ?" demanda Tom sans réservation.
translations.ko: "테이블을 얼마나 기다려야 하나요?"란 톰이 예약 없이 물었다.

meaning_2.description: suspicion or misgivings

translations.de: "Wie lange muss ich auf einen Tisch warten?" fragte Tom ohne Bedenken.
translations.fr: "Combien de temps vais-je devoir attendre une table ?" demanda Tom sans réserve.
translations.ko: "테이블을 얼마나 기다려야 하나요?"란 톰이 망설임 없이 물었다.

594.pun_sentence: Rabbits like their beer brewed with a lot of hops.

meaning_1.description: a type of plant used in brewing to give a bitter taste to beer.

translations.de: Kaninchen mögen ihr Bier mit vielen Hopfen gebraut.
translations.fr: Les lapins aiment leur bière brassée avec beaucoup de houblon.
translations.ko: 토끼는 맥주를 많은 홉과 함께 브루하는 것을 좋아해요.

meaning_2.description: the bouncing movement that rabbits make.

translations.de: Kaninchen mögen es, wenn ihr Bier mit vielen Hüpfen gebraut wird.
translations.fr: Les lapins aiment leur bière brassée avec beaucoup de sauts.
translations.ko: 토끼는 맥주를 많이 뛰며 브루하는 것을 좋아해요.

595.pun_sentence: Some people really enjoy blowing air out of their lungs - I'm not a fan myself.

meaning_1.description: a person who has a strong interest in something.

translations.de: Einige Leute finden es wirklich toll, Luft aus ihren Lungen zu pusten - Ich bin kein Anhänger davon.
translations.fr: Certaines personnes apprécient vraiment de souffler de l'air par leurs poumons - Je ne suis pas un fan moi-même.
translations.ko: 어떤 사람들은 진짜로 폐에서 공기를 내뿜는 것을 좋아해 - 나 자신은 팬이 아니야.

meaning_2.description: a device for creating a current of air.

translations.de: Einige Leute finden es wirklich toll, Luft aus ihren Lungen zu pusten - Ich bin kein Ventilator davon.
translations.fr: Certaines personnes apprécient vraiment de souffler de l'air par leurs poumons - Je ne suis pas un ventilateur moi-même.
translations.ko: 어떤 사람들은 진짜로 폐에서 공기를 내뿜는 것을 좋아해 - 나 자신은 선풍기가 아니야.

596.pun_sentence: If an animal looses its tail it should shop at a retail store.

meaning_1.description: the sale of goods to the public in relatively small quantities for use or consumption rather than for resale.

translations.de: Wenn ein Tier seinen Schwanz verliert, sollte es in einem Einzelhandelsgeschäft einkaufen.
translations.fr: Si un animal perd sa queue, il devrait faire ses achats dans un magasin de détail.
translations.ko: 만일 동물이 꼬리를 잃었다면, 그것은 소매점에서 쇼핑을 해야 합니다.

meaning_2.description: to reattach a tail

translations.de: Wenn ein Tier seinen Schwanz verliert, sollte es ihn in einem Wiederschwanzgeschäft anbringen lassen.
translations.fr: Si un animal perd sa queue, il devrait aller dans un magasin de requeues.
translations.ko: 만일 동물이 꼬리를 잃었다면, 꼬리를 다시 붙일 수 있는 가게에 가야합니다.

597.pun_sentence: A mechanic who was also a musician was good at tuning things.

meaning_1.description: adjusting a musical instrument to the correct or uniform pitch.

translations.de: Ein Mechaniker, der auch Musiker war, war gut darin, Dinge zu stimmen.
translations.fr: Un mécanicien qui était aussi musicien était doué pour accorder des choses.
translations.ko: 음악가이자 기계공인 사람은 물건을 조율하는 데 능했다.

meaning_2.description: adjusting the engine of a vehicle or other machine so it works in the most suitable or effective way.

translations.de: Ein Mechaniker, der auch Musiker war, war gut darin, Dinge zu optimieren.
translations.fr: Un mécanicien qui était aussi musicien était doué pour ajuster des choses.
translations.ko: 음악가이자 기계공인 사람은 물건을 최적화하는 데 능했다.

598.pun_sentence: I watched a movie about a baby hen, it was a real chick flick.

meaning_1.description: a baby chicken.

translations.de: Ich habe einen Film über ein Hühnerküken gesehen, er war ein echter "Chick flick" (Wortspiel für ein Film über ein Küken).
translations.fr: J'ai regardé un film sur un poussin, c'était vraiment un "Chick flick" (jeu de mots pour un film sur un poussin).
translations.ko: 저는 병아리에 관한 영화를 봤어요, 그건 정말 '병아리 영화'였어요 (병아리에 대한 영화라는 뜻의 말장난).

meaning_2.description: a young woman

translations.de: Ich habe einen Film über ein junges Mädchen gesehen, er war ein echter "Chick flick" (Wortspiel für einen Film, der sich an junge Frauen richtet).
translations.fr: J'ai regardé un film sur une jeune femme, c'était vraiment un "Chick flick" (jeu de mots pour un film destiné aux jeunes femmes).
translations.ko: 저는 어린 여자에 관한 영화를 봤어요, 그건 정말 '병아리 영화'였어요 (젊은 여성을 대상으로 한 영화라는 뜻의 말장난).

599.pun_sentence: How does a card player party? They shuffle.

meaning_1.description: to move or dance in a casual, relaxed, or disorganized manner, often used to describe a carefree or informal style of dancing.

translations.de: Wie feiert ein Kartenspieler? Sie tanzen lässig.
translations.fr: Comment un joueur de cartes fait-il la fête ? Ils dansent de manière décontractée.
translations.ko: 카드 플레이어는 어떻게 파티를 즐깁니까? 그들은 캐주얼하게 춤을 춰요.

meaning_2.description: To mix playing cards by randomly interchanging their positions in a deck, often done before dealing the cards in a card game.

translations.de: Wie feiert ein Kartenspieler? Sie mischen die Karten.
translations.fr: Comment un joueur de cartes fait-il la fête ? Ils mélangent les cartes.
translations.ko: 카드 플레이어는 어떻게 파티를 즐깁니까? 그들은 카드를 섞어요.

600.pun_sentence: She was only a Fruit vender's daughter, but, oh, what a peach.

meaning_1.description: A type of fruit.

translations.de: Sie war nur die Tochter eines Obsthändlers, aber, oh, was für ein Pfirsich.
translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'un vendeur de fruits, mais, oh, quelle pêche.
translations.ko: 그녀는 과일 판매상의 딸이었을 뿐이지만, 아, 어떤 복숭아였는지.

meaning_2.description: An attractive or excellent person or thing.

translations.de: Sie war nur die Tochter eines Obsthändlers, aber, oh, was für eine Schönheit.
translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'un vendeur de fruits, mais, oh, quel canon.
translations.ko: 그녀는 과일 판매상의 딸이었을 뿐이지만, 참, 얼마나 매력적인 사람이었는지.

601.pun_sentence: A boating accident between the yacht, Red Dawn, and the schooner, Blue Lagoon, left the survivors marooned.

meaning_1.description: being left in isolation in an inescapable place, for instance, a deserted island.

translations.de: Ein Bootsunfall zwischen der Yacht, Roter Morgen, und der Schoner, Blaue Lagune, ließ die Überlebenden gestrandet.
translations.fr: Un accident de bateau entre le yacht, l'Aube Rouge, et la goélette, la Lagune Bleue, a laissé les survivants échoués.
translations.ko: 요트 '레드 던'과 스쿠너 '블루 라군' 사이의 보트 사고로 생존자들이 고립되었습니다.

meaning_2.description: the color maroon – a dark reddish-brown.

translations.de: Ein Bootsunfall zwischen der Yacht, Roter Morgen, und der Schoner, Blaue Lagune, ließ die Überlebenden in Magenta.
translations.fr: Un accident de bateau entre le yacht, l'Aube Rouge, et la goélette, la Lagune Bleue, a laissé les survivants bordeaux.
translations.ko: 요트 '레드 던'과 스쿠너 '블루 라군' 사이의 보트 사고로 생존자들이 마룬 색상이 되었습니다.

602.pun_sentence: The waiter was shocked when I asked for my salad to be served naked. I explained, no dressing please.

meaning_1.description: A sauce or garnish that goes on top of a salad.

translations.de: Der Kellner war geschockt, als ich ihn bat, meinen Salat nackt zu servieren. Ich erklärte, bitte keine Soße.
translations.fr: Le serveur a été choqué quand j'ai demandé que ma salade soit servie nue. J'ai expliqué, pas de vinaigrette s'il vous plaît.
translations.ko: 나가 나의 샐러드를 알몸으로 제공해 달라고 요청했을 때, 웨이터는 놀랐어요. 난 설명했어요, 드레싱은 제발 없게 해주세요.

meaning_2.description: Clothes one is wearing.

translations.de: Der Kellner war geschockt, als ich ihn bat, meinen Salat nackt zu servieren. Ich erklärte, bitte keine Bekleidung.
translations.fr: Le serveur a été choqué quand j'ai demandé que ma salade soit servie nue. J'ai expliqué, je ne veux pas d'habillement s'il vous plaît.
translations.ko: 나가 나의 샐러드를 알몸으로 제공해 달라고 요청했을 때, 웨이터는 놀랐어요. 난 설명했어요, 옷은 제발 없게 해주세요.

603.pun_sentence: I suspected our new house guest was a terrorist. He asked to sleep on a blow up mattress.

meaning_1.description: to inflate something, such as a mattress, typically with air.

translations.de: Ich vermutete, dass unser neuer Hausgast ein Terrorist ist. Er bat um eine aufblasbare Matratze.
translations.fr: Je soupçonnais que notre nouvel invité était un terroriste. Il a demandé à dormir sur un matelas gonflable.
translations.ko: 나는 우리 새 집 게스트가 테러리스트라고 의심했어. 그는 풍선 매트리스에서 자고 싶어했어.

meaning_2.description: to set off a bomb or explosive.

translations.de: Ich vermutete, dass unser neuer Hausgast ein Terrorist ist. Er bat darum, eine Matratze in die Luft zu jagen.
translations.fr: Je soupçonnais que notre nouvel invité était un terroriste. Il a demandé à faire exploser un matelas.
translations.ko: 나는 우리 새 집 게스트가 테러리스트라고 의심했어. 그는 매트리스를 터트리고 싶어했어.

604.pun_sentence: Scientists have created a flea from scratch.

meaning_1.description: to create something from the beginning

translations.de: Wissenschaftler haben einen Floh von Grund auf neu erschaffen.
translations.fr: Les scientifiques ont créé une puce à partir de rien.
translations.ko: 과학자들은 완전 처음부터 벼룩을 만들었습니다.

meaning_2.description: the act of itching oneself

translations.de: Wissenschaftler haben einen Floh aus einem Kratzer gemacht.
translations.fr: Les scientifiques ont créé une puce à partir d'une gratte.
translations.ko: 과학자들은 긁는 행동에서 벼룩을 만들었습니다.

605.pun_sentence: Why was the car embarrassed?Because it had gas!

meaning_1.description: Fuel for a car, as in gasoline.

translations.de: Warum war das Auto verlegen? Weil es Benzin hatte!
translations.fr: Pourquoi la voiture était-elle gênée ? Parce qu'elle avait de l'essence !
translations.ko: 왜 그 차는 당황했을까? 왜냐하면 그것이 기름이 있었기 때문이야!

meaning_2.description: Flatulence, as in the release of intestinal gas.

translations.de: Warum war das Auto verlegen? Weil es einen Furz hatte!
translations.fr: Pourquoi la voiture était-elle gênée ? Parce qu'elle avait des gaz !
translations.ko: 왜 그 차는 당황했을까? 왜냐하면 그것이 방귀를 뀌었기 때문이야!

606.pun_sentence: When entering a funeral home, remember to stay alert and always look alive!

meaning_1.description: Living; not dead.

translations.de: Wenn Sie ein Beerdigungsinstitut betreten, bleiben Sie wachsam und wirken Sie immer lebendig!
translations.fr: En entrant dans une maison funéraire, souvenez-vous de rester alerte et de toujours paraître vivant !
translations.ko: 장례식장에 들어갈 때는 항상 경계를 갖추고, 마치 살아있는 것처럼 행동하세요!

meaning_2.description: Realistic, vivid, or lifelike.

translations.de: Wenn Sie ein Beerdigungsinstitut betreten, bleiben Sie wachsam und wirken Sie immer realistisch!
translations.fr: En entrant dans une maison funéraire, souvenez-vous de rester alerte et de toujours paraître réaliste !
translations.ko: 장례식장에 들어갈 때는 항상 경계를 갖추고, 마치 사실같이 생생한 것처럼 행동하세요!

607.pun_sentence: My boyfriend and I started to date after he backed his car into mine. We met by accident.

meaning_1.description: An unexpected event, typically resulting in damage or injury.

translations.de: Mein Freund und ich begannen uns zu verabreden, nachdem er sein Auto in meines gefahren hat. Wir trafen uns durch einen Unfall.
translations.fr: Mon petit ami et moi avons commencé à sortir ensemble après qu'il ait renversé sa voiture dans la mienne. Nous nous sommes rencontrés par accident.
translations.ko: 나의 남자친구와 나는 그가 차를 내 차에 들이받은 후에 연애를 시작했다. 우리는 사고로 만났어요.

meaning_2.description: A chance occurrence or event, unplanned or without obvious cause.

translations.de: Mein Freund und ich begannen uns zu verabreden, nachdem er sein Auto in meines gefahren hat. Wir trafen uns zufällig.
translations.fr: Mon petit ami et moi avons commencé à sortir ensemble après qu'il ait renversé sa voiture dans la mienne. Nous nous sommes rencontrés par hasard.
translations.ko: 나의 남자친구와 나는 그가 차를 내 차에 들이받은 후에 연애를 시작했다. 우리는 우연히 만났어요.

608.pun_sentence: OLD PILOTS never die they just go to a higher plane.

meaning_1.description: An aircraft that has wings and one or more engines.

translations.de: Alte Piloten sterben nie, sie gehen einfach zu einem höheren Flugzeug.
translations.fr: Les vieux pilotes ne meurent jamais, ils se rendent simplement à un avion plus haut.
translations.ko: 노련한 조종사들은 절대 죽지 않아, 그들은 그냥 더 높은 비행기로 가요.

meaning_2.description: A level or surface sharing characteristics with the space in which a flat two-dimensional object exists.

translations.de: Alte Piloten sterben nie, sie gehen einfach auf eine höhere Ebene.
translations.fr: Les vieux pilotes ne meurent jamais, ils passent simplement à un niveau supérieur.
translations.ko: 노련한 조종사들은 절대 죽지 않아, 그들은 그냥 더 높은 차원으로 가요.

609.pun_sentence: Dry cleaners are often pressed for time.

meaning_1.description: being in a hurry or under pressure.

translations.de: Chemische Reinigungen haben häufig Zeitdruck.
translations.fr: Les pressings sont souvent pressés par le temps.
translations.ko: 드라이 클리닝 업자들은 종종 시간에 쫓기곤 합니다.

meaning_2.description: the action of ironing clothes to remove wrinkles.

translations.de: Chemische Reinigungen sind oft mit Bügeln beschäftigt.
translations.fr: Les pressings sont souvent occupés à repasser.
translations.ko: 드라이 클리닝 업자들은 종종 옷을 다림질하는 데 바쁩니다.

610.pun_sentence: Cousteau was submerged in his work.

meaning_1.description: To be covered with water, to go under water.

translations.de: Cousteau war in seiner Arbeit untergetaucht.
translations.fr: Cousteau était submergé dans son travail.
translations.ko: 쿠스토는 그의 일에 잠겨 있었다.

meaning_2.description: To be deeply involved in a task or situation.

translations.de: Cousteau war in seiner Arbeit vertieft.
translations.fr: Cousteau était immergé dans son travail.
translations.ko: 쿠스토는 그의 일에 몰두하고 있었다.

611.pun_sentence: I went to the store to buy some soup but they were out of stock.

meaning_1.description: items or merchandise kept on the premises of a business or warehouse and available for sale or distribution.

translations.de: Ich bin in den Laden gefahren, um Suppe zu kaufen, aber sie waren ausverkauft.
translations.fr: Je suis allé au magasin pour acheter de la soupe mais ils étaient en rupture de stock.
translations.ko: 나는 스프를 사러 가게에 갔는데 품절이었습니다.

meaning_2.description: a type of soup made by simmering various ingredients in water.

translations.de: Ich ging in den Laden, um eine Brühe zu kaufen, aber sie hatten keine mehr.
translations.fr: Je suis allé au magasin pour acheter du bouillon mais ils n'en avaient plus.
translations.ko: 나는 육수를 사러 가게에 갔는데, 그들이 그것을 다 팔아버렸어요.

612.pun_sentence: Sports are refereed by people of many stripes.

meaning_1.description: streaks or bands of a different color or texture from the surface on which they appear.

translations.de: Die Sportarten werden von Menschen mit vielen Streifen gepfiffen.
translations.fr: Les sports sont arbitres par des personnes de nombreuses rayures.
translations.ko: 스포츠는 다양한 띠를 가진 사람들이 심판합니다.

meaning_2.description: Types or categories, referring to people's characteristics, experiences, or qualifications.

translations.de: Die Sportarten werden von Menschen verschiedener Art gepfiffen.
translations.fr: Les sports sont arbitres par des personnes de nombreux types.
translations.ko: 스포츠는 다양한 유형의 사람들이 심판합니다.

613.pun_sentence: Don’t let your footprints in the sands of time be the mark of a heel.

meaning_1.description: the back part of the foot below the ankle.

translations.de: Lass deine Fußabdrücke im Sand der Zeit nicht die Spur eines Absatzes sein.
translations.fr: Ne laissez pas que vos empreintes dans le sable du temps soient celle d'un talon.
translations.ko: 시간의 모래에 남는 당신의 발자국이 뒤꿈치의 흔적이 되지 않게 하세요.

meaning_2.description: a person who treats other people badly and unfairly

translations.de: Lass deine Fußabdrücke im Sand der Zeit nicht die Spur eines schlechten Menschen sein.
translations.fr: Ne laissez pas que vos empreintes dans le sable du temps soient celle d'un salaud.
translations.ko: 시간의 모래에 남는 당신의 발자국이 나쁜 사람의 흔적이 되지 않게 하세요.

614.pun_sentence: Five brothers wanted to buy a horse, so they all had to pony up.

meaning_1.description: A small breed of horse.

translations.de: Fünf Brüder wollten ein Pferd kaufen, also mussten sie alle ein Pony aufbringen.
translations.fr: Cinq frères voulaient acheter un cheval, donc ils ont tous dû fournir un poney.
translations.ko: 다섯 형제가 말을 사고 싶어했기 때문에, 그들 모두가 조랑말을 가져와야 했다.

meaning_2.description: paying or contributing money

translations.de: Fünf Brüder wollten ein Pferd kaufen, also mussten sie alle Geld aufbringen.
translations.fr: Cinq frères voulaient acheter un cheval, donc ils ont tous dû payer.
translations.ko: 다섯 형제가 말을 사고 싶어했기 때문에, 그들 모두가 돈을 내야 했다.

615.pun_sentence: If you get sick at the airport it could be a terminal illness.

meaning_1.description: a building where passengers arrive and depart, typically associated with air travel

translations.de: Wenn Sie am Flughafen krank werden, könnte es eine Terminalerkrankung sein.
translations.fr: Si vous tombez malade à l'aéroport, cela pourrait être une maladie terminale.
translations.ko: 공항에서 아프게 되면 그것은 터미널 병증일 수 있어요.

meaning_2.description: a severe or incurable medical condition that is expected to lead to the patient's death

translations.de: Wenn Sie am Flughafen krank werden, könnte es eine unheilbare Krankheit sein.
translations.fr: Si vous tombez malade à l'aéroport, cela pourrait être une maladie incurable.
translations.ko: 공항에서 아프게 되면 그것은 치료가 불가능한 병일 수 있어요.

616.pun_sentence: Before he was hired as a short order cook they grilled him.

meaning_1.description: the process of cooking food on a grill.

translations.de: Bevor er als Kurzzeitkoch eingestellt wurde, grillten sie ihn.
translations.fr: Avant qu'il ne soit embauché comme cuisinier à court ordre, ils l'ont grillé.
translations.ko: 그가 단기 요리사로 고용되기 전에 그들은 그를 구웠다.

meaning_2.description: intense questioning or cross-examination.

translations.de: Bevor er als Kurzzeitkoch eingestellt wurde, haben sie ihn intensiv befragt.
translations.fr: Avant qu'il ne soit embauché comme cuisinier à court ordre, ils l'ont soumis à un interrogatoire serré.
translations.ko: 그가 단기 요리사로 고용되기 전에 그들은 그를 집중적으로 심문했다.

617.pun_sentence: Pencil sharpeners have a tough life - they live off tips.

meaning_1.description: The end part of something, for example, the pointed end of a pencil.

translations.de: Bleistiftspitzer haben ein hartes Leben - sie leben von Spitzen.
translations.fr: Les taille-crayons ont une vie dure - ils vivent des pointes.
translations.ko: 연필깎이는 힘든 삶을 살아가요 - 그들은 굵은 부분에 의존해 살아가요.

meaning_2.description: a money given to someone as a reward for their services.

translations.de: Bleistiftspitzer haben ein hartes Leben - sie leben von Trinkgeldern.
translations.fr: Les taille-crayons ont une vie dure - ils vivent des pourboires.
translations.ko: 연필깎이는 힘든 삶을 살아가요 - 그들은 팁에 의존해 살아가요.

618.pun_sentence: When it was lumpy he had a beef with his gravy.

meaning_1.description: Meat from a cow.

translations.de: Als es klumpig war, hatte er Rindfleisch in seiner Soße.
translations.fr: Quand c'était grumeleux, il avait du boeuf dans sa sauce.
translations.ko: 그것이 고르지 않았을 때, 그는 그의 소스에 소고기가 있었다.

meaning_2.description: A complaint or a type of disagreement.

translations.de: Als es klumpig war, hatte er einen Streit mit seiner Soße.
translations.fr: Quand c'était grumeleux, il avait un grief avec sa sauce.
translations.ko: 그것이 고르지 않았을 때, 그는 그의 소스와 불만이 있었다.

619.pun_sentence: A pop singer bought a new house for a song.

meaning_1.description: A short musical composition with words.

translations.de: Ein Pop-Sänger hat ein neues Haus für ein Lied gekauft.
translations.fr: Une chanteuse de pop a acheté une nouvelle maison pour une chanson.
translations.ko: 팝 가수가 노래 하나로 새 집을 샀다.

meaning_2.description: very small amount of money

translations.de: Ein Pop-Sänger hat ein neues Haus für einen Spottpreis gekauft.
translations.fr: Une chanteuse de pop a acheté une nouvelle maison pour une bouchée de pain.
translations.ko: 팝 가수가 아주 싸게 새 집을 샀다.

620.pun_sentence: Two florists got married. It was an arranged marriage.

meaning_1.description: a union in which the partners are selected by their families or others, often without their direct involvement in the choice

translations.de: Zwei Floristen haben geheiratet. Es war eine arrangierte Ehe.
translations.fr: Deux fleuristes se sont mariés. C'était un mariage arrangé.
translations.ko: 두 명의 꽃장식사가 결혼했습니다. 그것은 정해진 결혼이었습니다.

meaning_2.description: being organized, planned, or set up in a deliberate manner

translations.de: Zwei Floristen haben geheiratet. Es war eine organisierte Ehe.
translations.fr: Deux fleuristes se sont mariés. C'était un mariage organisé.
translations.ko: 두 명의 꽃장식사가 결혼했습니다. 그것은 조직된 결혼이었습니다.

621.pun_sentence: The photograph that I took of the sandstorm turned out grainy.

meaning_1.description: Having a rough or sandy texture.

translations.de: Das Foto, das ich von dem Sandsturm gemacht habe, ist körnig herausgekommen.
translations.fr: La photo que j'ai prise de la tempête de sable est sortie granuleuse.
translations.ko: 나가 사진을 찍은 모래폭풍 사진은 조악해졌어.

meaning_2.description: a high level of film grain (noise) in a photographic image.

translations.de: Das Foto, das ich von dem Sandsturm gemacht habe, hat einen hohen Filmkorn (Rauschen).
translations.fr: La photo que j'ai prise de la tempête de sable présente un niveau élevé de grain photographique (bruit).
translations.ko: 내가 찍은 모래폭풍 사진은 필름 노이즈가 많아졌어.

622.pun_sentence: The owner of the hair salon had to make cuts on his staff.

meaning_1.description: The act of reducing, limiting, or removing something.

translations.de: Der Besitzer des Friseursalons musste Kürzungen an seinem Personal vornehmen.
translations.fr: Le propriétaire du salon de coiffure a dû faire des coupes dans son personnel.
translations.ko: 미용실 주인은 직원들을 줄여야 했어요.

meaning_2.description: The act of cutting hair.

translations.de: Der Besitzer des Friseursalons musste Schnitte an seinem Personal vornehmen.
translations.fr: Le propriétaire du salon de coiffure a dû faire des coupes de cheveux à son personnel.
translations.ko: 미용실 주인은 직원들의 머리카락을 자르는 일을 해야 했어요.

623.pun_sentence: Those working in tissue research and testing are always blowing it.

meaning_1.description: Expelling air forcefully from the mouth.

translations.de: Diejenigen, die in Gewebeforschung und -prüfung arbeiten, blasen es immer.
translations.fr: Ceux qui travaillent dans la recherche et les tests de tissus soufflent toujours dessus.
translations.ko: 조직 연구 및 검사를 하는 사람들은 항상 불어요.

meaning_2.description: Ruining or messing something up.

translations.de: Diejenigen, die in Gewebeforschung und -prüfung arbeiten, vermasseln es immer.
translations.fr: Ceux qui travaillent dans la recherche et les tests de tissus ratent toujours.
translations.ko: 조직 연구 및 검사를 하는 사람들은 항상 망쳐요.

624.pun_sentence: For the office drunk : He generally found him loaded with work to do.

meaning_1.description: To be burdened or overwhelmed with a lot of work.

translations.de: Für den Bürotrinker Er fand ihn allgemein überladen mit Arbeit.
translations.fr: Pour l'employé ivre  Il le trouvait généralement submergé de travail à faire.
translations.ko: 사무실 술꾼에게  그는 일반적으로 그에게 해야 할 업무로 과부하 상태로 발견했습니다.

meaning_2.description: To be intoxicated or drunk, usually from alcohol.

translations.de: Für den Bürotrinker Er fand ihn allgemein betrunken.
translations.fr: Pour l'employé ivre  Il le trouvait généralement chargé, c'est-à-dire ivre.
translations.ko: 사무실 술꾼에게  그는 일반적으로 그를 취한 상태로 발견했습니다.

625.pun_sentence: Labor Day is a good time to stop and reflect on the august events the the preceding month.

meaning_1.description: respected and impressive.

translations.de: Der Tag der Arbeit ist eine gute Zeit, um innezuhalten und über die ehrwürdigen Ereignisse des Vormonats nachzudenken.
translations.fr: La fête du Travail est un bon moment pour s'arrêter et réfléchir aux événements augustes du mois précédent.
translations.ko: 노동절은 지난달의 존경스러운 사건들에 대해 멈춰서고 생각해볼 좋은 시기입니다.

meaning_2.description: the eighth month of the year.

translations.de: Der Tag der Arbeit ist eine gute Zeit, um innezuhalten und über die Ereignisse im August des Vormonats nachzudenken.
translations.fr: La fête du Travail est un bon moment pour s'arrêter et réfléchir aux événements du mois d'août précédent.
translations.ko: 노동절은 지난달, 8월의 사건들에 대해 멈춰서고 생각해볼 좋은 시기입니다.

626.pun_sentence: "Waiter, there's a fly in my soup!" Force of habit, sir, the chef used to be a tailor.

meaning_1.description: An insect.

translations.de: "Kellner, in meiner Suppe ist eine Fliege!" "Außer Gewohnheit, Herr, der Koch war einmal ein Schneider."
translations.fr: "Garçon, il y a une mouche dans ma soupe !" "Par habitude, monsieur, le chef était jadis un tailleur."
translations.ko: "웨이터, 내 수프에 파리가 있어!" "습관의 힘입니다, 그래요, 요리사는 이전에 재단사였어요."

meaning_2.description: The fastening at the front of a pair of trousers.

translations.de: "Kellner, in meiner Suppe ist ein Fliegen!" "Außer Gewohnheit, Herr, der Koch war einmal ein Schneider."
translations.fr: "Garçon, il y a une braguette dans ma soupe !" "Par habitude, monsieur, le chef était jadis un tailleur."
translations.ko: "웨이터, 내 수프에 지퍼가 있어!" "습관의 힘입니다, 그래요, 요리사는 이전에 재단사였어요."

627.pun_sentence: You know what happens after you miss math class? It starts adding up.

meaning_1.description: Incorporating extra materials or details into something.

translations.de: Weißt du, was passiert, wenn du den Matheunterricht verpasst? Es fängt an, sich zu summieren.
translations.fr: Tu sais ce qui arrive lorsque tu rates un cours de maths? Ça commence à s'accumuler.
translations.ko: 수학 수업을 빼먹으면 어떻게 되는지 알아? 쌓이기 시작해요.

meaning_2.description: The mathematical operation of adding or summing up numbers.

translations.de: Weißt du, was passiert, wenn du den Matheunterricht verpasst? Es fängt an, aufzuaddieren.
translations.fr: Tu sais ce qui arrive lorsque tu rates un cours de maths? Ça commence à s'additionner.
translations.ko: 수학 수업을 빼먹으면 어떻게 되는지 알아? 더하기 시작해요.

628.pun_sentence: I hear the Sylvester Stallone Film Festival got off to a rocky start.

meaning_1.description: uneven or problematic.

translations.de: Ich höre, dass das Sylvester Stallone Filmfestival einen unebenen Start hatte.
translations.fr: J'ai entendu dire que le festival de films de Sylvester Stallone a commencé de manière problématique.
translations.ko: 나는 실베스터 스탤론 영화 축제가 문제가 많은 시작을 했다고 들었어.

meaning_2.description: Rocky in the movie 'Rocky'

translations.de: Ich höre, dass das Sylvester Stallone Filmfestival einen "Rocky" Start hatte.
translations.fr: J'ai entendu dire que le festival de films de Sylvester Stallone a commencé sur un début "Rocky".
translations.ko: 나는 실베스터 스탤론 영화 축제가 '록키' 얼릉 시작했다고 들었어.

629.pun_sentence: He collects mouthwash bottles, and they're all in mint condition.

meaning_1.description: A plant used as a flavoring, especially in sweets and medicines.

translations.de: Er sammelt Mundwasserflaschen und sie sind alle in Minzzustand.
translations.fr: Il collectionne les bouteilles de bain de bouche, et elles sont toutes en état de menthe.
translations.ko: 그는 가글용기를 수집하는데, 그것들은 모두 민트 상태에 있어.

meaning_2.description: In perfect condition;

translations.de: Er sammelt Mundwasserflaschen und sie sind alle in makellosem Zustand.
translations.fr: Il collectionne les bouteilles de bain de bouche, et elles sont toutes en parfait état.
translations.ko: 그는 가글용기를 수집하는데, 그것들은 모두 완벽한 상태에 있어.

630.pun_sentence: Two companies that manufactured rulers decided to align.

meaning_1.description: to form an alliance, partnership, or agreement, often to achieve common goals or interests.

translations.de: Zwei Unternehmen, die Lineale herstellten, beschlossen sich zu verbünden.
translations.fr: Deux entreprises qui fabriquaient des règles ont décidé de s'allier.
translations.ko: 자를 제조하는 두 회사가 동맹을 맺기로 결정했습니다.

meaning_2.description: To arrange or position things in a straight line or in a coordinated manner

translations.de: Zwei Unternehmen, die Lineale herstellten, beschlossen sich auszurichten.
translations.fr: Deux entreprises qui fabriquaient des règles ont décidé de s'aligner.
translations.ko: 자를 제조하는 두 회사가 일렬로 정렬하기로 결정했습니다.

631.pun_sentence: I tried to pack myself in a suitcase. I could hardly contain myself.

meaning_1.description: To hold or include within itself, have room for, accommodate.

translations.de: Ich habe versucht, mich in einen Koffer zu packen. Ich konnte mich kaum fassen.
translations.fr: J'ai essayé de me mettre dans une valise. Je pouvais à peine me contenir.
translations.ko: 나는 짐을 싼다고 했는데, 가방 안에 절 넣어봤어. 나를 가방 안에 담기가 거의 불가능했어.

meaning_2.description: To control or restrain oneself, prevent oneself from exhibiting strong emotion or behavior.

translations.de: Ich habe versucht, mich in einen Koffer zu packen. Ich konnte mich kaum beherrschen.
translations.fr: J'ai essayé de me mettre dans une valise. Je pouvais à peine me maîtriser.
translations.ko: 나는 짐을 싼다고 했는데, 가방 안에 절 넣어봤어. 나를 억제하는 것이 거의 불가능했어.

632.pun_sentence: My name is Leo. A lion trainer.

meaning_1.description: a common given name for individuals

translations.de: Mein Name ist Leo. Ein Menschen-Trainer.
translations.fr: Mon nom est Léo. Un dresseur d'hommes.
translations.ko: 제 이름은 레오입니다. 사람 훈련사예요.

meaning_2.description: Latin word for 'lion'

translations.de: Mein Name ist Leo. Ein Löwen-Trainer.
translations.fr: Mon nom est Léo. Un dresseur de lions.
translations.ko: 제 이름은 레오입니다. 사자 훈련사예요.

633.pun_sentence: The river crested when a factory spilled toothpaste into it.

meaning_1.description: the highest point or level reached by a body of water, such as a river, during flooding

translations.de: Der Fluss erreichte seinen Höchststand, als eine Fabrik Zahnpasta in ihn einleitete.
translations.fr: La rivière a atteint son niveau le plus haut lorsque une usine a déversé du dentifrice dedans.
translations.ko: 공장에서 치약을 물에 흘려보냈을 때, 그 강이 최고수위에 이르렀다.

meaning_2.description: apperance of toothpaste coming out of a tube

translations.de: Der Fluss bildete eine Krone, als eine Fabrik Zahnpasta in ihn einleitete.
translations.fr: La rivière s'est formée en crête lorsque une usine a déversé du dentifrice dedans.
translations.ko: 공장에서 치약을 물에 흘려보냈을 때, 그 강이 부풀어 올랐다.

634.pun_sentence: When video arcades switched to a system of tokens, there was no quarter asked or given.

meaning_1.description: One fourth of a dollar, the currency used in video arcades before switching to tokens

translations.de: Als Videospielhallen auf ein Token-System umstellten, wurde weder ein Vierteldollar gefragt noch gegeben.
translations.fr: Lorsque les salles d'arcade ont adopté un système de jetons, il n'y avait plus de quart de dollar demandé ou donné.
translations.ko: 비디오 아케이드가 토큰 체제로 전환했을 때, 25센트가 요구되거나 주어진 적이 없습니다.

meaning_2.description: mercy or leniency

translations.de: Als Videospielhallen auf ein Token-System umstellten, wurde weder Gnade noch Nachsicht gezeigt.
translations.fr: Lorsque les salles d'arcade ont adopté un système de jetons, il n'y avait plus de pitié demandée ou accordée.
translations.ko: 비디오 아케이드가 토큰 체제로 전환했을 때, 사방이나 자비가 요구되거나 주어진 적이 없습니다.

635.pun_sentence: The Alpine Skiing competition started poorly and went downhill from there.

meaning_1.description: A type of skiing that goes down the slope or hill.

translations.de: Der Alpinski-Wettbewerb begann schlecht und ging von dort aus bergab.
translations.fr: La compétition de ski alpin a mal commencé et a dévalé la pente à partir de là.
translations.ko: 알파인 스키 경기가 잘못 시작되어 경사로를 따라 내려갔다.

meaning_2.description: A situation going from bad to worse.

translations.de: Der Alpinski-Wettbewerb begann schlecht und es wurde von dort aus noch schlimmer.
translations.fr: La compétition de ski alpin a mal commencé et la situation s'est empirée à partir de là.
translations.ko: 알파인 스키 경기가 잘못 시작하고 거기서부터 상황이 나빠졌다.

636.pun_sentence: "I've run out of wool," said Tom, knitting his brow.

meaning_1.description: The action or method of interlocking loops of wool or other yarn with knitting needles or on a machine.

translations.de: "'Ich habe keine Wolle mehr', sagte Tom, während er seine Stirn strickte."
translations.fr: "'J'ai épuisé ma laine', a dit Tom, tricotant son front."
translations.ko: "'나는 양모가 다 떨어졌어', 톰이 말하면서 미간을 뜨개질했다."

meaning_2.description: The act of furrowing one's brows in a display of worry, confusion, or concentration.

translations.de: "'Ich habe keine Wolle mehr', sagte Tom, während er seine Stirn runzelte."
translations.fr: "'J'ai épuisé ma laine', a dit Tom, fronçant les sourcils."
translations.ko: "'나는 양모가 다 떨어졌어', 톰이 말하면서 이마를 찡그렸다."

637.pun_sentence: The prospector didn't think his career would pan out.

meaning_1.description: to turn out or develop in a certain way, often used to describe the success or outcome of a situation.

translations.de: Der Goldgräber dachte nicht, dass seine Karriere klappen würde.
translations.fr: Le chercheur d'or ne pensait pas que sa carrière allait aboutir.
translations.ko: 금광 채굴자는 그의 경력이 흥행할 것이라고 생각하지 않았어요.

meaning_2.description: To wash gravel, sand or crushed rock in a pan to separate the gold.

translations.de: Der Goldgräber dachte nicht, dass er in seiner Karriere Gold waschen würde.
translations.fr: Le chercheur d'or ne pensait pas qu'il passerait sa carrière à laver de l'or dans une poêle.
translations.ko: 금광 채굴자는 그의 경력을 돋보기로 살치기할 것이라고 생각하지 않았어요.

638.pun_sentence: The ice at the rink has many ruts. I think the maintenance crew is slipping up.

meaning_1.description: To involuntarily slide or lose one's footing or grip.

translations.de: Das Eis in der Halle hat viele Spurrillen. Ich denke, die Wartungscrew rutscht aus.
translations.fr: La glace sur la piste a beaucoup d'ornières. Je pense que l'équipe d'entretien glisse.
translations.ko: 빙상장의 얼음에는 많은 트랙이 있어요. 유지보수 팀이 미끈거리는 것 같아요.

meaning_2.description: Failing to maintain a good or standard level of performance, losing competence.

translations.de: Das Eis in der Halle hat viele Spurrillen. Ich denke, die Wartungscrew lässt nach.
translations.fr: La glace sur la piste a beaucoup d'ornières. Je pense que l'équipe d'entretien perd de sa compétence.
translations.ko: 빙상장의 얼음에는 많은 트랙이 있어요. 유지보수 팀이 능력을 잃어가는 것 같아요.

639.pun_sentence: There was a contest on a slippery rock slope. I won in a landslide.

meaning_1.description: overwhelming victory in a contest or election.

translations.de: Es gab einen Wettbewerb an einem rutschigen Felsenhang. Ich habe mit einem Erdrutschsieg gewonnen.
translations.fr: Il y avait un concours sur une pente rocheuse glissante. J'ai gagné par une victoire écrasante.
translations.ko: 미끄러운 바위 경사에서 경기가 있었습니다. 나는 압도적인 승리로 이겼어요.

meaning_2.description: geological phenomenon where soil, rocks, and debris slide down a slope.

translations.de: Es gab einen Wettbewerb an einem rutschigen Felsenhang. Ich habe wegen eines Erdrutsches gewonnen.
translations.fr: Il y avait un concours sur une pente rocheuse glissante. J'ai gagné à cause d'un glissement de terrain.
translations.ko: 미끄러운 바위 경사에서 경기가 있었습니다. 나는 산사태 때문에 이겼어요.

640.pun_sentence: When a priest makes a mistake in church it's a clerical error.

meaning_1.description: relating to the work done or people working in an office, especially routine documentation work.

translations.de: Wenn ein Priester einen Fehler im Büro macht, ist das ein Verwaltungsfehler.
translations.fr: Quand un prêtre fait une erreur de bureau, c'est une erreur cléricale.
translations.ko: 제사장이 사무실에서 실수를 한다면, 그것은 사무 실수입니다.

meaning_2.description: relating to clergy or priestly activities.

translations.de: Wenn ein Priester einen Fehler in der Kirche macht, ist das ein geistlicher Fehler.
translations.fr: Quand un prêtre fait une erreur à l'église, c'est une erreur ecclésiastique.
translations.ko: 제사장이 교회에서 실수를 한다면, 그것은 교회의 실수입니다.

641.pun_sentence: The first time I got hold of a hang glider I had to wing it.

meaning_1.description: part of the hang glider that provides lift for the aircraft

translations.de: Das erste Mal, als ich einen Hängegleiter in die Hand bekam, musste ich ihn benutzen.
translations.fr: La première fois que j'ai eu un deltaplane en main, j'ai dû l'aile.
translations.ko: 나는 처음으로 행글라이더를 들었을 때, 날개를 사용해야 했어요.

meaning_2.description: to improvise or do something without proper preparation or practice

translations.de: Das erste Mal, als ich einen Hängegleiter in die Hand bekam, musste ich improvisieren.
translations.fr: La première fois que j'ai eu un deltaplane en main, j'ai dû improviser.
translations.ko: 나는 처음으로 행글라이더를 들었을 때, 즉흥적으로 행동해야 했어요.

642.pun_sentence: The coffee tasted like mud because it was ground a couple of minutes ago.

meaning_1.description: Substance reduced to fine particles by crushing or grinding.

translations.de: Der Kaffee schmeckte wie Schlamm, weil er vor ein paar Minuten gemahlen wurde.
translations.fr: Le café avait le goût de boue parce qu'il avait été moulu quelques minutes auparavant.
translations.ko: 커피는 몇 분 전에 갈린 거라서 흙맛이 나요.

meaning_2.description: The surface of the earth or soil

translations.de: Der Kaffee schmeckte wie Erde, weil er vor ein paar Minuten gemahlen wurde.
translations.fr: Le café avait le goût de terre parce qu'il avait été moulu quelques minutes auparavant.
translations.ko: 커피는 몇 분 전에 갈린 거라서 마치 땅맛이 나요.

643.pun_sentence: Show me a baker who is on a roll and I'll show you someone sitting on a bun.

meaning_1.description: small piece of bread

translations.de: Zeige mir einen Bäcker, der auf einem Brötchen ist und ich zeige dir jemanden, der auf einem Brötchen sitzt.
translations.fr: Montrez-moi un boulanger qui est sur un petit pain et je vous montrerai quelqu'un assis sur un petit pain.
translations.ko: 롤인 제빵사를 보여줘요, 그럼 나는 빵 위에 앉아 있는 사람을 보여줄게요.

meaning_2.description: experiencing a particularly successful period or streak

translations.de: Zeige mir einen Bäcker, der im Erfolg rollt und ich zeige dir jemanden, der oben sitzt.
translations.fr: Montrez-moi un boulanger qui est sur une lancée et je vous montrerai quelqu'un qui est en tête.
translations.ko: 성공적인 기간을 보내고 있는 제빵사를 보여줘요, 그럼 나는 이길수 있는 사람을 보여줄게요.

644.pun_sentence: Success comes in cans, failure comes in cant’s.

meaning_1.description: Containers for storing food or beverages.

translations.de: Der Erfolg kommt in Dosen, das Scheitern kommt in Kannst-Nichts.
translations.fr: Le succès arrive dans des boîtes de conserve, l'échec arrive dans des 'je-ne-peux-pas'.
translations.ko: 성공은 통조림 속에 있다 실패는 '할 수 없다'에 있다.

meaning_2.description: the ability or possibility to do something

translations.de: Der Erfolg kommt in Möglichkeiten, das Scheitern kommt in Unmöglichkeiten.
translations.fr: Le succès est dans le "on peut", l'échec est dans le "je ne peux pas".
translations.ko: 성공은 할 수 있는 능력에 달려있고, 실패는 '할 수 없다'의 없음에 달려있다.

645.pun_sentence: I know road rage is an awful thing but when someone bumped my car I just couldn't help it. I got out my camera and snapped at the offender.

meaning_1.description: Quickly taking a photograph.

translations.de: Ich weiß, dass Straßenwut eine schreckliche Sache ist, aber als jemand mein Auto angefahren hat, konnte ich nichts dagegen machen. Ich holte meine Kamera heraus und machte schnell ein Foto von dem Täter.
translations.fr: Je sais que la rage au volant est une chose affreuse mais quand quelqu'un a heurté ma voiture je n'ai simplement pas pu m'en empêcher. J'ai sorti mon appareil photo et j'ai pris rapidement une photo de l'offenseur.
translations.ko: 나는 도로 분노가 끔찍한 일이라는 걸 알지만, 누군가가 내 차를 들이받았을 때 나는 도저히 참을 수가 없었어. 나는 카메라를 꺼내서 가해자를 바로 찍었어.

meaning_2.description: Quickly or suddenly become angry or aggressive.

translations.de: Ich weiß, dass Straßenwut eine schreckliche Sache ist, aber als jemand mein Auto angefahren hat, konnte ich nichts dagegen machen. Ich stieg aus, holte meine Kamera heraus und schimpfte wütend auf den Täter.
translations.fr: Je sais que la rage au volant est une chose affreuse mais quand quelqu'un a heurté ma voiture je n'ai simplement pas pu m'en empêcher. J'ai sorti mon appareil photo et je me suis énervé contre l'offenseur.
translations.ko: 나는 도로 분노가 끔찍한 일이라는 걸 알지만, 누군가가 내 차를 들이받았을 때 나는 도저히 참을 수가 없었어. 나는 카메라를 꺼내고 가해자에게 화를 내버렸어.

646.pun_sentence: I tried hard to get into vexillology, but, in the end, had to flag it away.

meaning_1.description: a piece of cloth with a special design that is used as an emblem, or symbol.

translations.de: Ich habe hart versucht, in die Vexillologie einzusteigen, aber am Ende musste ich es wegfahnen.
translations.fr: J'ai essayé de me plonger dans la vexillologie, mais à la fin, j’ai dû la mettre au drapeau.
translations.ko: 나는 기복학에 입문하기 위해 열심히 시도했는데, 결국 그것을 휘날려 버려야 했어요.

meaning_2.description: To become tired, weaker, or less enthusiastic.

translations.de: Ich habe hart versucht, in die Vexillologie einzusteigen, aber am Ende musste ich wegen Erschöpfung aufhören.
translations.fr: J'ai essayé de me plonger dans la vexillologie, mais à la fin, j'ai dû abandonner par fatigue.
translations.ko: 나는 기복학에 입문하기 위해 열심히 시도했는데, 결국 피곤해서 그만둬야 했어요.

647.pun_sentence: I've spotted more blackbirds than you have, Tom crowed.

meaning_1.description: to speak or express oneself in a self-satisfied or triumphant manner.

translations.de: "Ich habe mehr Amseln gesehen als du, triumphierte Tom."
translations.fr: "J'ai aperçu plus de merles que toi, Tom a fanfaronné."
translations.ko: "나는 너보다 더 많은 검은 새들을 발견했다, 톰이 거만하게 말했다."

meaning_2.description: the call of a crow or rooster.

translations.de: "Ich habe mehr Amseln gesehen als du, krähte Tom."
translations.fr: "J'ai aperçu plus de merles que toi, Tom a croassé."
translations.ko: "나는 너보다 더 많은 검은 새들을 발견했다, 톰이 우는 소리를 냈다."

648.pun_sentence: Old lumberjacks never die, they just pine away.

meaning_1.description: A type of tree that is common in the forest.

translations.de: Alte Holzfäller sterben nie, sie werden nur zu Kiefern.
translations.fr: Les vieux bûcherons ne meurent jamais, ils deviennent simplement des pins.
translations.ko: 노인 나무꾼들은 결코 죽지 않아요, 그들은 그냥 소나무가 될 뿐이에요.

meaning_2.description: To suffer a mental and physical decline, especially because of a broken heart.

translations.de: Alte Holzfäller sterben nie, sie verschmachten nur.
translations.fr: Les vieux bûcherons ne meurent jamais, ils dépérissent simplement.
translations.ko: 노인 나무꾼들은 결코 죽지 않아요, 그들은 그냥 슬퍼서 쇠약해지는 거에요.

649.pun_sentence: When you give to god, you always get back change.

meaning_1.description: Make or become different.

translations.de: Wenn du Gott gibst, bekommst du immer eine Veränderung zurück.
translations.fr: Quand vous donnez à Dieu, vous recevez toujours du changement en retour.
translations.ko: 당신이 신에게 줄 때, 항상 변화를 받게 됩니다.

meaning_2.description: Coins as change or small amount of money given back when the amount tendered is more than the amount due.

translations.de: Wenn du Gott gibst, bekommst du immer Wechselgeld zurück.
translations.fr: Quand vous donnez à Dieu, vous recevez toujours de la monnaie en retour.
translations.ko: 당신이 신에게 줄 때, 항상 거스름돈을 받게 됩니다.

650.pun_sentence: I was going to buy some loose tea, but the price was too steep.

meaning_1.description: Extreme or drastic, often used to describe a rapid increase or high degree of something, like a price.

translations.de: Ich wollte losen Tee kaufen, aber der Preis war zu steil.
translations.fr: J'allais acheter du thé en vrac, mais le prix était trop élevé.
translations.ko: 나는 느슨한 차를 사려고 했는데 가격이 너무 비쌌습니다.

meaning_2.description: Soaking something in liquid to extract its flavor or to soften it.

translations.de: Ich wollte losen Tee kaufen, aber die Preis war zu steil zum Ziehenlassen.
translations.fr: J'allais acheter du thé en vrac, mais le prix était trop fort pour le faire infuser.
translations.ko: 나는 느슨한 차를 사려고 했는데 가격이 너무 비싸서 차를 우릴 수 없었습니다.

651.pun_sentence: The sergeant drank whiskey in order to be fortified in his position.

meaning_1.description: Strengthened or secured, especially against attack.

translations.de: Der Sergeant trank Whiskey, um seine Position zu stärken.
translations.fr: Le sergent a bu du whisky afin de se fortifier dans sa position.
translations.ko: 그 중사는 자신의 위치를 강화하기 위해 위스키를 마셨다.

meaning_2.description: alcohol to be intensified with the addition of more spirits.
