translations.de: Der Sergeant trank Whiskey, um ihn mit dem Zusatz von mehr Spirituosen zu verstärken.
translations.fr: Le sergent a bu du whisky afin d'intensifier l'alcool par l'ajout de plus d'esprits.
translations.ko: 그 중사는 주류의 향을 강화하기 위해 위스키를 마셨다.

652.pun_sentence: When the woman got paid for being in a study at the sleep clinic, she said it was her dream job.

meaning_1.description: A thought or series of thoughts that happens during sleep.

translations.de: Als die Frau dafür bezahlt wurde, an einer Studie in der Schlafklinik teilzunehmen, sagte sie, das sei ihr Traumjob.
translations.fr: Lorsque la femme a été payée pour participer à une étude dans une clinique du sommeil, elle a dit que c'était son travail de rêve.
translations.ko: 그 여자가 수면 클리닉에서의 연구에 참여하여 급여를 받았을 때, 그녀가 이것이 그녀의 꿈의 직업이라고 말했습니다.

meaning_2.description: An aspiration; something greatly desired.

translations.de: Als die Frau dafür bezahlt wurde, an einer Studie in der Schlafklinik teilzunehmen, sagte sie, das sei der Job, von dem sie immer geträumt hat.
translations.fr: Lorsque la femme a été payée pour participer à une étude dans une clinique du sommeil, elle a dit que c'était le travail dont elle avait toujours rêvé.
translations.ko: 그 여자가 수면 클리닉에서의 연구에 참여하여 급여를 받았을 때, 그녀가 이것이 그녀가 항상 원했던 직업이라고 말했습니다.

653.pun_sentence: A carpenter sat on his drill and was bored to tears.

meaning_1.description: lack of interest or a state of being weary due to lack of stimulation.

translations.de: Ein Zimmermann saß auf seinem Bohrer und war vor Langeweile zu Tränen gelangweilt.
translations.fr: Un charpentier s'asseyait sur sa perceuse et était ennuyé aux larmes.
translations.ko: 목수가 드릴에 앉았는데, 지루함으로 눈물이 나왔어요.

meaning_2.description: Drill a hole.

translations.de: Ein Zimmermann saß auf seinem Bohrer und wurde buchstäblich zu Tränen gebohrt.
translations.fr: Un charpentier s'asseyait sur sa perceuse et était percé aux larmes.
translations.ko: 목수가 드릴에 앉았는데, 말 그대로 눈물이 나왔어요.

654.pun_sentence: She's a composer who has scores of works to her credit.

meaning_1.description: a large number or quantity of something.

translations.de: Sie ist eine Komponistin, die Unmengen an Werken zu ihrer Ehre hat.
translations.fr: Elle est une compositrice qui a une multitude d'œuvres à son actif.
translations.ko: 그녀는 수많은 작품을 자신의 공로로 가진 작곡가입니다.

meaning_2.description: a written form of a musical composition.

translations.de: Sie ist eine Komponistin, die viele Partituren als ihre Werke hat.
translations.fr: Elle est une compositrice qui a de nombreuses partitions comme ses œuvres.
translations.ko: 그녀는 여러 음악 점수를 자신의 작품으로 가진 작곡가입니다.

655.pun_sentence: When he fell in the wet concrete he left a bad impression.

meaning_1.description: a mark or indentation left by pressure.

translations.de: Als er in den nassen Beton fiel, hinterließ er einen schlechten Abdruck.
translations.fr: Quand il est tombé dans le béton humide, il a laissé une mauvaise empreinte.
translations.ko: 그가 젖은 콘크리트에 넘어질 때, 나쁜 흔적을 남겼어요.

meaning_2.description: an idea or opinion of what something or someone is like.

translations.de: Als er in den nassen Beton fiel, machte er einen schlechten Eindruck.
translations.fr: Quand il est tombé dans le béton humide, il a donné une mauvaise impression.
translations.ko: 그가 젖은 콘크리트에 넘어질 때, 나쁜 인상을 남겼어요.

656.pun_sentence: A goat that ate office supplies was on a staple diet.

meaning_1.description: A small bent piece of metal, driven through sheets of paper to fasten them together.

translations.de: Eine Ziege, die Büromaterialien gefressen hat, war auf einer Klammern-Ernährung.
translations.fr: Une chèvre qui a mangé des fournitures de bureau était sous un régime d'agrafes.
translations.ko: 사무용품을 먹은 염소는 스테이플 다이어트였다.

meaning_2.description: A main or important element of something, especially of a diet.

translations.de: Eine Ziege, die Büromaterialien gefressen hat, hatte eine grundlegende Diät.
translations.fr: Une chèvre qui a mangé des fournitures de bureau avait un régime alimentaire essentiel.
translations.ko: 사무용품을 먹은 염소는 주요 식품으로 구성된 식단을 가지고 있었다.

657.pun_sentence: When the wino suspected his muscatel was watered down, he needed more proof.

meaning_1.description: Evidence or argument establishing a fact or the truth of a statement.

translations.de: Als der Säufer vermutete, sein Muskateller wurde verwässert, brauchte er mehr Beweise.
translations.fr: Quand le poivrot a soupçonné que son muscatel était dilué, il avait besoin de plus de preuves.
translations.ko: 술꾼이 그의 머스카텔 와인이 희석되었다고 의심할 때, 그는 더 많은 증거가 필요했다.

meaning_2.description: measure of the amount of alcohol in a beverage

translations.de: Als der Säufer vermutete, sein Muskateller wurde verwässert, brauchte er mehr Alkoholgehalt.
translations.fr: Quand le poivrot a soupçonné que son muscatel était dilué, il avait besoin de plus de degrés d'alcool.
translations.ko: 술꾼이 그의 머스카텔 와인이 희석되었다고 의심할 때, 그는 더 많은 도수가 필요했다.

658.pun_sentence: The bargain store promised a free abacus with every purchase, but I wouldn't count on it.

meaning_1.description: to rely on

translations.de: Der Schnäppchenladen versprach einen kostenlosen Abakus mit jedem Kauf, aber ich würde mich nicht darauf verlassen.
translations.fr: Le magasin à prix réduit promettait un abacus gratuit avec chaque achat, mais je ne m'y ferais pas confiance.
translations.ko: 구입할때마다 공짜로 주판을 제공하는 가게인데, 저는 그것에 기댈 수는 없을 것 같아.

meaning_2.description: calculate or add up

translations.de: Der Schnäppchenladen versprach einen kostenlosen Abakus mit jedem Kauf, aber ich würde nicht darauf zählen.
translations.fr: Le magasin à prix réduit promettait un abacus gratuit avec chaque achat, mais je ne compterais pas dessus.
translations.ko: 구입할때마다 공짜로 주판을 제공하는 가게인데, 저는 그것을 세는 것은 없을 것 같아.

659.pun_sentence: The orange squeezer was invented with some juicy information.

meaning_1.description: full of juice.

translations.de: Der Orangensaftpresse wurde mit einigen saftigen Informationen erfunden.
translations.fr: L'extracteur d'orange a été conçu avec des informations juteuses.
translations.ko: 오렌지 짜는 장치는 즙이 많은 정보를 가지고 발명되었습니다.

meaning_2.description: exciting or scandalous (usually referring to news or gossip)

translations.de: Der Orangensaftpresse wurde mit einigen brisanten Informationen erfunden.
translations.fr: L'extracteur d'orange a été conçu avec des informations croustillantes.
translations.ko: 오렌지 짜는 장치는 흥미롭거나 충격적인 정보를 가지고 발명되었습니다.

660.pun_sentence: Why did the agricultural presentation go so smoothly? They planted questions.

meaning_1.description: To place or fix in a specified place.

translations.de: Warum lief die landwirtschaftliche Präsentation so reibungslos? Sie pflanzten Fragen.
translations.fr: Pourquoi la présentation agricole s'est-elle déroulée si facilement ? Ils ont planté des questions.
translations.ko: 왜 농업 프레젠테이션이 원활하게 진행됐을까요? 그들은 질문을 '심었'어요.

meaning_2.description: to introduce or place something in a subtle or strategic manner to achieve a certain outcome, often used in discussions or meetings.

translations.de: Warum lief die landwirtschaftliche Präsentation so reibungslos? Sie platzierten geschickt Fragen.
translations.fr: Pourquoi la présentation agricole s'est-elle déroulée si facilement ? Ils ont introduit des questions de manière stratégique.
translations.ko: 왜 농업 프레젠테이션이 원활하게 진행됐을까요? 그들은 질문을 '은근히 논의에 끼워넣었'어요.

661.pun_sentence: When buying a battery you should never have to charge it.

meaning_1.description: The act of asking for payment for goods or services.

translations.de: Beim Kauf einer Batterie sollten Sie niemals dafür bezahlen müssen.
translations.fr: Lorsque vous achetez une batterie, vous ne devriez jamais avoir à la payer.
translations.ko: 배터리를 사면 절대로 비용을 청구하면 안 돼요.

meaning_2.description: The act of adding electrical energy to a battery.

translations.de: Beim Kauf einer Batterie sollten Sie niemals diese aufladen müssen.
translations.fr: Lorsque vous achetez une batterie, vous ne devriez jamais avoir à la charger.
translations.ko: 배터리를 사면 절대로 충전할 필요가 없어요.

662.pun_sentence: In the office she was frantically looking for her false nails only to discover she had filed them away.

meaning_1.description: The action or process of smoothing or shaping something with a file.

translations.de: Im Büro suchte sie verzweifelt nach ihren künstlichen Nägeln, nur um zu entdecken, dass sie sie weggefeilt hatte.
translations.fr: Au bureau, elle cherchait frénétiquement ses faux ongles, seulement pour découvrir qu'elle les avait limés.
translations.ko: 그녀는 사무실에서 절망적으로 인조 손톱을 찾았지만, 결국 그것들을 팠다는 걸 발견했다.

meaning_2.description: Putting away systematically in a particular place for preservation.

translations.de: Im Büro suchte sie verzweifelt nach ihren künstlichen Nägeln, nur um zu entdecken, dass sie sie weggelegt hatte.
translations.fr: Au bureau, elle cherchait frénétiquement ses faux ongles, seulement pour découvrir qu'elle les avait classés.
translations.ko: 그녀는 사무실에서 절망적으로 인조 손톱을 찾았지만, 결국 그것들을 정리해 뒀다는 걸 발견했다.

663.pun_sentence: OLD TEACHERS never die they just lose their class.

meaning_1.description: A group of students who are taught together.

translations.de: ALTE LEHRER sterben nie, sie verlieren nur ihre Klasse.
translations.fr: LES VIEUX PROFESSEURS ne meurent jamais, ils perdent seulement leur classe.
translations.ko: 노련한 선생님들은 결코 죽지 않아요, 그들은 단지 학생들을 잃을 뿐이에요.

meaning_2.description: Elegance, style, or quality.

translations.de: ALTE LEHRER sterben nie, sie verlieren nur ihren Stil.
translations.fr: LES VIEUX PROFESSEURS ne meurent jamais, ils perdent simplement leur élégance.
translations.ko: 노련한 선생님들은 결코 죽지 않아요, 그들은 단지 그들의 품격을 잃는 거죠.

664.pun_sentence: Sign in an electrician's shop : 'We will refuse you.'

meaning_1.description: to decline to accept.

translations.de: Schild in einem Elektrikerladen "Wir werden Sie ablehnen."
translations.fr: Panneau dans une boutique d'électricien  "Nous vous refuserons."
translations.ko: 전기공의 가게에 있는 표시  "우리는 당신을 거부할 것이다."

meaning_2.description: waste or garbage.

translations.de: Schild in einem Elektrikerladen "Wir werden Ihren Abfall sein."
translations.fr: Panneau dans une boutique d'électricien  "Nous serons vos déchets."
translations.ko: 전기공의 가게에 있는 표시  "우리는 당신의 쓰레기가 될 것이다."

665.pun_sentence: A wig van blew up on the motorway - police are combing the area.

meaning_1.description: to tidy your hair

translations.de: Ein Perückenvan explodierte auf der Autobahn - die Polizei kämmt die Gegend (idiomatisch für die Polizei bringt ihre Haare in Ordnung).
translations.fr: Un fourgon de perruques a explosé sur l'autoroute - la police peigne la zone (au sens littéral la police se peigne les cheveux).
translations.ko: 가발 밴이 고속도로에서 터졌다 - 경찰이 지역을 빗고 있다 (말 그대로 경찰이 머리를 빗고 있다)

meaning_2.description: Searching carefully and thoroughly.

translations.de: Ein Perückenvan explodierte auf der Autobahn - die Polizei durchkämmt die Gegend.
translations.fr: Un fourgon de perruques a explosé sur l'autoroute - la police fouille minutieusement la zone.
translations.ko: 가발 밴이 고속도로에서 터졌다 - 경찰이 지역을 철저히 수색하고 있다.

666.pun_sentence: He had a difficult time bouncing back from his bungee cord accident.

meaning_1.description: Recover or rejuvenate quickly from a setback or adversity.

translations.de: Er hatte Schwierigkeiten, sich schnell von seinem Bungee-Sprung-Unfall zu erholen.
translations.fr: Il a eu du mal à se remettre rapidement de son accident de saut à l'élastique.
translations.ko: 그는 번지점프 사고 이후 빠르게 회복하는데 어려움을 겪었습니다.

meaning_2.description: Physically rebounding off or jumping up and down, as one would do during a bungee jump.

translations.de: Er hatte Schwierigkeiten, nach seinem Bungee-Sprung-Unfall wieder aufzuprallen.
translations.fr: Il a eu du mal à rebondir après son accident de saut à l'élastique.
translations.ko: 그는 번지점프 사고 이후 다시 튕겨져 나오는데 어려움을 겪었습니다.

667.pun_sentence: A tattle tale pig is a squealer.

meaning_1.description: A person who tells on someone or reveals secrets.

translations.de: Ein petzender Schweine ist ein Verräter.
translations.fr: Un cochon rapporteur est un délateur.
translations.ko: 이야기를 전하는 돼지는 고자질하는 사람이지요.

meaning_2.description: The sound that a pig makes.

translations.de: Ein petzender Schweine ist ein Quieker.
translations.fr: Un cochon rapporteur est un grogneur.
translations.ko: 이야기를 전하는 돼지는 꿀꿀거리는 소리를 내는 돼지랍니다.

meaning_1.description: Series or sequence of events that repeat themselves regularly and in the same order.

translations.de: Der Verkauf von Fahrrädern läuft in Zyklen.
translations.fr: Les ventes de vélos se font en cycles.
translations.ko: 자전거 판매는 주기적으로 이루어집니다.

meaning_2.description: Bicycles, a two-wheeled vehicle that is pedalled.

translations.de: Der Verkauf von Fahrrädern betrifft Fahrräder.
translations.fr: Les ventes de vélos concernent les vélos.
translations.ko: 자전거 판매는 자전거를 의미합니다.

669.pun_sentence: When cave men got together they formed clubs.

meaning_1.description: A heavy stick intended for use as a weapon.

translations.de: Wenn Höhlenmenschen zusammenkamen, formten sie Knüppel.
translations.fr: Quand les hommes des cavernes se réunissaient, ils formaient des clubs (masses).
translations.ko: 선사시대 사람들이 모일 때, 그들은 모둠을 만들었다. (무기로 사용하는 무거운 막대기의 의미)

meaning_2.description: An association or organization for social or recreational purposes.

translations.de: Wenn Höhlenmenschen zusammenkamen, gründeten sie Klubs.
translations.fr: Quand les hommes des cavernes se réunissaient, ils formaient des clubs (associations).
translations.ko: 선사시대 사람들이 모일 때, 그들은 클럽을 만들었다. (사회적, 레크리에이션 목적의 단체나 조직의 의미)

670.pun_sentence: My friend was fired from his job at the road department for stealing. I have to say I saw it coming. The last time I was at his house all the signs were there.

meaning_1.description: Indications or proofs.

translations.de: Mein Freund wurde von seiner Arbeit in der Straßenabteilung entlassen, weil er gestohlen hatte. Ich muss sagen, ich habe es kommen sehen. Das letzte Mal, als ich bei ihm zu Hause war, waren alle Beweise da.
translations.fr: Mon ami a été viré de son travail au département des routes pour vol. Je dois dire que je l'ai vu venir. La dernière fois que j'étais chez lui, tous les signes étaient là.
translations.ko: 내 친구는 도로 부서에서 도둑질로 해고되었어. 나는 그것을 미리 알 수 있었어. 마지막으로 그의 집에 갔을 때 모든 흔적들이 있었어.

meaning_2.description: Physical signage that is used to direct or inform, especially in connection with a road department.

translations.de: Mein Freund wurde von seiner Arbeit in der Straßenabteilung entlassen, weil er gestohlen hatte. Ich muss sagen, ich habe es kommen sehen. Das letzte Mal, als ich bei ihm zu Hause war, waren alle Straßenschilder da.
translations.fr: Mon ami a été viré de son travail au département des routes pour vol. Je dois dire que je l'ai vu venir. La dernière fois que j'étais chez lui, tous les panneaux de signalisation étaient là.
translations.ko: 내 친구는 도로 부서에서 도둑질로 해고되었어. 나는 그것을 미리 알 수 있었어. 마지막으로 그의 집에 갔을 때 모든 교통 표지판들이 있었어.

671.pun_sentence: Doctor, doctor, I keep thinking I'm a spoon. - Sit there and don't stir. Next.

meaning_1.description: to be active after a rest; be up and about

translations.de: Doktor, Doktor, ich denke ständig, ich wäre ein Löffel. - Sitzen Sie da und rühren Sie sich nicht. Nächster.
translations.fr: Docteur, docteur, je n'arrête pas de penser que je suis une cuillère. - Asseyez-vous là et ne bougez pas. Suivant.
translations.ko: 의사님, 의사님, 저 계속 제가 숟가락인 것 같아요. - 거기 앉아서 움직이지 마. 다음.

meaning_2.description: To mix an ingredient into a liquid or other substance by moving an implement such as a spoon around.

translations.de: Doktor, Doktor, ich denke ständig, ich wäre ein Löffel. - Sitzen Sie da und rühren Sie nichts um. Nächster.
translations.fr: Docteur, docteur, je n'arrête pas de penser que je suis une cuillère. - Asseyez-vous là et ne remuez rien. Suivant.
translations.ko: 의사님, 의사님, 저 계속 제가 숟가락인 것 같아요. - 거기 앉아서 무언가를 젓지 마. 다음.

672.pun_sentence: Golfers hate cake because they might get a slice.

meaning_1.description: a piece of cake that has been cut off

translations.de: Golfer hassen Kuchen, weil sie ein Stück bekommen könnten.
translations.fr: Les golfeurs détestent le gâteau parce qu'ils pourraient en avoir une tranche.
translations.ko: 골퍼들은 자신들이 슬라이스를 얻을 수도 있어서 케이크를 싫어해요.

meaning_2.description: a type of mis-hit where the ball curves off to the right (for a right-handed player) in golf

translations.de: Golfer hassen Kuchen, weil sie einen Slice bekommen könnten.
translations.fr: Les golfeurs détestent le gâteau parce qu'ils pourraient faire une tranche.
translations.ko: 골퍼들은 자신들이 슬라이스 샷을 칠 수도 있어서 케이크를 싫어해요.

673.pun_sentence: My name is Ray. I'm a roentgenologist.

meaning_1.description: a person's given name.

translations.de: Mein Name ist Ray. Ich bin ein Röntgenologe.
translations.fr: Mon nom est Ray. Je suis un roentgenologiste.
translations.ko: 제 이름은 레이입니다. 저는 방사선 전문가입니다.

meaning_2.description: a unit of measurement for x-rays or radiation

translations.de: Mein Strahl ist Ray. Ich bin ein Röntgenologe.
translations.fr: Mon rayon est Ray. Je suis un roentgenologiste.
translations.ko: 제 방사선은 레이입니다. 저는 방사선 전문가입니다.

674.pun_sentence: If pride goes before a fall, humility should arrive by that winter

meaning_1.description: a downfall or failure

translations.de: Wenn Stolz vor einem Fall kommt, sollte Demut bis zu diesem Winter eintreffen.
translations.fr: Si la fierté précède la chute, l'humilité devrait arriver avant cet hiver.
translations.ko: 자부심이 실패 앞에 온다면, 겸손함은 그것에 따라 겨울에 도착해야 합니다.

meaning_2.description: the season of the year between summer and winter, during which the weather becomes cooler and many plants become dormant.

translations.de: Wenn Stolz vor dem Herbst kommt, sollte Demut bis zu diesem Winter eintreffen.
translations.fr: Si la fierté précède l'automne, l'humilité devrait arriver avant cet hiver.
translations.ko: 자부심이 가을 앞에 온다면, 겸손함은 그것에 따라 겨울에 도착해야 합니다.

675.pun_sentence: The psychiatrist told the genie his emotions were all bottled up.

meaning_1.description: To suppress or repress emotions.

translations.de: Der Psychiater sagte dem Geist, dass seine Gefühle alle unterdrückt wären.
translations.fr: Le psychiatre a dit au génie que ses émotions étaient toutes réprimées.
translations.ko: 정신과 의사는 지니에게 그의 감정이 모두 억눌렸다고 말했습니다.

meaning_2.description: To be confined or trapped as if in a bottle.

translations.de: Der Psychiater sagte dem Geist, dass er gefangen wäre, als ob in einer Flasche.
translations.fr: Le psychiatre a dit au génie qu'il était confiné comme s'il était dans une bouteille.
translations.ko: 정신과 의사는 지니에게 그가 마치 병 속에 갇혀있는 것처럼 느껴졌다고 말했습니다.

676.pun_sentence: After they had it out in the boxing ring, they called it square.

meaning_1.description: A shape with four equal sides and four right angles.

translations.de: Nachdem sie im Boxring fertig waren, nannten sie es Quadrat.
translations.fr: Après s'être affrontés sur le ring de boxe, ils l'ont appelé carré.
translations.ko: 그들이 복싱 링에서 싸운 후, 그들은 그것을 '정사각형'이라고 불렀다.

meaning_2.description: to finish a game with the same number of points as the other person or team

translations.de: Nachdem sie im Boxring fertig waren, nannten sie es ausgeglichen.
translations.fr: Après s'être affrontés sur le ring de boxe, ils ont dit qu'ils étaient à égalité.
translations.ko: 그들이 복싱 링에서 싸운 후, 그들은 점수가 동일하다고 말했다.

677.pun_sentence: A politician with a bad back needs lots of support.

meaning_1.description: assistance for physical stability or balance.

translations.de: Ein Politiker mit Rückenproblemen benötigt viel Unterstützung.
translations.fr: Un politicien avec un mal de dos a besoin de beaucoup de soutien.
translations.ko: 허리가 아픈 정치인은 많은 지지가 필요해요.

meaning_2.description: endorsement, agreement, or loyalty, especially from constituents or supporters in politics.

translations.de: Ein Politiker mit Rückenproblemen benötigt viel Zustimmung.
translations.fr: Un politicien avec un mal de dos a besoin de beaucoup d'appui.
translations.ko: 허리가 아픈 정치인은 많은 지원이 필요해요.

678.pun_sentence: She had two different jobs as a chef which gave her a full plate.

meaning_1.description: The dish from which food is eaten.

translations.de: Sie hatte zwei verschiedene Jobs als Köchin, das hat ihr einen vollen Teller gegeben.
translations.fr: Elle avait deux emplois différents en tant que chef, ce qui lui donne une assiette pleine.
translations.ko: 그녀는 요리사로서 두 가지 다른 일을 가지고 있었는데, 그것이 그녀에게 가득찬 접시를 줬어요.

meaning_2.description: A great deal of work or difficulty; full responsibility or task

translations.de: Sie hatte zwei verschiedene Jobs als Köchin, das hat ihr einen großen Aufgabenbereich gegeben.
translations.fr: Elle avait deux emplois différents en tant que chef, ce qui lui donne beaucoup de travail.
translations.ko: 그녀는 요리사로서 두 가지 다른 일을 가지고 있었는데, 그것이 그녀에게 많은 일을 줬어요.

679.pun_sentence: A baseball player joined the army and did the round of military bases.

meaning_1.description: the diamond-shaped circuit with four posts (bases) in the game of baseball.

translations.de: Ein Baseballspieler trat in die Armee ein und lief die Runde der Baseballfelder.
translations.fr: Un joueur de baseball a rejoint l'armée et a fait le tour des bases de baseball.
translations.ko: 야구 선수가 군대에 입대하여 군대 야구장을 돌아다녔다.

meaning_2.description: place where some military personnel are located and from which they operate.

translations.de: Ein Baseballspieler trat in die Armee ein und bereiste die Militärstützpunkte.
translations.fr: Un joueur de baseball a rejoint l'armée et a fait le tour des bases militaires.
translations.ko: 야구 선수가 군대에 입대하여 군대 기지를 돌아다녔다.

680.pun_sentence: A tatoo artist has designs on his clients.

meaning_1.description: Artistic drawings or plans.

translations.de: Ein Tattoo-Künstler hat Designs für seine Kunden.
translations.fr: Un tatoueur a des dessins pour ses clients.
translations.ko: 타투 아티스트는 그의 고객들을 위한 디자인을 가지고 있어.

meaning_2.description: Schemes or plans with a particular intent or purpose.

translations.de: Ein Tattoo-Künstler hat Pläne für seine Kunden.
translations.fr: Un tatoueur a des plans pour ses clients.
translations.ko: 타투 아티스트는 그의 고객들을 위한 계획을 가지고 있어.

681.pun_sentence: Dentists practice by going through many drills.

meaning_1.description: exercises and practical activities to develop skills.

translations.de: Zahnärzte üben, indem sie viele Übungen durchlaufen.
translations.fr: Les dentistes s'entrainent en effectuant de nombreux exercices.
translations.ko: 치과 의사들은 많은 연습을 통해 실력을 키운다.

meaning_2.description: a tool or machine that makes holes.

translations.de: Zahnärzte üben, indem sie viele Bohrer durchlaufen.
translations.fr: Les dentistes s'entrainent en utilisant de nombreux forets.
translations.ko: 치과 의사들은 많은 드릴을 통해 실력을 키운다.

682.pun_sentence: A little boy called his father who made balloons 'pop'.

meaning_1.description: the noise made by bursting.

translations.de: Ein kleiner Junge nannte seinen Vater, der Ballons herstellte, „Knall“.
translations.fr: Un petit garçon a appelé ' claquement ' son père qui fabriquait des ballons.
translations.ko: 어린 소년은 풍선을 만드는 아버지를 ' 터트릴 '이라고 불렀어요.

meaning_2.description: informal term for father.

translations.de: Ein kleiner Junge nannte seinen Vater, der Ballons herstellte, „Papa“.
translations.fr: Un petit garçon a appelé ' papa ' son père qui fabriquait des ballons.
translations.ko: 어린 소년은 풍선을 만드는 아버지를 ' 아빠 '라고 불렀어요.

683.pun_sentence: A skier who makes it to the olympics finds that it is all downhill from there.

meaning_1.description: A slope perfectly fitting for skiing.

translations.de: Ein Skifahrer, der es zu den Olympischen Spielen schafft, stellt fest, dass es von dort nur noch bergab geht.
translations.fr: Un skieur qui arrive aux Jeux olympiques trouve que tout est en descente après cela.
translations.ko: 올림픽에 도착한 스키 선수는 그 곳에서 모두 내리막길임을 발견한다.

meaning_2.description: A decline or decrease; a turn for the worse.

translations.de: Ein Skifahrer, der es zu den Olympischen Spielen schafft, stellt fest, dass seine Karriere danach einen Abwärtstrend nimmt.
translations.fr: Un skieur qui arrive aux Jeux olympiques constate que tout se dégrade après ça.
translations.ko: 올림픽에 도착한 스키 선수는 그 이후로 모든 것이 점점 나빠진다는 것을 발견한다.

684.pun_sentence: OLD ESKIMOS never die, they just go cold.

meaning_1.description: low temperature or the state of being at a less than normal temperature.

translations.de: Alte Eskimos sterben nie, sie werden einfach kalt.
translations.fr: Les vieux Eskimos ne meurent jamais, ils deviennent simplement froids.
translations.ko: 노란 에스키모들은 결코 죽지 않아, 그저 추워져만 가.

meaning_2.description: death

translations.de: Alte Eskimos sterben nie, sie erleiden einfach den Tod.
translations.fr: Les vieux Eskimos ne meurent jamais, ils passent simplement de vie à trépas.
translations.ko: 노란 에스키모들은 결코 죽지 않아, 그저 죽어만 가.

685.pun_sentence: You really are addicted to soccer, you should think of kicking the habit.

meaning_1.description: Making a forceful motion with one's foot or feet.

translations.de: Du bist wirklich süchtig nach Fußball, du solltest darüber nachdenken, den Ball zu kicken.
translations.fr: Tu es vraiment accro au foot, tu devrais penser à donner des coups de pied à la habitude.
translations.ko: 너 정말로 축구에 중독되어 있어, 너는 버릇을 차버리는 것을 고려해야 해.

meaning_2.description: to quit or give up bad habit or addiction

translations.de: Du bist wirklich süchtig nach Fußball, du solltest darüber nachdenken, die Sucht aufzugeben.
translations.fr: Tu es vraiment accro au foot, tu devrais penser à arrêter cette habitude.
translations.ko: 너 정말로 축구에 중독되어 있어, 너는 그 버릇을 그만두는 것을 고려해야 해.

686.pun_sentence: She was only a Magistrates daughter, but she knew what to do on the bench.

meaning_1.description: A long seat for several people.

translations.de: Sie war nur die Tochter eines Magistrats, aber sie wusste, was sie auf der Bank tun sollte.
translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'un magistrat, mais elle savait quoi faire sur le banc.
translations.ko: 그녀는 단지 판사의 딸이었지만, 벤치에서 무엇을 해야 하는지 알고 있었다.

meaning_2.description: A judge's seat or the office of a judge.

translations.de: Sie war nur die Tochter eines Magistrats, aber sie wusste, was sie auf der Richterbank tun sollte.
translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'un magistrat, mais elle savait quoi faire sur le banc des juges.
translations.ko: 그녀는 단지 판사의 딸이었지만, 법정의 자리에서 무엇을 해야 하는지 알고 있었다.

687.pun_sentence: I went to buy some property with a hill on it, but it was a little steep.

meaning_1.description: Having a sharp inclination.

translations.de: Ich ging hin, um ein Grundstück mit einem Hügel darauf zu kaufen, aber es war ein bisschen steil.
translations.fr: Je suis allé acheter une propriété avec une colline dessus, mais elle était un peu abrupte.
translations.ko: 나는 언덕이 있는 부동산을 사러 갔는데, 경사가 좀 가팠어요.

meaning_2.description: Excessive or too much, especially in terms of price.

translations.de: Ich ging hin, um ein Grundstück mit einem Hügel darauf zu kaufen, aber es war ein bisschen teuer.
translations.fr: Je suis allé acheter une propriété avec une colline dessus, mais elle était un peu chère.
translations.ko: 나는 언덕이 있는 부동산을 사러 갔는데, 가격이 좀 비쌌어요.

688.pun_sentence: A racer who was also a golfer really knew how to drive.

meaning_1.description: controlling and steering a vehicle.

translations.de: Ein Rennfahrer, der auch Golfer war, wusste wirklich, wie man fährt.
translations.fr: Un coureur qui était aussi golfeur savait vraiment comment conduire.
translations.ko: 레이서이자 골퍼인 사람은 정말로 어떻게 운전하는지 잘 알았어요.

meaning_2.description: a type of golf stroke, typically the longest stroke made in the game which is usually done from the tee box in golf

translations.de: Ein Rennfahrer, der auch Golfer war, wusste wirklich, wie man ein Drive schlägt.
translations.fr: Un coureur qui était aussi golfeur savait vraiment comment frapper un drive.
translations.ko: 레이서이자 골퍼인 사람은 정말로 어떻게 드라이브를 하는지 잘 알았어요.

689.pun_sentence: Army dentists make a good drill corps.

meaning_1.description: An instrument or device used for making holes in hard substances.

translations.de: Armeezahnärzte machen eine gute Bohrergruppe.
translations.fr: Les dentistes militaires font un bon corps de perceuse.
translations.ko: 군대 치과 의사들은 좋은 드릴 팀을 만듭니다.

meaning_2.description: Training or practice in military exercises.

translations.de: Armeezahnärzte sind gut in militärischen Übungen.
translations.fr: Les dentistes militaires forment un bon corps d'exercice.
translations.ko: 군대 치과 의사들은 우수한 군사 연습단을 만듭니다.

690.pun_sentence: My name is Bet. I'm a coupier.

meaning_1.description: a common female name

translations.de: Mein Name ist Bet. Ich bin ein Croupier.
translations.fr: Mon nom est Bet. Je suis croupier.
translations.ko: 제 이름은 벳입니다. 저는 딜러입니다.

meaning_2.description: a wager or risk of money on the outcome of a game or event, usually in gambling

translations.de: Mein Einsatz ist Bet. Ich bin ein Croupier.
translations.fr: Ma mise est Bet. Je suis croupier.
translations.ko: 제 베팅은 '벳'입니다. 저는 딜러입니다.

691.pun_sentence: OLD PROGRAMMERS never die they just go to bits.

meaning_1.description: Small pieces or parts of something.

translations.de: ALTE PROGRAMMIERER sterben nie, sie zerfallen nur in Teile.
translations.fr: LES ANCIENS PROGRAMMEURS ne meurent jamais, ils se réduisent simplement en petits morceaux.
translations.ko: 노련한 프로그래머들은 결코 죽지 않는다. 그들은 그저 조각으로 가는 것이다.

meaning_2.description: the most basic unit of information in computing

translations.de: ALTE PROGRAMMIERER sterben nie, sie werden einfach zu Bits.
translations.fr: LES ANCIENS PROGRAMMEURS ne meurent jamais, ils deviennent simplement des bits.
translations.ko: 노련한 프로그래머들은 결코 죽지 않는다. 그들은 그저 비트가 되는 것이다.

692.pun_sentence: OLD BREAD MEN never die, they just lose their dough.

meaning_1.description: A mixture of flour, water, and other ingredients that is baked to make bread or pastry.

translations.de: Alte Bäcker sterben nie, sie verlieren nur ihren Teig.
translations.fr: Les vieux boulangers ne meurent jamais, ils perdent juste leur pâte.
translations.ko: 노인 빵집 주인들은 결코 사라지지 않아, 그저 반죽을 잃는다.

meaning_2.description: Money.

translations.de: Alte Bäcker sterben nie, sie verlieren nur ihr Geld.
translations.fr: Les vieux boulangers ne meurent jamais, ils perdent juste leur argent.
translations.ko: 노인 빵집 주인들은 결코 사라지지 않아, 그저 돈을 잃는다.

693.pun_sentence: When ancient wall sculptors were finished it was a relief.

meaning_1.description: The feeling of reassurance and relaxation following the removal of stress or discomfort.

translations.de: Als die antiken Wandbildhauer fertig waren, war es eine Erleichterung.
translations.fr: Quand les sculpteurs de mur anciens avaient fini, c'était un soulagement.
translations.ko: 고대의 벽 조각가들이 마칩니다, 그것은 안도감이었습니다.

meaning_2.description: A method of molding, carving, or stamping in which the design stands out from the surface, to a greater (high relief) or lesser extent (low relief).

translations.de: Als die antiken Wandbildhauer fertig waren, war es ein Relief.
translations.fr: Quand les sculpteurs de mur anciens avaient fini, c'était un relief.
translations.ko: 고대의 벽 조각가들이 마칩니다, 그것은 렐리에프였습니다.

694.pun_sentence: OLD MATH PROFESSORS never die, they just use strange expressions.

meaning_1.description: The act of making one's thoughts, feelings, or ideas known.

translations.de: Alte Mathematikprofessoren sterben niemals, sie äußern sich nur auf seltsame Weise.
translations.fr: Les vieux professeurs de mathématiques ne meurent jamais, ils expriment simplement des pensées étranges.
translations.ko: 노인 수학 교수는 결코 죽지 않아요, 그들은 그저 이상한 표현을 사용할 뿐이에요.

meaning_2.description: symbols that represent numbers or relationships between numbers. in mathematics

translations.de: Alte Mathematikprofessoren sterben niemals, sie verwenden nur seltsame mathematische Ausdrücke.
translations.fr: Les vieux professeurs de mathématiques ne meurent jamais, ils utilisent tout simplement des expressions mathématiques étranges.
translations.ko: 노인 수학 교수는 결코 죽지 않아요, 그들은 그저 이상한 수학적 표현을 사용할 뿐이에요.

695.pun_sentence: OLD SEWAGE WORKERS never die they just waste away.

meaning_1.description: Unwanted or unusable material or substance.

translations.de: ALTE ABWASSERARBEITER sterben nie, sie verfallen einfach.
translations.fr: LES ANCIENS ÉGOUTIERS ne meurent jamais, ils se dégradent simplement.
translations.ko: 노인 하수도 작업자들은 절대 죽지 않아, 그들은 그냥 퇴화해 가요.

meaning_2.description: To use or expend carelessly.

translations.de: ALTE ABWASSERARBEITER sterben nie, sie verschwenden nur.
translations.fr: LES ANCIENS ÉGOUTIERS ne meurent jamais, ils gaspillent seulement.
translations.ko: 노인 하수도 작업자들은 절대 죽지 않아, 그들은 그냥 낭비해 가요.

696.pun_sentence: Everyday is a gift from god, that is why it is called the present.

meaning_1.description: current moment or time

translations.de: Jeder Tag ist ein Geschenk von Gott, deshalb wird es das Jetzt genannt.
translations.fr: Chaque jour est un cadeau de Dieu, c'est pourquoi on l'appelle le présent.
translations.ko: 매일은 하나님의 선물이기 때문에, 그것을 '현재'라고 부릅니다.

meaning_2.description: a gift that is given to someone

translations.de: Jeder Tag ist ein Geschenk von Gott, deshalb wird es das Geschenk genannt.
translations.fr: Chaque jour est un cadeau de Dieu, c'est pourquoi on l'appelle le cadeau.
translations.ko: 매일은 하나님의 선물이기 때문에, 그것을 '선물'이라고 부릅니다.

697.pun_sentence: There’s no high like the most high.

meaning_1.description: A state of euphoria or happiness, often induced by alcohol or drugs.

translations.de: Es gibt keinen Rausch der dem Höchsten gleicht.
translations.fr: Il n'y a pas de sensation plus haute que le plus haut des plaisirs.
translations.ko: '최고로 행복한 상태'보다 더 좋은 것은 없다.

meaning_2.description: spiritual state from connecting with the divine

translations.de: Es gibt keine spirituelle Erhöhung, die der höchsten göttlichen Verbindung gleichkommt.
translations.fr: Il n'y a pas de sensation plus haute que la plus haute connexion divine.
translations.ko: '최고로 성스러운 상태'보다 더 좋은 것은 없다.

698.pun_sentence: I was going to buy a book on phobias, but I was afraid it wouldn't help me.

meaning_1.description: feeling fear or apprehension.

translations.de: Ich wollte ein Buch über Phobien kaufen, aber ich hatte Angst, es würde mir nicht helfen.
translations.fr: J'allais acheter un livre sur les phobies, mais j'avais peur qu'il ne m'aide pas.
translations.ko: 나는 공포증에 관한 책을 사려고 했어, 하지만 그것이 나를 도와주지 않을까봐 무서워했어.

meaning_2.description: expressing regret or reluctance.

translations.de: Ich wollte ein Buch über Phobien kaufen, aber es tat mir leid, dass es mir nicht helfen würde.
translations.fr: J'allais acheter un livre sur les phobies, mais je regrettais qu'il ne puisse pas m'aider.
translations.ko: 나는 공포증에 관한 책을 사려고 했어, 하지만 그것이 나를 도와주지 않을 것 같아서 아쉬워했어.

meaning_1.description: Prevented from succeeding.

translations.de: Das Aluminium hat meine Pläne vereitelt.
translations.fr: L'aluminium a contrecarré mes plans.
translations.ko: 알루미늄이 내 계획을 망쳤어.

meaning_2.description: Covered or wrapped in a thin sheet of metal.

translations.de: Das Aluminium hat meine Pläne eingewickelt.
translations.fr: L'aluminium a enveloppé mes plans.
translations.ko: 알루미늄이 내 계획을 포장했어.

700.pun_sentence: She was only a Waitress's daughter but she sure could dish it out.

meaning_1.description: To serve food in a dish or plate.

translations.de: Sie war nur die Tochter einer Kellnerin, aber sie konnte es sicher servieren.
translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'une serveuse, mais elle savait certainement servir.
translations.ko: 그녀는 단지 웨이트리스의 딸이었지만, 그녀는 분명히 음식을 제공할 줄 알았어요.

meaning_2.description: To distribute or deliver something (like insults or criticism).

translations.de: Sie war nur die Tochter einer Kellnerin, aber sie konnte es sicher austeilen.
translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'une serveuse, mais elle savait certainement distribuer.
translations.ko: 그녀는 단지 웨이트리스의 딸이었지만, 그녀는 분명히 비난이나 비평을 퍼뜨리는데 능했어요.

701.pun_sentence: He bent over to pick up a sieve and strained himself.

meaning_1.description: put in a lot of effort or energy in doing something.

translations.de: Er beugte sich vor, um ein Sieb aufzuheben und strengte sich dabei an.
translations.fr: Il s'est penché pour ramasser une passoire et s'est beaucoup fatigué.
translations.ko: 그는 체를 주워 들기 위해 몸을 구부렸고, 그 과정에서 많이 노력했습니다.

meaning_2.description: filter or separate particles using a sieve.

translations.de: Er beugte sich vor, um ein Sieb aufzuheben und siebte sich dabei.
translations.fr: Il s'est penché pour ramasser une passoire et s'est filtré lui-même.
translations.ko: 그는 체를 주워 들기 위해 몸을 구부렸고, 그 과정에서 그 자신을 체질렀습니다.

702.pun_sentence: A fisherman tried boxing, but he only threw hooks.

meaning_1.description: type of punch thrown with a bent arm around the side of the opponent's guard

translations.de: Ein Fischer versuchte zu boxen, aber er warf nur Haken.
translations.fr: Un pêcheur a essayé de boxer, mais il ne lançait que des crochets.
translations.ko: 어부가 복싱을 시도했지만, 그는 오직 훅만 던졌다.

meaning_2.description: a type of fishing gear to catch fish.

translations.de: Ein Fischer versuchte zu boxen, aber er warf nur Angelhaken.
translations.fr: Un pêcheur a essayé de boxer, mais il ne lançait que des hameçons.
translations.ko: 어부가 복싱을 시도했지만, 그는 오직 낚시바늘만 던졌다.

703.pun_sentence: Winning candy as a prize is always a sweet victory.

meaning_1.description: very good or impressive

translations.de: Süßigkeiten als Preis zu gewinnen, ist immer ein beeindruckender Sieg.
translations.fr: Gagner des bonbons en prix est toujours une victoire impressionnante.
translations.ko: 사탕을 상으로 받는 것은 항상 놀라운 승리입니다.

meaning_2.description: containing a lot of sugar

translations.de: Süßigkeiten als Preis zu gewinnen, ist immer ein zuckersüßer Sieg.
translations.fr: Gagner des bonbons en prix est toujours une victoire sucrée.
translations.ko: 사탕을 상으로 받는 것은 항상 달콤한 승리입니다.

704.pun_sentence: "I can take photographs if I want to!" Tom snapped.

meaning_1.description: spoke in a abrupt, sharp, or irritated manner.

translations.de: "Ich kann Fotos machen, wenn ich will!" sagte Tom abrupt.
translations.fr: "Je peux prendre des photos si je veux !" Tom a répliqué brusquement.
translations.ko: "'나 원하면 사진 찍을 수 있어!' 톰이 퉁명스럽게 말했다."

meaning_2.description: took a photograph.

translations.de: "Ich kann Fotos machen, wenn ich will!" knipste Tom.
translations.fr: "Je peux prendre des photos si je veux !" Tom a pris en photo.
translations.ko: "'나 원하면 사진 찍을 수 있어!' 톰이 사진을 찍었다."

705.pun_sentence: Our bikinis are exciting. They are simply the tops.

meaning_1.description: uppermost part of something.

translations.de: Unsere Bikinis sind aufregend. Sie sind einfach die Spitze.
translations.fr: Nos bikinis sont excitants. Ils sont simplement les hauts.
translations.ko: 우리의 비키니는 흥미롭습니다. 그들은 단순히 최고입니다.

meaning_2.description: upper part of a two-piece swimsuit.

translations.de: Unsere Bikinis sind aufregend. Sie sind einfach die Oberteile.
translations.fr: Nos bikinis sont excitants. Ils sont simplement les hauts de maillot.
translations.ko: 우리의 비키니는 흥미롭습니다. 그들은 단순히 비키니 상의입니다.

706.pun_sentence: High on a ladder he saw a beautiful girl below.He fell for her.

meaning_1.description: To drop or come down from a higher place to a lower level.

translations.de: Hoch oben auf einer Leiter sah er unten ein schönes Mädchen. Er fiel für sie.
translations.fr: Haut sur une échelle, il a vu une belle fille en bas. Il est tombé pour elle.
translations.ko: 그는 사다리 위에서 아래로 아름다운 여자를 보았다. 그는 그녀에게 떨어졌다.

meaning_2.description: To fall in love or become very attracted to someone.

translations.de: Hoch oben auf einer Leiter sah er unten ein schönes Mädchen. Er verliebte sich in sie.
translations.fr: Haut sur une échelle, il a vu une belle fille en bas. Il est tombé amoureux d'elle.
translations.ko: 그는 사다리 위에서 아래로 아름다운 여자를 보았다. 그는 그녀에게 반했다.

707.pun_sentence: Old burglars never die they just steal away.

meaning_1.description: to take something that does not belong to you without permission.

translations.de: Alte Einbrecher sterben nie, sie stehlen einfach weiter.
translations.fr: Les vieux cambrioleurs ne meurent jamais, ils volent juste encore.
translations.ko: 오래된 도둑들은 절대로 죽지 않아요, 그들은 그냥 계속해서 훔쳐요.

meaning_2.description: to go somewhere or leave quietly or secretly.

translations.de: Alte Einbrecher sterben nie, sie schleichen sich einfach davon.
translations.fr: Les vieux cambrioleurs ne meurent jamais, ils s'éclipsent juste en silence.
translations.ko: 오래된 도둑들은 절대로 죽지 않아요, 그들은 그냥 조용히 사라져요.

708.pun_sentence: Lumberjacks have to keep problem logs.

meaning_1.description: Large pieces of tree trunk or branch, especially after being prepared for use in building or carpentry.

translations.de: Holzfäller müssen problematische Baumstämme behalten.
translations.fr: Les bûcherons doivent garder les grumes problématiques.
translations.ko: 나무꾼들은 문제가 되는 원목을 유지해야 합니다.

meaning_2.description: A record of events or incidents.

translations.de: Holzfäller müssen problematische Aufzeichnungen behalten.
translations.fr: Les bûcherons doivent garder les journaux de problèmes.
translations.ko: 나무꾼들은 문제가 되는 기록을 유지해야 합니다.

709.pun_sentence: My name is Joe, an espresso vender

meaning_1.description: Joe is a common name for a person.

translations.de: Mein Name ist Joe, ein Espresso-Verkäufer.
translations.fr: Mon nom est Joe, vendeur d'espresso.
translations.ko: 나의 이름은 조, 에스프레소 판매자입니다.

meaning_2.description: In American English, "Joe" is a colloquial term for coffee.

translations.de: Mein Name ist Kaffee, ein Espresso-Verkäufer.
translations.fr: Mon nom est Café, vendeur d'espresso.
translations.ko: 나의 이름은 커피, 에스프레소 판매자입니다.

710.pun_sentence: Pipe fitters often have high pressure jobs.

meaning_1.description: the feeling of stressful urgency caused by the necessity of doing or achieving something, especially with limited time.

translations.de: Rohrinstallateure haben oft Jobs mit hohem Druck.
translations.fr: Les tuyauteurs ont souvent des emplois à haute pression.
translations.ko: 파이프 피터는 종종 고압력의 직장을 가지고 있습니다.

meaning_2.description: the continuous physical force exerted on or against an object by something in contact with it.

translations.de: Rohrinstallateure haben oft Jobs mit hohem Druck.
translations.fr: Les tuyauteurs sont souvent soumis à une forte pression dans leur travail.
translations.ko: 파이프 피터는 종종 스트레스가 많은 직장을 가지고 있습니다.

711.pun_sentence: Coaches usually have a goal in mind.

meaning_1.description: Ambition or aim that someone wants to achieve.

translations.de: Trainer haben normalerweise ein Ziel im Kopf.
translations.fr: Les entraîneurs ont généralement un objectif en tête.
translations.ko: 코치들은 보통 목표를 가지고 있습니다.

meaning_2.description: A scored point in sports.

translations.de: Trainer haben normalerweise ein Tor im Kopf.
translations.fr: Les entraîneurs ont généralement un but en tête.
translations.ko: 코치들은 보통 골을 염두에 두고 있습니다.

712.pun_sentence: The meat truck took a long time to deliver because of the Jerky ride.

meaning_1.description: Abrupt, hasty, and uneven movement.

translations.de: Der Fleischtransporter brauchte lange für die Lieferung, wegen der ruckartigen Fahrt.
translations.fr: Le camion de viande a pris beaucoup de temps pour livrer à cause du trajet saccadé.
translations.ko: 고기 트럭이 도착하는데 오랜 시간이 걸렸다, 그 이유는 버킷리드 이동 때문이었다.

meaning_2.description: A type of preserved, dried meat.

translations.de: Der Fleischtransporter brauchte lange für die Auslieferung, wegen des getrockneten Fleisches.
translations.fr: Le camion de viande a pris beaucoup de temps à livrer à cause du jerky.
translations.ko: 고기 트럭이 배달하는데 오랜 시간이 걸렸다, 그 이유는 젠키(건조 고기) 때문이었다.

713.pun_sentence: OLD CARD PLAYERS never die, they just fold.

meaning_1.description: to accept defeat in a card game (such as poker) by removing your cards from the game

translations.de: Alte Kartenspieler sterben nie, sie passen nur.
translations.fr: Les vieux joueurs de cartes ne meurent jamais, ils se couchent seulement.
translations.ko: 노년 카드 플레이어는 결코 죽지 않아, 그들은 그냥 포기해.

meaning_2.description: to bend something so that one part of it lies flat on top of another part, or to bend in this way

translations.de: Alte Kartenspieler sterben nie, sie falten einfach die Karte.
translations.fr: Les vieux joueurs de cartes ne meurent jamais, ils plient simplement la carte.
translations.ko: 노년 카드 플레이어는 결코 죽지 않아, 그들은 그냥 카드를 반으로 접어.

714.pun_sentence: Boyle said he was under too much pressure.

meaning_1.description: Physical strain or difficulty

translations.de: Boyle sagte, er sei unter zu großem Druck.
translations.fr: Boyle a dit qu'il était sous trop de pression.
translations.ko: 보일은 그가 너무 많은 부담을 받고 있다고 말했다.

meaning_2.description: force exerted per unit area

translations.de: Boyle sagte, er sei unter zu hohem Druck (im physikalischen Sinne).
translations.fr: Boyle a dit qu'il était sous trop de pression (au sens de la force exercée par unité de surface).
translations.ko: 보일은 그가 너무 많은 압력을 받고 있다고 말했다.

715.pun_sentence: The color of the sun in the early morning : rose.

meaning_1.description: A type of flowering plant or its color.

translations.de: Die Farbe der Sonne am frühen Morgen Rose.
translations.fr: La couleur du soleil au petit matin  rose.
translations.ko: 이른 아침의 해 색깔 장미.

meaning_2.description: to move upward.

translations.de: Die Sonne stieg früh am Morgen Rose.
translations.fr: Le soleil s'élevait au petit matin  rose.
translations.ko: 이른 아침에 해가 올랐어 떠올랐어.

716.pun_sentence: Driving on so many turnpikes was taking its toll.

meaning_1.description: a charge payable for permission to use a particular bridge or road.

translations.de: Auf so vielen Mautstraßen zu fahren, kostete seinen Preis.
translations.fr: Conduire sur tant de péages prenait son péage.
translations.ko: 그렇게 많은 유료 도로를 운전하니까 비용이 쌓였어요.

meaning_2.description: the extent of loss, damage, suffering, etc., resulting from some action or calamity.

translations.de: Auf so vielen Mautstraßen zu fahren, forderte seinen Tribut.
translations.fr: Conduire sur tant de péages avait ses conséquences.
translations.ko: 그렇게 많은 유료 도로를 운전하니까 참다못한 피해를 봤어요.

717.pun_sentence: A ham walked out of the hospital and said "I'm cured".

meaning_1.description: restored to health from an illness.

translations.de: Ein Schinken kam aus dem Krankenhaus und sagte "Ich bin geheilt".
translations.fr: Un jambon est sorti de l'hôpital et a dit "Je suis guéri".
translations.ko: 햄이 병원에서 나와서 말했습니다. "나는 낫었다."

meaning_2.description: preserved by salting, drying, or smoking – commonly used to describe the method to prepare meats, like ham.

translations.de: Ein Schinken kam aus dem Krankenhaus und sagte "Ich bin gepökelt".
translations.fr: Un jambon est sorti de l'hôpital et a dit "Je suis salé".
translations.ko: 햄이 병원에서 나와서 말했습니다. "나는 절였다."

718.pun_sentence: In high school I recall having a beautiful but difficult math teacher. She was easy on the eyes and hard on the pupils!

meaning_1.description: Students in a school.

translations.de: In der High School erinnere ich mich an eine schöne, aber schwierige Mathelehrerin. Sie war leicht auf den Augen und hart auf die Schüler!
translations.fr: Au lycée, je me souviens d'une professeure de maths belle mais difficile. Elle était douce pour les yeux et dure pour les élèves !
translations.ko: 고등학교 때 아름답지만 어려운 수학 선생님을 기억합니다. 그녀는 눈에는 쉽고 학생들에게는 어렵습니다!

meaning_2.description: The aperture in the iris which light travels into the eye.

translations.de: In der High School erinnere ich mich an eine schöne, aber schwierige Mathelehrerin. Sie war leicht auf den Augen und hart auf die Pupillen!
translations.fr: Au lycée, je me souviens d'une professeure de maths belle mais difficile. Elle était douce pour les yeux et dure pour les pupilles !
translations.ko: 고등학교 때 아름답지만 어려운 수학 선생님을 기억합니다. 그녀는 눈에는 쉽고 동공에게는 어렵습니다!

719.pun_sentence: A skier who loses a race on a cold day will have a frosty disposition.

meaning_1.description: literally very cold in temperature.

translations.de: Ein Skifahrer, der an einem kalten Tag ein Rennen verliert, wird eine frostige Stimmung haben.
translations.fr: Un skieur qui perd une course par une journée froide aura une disposition glaciale.
translations.ko: 추운 날 경기에서 진 스키 선수는 차가운 기분이 될 것이다.

meaning_2.description: unfriendly or lacking warmth in the manner or expression.

translations.de: Ein Skifahrer, der an einem kalten Tag ein Rennen verliert, wird eine kühl distanzierte Haltung haben.
translations.fr: Un skieur qui perd une course par une journée froide aura une disposition froide et distante.
translations.ko: 추운 날 경기에서 진 스키 선수는 냉정한 태도를 가질 것이다.

720.pun_sentence: OLD PROGRAMMERS never die, they just get bugged with life.

meaning_1.description: Annoyed or disturbed.

translations.de: Ältere Programmierer sterben nie, sie werden einfach nur vom Leben genervt.
translations.fr: Les vieux programmeurs ne meurent jamais, ils sont juste agacés par la vie.
translations.ko: 노인 프로그래머들은 결코 죽지 않아요, 그들은 그냥 인생에 짜증나요.

meaning_2.description: To encounter bugs in software or a program.

translations.de: Ältere Programmierer sterben nie, sie treffen einfach nur auf Bugs im Leben.
translations.fr: Les vieux programmeurs ne meurent jamais, ils rencontrent juste des bugs dans la vie.
translations.ko: 노인 프로그래머들은 결코 죽지 않아요, 그들은 그냥 인생에서 버그를 만나요.

721.pun_sentence: Food for bad dogs is bought by the pound.

meaning_1.description: A unit of weight used principally in the United States and imperial systems of measurement.

translations.de: Futter für schlechte Hunde wird pfundweise gekauft.
translations.fr: La nourriture pour les mauvais chiens est achetée au kilogramme.
translations.ko: 나쁜 개들을 위한 사료는 파운드로 사집니다.

meaning_2.description: A place where stray animals, especially dogs, are kept.

translations.de: Futter für schlechte Hunde wird im Tierheim gekauft.
translations.fr: La nourriture pour les mauvais chiens est achetée à la fourrière.
translations.ko: 나쁜 개들을 위한 사료는 유기 동물 보호소에서 사집니다.

722.pun_sentence: My son wanted a scooter. When I told him they are too dangerous, he moped around the house.

meaning_1.description: Feeling dejected or sulky.

translations.de: Mein Sohn wollte einen Roller. Als ich ihm sagte, sie seien zu gefährlich, schmollte er im Haus herum.
translations.fr: Mon fils voulait une trottinette. Quand je lui ai dit que c'était trop dangereux, il s'est mis à bouder dans la maison.
translations.ko: 내 아들은 스쿠터를 원했어. 그게 너무 위험하다고 말하니, 그는 집 안을 어슬렁거렸어.

meaning_2.description: A type of lightweight, slower-speed motorcycle.

translations.de: Mein Sohn wollte einen Roller. Als ich ihm sagte, sie seien zu gefährlich, fuhr er im Haus mit dem Moped herum.
translations.fr: Mon fils voulait une trottinette. Quand je lui ai dit que c'était trop dangereux, il a sillonné la maison avec son cyclomoteur.
translations.ko: 내 아들은 스쿠터를 원했어. 그게 너무 위험하다고 말하니, 그는 집 안을 원동기 스쿠터로 돌아다녔어.

723.pun_sentence: I never understood why people liked to play soft ball. It's a very underhanded thing to do.

meaning_1.description: physically delivering a ball or other object below the level of one's hand or hands.

translations.de: Ich habe nie verstanden, warum Menschen gern Softball spielen. Es ist eine sehr unterhändige Sache zu tun.
translations.fr: Je n'ai jamais compris pourquoi les gens aimaient jouer au softball. C'est une chose très sournoise à faire.
translations.ko: 나는 사람들이 왜 소프트볼을 좋아하는지 이해하지 못했어. 그것은 매우 손 아래로 하는 일이야.

meaning_2.description: deceptive, untrustworthy, or insincere

translations.de: Ich habe nie verstanden, warum Menschen gern Softball spielen. Es ist eine sehr hinterhältige Sache zu tun.
translations.fr: Je n'ai jamais compris pourquoi les gens aimaient jouer au softball. C'est une chose très trompeuse à faire.
translations.ko: 나는 사람들이 왜 소프트볼을 좋아하는지 이해하지 못했어. 그것은 매우 속이는, 신뢰할 수 없는 일이야.

724.pun_sentence: Tom was so tired, he lied about his bed.

meaning_1.description: to make an untrue statement with intent to deceive.

translations.de: Tom war so müde, er log bezüglich seines Bettes.
translations.fr: Tom était tellement fatigué, il a menti à propos de son lit.
translations.ko: 톰이 너무 피곤해서 침대에 대해 거짓말했어.

meaning_2.description: to rest or lie down in a flat position

translations.de: Tom war so müde, er lag auf seinem Bett.
translations.fr: Tom était tellement fatigué, il était allongé sur son lit.
translations.ko: 톰이 너무 피곤해서 침대에 누웠어.

725.pun_sentence: She was only an Artist's daughter, but what a crowd she could draw.

meaning_1.description: to produce a picture or diagram by making lines and marks on paper.

translations.de: Sie war nur die Tochter eines Künstlers, aber was für ein Bild konnte sie zeichnen.
translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'un artiste, mais quelle foule elle pouvait dessiner.
translations.ko: 그녀는 단지 아티스트의 딸이었지만, 어떤 그림 그려낼 수 있더라.

meaning_2.description: To attract or pull someone or something towards oneself.

translations.de: Sie war nur die Tochter eines Künstlers, aber was für eine Menge konnte sie anziehen.
translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'un artiste, mais quelle foule elle pouvait attirer.
translations.ko: 그녀는 단지 아티스트의 딸이었지만, 어떤 인파를 끌어모을 수 있더라.

726.pun_sentence: OLD CRICKETERS never die, they just get bowled over.

meaning_1.description: to deliver the ball to the batsman, in cricket

translations.de: Alte Cricketspieler sterben nie, sie werden nur überbowlt.
translations.fr: Les vieux joueurs de cricket ne meurent jamais, ils se font simplement lancer la balle.
translations.ko: 노인 크리켓 선수는 절대로 죽지 않아요, 그들은 단지 볼을 던져져요.

meaning_2.description: To become extremely surprised or overwhelmed.

translations.de: Alte Cricketspieler sterben nie, sie werden nur überwältigt.
translations.fr: Les vieux joueurs de cricket ne meurent jamais, ils sont simplement bouleversés.
translations.ko: 노인 크리켓 선수는 절대로 죽지 않아요, 그들은 단지 깜짝 놀라게 됩니다.

727.pun_sentence: It's quiet in a bowling alley because you can hear a pin drop.

meaning_1.description: a thin piece of metal with a sharp point at one end and a round head at the other, used especially for fastening pieces of cloth.

translations.de: Es ist ruhig in einer Bowlingbahn, weil man einen Stift fallen hören kann.
translations.fr: C'est calme dans une salle de bowling parce que vous pouvez entendre tomber une épingle.
translations.ko: 볼링장은 조용해요, 왜냐하면 핀이 떨어지는 소리를 들을 수 있기 때문이죠.

meaning_2.description: A bowling pin, which is knocked down by a bowling ball in the game of bowling.

translations.de: Es ist ruhig in einer Bowlingbahn, weil man einen Kegel fallen hören kann.
translations.fr: C'est calme dans une salle de bowling parce que vous pouvez entendre tomber un quille.
translations.ko: 볼링장은 조용해요, 왜냐하면 볼링핀이 넘어지는 소리를 들을 수 있기 때문이죠.

728.pun_sentence: After having a knee dislocated and an elbow fractured in two barroom brawls Bradley should have learned to stay away from those joints.

meaning_1.description: parts of the body where two bones are connected, such as knees or elbows.

translations.de: Nachdem Bradley in zwei Kneipenschlägereien ein Knie ausgekugelt und einen Ellbogen gebrochen hatte, hätte er lernen sollen, diese Gelenke zu schonen.
translations.fr: Après s'être déboîté un genou et fracturé un coude dans deux bagarres de bar, Bradley aurait dû apprendre à éviter de solliciter ces articulations.
translations.ko: 두 차례의 술집 싸움에서 무릎을 벗겨지고 팔꿈치를 골절한 브래들리는 그 관절을 만지지 않는 것을 피해야 했을 것이다.

meaning_2.description: slang term for a place, in this context referring to bars or pubs.

translations.de: Nachdem Bradley in zwei Kneipenschlägereien ein Knie ausgekugelt und einen Ellbogen gebrochen hatte, hätte er lernen sollen, diesen Lokalen fernzubleiben.
translations.fr: Après s'être déboîté un genou et fracturé un coude dans deux bagarres de bar, Bradley aurait dû apprendre à éviter ces endroits.
translations.ko: 두 차례의 술집 싸움에서 무릎을 벗겨지고 팔꿈치를 골절한 브래들리는 그런 곳을 멀리하는 것을 배워야 했을 것이다.

729.pun_sentence: What do they call all that lumber on the Star Trek's Enterprise? Captain's log.

meaning_1.description: Long pieces of wood that have been cut from a tree.

translations.de: Wie nennen sie all das Gehölz auf dem Star Trek's Enterprise? Käpt'ns Holz.
translations.fr: Comment appellent-ils tout ce bois sur l'Enterprise de Star Trek? Journal du capitaine.
translations.ko: '스타 트렉'의 엔터프라이즈호에 있는 그 모든 나무들을 뭐라고 부르지? 선장의 원목이라고.

meaning_2.description: A record of events or information.

translations.de: Wie nennen sie all das Gehölz auf dem Star Trek's Enterprise? Käpt'ns Logbuch.
translations.fr: Comment appellent-ils tout ce bois sur l'Enterprise de Star Trek? Journal de bord du capitaine.
translations.ko: '스타 트렉'의 엔터프라이즈호에 있는 그 모든 나무들을 뭐라고 부르지? 선장의 로그라고.

730.pun_sentence: After Gus gave his girlfriend a 3 dollar box of chocolates for her birthday he got nothing but snickers.

meaning_1.description: a light, half-suppressed laugh.

translations.de: Nachdem Gus seiner Freundin eine 3-Dollar-Schachtel Pralinen zum Geburtstag geschenkt hatte, erntete er nichts als verhaltene Lacher.
translations.fr: Après que Gus ait offert à sa petite amie une boîte de chocolats de 3 dollars pour son anniversaire, il n'a récolté que des ricanements.
translations.ko: 거스가 그의 여자친구에게 생일 선물로 3달러짜리 초콜릿 상자를 준 뒤로 그는 웃음만 들었어.

meaning_2.description: A chocolate bar produced by the Mars company

translations.de: Nachdem Gus seiner Freundin eine 3-Dollar-Schachtel Pralinen zum Geburtstag geschenkt hatte, bekam er nichts als Snickers-Riegel.
translations.fr: Après que Gus ait offert à sa petite amie une boîte de chocolats de 3 dollars pour son anniversaire, il n'a reçu que des barres de chocolat Snickers.
translations.ko: 거스가 그의 여자친구에게 생일 선물로 3달러짜리 초콜릿 상자를 준 뒤로 그는 스니커즈 초콜릿바밖에 받지 못했어.

731.pun_sentence: Changing a tire on that crazy Houston freeway was a wrenching experience.

meaning_1.description: To twist and turn with a quick, violent motion.

translations.de: Einen Reifen auf dieser verrückten Houstoner Autobahn zu wechseln, war eine schraubende Erfahrung.
translations.fr: Changer un pneu sur cette autoroute folle de Houston a été une expérience de torsion.
translations.ko: 그 미친 휴스턴 고속도로에서 타이어를 교체하는 것은 비틀어서 돌리는 경험이었어.

meaning_2.description: Causing mental or physical pain.

translations.de: Einen Reifen auf dieser verrückten Houstoner Autobahn zu wechseln, war eine schmerzliche Erfahrung.
translations.fr: Changer un pneu sur cette autoroute folle de Houston a été une expérience déchirante.
translations.ko: 그 미친 휴스턴 고속도로에서 타이어를 교체하는 것은 고통스러운 경험이었어.

meaning_1.description: the raised area on the bottom of the foot that is formed by a curved section of bones

translations.de: Zwei Podologen wurden zu Erzrivalen im Sinne von Fußgewölben.
translations.fr: Deux podologues sont devenus des rivaux sous forme de voûte plantaire.
translations.ko: 두 신경외과 의사가 발바닥의 굴곡부분, 곧 아치를 뜻하는 치열한 경쟁자가 되었습니다.

meaning_2.description: in direct opposition to each other

translations.de: Zwei Podologen wurden zu Erzrivalen im direkten Gegensatz zueinander.
translations.fr: Deux podologues sont devenus des rivaux en opposition directe.
translations.ko: 두 신경외과 의사가 서로 반대되는, 곧 아치를 뜻하는 치열한 경쟁자가 되었습니다.

733.pun_sentence: A manufacturer that made lamps gave their employees a light workload.

meaning_1.description: a small or easy amount of

translations.de: Ein Lampenhersteller gab seinen Mitarbeitern eine leichte Arbeitsbelastung.
translations.fr: Un fabricant qui faisait des lampes a donné à ses employés une petite charge de travail.
translations.ko: 램프를 만드는 제조업체가 직원들에게 가벼운 업무 부담을 주었습니다.

meaning_2.description: something that makes things visible or affords illumination like a lamp.

translations.de: Ein Lampenhersteller gab seinen Mitarbeitern eine helle Arbeitsbelastung.
translations.fr: Un fabricant qui faisait des lampes a donné à ses employés une charge de travail éclairée.
translations.ko: 램프를 만드는 제조업체가 직원들에게 밝은 업무 부담을 주었습니다.

734.pun_sentence: Before a plumber retired, he took the final plunge.

meaning_1.description: a significant act or decision, often after some hesitation

translations.de: Vor der Pensionierung eines Klempners, hat er den endgültigen Sprung gewagt.
translations.fr: Avant de prendre sa retraite, le plombier a fait le dernier grand saut.
translations.ko: 배관공이 은퇴하기 전에 마지막으로 큰 결정을 내렸어요.

meaning_2.description: Use a plunger to clear a blockage in pipes.

translations.de: Bevor der Klempner in den Ruhestand ging, machte er den letzten Stoß.
translations.fr: Avant de prendre sa retraite, le plombier a fait le dernier plongeon avec un déboucheur.
translations.ko: 배관공이 은퇴하기 전에, 마지막으로 플런저를 사용했어요.

735.pun_sentence: The plums for sale dried out, so the profits were pruned.

meaning_1.description: Cut back or reducing in size or amount.

translations.de: Die zum Verkauf stehenden Pflaumen trockneten aus, daher wurden die Gewinne gekürzt.
translations.fr: Les prunes en vente se sont desséchées, donc les bénéfices ont été réduits.
translations.ko: 팔려던 자두가 말랐으므로, 수익이 줄었다.

meaning_2.description: to trim a plant by cutting away dead or overgrown branches or stems

translations.de: Die zum Verkauf stehenden Pflaumen trockneten aus, daher wurden die Gewinne beschnitten.
translations.fr: Les prunes en vente se sont desséchées, donc les bénéfices ont été élagués.
translations.ko: 팔려던 자두가 말랐으므로, 수익이 가지치기 되었다.

736.pun_sentence: This is the best guy I've met to date.

meaning_1.description: The present or current period.

translations.de: Das ist der beste Kerl, den ich bis heute getroffen habe.
translations.fr: C'est le meilleur homme que j'ai rencontré jusqu'à présent.
translations.ko: 이 사람은 지금까지 만난 가장 좋은 사람이에요.

meaning_2.description: A social or romantic outing with someone.

translations.de: Das ist der beste Kerl, mit dem ich bislang ausgegangen bin.
translations.fr: C'est le meilleur homme avec qui j'ai eu un rendez-vous.
translations.ko: 이 사람은 내가 지금까지 데이트한 가장 좋은 사람이에요.

737.pun_sentence: OLD AUDITORS never die, they just lose their figures.

meaning_1.description: Numerical values or statistics.

translations.de: ALTE REVISOREN sterben nie, sie verlieren nur ihre Zahlen.
translations.fr: LES ANCIENS AUDITEURS ne meurent jamais, ils perdent juste leurs chiffres.
translations.ko: 노련한 감사인들은 절대로 죽지 않아요, 그들은 단지 그들의 숫자를 잃어버릴 뿐이에요.

meaning_2.description: Physical shape or form, especially an attractive one.

translations.de: ALTE REVISOREN sterben nie, sie verlieren nur ihre Figur.
translations.fr: LES ANCIENS AUDITEURS ne meurent jamais, ils perdent juste leur forme.
translations.ko: 노련한 감사인들은 절대로 죽지 않아요, 그들은 단지 그들의 몸매를 잃어버릴 뿐이에요.

738.pun_sentence: News of a coming flood was leaked.

meaning_1.description: Unintentionally disclose or reveal (information)

translations.de: Nachrichten von einer bevorstehenden Flut wurden versehentlich preisgegeben.
translations.fr: Des nouvelles d'une inondation à venir ont été révélées par inadvertance.
translations.ko: 채비 중인 홍수의 소식이 비밀스럽게 유출되었습니다.

meaning_2.description: Escaping of liquid or gas from a hole or crack in a container or system.

translations.de: Die Nachrichten von einer kommenden Flut sind ausgelaufen.
translations.fr: Des nouvelles d'une inondation à venir ont fui.
translations.ko: 채비 중인 홍수의 소식이 누출되었습니다.

739.pun_sentence: She became a telephone operator because it was her calling.

meaning_1.description: strong urge to follow a particular career or vocation.

translations.de: Sie wurde eine Telefonistin, weil es ihre Berufung war.
translations.fr: Elle est devenue opératrice téléphonique parce que c'était sa vocation.
translations.ko: 그녀는 자신의 소명 때문에 전화 교환원이 되었습니다.

meaning_2.description: The act of making a phone call.

translations.de: Sie wurde eine Telefonistin, weil sie anrufen musste.
translations.fr: Elle est devenue opératrice téléphonique parce qu'elle devait appeler.
translations.ko: 그녀는 전화를 걸어야 하기 때문에 전화 교환원이 되었습니다.

740.pun_sentence: The politician is not one for Indian food. But he's good at currying favors.

meaning_1.description: act of cooking with curry, a variety of dishes originating from the Indian subcontinent

translations.de: Der Politiker ist nicht für indisches Essen. Aber er ist gut im Curry Kochen.
translations.fr: Le politicien n'est pas pour la nourriture indienne. Mais il est doué pour cuisiner du curry.
translations.ko: 이 정치인은 인도 음식을 선호하지 않아. 하지만 그는 카레 요리를 잘해.

meaning_2.description: The act of gaining favor from someone through flattery or attention.

translations.de: Der Politiker ist nicht für indisches Essen. Aber er ist gut darin, Gefälligkeiten zu erwirken.
translations.fr: Le politicien n'est pas pour la nourriture indienne. Mais il est doué pour se faire des faveurs.
translations.ko: 이 정치인은 인도 음식을 선호하지 않아. 하지만 그는 아부를 잘해.

741.pun_sentence: If you are what you eat, I'm staying away from the nuts!

meaning_1.description: Edible seeds that are often in a hard shell.

translations.de: Wenn du bist, was du isst, bleibe ich von den Nüssen fern!
translations.fr: Si tu es ce que tu manges, je vais rester loin des noix !
translations.ko: 너가 먹는 것이 너라면, 나는 견과류에서 멀리 떨어져 있겠어!

meaning_2.description: A slang term for crazy or insane person

translations.de: Wenn du bist, was du isst, halte ich mich von den Verrückten fern!
translations.fr: Si tu es ce que tu manges, je vais rester loin des fous !
translations.ko: 너가 먹는 것이 너라면, 나는 미친 사람들로부터 멀리 떨어져 있겠어!

742.pun_sentence: I went to the dentist without lunch, and he gave me a plate.

meaning_1.description: A flat dish from which food is eaten or served.

translations.de: Ich ging ohne Mittagessen zum Zahnarzt, und er gab mir einen Teller.
translations.fr: Je suis allé chez le dentiste sans déjeuner, et il m'a donné une assiette.
translations.ko: 나는 점심 없이 치과에 갔다가, 그는 나에게 접시를 줬어요.

meaning_2.description: A dental appliance for the mouth and teeth, such as a denture.

translations.de: Ich ging ohne Mittagessen zum Zahnarzt, und er gab mir eine Zahnplatte.
translations.fr: Je suis allé chez le dentiste sans déjeuner, et il m'a donné une prothèse dentaire.
translations.ko: 나는 점심 없이 치과에 갔다가, 그는 나에게 잇몸 보호판을 줬어요.

743.pun_sentence: The massage which came with the spa treatment was a nice touch.

meaning_1.description: Physical contact

translations.de: Die Massage, die mit der Spa-Behandlung kam, war ein angenehmer Kontakt.
translations.fr: Le massage qui accompagnait le soin au spa était un contact agréable.
translations.ko: 스파 치료와 함께 제공된 마사지는 좋은 접촉이었습니다.

meaning_2.description: Nice touch means is an expression used when you're in awe of something. Whether it's food, interiors, or any kind of design, there's something about it that's just a little bit different, different, and wonderful

translations.de: Die Massage, die mit der Spa-Behandlung kam, war ein schönes Detail.
translations.fr: Le massage qui accompagnait le soin au spa était une jolie touche.
translations.ko: 스파 치료와 함께 제공된 마사지는 좋은 세부 사항이었습니다.

744.pun_sentence: OLD SHOE SHINE BOYS never die, they are just rebuffed..

meaning_1.description: rejected or refused abruptly or sharply, often in an ungracious or rude manner.

translations.de: Alte Schuhputzer sterben nie, sie werden nur abrupt abgelehnt.
translations.fr: Les vieux cireurs de chaussures ne meurent jamais, ils sont juste brutalement repoussés.
translations.ko: 구두 닦는 남자가 결코 죽지 않아, 그들은 단지 예기치 않게 거절당했다.

meaning_2.description: Polished or cleaned again by applying a buffing tool, especially in the context of shoes.

translations.de: Alte Schuhputzer sterben nie, sie werden nur wieder poliert.
translations.fr: Les vieux cireurs de chaussures ne meurent jamais, ils sont juste à nouveau polis.
translations.ko: 구두 닦는 남자가 결코 죽지 않아, 그들은 그냥 다시 빛낫자나요.

745.pun_sentence: Here is how the track meet is going to run...

meaning_1.description: to move swiftly on foot.

translations.de: Hier ist, wie der Leichtathletikwettbewerb laufen wird...
translations.fr: Voici comment la compétition d'athlétisme va courir...
translations.ko: 이것이 트랙 경기가 어떻게 달리게 될 것인지입니다 ...

meaning_2.description: to manage or direct the operations of something.

translations.de: Hier ist, wie der Leichtathletikwettbewerb geführt wird...
translations.fr: Voici comment la compétition d'athlétisme sera gérée...
translations.ko: 이것이 트랙 경기가 어떻게 운영될 것인지입니다 ...

746.pun_sentence: How do I handle change? I put it in the parking meter.

meaning_1.description: alteration or transformation, such as life changes or situational transitions.

translations.de: Wie gehe ich mit Veränderungen um? Ich stecke sie in den Parkautomaten.
translations.fr: Comment je gère le changement ? Je le mets dans l'horodateur.
translations.ko: 나는 어떻게 변화를 다루나? 나는 그것을 주차계수기에 넣어.

meaning_2.description: coins given as the remainder of a cash transaction

translations.de: Wie gehe ich mit Wechselgeld um? Ich stecke es in den Parkautomaten.
translations.fr: Comment je gère la monnaie? Je la mets dans l'horodateur.
translations.ko: 나는 어떻게 거스름돈을 다루나? 나는 그것을 주차계수기에 넣어.

747.pun_sentence: I've never killed a deer before but I'll take a shot at it.

meaning_1.description: Firing of a gun.

translations.de: Ich habe noch nie ein Reh getötet, aber ich werde einen Schuss darauf abgeben.
translations.fr: Je n'ai jamais tué de cerf auparavant mais je vais tirer dessus.
translations.ko: 나는 전에 사슴을 죽인 적이 없지만, 한 발 쏴 볼 거예요.

meaning_2.description: An attempt or try at doing something.

translations.de: Ich habe noch nie ein Reh getötet, aber ich werde es versuchen.
translations.fr: Je n'ai jamais tué de cerf auparavant mais je vais tenter ma chance.
translations.ko: 나는 전에 사슴을 죽인 적이 없지만 시도해 볼 거예요.

748.pun_sentence: Diabetics should not be allowed to have sweet dreams.

meaning_1.description: having a sugary taste, like candy or sugar

translations.de: Diabetiker sollten nicht erlaubt sein, süße Träume zu haben.
translations.fr: Les diabétiques ne devraient pas être autorisés à faire des rêves sucrés.
translations.ko: 당뇨병 환자들은 달콤한 꿈을 꾸지 못해야 한다.

meaning_2.description: pleasant or agreeable.

translations.de: Diabetiker sollten nicht erlaubt sein, angenehme Träume zu haben.
translations.fr: Les diabétiques ne devraient pas être autorisés à faire des rêves agréables.
translations.ko: 당뇨병 환자들은 즐거운 꿈을 꾸지 못해야 한다.

749.pun_sentence: I got a great bargain the other day when I bought a forklift for half - price. It's amazing what you can pick up these days.

meaning_1.description: acquire something, especially a bargain

translations.de: Ich habe neulich ein großartiges Schnäppchen gemacht, als ich einen Gabelstapler zum halben Preis gekauft habe. Es ist erstaunlich, was man heutzutage erwerben kann.
translations.fr: J'ai fait une excellente affaire l'autre jour quand j'ai acheté un chariot élévateur à moitié prix. C'est incroyable ce que vous pouvez acquérir de nos jours.
translations.ko: 나는 저번에 리프트트럭을 반값에 샀을 때 큰 싸움을 했어. 요즘 어떤 것들을 구매할 수 있는지 놀랍다.

meaning_2.description: To lift or move something using a forklift.

translations.de: Ich habe neulich ein großartiges Schnäppchen gemacht, als ich einen Gabelstapler zum halben Preis gekauft habe. Es ist erstaunlich, was man heutzutage anheben kann.
translations.fr: J'ai fait une excellente affaire l'autre jour quand j'ai acheté un chariot élévateur à moitié prix. C'est incroyable ce que vous pouvez soulever de nos jours.
translations.ko: 나는 저번에 리프트트럭을 반값에 샀을 때 큰 싸움을 했어. 요즘 어떤 것들을 들어올릴 수 있는지 놀랍다.

750.pun_sentence: "I just came in through the door," said Tom, entranced.

meaning_1.description: Being in a state of delight or wonder.

translations.de: "Ich bin gerade durch die Tür gekommen," sagte Tom, verzückt.
translations.fr: "'Je viens juste d'entrer par la porte', dit Tom, enchanté."
translations.ko: "나 방금 문을 통해 들어왔어,"라고 톰이 황홀한 표정으로 말했다.

meaning_2.description: enter a place

translations.de: "Ich bin gerade durch die Tür gekommen," sagte Tom, nach Betreten.
translations.fr: "'Je viens juste d'entrer par la porte', dit Tom, après être entré."
translations.ko: "나 방금 문을 통해 들어왔어,"라고 톰이 들어간 후에 말했다.

751.pun_sentence: Even if you're on the right track, you'll get run over if you just sit there.

meaning_1.description: being correct in one's approach or decision-making

translations.de: Selbst wenn du auf dem richtigen Weg bist, wirst du überfahren, wenn du einfach dasitzt.
translations.fr: Même si tu es sur la bonne voie, tu seras renversé si tu restes seulement là.
translations.ko: 당신이 올바른 방향으로 가고 있다 해도, 그냥 거기 앉아만 있다면 당신은 실패할 겁니다.

meaning_2.description: a railways track where trains run.

translations.de: Selbst wenn du auf dem richtigen Gleis bist, wirst du überfahren, wenn du einfach dasitzt.
translations.fr: Même si tu es sur la bonne voie ferrée, tu seras renversé si tu restes seulement là.
translations.ko: 당신이 올바른 철로 위에 있다 해도, 그냥 거기 앉아 있다면 당신은 치여 날 겁니다.

752.pun_sentence: When the investor came home from work he was spent.

meaning_1.description: Exhausted or tired after a period of exertion.

translations.de: Als der Investor von der Arbeit nach Hause kam, war er erschöpft.
translations.fr: Quand l'investisseur est rentré du travail, il était épuisé.
translations.ko: 투자자가 일을 마치고 집에 왔을 때, 그는 완전히 지쳐있었다.

meaning_2.description: Having been used and unable to be used again, in the context of money, spent denotes all the money has been used up.

translations.de: Als der Investor von der Arbeit nach Hause kam, war er ausgegeben.
translations.fr: Quand l'investisseur est rentré du travail, il était dépensé.
translations.ko: 투자자가 일을 마치고 집에 왔을 때, 그는 완전히 써버렸다.

753.pun_sentence: OLD GARDENERS never die, they just get uprooted.

meaning_1.description: To remove or displace from a particular environment or situation.

translations.de: ALTE GÄRTNER sterben nie, sie werden einfach entwurzelt.
translations.fr: LES VIEUX JARDINIERS ne meurent jamais, ils sont simplement déracinés.
translations.ko: 노인 원예가는 절대로 죽지 않습니다, 그들은 그냥 뽑혀 나갑니다.

meaning_2.description: to remove plants from the ground or soil.

translations.de: ALTE GÄRTNER sterben nie, sie ziehen einfach aus.
translations.fr: LES VIEUX JARDINIERS ne meurent jamais, ils sont simplement arrachés du sol.
translations.ko: 노인 원예가는 절대로 죽지 않습니다, 그들은 그냥 식물을 뽑아버립니다.

754.pun_sentence: The science teachers broke up because there was no chemistry between them.

meaning_1.description: a branch of science dealing with the study of matter and its interactions.

translations.de: Die Naturwissenschaftslehrer trennten sich, weil es zwischen ihnen keine Chemie gab.
translations.fr: Les professeurs de sciences se sont séparés car il n'y avait pas de chimie entre eux.
translations.ko: 그 과학 선생님들은 그들 사이에 화학이 없어서 헤어졌어요.

meaning_2.description: sense of understanding and attraction between two people.

translations.de: Die Naturwissenschaftslehrer trennten sich, weil sie sich nicht verstanden oder angezogen fühlten.
translations.fr: Les professeurs de sciences se sont séparés car il n'y avait aucune attirance ou compréhension entre eux.
translations.ko: 그 과학 선생님들은 그들 사이에 이해 또는 매력이 없어서 헤어졌어요.

755.pun_sentence: The math professor went crazy with the blackboard. He did a number on it.

meaning_1.description: A mathematical value used in calculations.

translations.de: Der Matheprofessor wurde verrückt mit der Tafel. Er hat eine Zahl darauf gemacht.
translations.fr: Le professeur de mathématiques est devenu fou avec le tableau noir. Il y a fait un nombre.
translations.ko: 수학 교수님이 칠판으로 미치게 되었어요. 그는 그 위에 숫자를 썼어요.

meaning_2.description: A form of harm or damage done to something.

translations.de: Der Matheprofessor wurde verrückt mit der Tafel. Er hat sie beschädigt.
translations.fr: Le professeur de mathématiques est devenu fou avec le tableau noir. Il l'a endommagé.
translations.ko: 수학 교수님이 칠판으로 미치게 되었어요. 그는 그것을 망가뜨렸어요.

756.pun_sentence: Madame : "Now remember, girls, when handling royalty the important thing is to keep up your dukes!"

meaning_1.description: High-ranking nobles in the hierarchy of feudal land-ownership, particularly in the British context.

translations.de: "Madame  '' Jetzt erinnert euch, Mädchen, wenn ihr mit dem Adel umgeht, ist das Wichtigste, eure Herzöge hochzuhalten! ''"
translations.fr: "Madame  '' Souvenez-vous maintenant, les filles, lorsqu'il s'agit de gérer la royauté, l'important est de maintenir vos duc! ''"
translations.ko: "마담  '' 이제 기억하십시오, 여성분들, 왕족을 대할 때 가장 중요한 것은 당신의 공작을 유지하는 것입니다! ''"

meaning_2.description: fists or hands

translations.de: "Madame  '' Jetzt erinnert euch, Mädchen, wenn ihr mit dem Adel umgeht, ist das Wichtigste, eure Fäuste hochzuhalten!' '"
translations.fr: "Madame  '' Souvenez-vous maintenant, les filles, lorsqu'il s'agit de gérer la royauté, l'important est de maintenir vos poings! ''"
translations.ko: "마담  '' 이제 기억하십시오, 여성분들, 왕족을 대할 때 가장 중요한 것은 당신의 주먹을 유지하는 것입니다! ''"

757.pun_sentence: Do you ever get tired of sleeping?

meaning_1.description: Feeling in need of rest or sleep.

translations.de: Wirst du jemals müde zu schlafen?
translations.fr: Est-ce que tu as parfois envie de dormir?
translations.ko: 너는 잠을 자다가 피곤해지는 일이 있니?

meaning_2.description: Fed up or bored with something.

translations.de: Hast du es jemals satt zu schlafen?
translations.fr: En as-tu jamais marre de dormir?
translations.ko: 너는 자다가 질리는 일이 있니?

758.pun_sentence: I was in a big hurry so I scrambled to make eggs for breakfast.

meaning_1.description: Hurried or rushed to do something.

translations.de: Ich hatte es sehr eilig und beeilte mich, Eier zum Frühstück zu machen.
translations.fr: J'étais très pressé alors j'ai hâté de préparer des œufs pour le petit-déjeuner.
translations.ko: 나는 너무 바빠서 아침식사로 계란을 급하게 만들었어요.

meaning_2.description: Beat (eggs) briskly so that the white and yolk mix before cooking them.

translations.de: Ich hatte es sehr eilig und schlug schnell Eier zum Frühstück auf.
translations.fr: J'étais très pressé alors j'ai battu rapidement des œufs pour le petit-déjeuner.
translations.ko: 나는 너무 바빠서 아침식사로 계란을 섞어 만들었어요.

759.pun_sentence: Just after thimbles were invented there was a shortage, so many people got stuck without one.

meaning_1.description: unable to move or set in a particular position.

translations.de: Gerade nachdem Fingerhüte erfunden wurden, gab es einen Mangel, so dass viele Menschen ohne einen festsaßen.
translations.fr: Juste après que les dé à coudre aient été inventés, il y a eu une pénurie, donc beaucoup de gens se sont retrouvés bloqués sans un.
translations.ko: 발명 직후에 지그재그가 부족했기 때문에 많은 사람들이 하나 없이 붙어 있었습니다.

meaning_2.description: being pricked or pierced by something sharp.

translations.de: Gerade nachdem Fingerhüte erfunden wurden, gab es einen Mangel, so dass viele Menschen ohne einen sich stachen.
translations.fr: Juste après que les dé à coudre aient été inventés, il y a eu une pénurie, donc beaucoup de gens se sont piqués sans un.
translations.ko: 발명 직후에 지그재그가 부족했기 때문에 많은 사람들이 하나 없이 찔렸습니다.

760.pun_sentence: The untruthful deli clerk was full of baloney.

meaning_1.description: Baloney refers to a type of sausage.

translations.de: Der unehrliche Deli Angestellte war voll von Mortadella.
translations.fr: Le commis de la charcuterie qui mentait tout le temps était plein de baloney.
translations.ko: 거짓말하는 델리 점원은 발로니 소시지로 가득했다.

meaning_2.description: nonsense or foolishness

translations.de: Der unehrliche Deli Angestellte erzählte nur Quatsch.
translations.fr: Le commis de la charcuterie qui mentait tout le temps racontait des balivernes.
translations.ko: 거짓말하는 델리 점원은 헛소리로 가득했다.

761.pun_sentence: When neon lights were perfected the inventor was positively glowing.

meaning_1.description: Emitting or reflecting light.

translations.de: Als die Neonlichter perfektioniert wurden, strahlte der Erfinder buchstäblich.
translations.fr: Lorsque les lumières au néon ont été perfectionnées, l'inventeur brillait littéralement.
translations.ko: 네온 조명이 완벽해졌을 때, 발명가는 글쎄 빛나고 있었어요.

meaning_2.description: Extremely positive, proud or enthusiastic.

translations.de: Als die Neonlichter perfektioniert wurden, war der Erfinder extrem positiv und stolz.
translations.fr: Lorsque les lumières au néon ont été perfectionnées, l'inventeur était extrêmement positif et fier.
translations.ko: 네온 조명이 완벽해졌을 때, 발명가는 매우 긍정적이고 자랑스러웠어요.

762.pun_sentence: The manufacturers of dynamite do a booming business.

meaning_1.description: growing rapidly or thriving in business.

translations.de: Die Hersteller von Dynamit machen ein florierendes Geschäft.
