translations.fr: Les fabricants de dynamite font un commerce florissant.
translations.ko: 다이너마이트 제조업체들은 활발하게 사업을 하고 있습니다.

meaning_2.description: a loud, deep, resonant sound, like an explosion.

translations.de: Die Hersteller von Dynamit machen ein knallendes Geschäft.
translations.fr: Les fabricants de dynamite font un commerce retentissant.
translations.ko: 다이너마이트 제조업체들은 폭발하는 듯한 사업을 하고 있습니다.

763.pun_sentence: Did you hear about the guy who planted bullets? He wanted to see a lot of little shoots.

meaning_1.description: The new growth from a plant.

translations.de: Hast du von dem Kerl gehört, der Kugeln gepflanzt hat? Er wollte viele kleine Triebe sehen.
translations.fr: As-tu entendu parler du gars qui a planté des balles ? Il voulait voir beaucoup de petites pousses.
translations.ko: 총알을 심은 사람에 대해 들어봤어? 그는 많은 작은 싹들을 보고 싶어했어.

meaning_2.description: The firing of bullets from a gun.

translations.de: Hast du von dem Kerl gehört, der Kugeln gepflanzt hat? Er wollte viele kleine Schüsse sehen.
translations.fr: As-tu entendu parler du gars qui a planté des balles ? Il voulait voir beaucoup de petits tirs.
translations.ko: 총알을 심은 사람에 대해 들어봤어? 그는 많은 작은 총알을 쏘고 싶어했어.

764.pun_sentence: Pompous male bees are often known to drone on about themselves.

meaning_1.description: A male honey bee, whose only function is to mate with the queen.

translations.de: Aufgeblasene männliche Bienen sind oft dafür bekannt, sich als Drohnen zu präsentieren.
translations.fr: Les abeilles mâles pompeuses sont souvent connues pour se comporter en bourdons.
translations.ko: 거만한 수벌들은 자주 자신을 수치로 여겨 알려져 있다.

meaning_2.description: Speaking in a monotonous tone for a long period, typically to deliver dull, boring, or tedious material.

translations.de: Aufgeblasene männliche Bienen sind oft dafür bekannt, monoton über sich selbst zu sprechen.
translations.fr: Les abeilles mâles pompeuses sont souvent connues pour parler d'elles-mêmes avec monotonie.
translations.ko: 거만한 수벌들은 자주 지루하고 단조롭게 자신에 대해 떠드는 것으로 알려져 있다.

765.pun_sentence: To a person who is attentive to minutiae : "You're certainly observant, even if you're not religious."

meaning_1.description: careful to notice things, especially possible danger.

translations.de: An eine Person, die auf Kleinigkeiten achtet "Du bist sicherlich beobachtend, auch wenn du nicht religiös bist."
translations.fr: À une personne qui fait attention aux détails  "Tu es certainement observateur, même si tu n'es pas religieux."
translations.ko: 세심하게 주의를 기울이는 사람에게  "당신은 종교적이지 않음에도 불구하고 분명히 관찰력이 있네요."

meaning_2.description: careful to fulfil the requirements of one's religion.

translations.de: An eine Person, die auf Kleinigkeiten achtet "Du bist sicherlich fromm, auch wenn du nicht religiös bist."
translations.fr: À une personne qui fait attention aux détails  "Tu es certainement pratiquant, même si tu n'es pas religieux."
translations.ko: 세심하게 주의를 기울이는 사람에게  "당신은 종교적이지 않음에도 불구하고 분명히 신앙롭네요."

766.pun_sentence: An Electrician's work is well grounded.

meaning_1.description: having a good understanding of the basics or being sensible and rational

translations.de: Die Arbeit eines Elektrikers ist gut begründet.
translations.fr: Le travail d'un électricien est bien fondé.
translations.ko: 전기기사의 일은 잘 근거가 있습니다.

meaning_2.description: connected to the ground, especially in terms of electrical equipment.

translations.de: Die Arbeit eines Elektrikers ist gut geerdet.
translations.fr: Le travail d'un électricien est bien mis à la terre.
translations.ko: 전기기사의 일은 잘 접지되어 있습니다.

767.pun_sentence: The scorpion said to the desert,'You know, our conversations are always so dry.'

meaning_1.description: Lacking moisture or water.

translations.de: Der Skorpion sagte zur Wüste "Weißt du, unsere Gespräche sind immer so trocken."
translations.fr: Le scorpion a dit au désert  "Tu sais, nos conversations sont toujours si sèches."
translations.ko: 전갈이 사막에게 말했어요  "너도 알다시피, 우리의 대화는 항상 너무 건조해."

meaning_2.description: Dull, uninteresting or lacking in humor.

translations.de: Der Skorpion sagte zur Wüste "Weißt du, unsere Gespräche sind immer so langweilig."
translations.fr: Le scorpion a dit au désert  "Tu sais, nos conversations sont toujours si ennuyeuses."
translations.ko: 전갈이 사막에게 말했어요  "너도 알다시피, 우리의 대화는 항상 너무 재미없어."

768.pun_sentence: An argument at the Bomb Squad convention ended in a blowup.

meaning_1.description: An explosion or detonation.

translations.de: Eine Diskussion auf der Bombenentschärfungskonferenz endete in einer Explosion.
translations.fr: Une dispute à la convention de l'escouade des bombes a fini en une explosion.
translations.ko: 폭발반 회의에서의 논쟁이 폭발로 끝났습니다.

meaning_2.description: A heated argument, fight or disagreement.

translations.de: Eine Diskussion auf der Bombenentschärfungskonferenz endete in einem heftigen Streit.
translations.fr: Une dispute à la convention de l'escouade des bombes a fini en un vif-échange.
translations.ko: 폭발반 회의에서의 논쟁이 격렬한 말다툼으로 끝났습니다.

769.pun_sentence: After a day of changing her triplet's diapers, the new mother was feeling rather pooped.

meaning_1.description: feeling very tired or exhausted

translations.de: Nach einem Tag voller Windelwechsel bei ihren Drillingen fühlte sich die neue Mutter ziemlich erschöpft.
translations.fr: Après une journée à changer les couches de son triplé, la nouvelle mère se sentait plutôt épuisée.
translations.ko: 삼둥이의 기저귀를 하루 종일 갈아준 후, 새로운 엄마는 상당히 피곤해 느껴졌다.

meaning_2.description: defecated

translations.de: Nach einem Tag voller Windelwechsel bei ihren Drillingen fühlte sich die neue Mutter ziemlich "voll".
translations.fr: Après une journée à changer les couches de son triplé, la nouvelle mère se sentait plutôt "faire caca".
translations.ko: 삼둥이의 기저귀를 하루 종일 갈아준 후, 새로운 엄마는 상당히 '똥쌌어' 느껴졌다.(meaning 2 can be inappropriate in Korean culture when directly translated. It's always good to remember cultural differences when translating puns as they don't always have the same effect in different languages and cultures.)

770.pun_sentence: Saw makers losing money have to make lots of cuts.

meaning_1.description: reductions or lessening of something, such as expenses or costs.

translations.de: Sägehersteller, die Geld verlieren, müssen viele Kürzungen vornehmen.
translations.fr: Les fabricants de scies qui perdent de l'argent doivent faire beaucoup de coupures.
translations.ko: 돈을 잃는 톱 제조업체들은 많은 고득점을 해야해요.

meaning_2.description: physical incisions made on a material, such as wood, using a saw.

translations.de: Sägehersteller, die Geld verlieren, müssen viele Schnitte machen.
translations.fr: Les fabricants de scies qui perdent de l'argent doivent faire beaucoup de coupes.
translations.ko: 돈을 잃는 톱 제조업체들은 많은 절삭을 해야해요.

771.pun_sentence: OLD EXORCISTS never die, they just get repossessed.

meaning_1.description: To take back possession of something, especially a house, when payments have not been made.

translations.de: Alte Exorzisten sterben nie, sie werden einfach wieder in Besitz genommen.
translations.fr: Les vieux exorcistes ne meurent jamais, ils sont simplement repris.
translations.ko: 노련한 퇴마사는 결코 죽지 않아, 그들은 그저 다시 재점유당해.

meaning_2.description: to be possessed again by an evil spirit, in a religious or spiritual context

translations.de: Alte Exorzisten sterben nie, sie werden einfach erneut besessen.
translations.fr: Les vieux exorcistes ne meurent jamais, ils sont simplement de nouveaux possédés.
translations.ko: 노련한 퇴마사는 결코 죽지 않아, 그들은 그저 다시 점령당해.

772.pun_sentence: Doctor, doctor, I think I'm a bridge. - What's come over you? - Two cars, a truck and a coach.

meaning_1.description: to move or travel towards or into a place

translations.de: "Doktor, Doktor, ich glaube, ich bin eine Brücke. - Was ist über dich gekommen? - Zwei Autos, ein LKW und ein Reisebus."
translations.fr: "Docteur, docteur, je pense que je suis un pont. - Qu'est-ce qui est passé sur vous ? - Deux voitures, un camion et un autocar."
translations.ko: "의사님, 의사님, 저, 저 다리인 것 같아요. - 무슨 일이세요? - 두 대의 차, 트럭 하나와 코치버스가 지나갔어요."

meaning_2.description: to cause a person to feel or behave a certain way

translations.de: "Doktor, Doktor, ich glaube, ich bin eine Brücke. - Was hat dich beeinflusst? - Zwei Autos, ein LKW und ein Reisebus."
translations.fr: "Docteur, docteur, je pense que je suis un pont. - Qu'est-ce qui vous a affecté ? - Deux voitures, un camion et un autocar."
translations.ko: "의사님, 의사님, 저, 저 다리인 것 같아요. - 무슨 일이세요? - 두 대의 차, 트럭 하나와 코치버스가 영향을 주었어요."

773.pun_sentence: OLD MEDIUMS never die, they just lose their spirits.

meaning_1.description: morale or enthusiasm.

translations.de: Alte Medien sterben nie, sie verlieren einfach nur ihren Geist.
translations.fr: Les vieux médiums ne meurent jamais, ils perdent simplement leur esprit.
translations.ko: 노란 미디엄들은 절대 죽지 않아요, 그들은 그저 그들의 정신을 잃을 뿐이예요.

meaning_2.description: supernatural entities that a medium, someone who claims to communicate with the dead

translations.de: Alte Medien sterben nie, sie verlieren einfach nur ihre Geister.
translations.fr: Les vieux médiums ne meurent jamais, ils perdent simplement leurs esprits.
translations.ko: 노란 미디엄들은 절대 죽지 않아요, 그들은 그저 그들의 영혼을 잃을 뿐이예요.

774.pun_sentence: OLD LUMBERJACKS never die, they just split.

meaning_1.description: To break or cause to break forcibly into parts.

translations.de: Alte Holzfäller sterben nie, sie spalten nur.
translations.fr: Les vieux bûcherons ne meurent jamais, ils se fendent juste.
translations.ko: 노련한 나무꾼들은 결코 죽지 않아, 그저 쪼개지기만 해.

meaning_2.description: To leave a place, often for another.

translations.de: Alte Holzfäller sterben nie, sie gehen einfach.
translations.fr: Les vieux bûcherons ne meurent jamais, ils partent juste.
translations.ko: 노련한 나무꾼들은 결코 죽지 않아, 그저 떠나기만 해.

775.pun_sentence: Martians welcome. We have space for everyone.

meaning_1.description: An area that is free or unoccupied.

translations.de: Marsmenschen willkommen. Wir haben Platz für jeden.
translations.fr: Martiens bienvenus. Nous avons de l'espace pour tout le monde.
translations.ko: 화성인을 환영합니다. 우리는 모두를 위한 공간이 있습니다.

meaning_2.description: The physical universe beyond the earth's atmosphere.

translations.de: Marsmenschen willkommen. Wir haben Raum für jeden.
translations.fr: Martiens bienvenus. Nous avons de l'espace pour tout l'univers.
translations.ko: 화성인을 환영합니다. 우리는 모두를 위한 우주가 있습니다.

776.pun_sentence: The fish missed the call because he was stuck on the other line.

meaning_1.description: A telephone connection.

translations.de: Der Fisch verpasste den Anruf, weil er an der anderen Leitung hing.
translations.fr: Le poisson a manqué l'appel car il était coincé sur l'autre ligne.
translations.ko: 그 물고기는 다른 라인에 걸려서 전화를 놓쳤어요.

meaning_2.description: A fishing line.

translations.de: Der Fisch verpasste den Anruf, weil er an der anderen Angelschnur hing.
translations.fr: Le poisson a manqué l'appel car il était coincé sur l'autre ligne de pêche.
translations.ko: 그 물고기는 다른 낚싯줄에 걸려서 전화를 놓쳤어요.

777.pun_sentence: No bungee cords, but we encourage leaps of faith.

meaning_1.description: The act of jumping or springing a long way, to a great height, or with great force.

translations.de: Keine Bungeeseile, aber wir ermutigen zu weiten Sprüngen.
translations.fr: Pas de cordes de bungee, mais nous encourageons les grands sauts.
translations.ko: 번지 줄은 없지만, 우리는 큰 도약을 격려합니다.

meaning_2.description: A daring step or decision which might come with great consequences.

translations.de: Keine Bungeeseile, aber wir ermutigen zu gewagten Entscheidungen.
translations.fr: Pas de cordes de bungee, mais nous encourageons les bonds de foi.
translations.ko: 번지 줄은 없지만, 우리는 대담한 결정을 위한 믿음의 도약을 격려합니다.

778.pun_sentence: After the six campers were discovered missing from their tents the state police began to canvas the area.

meaning_1.description: heavy-duty fabric used for making tents

translations.de: Nachdem die sechs Camper aus ihren Zelten verschwanden, begann die Polizei, den Bereich mit Leinwand zu bedecken.
translations.fr: Après la disparition des six campeurs de leurs tentes, la police a commencé à toileter la zone.
translations.ko: 여섯 명의 캠퍼가 텐트에서 사라진 후에, 주 경찰은 그 지역을 캔버스로 덮기 시작했다.

meaning_2.description: To cover, inspect or look around a particular area or place, usually in an attempt to find something or someone.

translations.de: Nachdem die sechs Camper aus ihren Zelten verschwanden, begann die Polizei, das Gebiet zu durchkämmen.
translations.fr: Après la disparition des six campeurs de leurs tentes, la police a commencé à fouiller la zone.
translations.ko: 여섯 명의 캠퍼가 텐트에서 사라진 후에, 주 경찰은 그 지역을 조사하기 시작했다.

779.pun_sentence: An accountant for a restaurant has to be sure the books are not cooked.

meaning_1.description: prepare food by subjecting it to heat

translations.de: Ein Buchhalter für ein Restaurant muss sicherstellen, dass die Bücher nicht gekocht werden.
translations.fr: Un comptable pour un restaurant doit s'assurer que les livres ne sont pas cuisinés.
translations.ko: 레스토랑의 회계사는 책들이 요리되지 않도록 확인해야 한다.

meaning_2.description: to alter accounting records dishonestly or illegally, usually to disguise a company's true financial position

translations.de: Ein Buchhalter für ein Restaurant muss sicherstellen, dass die Bücher nicht frisiert werden.
translations.fr: Un comptable pour un restaurant doit s'assurer que les livres ne sont pas maquillés.
translations.ko: 레스토랑의 회계사는 장부가 부정하게 조작되지 않게 해야 한다.

780.pun_sentence: OLD MUFFLERS never die they just get exhausted.

meaning_1.description: Extremely tired, to the point of being unable to continue.

translations.de: Alte Schalldämpfer sterben nie, sie werden einfach nur völlig erschöpft.
translations.fr: Les vieux silencieux ne meurent jamais, ils deviennent juste totalement épuisés.
translations.ko: 오래된 머플러는 절대 죽지 않아, 그저 완전히 피곤해질 뿐이야.

meaning_2.description: has been used to its limit and is no longer able to remove gases efficiently..

translations.de: Alte Schalldämpfer sterben nie, sie werden einfach nur vollständig ausgebrannt.
translations.fr: Les vieux silencieux ne meurent jamais, ils deviennent juste entièrement consumés.
translations.ko: 오래된 머플러는 절대 죽지 않아, 그냥 완전히 소진되는 거야.

781.pun_sentence: If you’re looking for a sign from god, this is it.

meaning_1.description: A symbol or indication with a particular meaning.

translations.de: Wenn Sie ein Zeichen von Gott suchen, ist dies es.
translations.fr: Si vous cherchez un signe de Dieu, c'est ça.
translations.ko: 만약 당신이 신의 징조를 찾고 있다면, 이것이 그것입니다.

meaning_2.description: A posted notice bearing a designation, direction, or command.

translations.de: Wenn Sie ein Schild von Gott suchen, ist dies es.
translations.fr: Si vous cherchez une enseigne de Dieu, c'est ça.
translations.ko: 만약 당신이 신의 표지판을 찾고 있다면, 이것이 그것입니다.

782.pun_sentence: A skier retired because he was going downhill.

meaning_1.description: a downhill skiing race

translations.de: Ein Skifahrer ist in den Ruhestand getreten, weil er abwärts fuhr.
translations.fr: Un skieur a pris sa retraite parce qu'il faisait de la descente.
translations.ko: 스키 선수가 하향 경기 때문에 은퇴했습니다.

meaning_2.description: deteriorating in quality, performance, or condition.

translations.de: Ein Skifahrer ist in den Ruhestand getreten, weil es mit ihm bergab ging.
translations.fr: Un skieur a pris sa retraite parce qu'il allait à la dérive.
translations.ko: 스키 선수가 점점 퇴보하기 때문에 은퇴했습니다.

783.pun_sentence: Doctor, Doctor I feel like a pair of curtains - Well pull yourself together then. Next.

meaning_1.description: to exert force in order to move something towards oneself, in this case, the curtains.

translations.de: Doktor, Doktor, ich fühle mich wie ein Paar Vorhänge - Na dann zieh dich doch zusammen. Nächster.
translations.fr: Docteur, docteur, je me sens comme un rideau - Eh bien, tire-toi ensemble alors. Suivant.
translations.ko: 의사님, 의사님, 저 마치 커튼 같아요 - 그럼 당신 스스로를 모아 보세요. 다음 사람.

meaning_2.description: to become calm and behave normally again after being angry or upset.

translations.de: Doktor, Doktor, ich fühle mich wie ein Paar Vorhänge - Na dann beruhig dich doch. Nächster.
translations.fr: Docteur, docteur, je me sens comme un rideau - Eh bien, reprends-toi alors. Suivant.
translations.ko: 의사님, 의사님, 저 마치 커튼 같아요 - 그럼 진정하자고요. 다음 사람.

784.pun_sentence: The gravity was so powerful, I couldn't stand it.

meaning_1.description: be upright or on your feet

translations.de: Die Schwerkraft war so stark, ich konnte nicht stehen.
translations.fr: La gravité était si puissante, je ne pouvais pas tenir debout.
translations.ko: 중력이 너무 강해서, 나는 서 있을 수 없었어.

meaning_2.description: to endure or tolerate a situation

translations.de: Die Schwerkraft war so stark, ich konnte es nicht aushalten.
translations.fr: La gravité était si puissante, je ne pouvais pas le supporter.
translations.ko: 그 중력이 너무 강해서, 나는 견디지 못했어.

785.pun_sentence: I can't remember ever getting nits as a kid, although I do have a lousy memory.

meaning_1.description: poor quality, bad, or disappointing.

translations.de: Ich kann mich nicht daran erinnern, als Kind jemals Läuse gehabt zu haben, obwohl ich ein schlechtes Gedächtnis habe.
translations.fr: Je ne me souviens pas avoir eu des poux quand j'étais enfant, bien que j'aie une mauvaise mémoire.
translations.ko: 나는 어릴 때 벼룩에 걸린 적이 없다고 기억하는데, 비록 내 기억력이 나쁘긴 하지만.

meaning_2.description: infested with lice, a parasitic insect.

translations.de: Ich kann mich nicht daran erinnern, als Kind jemals Läuse gehabt zu haben, obwohl ich ein lausiges Gedächtnis habe.
translations.fr: Je ne me souviens pas avoir eu des poux quand j'étais enfant, bien que j'aie une mémoire infestée de poux.
translations.ko: 나는 어릴 때 벼룩에 걸린 적이 없다고 기억하는데, 비록 내 기억력이 벼룩 같긴 하지만.

786.pun_sentence: OLD INTERPRETERS (for the deaf) never die, they just sign off.

meaning_1.description: to communicate or indicate something by means of gestures or symbols, typically in the context of sign language.

translations.de: ALTE DOLMETSCHER (für Gehörlose) sterben nie, sie gebärden nur ab.
translations.fr: Les anciens interprètes (pour les sourds) ne meurent jamais, ils se contentent de signer la fin.
translations.ko: 노년의 수화 통역사들은 결코 죽지 않아요. 그들은 그저 사인으로 끝을 보내요.

meaning_2.description: end a broadcast or to conclude any activity

translations.de: ALTE DOLMETSCHER (für Gehörlose) sterben nie, sie beenden nur ihre Tätigkeit.
translations.fr: Les anciens interprètes (pour les sourds) ne meurent jamais, ils se contentent de finir.
translations.ko: 노년의 수화 통역사들은 결코 죽지 않아요. 그들은 그저 활동을 마치기만 해요.

787.pun_sentence: Just because pews come in rows doesn’t mean we should plant ourselves there.

meaning_1.description: To place or fix in a specific position.

translations.de: Nur weil Kirchenbänke in Reihen stehen, bedeutet das nicht, dass wir uns dort positionieren sollten.
translations.fr: Ce n'est pas parce que les bancs d'église sont en rangées que nous devrions nous y placer.
translations.ko: 교회의 좌석이 행으로 배열되어 있다고 해서 우리가 그곳에 고정될 필요는 없습니다.

meaning_2.description: To cultivate or grow, as you would a plant.

translations.de: Nur weil Kirchenbänke in Reihen stehen, bedeutet das nicht, dass wir uns dort kultivieren sollten.
translations.fr: Ce n'est pas parce que les bancs d'église sont en rangées que nous devrions nous y cultiver.
translations.ko: 교회의 좌석이 행으로 배열되어 있다고 해서 우리가 그곳에서 자라날 필요는 없습니다.

788.pun_sentence: She was only a Rancher's daughter, but she couldn't keep her calves together.

meaning_1.description: The back lower part of the leg between the ankle and the knee.

translations.de: Sie war nur die Tochter eines Ranchers, aber sie konnte ihre Waden nicht zusammenhalten.
translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'un rancher, mais elle n'arrivait pas à garder ses mollets ensemble.
translations.ko: 그녀는 랜치 주인의 딸일 뿐이었지만, 그녀의 종아리를 떨어뜨리지 않을 수 없었다.

meaning_2.description: a very young cow

translations.de: Sie war nur die Tochter eines Ranchers, aber sie konnte ihre Kälber nicht zusammenhalten.
translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'un rancher, mais elle n'arrivait pas à garder ses veaux ensemble.
translations.ko: 그녀는 랜치 주인의 딸일 뿐이었지만, 그녀의 송아지를 떨어뜨일 수 없었다.

789.pun_sentence: A guy went to a costume party dressed as a knife, and he really looked sharp.

meaning_1.description: having an edge or point that is able to cut or pierce something.

translations.de: Ein Kerl ging zu einer Kostümparty verkleidet als ein Messer, und er sah wirklich scharf aus.
translations.fr: Un gars est allé à une fête costumée habillé en couteau, et il paraissait vraiment tranchant.
translations.ko: 한 남자가 칼로 변장해서 복장 파티에 갔는데, 정말로 날카롭게 보였어요.

meaning_2.description: looking or seeming to look attractive, intelligent, or chic.

translations.de: Ein Kerl ging zu einer Kostümparty verkleidet als ein Messer, und er sah wirklich schick aus.
translations.fr: Un gars est allé à une fête costumée habillé en couteau, et il paraissait vraiment élégant.
translations.ko: 한 남자가 칼로 변장해서 복장 파티에 갔는데, 정말로 멋있게 보였어요.

790.pun_sentence: Thieves who steal corn from a garden could be charged with stalking.

meaning_1.description: The act of following or pursuing someone stealthily.

translations.de: Diebe, die Mais aus einem Garten stehlen, könnten der Verfolgung beschuldigt werden.
translations.fr: Les voleurs qui volent du maïs dans un jardin pourraient être accusés de harcèlement.
translations.ko: 정원에서 옥수수를 훔치는 도둑은 추적하는 것으로 고발될 수 있습니다.

meaning_2.description: The act of removing stalks from fruits, vegetables, or plants.

translations.de: Diebe, die Mais aus einem Garten stehlen, könnten des Entfernens von Stielen angeklagt werden.
translations.fr: Les voleurs qui volent du maïs dans un jardin pourraient être accusés de dépiquage.
translations.ko: 정원에서 옥수수를 훔치는 도둑은 줄기를 제거하는 것으로 고발될 수 있습니다.

791.pun_sentence: Old school principals never die, they just lose their faculties.

meaning_1.description: the inherent mental or physical power of a person.

translations.de: Alte Schuldirektoren sterben nie, sie verlieren einfach ihre Fähigkeiten.
translations.fr: Les anciens principaux d’écoles ne meurent jamais, ils perdent simplement leurs facultés.
translations.ko: 고인 물이 될 선생님은 절대로 죽지 않아요, 그들은 단지 그들의 능력을 잃을 뿐이에요.

meaning_2.description: a department or group of related departments within a university, in academic terminology

translations.de: Alte Schulleiter sterben nie, sie verlieren einfach ihre Fakultäten.
translations.fr: Les vieux directeurs d'école ne meurent jamais, ils perdent simplement leurs facultés.
translations.ko: 고인 물이 될 선생님은 절대로 죽지 않아요, 그들은 단지 그들의 학부를 잃을 뿐이에요.

792.pun_sentence: A hole has been found in the nudist camp wall. The police are looking into it.

meaning_1.description: investigating or examining.

translations.de: Ein Loch wurde in der Wand des FKK-Camps gefunden. Die Polizei untersucht es.
translations.fr: Un trou a été trouvé dans le mur du camp de nudistes. La police enquête dessus.
translations.ko: 누디스트 캠프의 벽에 구멍이 발견되었어. 경찰이 조사 중이야.

meaning_2.description: viewing or watching.

translations.de: Ein Loch wurde in der Wand des FKK-Camps gefunden. Die Polizei schaut hinein.
translations.fr: Un trou a été trouvé dans le mur du camp de nudistes. La police regarde dedans.
translations.ko: 누디스트 캠프의 벽에 구멍이 발견되었어. 경찰이 그것을 보고 있어.

793.pun_sentence: A pirate with one hand often picked up the phone. He wanted to get off the hook.

meaning_1.description: a device for catching hold of objects, especially one attached to the end of a cord or wire.

translations.de: Ein Pirat mit einer Hand nahm oft das Telefon ab. Er wollte vom Haken kommen.
translations.fr: Un pirate avec une main décrochait souvent le téléphone. Il voulait se libérer du crochet.
translations.ko: 한 손이 있는 해적은 종종 전화를 받았어요. 그는 갈고리에서 벗어나길 원했어요.

meaning_2.description: being engaged or involved in a difficult or unwanted situation

translations.de: Ein Pirat mit einer Hand nahm oft das Telefon ab. Er wollte aus einer heiklen Situation herauskommen.
translations.fr: Un pirate avec une main décrochait souvent le téléphone. Il voulait se extraire d'une situation difficile.
translations.ko: 한 손이 있는 해적은 종종 전화를 받았어요. 그는 어려운 상황에서 벗어나길 원했어요.

794.pun_sentence: After he bought a mirror he became very reflective.

meaning_1.description: relating to or caused by light that reflects off a surface

translations.de: Nachdem er einen Spiegel gekauft hatte, wurde er sehr reflektierend.
translations.fr: Après avoir acheté un miroir, il est devenu très réfléchissant.
translations.ko: 거울을 산 후에 그가 매우 반사적이게 되었어요.

meaning_2.description: Engaging in deep thought or contemplation.

translations.de: Nachdem er einen Spiegel gekauft hatte, wurde er sehr nachdenklich.
translations.fr: Après avoir acheté un miroir, il est devenu très contemplatif.
translations.ko: 거울을 산 후에 그가 매우 사색적이게 되었어요.

795.pun_sentence: Plumbers often have to tap their natural abilities.

meaning_1.description: To use or exploit a resource.

translations.de: Klempner müssen oft auf ihre natürlichen Fähigkeiten zurückgreifen.
translations.fr: Les plombiers ont souvent recours à leurs talents naturels.
translations.ko: 배관공들은 종종 자연적인 능력을 활용해야 해요.

meaning_2.description: device for controlling the release of a liquid or gas

translations.de: Klempner haben oft mit dem Öffnen von Wasserhähnen zu tun.
translations.fr: Les plombiers ont souvent à manipuler des robinets.
translations.ko: 배관공들은 자주 수도꼭지를 다루어야 해요.

meaning_1.description: a very unpleasant or terrible place

translations.de: Die Hölle ist das Schlimmste.
translations.fr: L'enfer, c'est le pire.
translations.ko: 지옥은 최악이야.

meaning_2.description: a large hole in the ground

translations.de: Die Hölle ist ein tiefes Loch.
translations.fr: L'enfer est un grand trou dans le sol.
translations.ko: 지옥은 큰 구멍이야.

797.pun_sentence: When the butter melted, it was rendered useless.

meaning_1.description: To cause to become.

translations.de: Als die Butter schmolz, wurde sie nutzlos.
translations.fr: Quand le beurre a fondu, il est devenu inutile.
translations.ko: 버터가 녹아서 쓸모 없어졌어요.

meaning_2.description: to melt down

translations.de: Als die Butter schmolz, war sie heruntergeschmolzen.
translations.fr: Quand le beurre a fondu, il a été rendu.
translations.ko: 버터가 녹았어, 그래서 다시는 사용하지 못했어.

798.pun_sentence: Q : River Ravi flows in which state? A : Liquid.

meaning_1.description: A distinct area or territory within a country.

translations.de: Q  In welchem Staat fließt der Fluss Ravi? A  Flüssig.
translations.fr: Q  Le fleuve Ravi coule dans quel état ? A  Liquide.
translations.ko: Q  라비 강은 어느 주에서 흐르나요? A  액체 상태로.

meaning_2.description: the fact of being a liquid, solid, or gas

translations.de: Q  In welchem Zustand fließt der Fluss Ravi? A  Flüssig.
translations.fr: Q  Le fleuve Ravi coule dans quel état de la matière? A  Liquide.
translations.ko: Q  라비 강은 어떤 상태로 흐르나요? A  액체 상태로.

799.pun_sentence: OLD NEWSPAPER PUBLISHERS never die, they just lose their circulation.

meaning_1.description: The distribution or dissemination of newspaper or periodicals to the public.

translations.de: Alte Zeitungsverleger sterben nie, sie verlieren nur ihre Verbreitung.
translations.fr: Les anciens éditeurs de journaux ne meurent jamais, ils perdent juste leur diffusion.
translations.ko: 오래된 신문 출판사는 절대로 죽지 않아, 그들은 단지 그들의 유통을 잃어버리는 거야.

meaning_2.description: The movement of blood through the body's blood vessels due to the pumping action of the heart.

translations.de: Alte Zeitungsverleger sterben nie, sie verlieren nur ihren Kreislauf.
translations.fr: Les anciens éditeurs de journaux ne meurent jamais, ils perdent juste leur circulation.
translations.ko: 오래된 신문 출판사는 절대로 죽지 않아, 그들은 단지 그들의 순환을 잃어버리는 거야.

800.pun_sentence: A leak in the back of a boat is a stern warning.

meaning_1.description: the back end of a boat or ship

translations.de: Eine Leck im Heck eines Bootes ist eine strenge Warnung.
translations.fr: Une fuite à l'arrière d'un bateau est un avertissement strict.
translations.ko: 배의 뒷부분에서 누출이 발생하는 것은 엄중한 경고입니다.

meaning_2.description: serious, strict, or harsh

translations.de: Eine Leck im Heck eines Bootes ist ein ernster Warnhinweis.
translations.fr: Une fuite à l'arrière d'un bateau est un avertissement sérieux.
translations.ko: 배의 뒷부분에서 누출이 발생하는 것은 엄격한 경고입니다.

801.pun_sentence: A politician decided to resign on the day of an eclipse because it was a dark day.

meaning_1.description: Absence of light.

translations.de: Ein Politiker entschied sich am Tag einer Sonnenfinsternis zum Rücktritt, weil es ein lichtloser Tag war.
translations.fr: Un politicien a décidé de démissionner le jour d'une éclipse parce que c'était un jour sans lumière.
translations.ko: 정치인이 일식의 날에 사퇴를 결정했는데, 그것은 빛이 없는 날이었기 때문이다.

meaning_2.description: A gloomy or hopeless situation.

translations.de: Ein Politiker entschied sich am Tag einer Sonnenfinsternis zum Rücktritt, weil es ein düsterer Tag war.
translations.fr: Un politicien a décidé de démissionner le jour d'une éclipse parce que c'était un jour sombre.
translations.ko: 정치인이 일식의 날에 사퇴를 결정했는데, 그것은 어두운 날이었기 때문이다.

802.pun_sentence: When the beekeeper moved into town he created quite a buzz.

meaning_1.description: A common sound made by bees.

translations.de: Als der Imker in die Stadt zog, erzeugte er ziemlich ein Summen.
translations.fr: Lorsque l'apiculteur a emménagé en ville, il a créé un certain bourdonnement.
translations.ko: 벌통지기가 마을에 이사오자마자 꽤 큰 소음을 만들었어요.

meaning_2.description: the things that are being said about something

translations.de: Als der Imker in die Stadt zog, sorgte er für ziemlich einen Tumult.
translations.fr: Lorsque l'apiculteur a emménagé en ville, il a créé un certain buzz.
translations.ko: 벌통지기가 마을에 이사오자마자 꽤 많은 이야기를 만들었어요.

803.pun_sentence: OLD HUMAN CANNONBALLS never die they just get fired.

meaning_1.description: Getting discharged or terminated from a job.

translations.de: ALTE MENSCHLICHE KANONENKUGELN sterben nie, sie werden nur gefeuert.
translations.fr: LES VIEUX HOMMES-CANNONS ne meurent jamais, ils se font juste licencier.
translations.ko: 늙은 인간 대포알들은 절대 죽지 않아, 그들은 그저 해고당하기만 해.

meaning_2.description: Being launched from a cannon.

translations.de: ALTE MENSCHLICHE KANONENKUGELN sterben nie, sie werden nur abgeschossen.
translations.fr: LES VIEUX HOMMES-CANNONS ne meurent jamais, ils se font juste tirer.
translations.ko: 늙은 인간 대포알들은 절대 죽지 않아, 그들은 그저 쏘아지기만 해.

804.pun_sentence: Edison thought it would be an illuminating experience.

meaning_1.description: providing light or lit up.

translations.de: Edison dachte, es wäre eine erhellende Erfahrung.
translations.fr: Edison pensait que ce serait une expérience éclairante.
translations.ko: 에디슨은 그것이 밝은 경험이 될 거라고 생각했습니다.

meaning_2.description: providing insight, knowledge, or spiritual illumination.

translations.de: Edison dachte, es wäre eine aufschlussreiche Erfahrung.
translations.fr: Edison pensait que ce serait une expérience éclairée.
translations.ko: 에디슨은 그것이 통찰력을 주는 경험이 될 거라고 생각했습니다.

805.pun_sentence: Basketball players are always bouncing ideas off each other.

meaning_1.description: to cause (a ball, rock, etc.) to hit against a surface and quickly move in a different and usually opposite direction

translations.de: Basketballspieler lassen ihre Ideen immer gegeneinander prallen.
translations.fr: Les joueurs de basket-balle font toujours rebondir leurs idées entre eux.
translations.ko: 농구 선수들은 항상 서로에게 아이디어를 튕겨나가요.

meaning_2.description: to share and discuss ideas with one another for feedback

translations.de: Basketballspieler tauschen ihre Ideen immer mit einander aus.
translations.fr: Les joueurs de basket-ball échangent toujours leurs idées entre eux.
translations.ko: 농구 선수들은 항상 서로 아이디어를 공유하며 토론해요.

806.pun_sentence: An old lady once asked the dispatcher of a local trucking company if they could ship an antique mirror to her sister in Toronto. The dispatcher says, 'I don't know madam, I'd have to look into it first'.

meaning_1.description: to gaze into a mirror

translations.de: Eine alte Dame fragte einmal den Dispatcher eines lokalen Transportunternehmens, ob sie einen antiken Spiegel an ihre Schwester in Toronto schicken könnten. Der Dispatcher sagt,"Ich weiß nicht, Madame, ich müsste zuerst hineinschauen."
translations.fr: Une vieille dame a demandé un jour à l'expéditeur d'une entreprise de camionnage locale s'ils pouvaient envoyer un miroir antique à sa sœur à Toronto. L'expéditeur dit,"Je ne sais pas, madame, je devrais d'abord y jeter un œil."
translations.ko: 한 번 노부인이 지역 화물 운송 회사의 디스패처에게 그녀의 토론토에 거주하는 여동생에게 골동품 거울을 보낼 수 있는지 물었습니다. 디스패처가 말하길, "모르겠습니다, 아주머니. 먼저 그 안을 봐야겠습니다."

meaning_2.description: to investigate or check on something before proceeding

translations.de: Eine alte Dame fragte einmal den Dispatcher eines lokalen Transportunternehmens, ob sie einen antiken Spiegel an ihre Schwester in Toronto schicken könnten. Der Dispatcher sagt,"Ich weiß nicht, Madame, ich müsste das erst prüfen."
translations.fr: Une vieille dame a demandé un jour à l'expéditeur d'une entreprise de camionnage locale s'ils pouvaient envoyer un miroir antique à sa sœur à Toronto. L'expéditeur dit,"Je ne sais pas, madame, je devrais d'abord vérifier cela."
translations.ko: 한 번 노부인이 지역 화물 운송 회사의 디스패처에게 그녀의 토론토에 거주하는 여동생에게 골동품 거울을 보낼 수 있는지 물었습니다. 디스패처가 말하길, "모르겠습니다, 아주머니. 먼저 그것을 확인해 봐야 합니다."

807.pun_sentence: OLD TREE SURGEONS never die, they just pine away.

meaning_1.description: A type of evergreen tree.

translations.de: ALTE BAUMCHIRURGEN sterben nie, sie werden einfach zur Kiefer.
translations.fr: LES ANCIENS ARBORISTES ne meurent jamais, ils deviennent simplement un pin.
translations.ko: 노련한 나무 외과 의사들은 절대 죽지 않아요, 그들은 그냥 소나무가 돼요.

meaning_2.description: To suffer a mental and physical decline, especially because of a broken heart.

translations.de: ALTE BAUMCHIRURGEN sterben nie, sie sehnen sich einfach dahin.
translations.fr: LES ANCIENS ARBORISTES ne meurent jamais, ils dépérissent simplement.
translations.ko: 노련한 나무 외과 의사들은 절대 죽지 않아요, 그들은 그냥 서러워하며 쇠퇴해요.

808.pun_sentence: If a judge loves the sound of his own voice, expect a long sentence.

meaning_1.description: A group of words that expresses a complete thought, usually containing a subject and predicate.

translations.de: Wenn ein Richter den Klang seiner eigenen Stimme liebt, erwarte einen langen Satz.
translations.fr: Si un juge aime le son de sa propre voix, attendez-vous à une longue phrase.
translations.ko: 판사가 자신의 목소리를 좋아한다면, 긴 문장을 기대하십시오.

meaning_2.description: A punishment assigned to a defendant found guilty by a court for a crime committed.

translations.de: Wenn ein Richter den Klang seiner eigenen Stimme liebt, erwarte eine lange Strafe.
translations.fr: Si un juge aime le son de sa propre voix, attendez-vous à une longue peine.
translations.ko: 판사가 자신의 목소리를 좋아한다면, 긴 형벌을 기대하십시오.

809.pun_sentence: A rock band set up on the exchange floor.They wanted to play the stock market.

meaning_1.description: To perform music.

translations.de: Eine Rockband spielte auf dem Börsenparkett. Sie wollten die Börse bespielen.
translations.fr: Un groupe de rock s'est installé sur le parquet de la bourse. Ils voulaient jouer sur le marché boursier.
translations.ko: 록 밴드가 거래소 바닥에 설치됐어요. 그들은 주식 시장에서 연주하고자 했어요.

meaning_2.description: To participate in a game or activity for enjoyment, in this context it refers to making strategic financial decisions in the stock market.

translations.de: Eine Rockband spielte auf dem Börsenparkett. Sie wollten am Aktienmarkt teilnehmen.
translations.fr: Un groupe de rock s'est installé sur le parquet de la bourse. Ils voulaient s'engager sur le marché boursier.
translations.ko: 록 밴드가 거래소 바닥에 설치됐어요. 그들은 주식 시장에서 투자하고자 했어요.

810.pun_sentence: She was always calling for her twins, "on the double."

meaning_1.description: Referring to something that is twice the size or quantity.

translations.de: Sie rief immer nach ihren Zwillingen, ' ' im doppelten Sinne. ' '
translations.fr: Elle appelait toujours ses jumeaux, '' au double. ''
translations.ko: 그녀는 항상 쌍둥이를 부르면서, '' 두 배로. ''

meaning_2.description: An instruction or command to be done quickly or promptly, often used in the military.

translations.de: Sie rief immer nach ihren Zwillingen, ' ' doppelt so schnell. ' '
translations.fr: Elle appelait toujours ses jumeaux, '' au pas de course. ''
translations.ko: 그녀는 항상 쌍둥이를 부르면서, '' 빨리. ''

811.pun_sentence: She was only a Flag - waver's daughter, but she'd let her standards down for anyone.

meaning_1.description: The level or principle of acceptable, good, or correct behavior.

translations.de: Sie war nur die Tochter eines Fahnenschwenkers, aber sie ließ ihre Standards für jeden fallen.
translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'un agitateur de drapeau, mais elle laissait tomber ses normes pour n'importe qui.
translations.ko: 그녀는 단지 깃발을 흔드는 사람의 딸이었지만, 그녀는 누구에게나 자신의 기준을 떨어뜨렸다.

meaning_2.description: A flag, banner or ensign, particularly a military or heraldic flag.

translations.de: Sie war nur die Tochter eines Fahnenschwenkers, aber sie ließ ihre Fahnen für jeden fallen.
translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'un agitateur de drapeau, mais elle laissait tomber ses étendards pour n'importe qui.
translations.ko: 그녀는 단지 깃발을 흔드는 사람의 딸이었지만, 그녀는 누구에게나 자신의 깃발을 떨어뜨렸다.

812.pun_sentence: I was fired from my job selling amplifiers.I didn't achieve the sufficient volume of sales.

meaning_1.description: The number or amount of something

translations.de: Ich wurde von meinem Job als Verstärker-Verkäufer entlassen. Ich habe nicht das ausreichende Volumen an Verkäufen erreicht.
translations.fr: J'ai été licencié de mon travail de vente d'amplificateurs. Je n'ai pas atteint le volume suffisant de ventes.
translations.ko: 나는 앰프를 팔던 직장에서 해고당했다. 나는 충분한 판매량을 달성하지 못했다.

meaning_2.description: Loudness or the strength of the sound.

translations.de: Ich wurde von meinem Job als Verstärker-Verkäufer entlassen. Ich habe nicht die ausreichende Lautstärke erreicht.
translations.fr: J'ai été licencié de mon travail de vente d'amplificateurs. Je n'ai pas atteint le volume sonore suffisant.
translations.ko: 나는 앰프를 팔던 직장에서 해고당했다. 나는 충분한 볼륨을 달성하지 못했다.

813.pun_sentence: Did you hear about the compulsive fisherman?He was really hooked on it.

meaning_1.description: Being extremely interested or obsessed with something.

translations.de: Hast du von dem zwanghaften Fischer gehört? Er war wirklich süchtig danach.
translations.fr: Avez-vous entendu parler du pêcheur compulsif? Il était vraiment accro.
translations.ko: 강박증을 가진 낚시꾼에 대해 들어 봤어요? 그는 그것에 진짜 푹 빠져 있었어요.

meaning_2.description: to catch fish with a hook

translations.de: Hast du von dem zwanghaften Fischer gehört? Er war wirklich daran gehakt.
translations.fr: Avez-vous entendu parler du pêcheur compulsif? Il l'a vraiment hameçonné.
translations.ko: 강박증을 가진 낚시꾼에 대해 들어 봤어요? 그는 그것을 진짜로 낚았어요.

814.pun_sentence: Sign at a deer crossing : The Buck Stops Here.

meaning_1.description: A male deer.

translations.de: Schild an einer Hirschüberquerung Der Hirsch endet hier.

825.pun_sentence: I walked past a gang of youths yesterday and one of them threw a piece of cheese at me, which hit me on the back of the head. I turned round and shouted, "That's not very mature!"

translations.ko: 어제 젊은이들의 무리를 지나갔는데, 그 중 한명이 나에게 치즈 조각을 던져서 뒷머리에 맞았어요. 나는 돌아서서 소리쳤어요 '그건 좀 성숙하지 않네!'

826.pun_sentence: The state police highway officer worked tirelessly in the heavy rain to assist a lady whose car was stuck in a ditch. He was a real trooper.

831.pun_sentence: Ampere was worried he wasn't up to current research.

833.pun_sentence: Harry and Clem the carpenters, argued mightily on how best to complete the dinette set they were working on. They finally agreed to table the discussion.

meaning_1.description: a piece of furniture with a flat top and one or more legs.

translations.de: Harry und Clem, die Zimmermänner, stritten heftig darüber, wie sie das Esszimmerset, an dem sie arbeiteten, am besten fertigstellen könnten. Sie einigten sich schließlich darauf, die Diskussion zum Tisch zu machen.

meaning_2.description: to postpone or defer consideration of a matter.

835.pun_sentence: "My parents are called Billy and Nanny," Tom kidded.

839.pun_sentence: OLD INVESTORS never die they just roll over.

840.pun_sentence: Why was the rabbit depressed?He was just going through a bad patch!

meaning_1.description: a difficult or troubled period in one's life

translations.de: Warum war der Hase deprimiert? Er durchlebte gerade eine schwere Phase!

meaning_2.description: a small piece of ground.

translations.fr: Pourquoi le lapin était-il déprimé? Il traversait seulement un mauvais lopin de terre!
translations.ko: 왜 토끼는 우울했을까? 그는 단지 나쁜 조각 땅을 지나가고 있었어요!

841.pun_sentence: If you walk along a railroad track you may soon feel run down.

meaning_1.description: feeling tired or exhausted

meaning_2.description: to being hit or run over by a train on the railroad tracks

translations.ko: 만약 당신이 철로를 따라 걸으면, 곧 기차에 치이게 될 수 있어요.

translations.fr: L'utilisation de déodorant n'est pas une transpiration.
translations.ko: 데오도란트를 사용하는 것은 땀 흘리는 것이 아니에요.

meaning_2.description: to experience anxiousness or stress over something.

translations.fr: L'utilisation de déodorant n'est pas stressante.
translations.ko: 데오도란트를 사용하는 것은 스트레스 받는 것이 아니에요.

843.pun_sentence: He was hit on the head during a hail storm and was knocked out cold.

meaning_1.description: lacking warmth, normally refers to a lower temperature.

translations.de: Er wurde während eines Hagelsturms am Kopf getroffen und war eiskalt.

translations.ko: 그는 우박 폭풍 중에 머리에 맞아 차갑게 기절했어.

meaning_2.description: Suddenly unconscious or incapacitated.

translations.de: Er wurde während eines Hagelsturms am Kopf getroffen und war bewusstlos.
translations.fr: Il a été frappé à la tête pendant une tempête de grêle et a été assommé et inconscient.
translations.ko: 그는 우박 폭풍 중에 머리에 맞아 갑자기 의식을 잃었어.

844.pun_sentence: The car stopped with a jerk, then the jerk got out.

meaning_1.description: a style of cooking popular in the Caribbean, in which meat is rubbed or marinated in special spices and then cooked

translations.ko: 자동차가 젠킨스 시즌으로 멈췄다. 그리고 젠킨스가 내렸다.

translations.fr: La voiture s'est arrêtée avec un imbécile, puis l'imbécile est sorti.
translations.ko: 자동차가 바보와 함께 멈췄다. 그리고 바보가 내렸다.

845.pun_sentence: OLD STATUES never die they just get busted.

translations.fr: Les vieilles statues ne meurent jamais, elles sont juste endommagées.
translations.ko: 오래된 조각상은 절대 죽지 않아, 그냥 망가져 버리기만 해.

meaning_2.description: arrested or caught doing something wrong.

translations.fr: Les vieilles statues ne meurent jamais, elles sont juste arrêtées.
translations.ko: 오래된 조각상은 절대 죽지 않아, 그냥 붙잡혀 버리기만 해.

846.pun_sentence: While the music was playing the geology teacher was rocking around.

meaning_1.description: moving back and forth, typically to music.

translations.ko: 음악이 흘러나올 때, 지질학 선생님은 흔들려 다녔어요.

translations.ko: 음악이 흘러나올 때, 지질학 선생님은 바위들로 작업하고 있었어요.

847.pun_sentence: Doctor, Doctor, should I file my nails? - No. Throw them away like everybody else. Next.

meaning_1.description: To smooth or shape with a file (a tool used to cut, shave, or finish a hard material).

translations.de: Doktor, Doktor, soll ich meine Nägel feilen? - Nein. Werfen Sie sie weg, wie es jeder andere tut. Nächster.
translations.fr: Docteur, Docteur, devrais-je limer mes ongles ? - Non. Jetez-les comme tout le monde. Suivant.
translations.ko: 의사님, 제 손톱을 갈아야 하나요? - 아니요. 다른 사람들처럼 그냥 버려요. 다음.

meaning_2.description: To submit or send records or documents for archival or official purposes.

translations.de: Doktor, Doktor, soll ich meine Nägel einreichen? - Nein. Werfen Sie sie weg, wie es jeder andere tut. Nächster.
translations.fr: Docteur, Docteur, dois-je déposer mes ongles ? - Non. Jetez-les comme tout le monde. Suivant.
translations.ko: 의사님, 제 손톱을 제출해야 하나요? - 아니요. 다른 사람들처럼 그냥 버려요. 다음.

848.pun_sentence: He's a good letter carrier. He always keeps you posted.

meaning_1.description: To mail or to send a letter or package.

translations.ko: 그는 좋은 우편 집배원이야. 항상 편지를 보내줘.

meaning_2.description: To inform or update someone about a situation.

translations.de: Er ist ein guter Postbote. Er hält Sie immer auf dem Laufenden.
translations.fr: C'est un bon facteur. Il vous tient toujours au courant.
translations.ko: 그는 좋은 우편 집배원이야. 항상 최신 정보를 알려줘.

849.pun_sentence: The valuable dog was still missing, believed stolen, however the police announced they have a lead.

meaning_1.description: Information or evidence that may help in the solving of a problem or case.

translations.de: Der wertvolle Hund war immer noch vermisst, man glaubte, er sei gestohlen worden, jedoch kündigte die Polizei an, dass sie eine Spur haben.
translations.fr: Le chien précieux était toujours porté disparu, probablement volé, cependant, la police a annoncé qu'ils avaient une piste.
translations.ko: 값비싼 개는 여전히 실종되었으며, 도난 당했다고 생각되었지만, 경찰은 단서를 갖고 있다고 발표했습니다.

translations.fr: Le chien précieux était toujours porté disparu, probablement volé, cependant, la police a annoncé qu'ils avaient une laisse.
translations.ko: 값비싼 개는 여전히 실종되었으며, 도난 당했다고 생각되었지만, 경찰은 리드(개가줄)를 갖고 있다고 발표했습니다.

850.pun_sentence: OLD LIBRARIANS never die, they just check out.

translations.de: ALTE BIBLIOTHEKARE sterben nie, sie checken nur aus.
translations.fr: LES VIEUX BIBLIOTHÉCAIRES ne meurent jamais, ils s'en vont juste.
translations.ko: 노인 도서관 사서들은 결코 죽지 않아, 그들은 단지 생을 마감해가.

851.pun_sentence: Why do people preserve fruits and vegetables? Because they 'can'.

meaning_1.description: to be able to

852.pun_sentence: When I had my PlayStation stolen, my family were there to console me.

translations.ko: 내 PlayStation이 도난당했을 때, 내 가족이 나를 위로하기 위해 콘솔로 왔어요.

meaning_2.description: to comfort or cheer up someone

translations.de: Als meine PlayStation gestohlen wurde, war meine Familie dort, um mich zu trösten.
translations.fr: Quand ma PlayStation a été volée, ma famille était là pour me consoler.
translations.ko: 내 PlayStation이 도난당했을 때, 내 가족이 나를 위로하기 위해 왔어요.

853.pun_sentence: Young women who are mathematics professors closely watch their figures.

meaning_1.description: Mathematical calculations or numerical data.

854.pun_sentence: He had trouble in his new job making tents and got himself into a flap.

meaning_1.description: a piece of fabric hanging loosely from a larger piece, as in a tent.

translations.de: Er hatte Schwierigkeiten in seinem neuen Job beim Zeltbau und bekam sich selbst in einen Überhang.
translations.fr: Il avait des problèmes dans son nouveau travail de fabrication de tentes et s'est retrouvé dans un panneau pendulant.
translations.ko: 그는 새로운 텐트 만드는 일에서 고생했고, 그 자신을 텐트의 플랩에 걸렸어요.

855.pun_sentence: Poor blood circulation runs through the family.

translations.de: Eine schlechte Blutzirkulation rennt durch die Familie.
translations.fr: Une mauvaise circulation sanguine court dans la famille.

856.pun_sentence: Wally wasn't sure in which branch of the Army he wanted to serve, but he gravitated toward the paratroops.

meaning_1.description: To be attracted to something.

translations.de: Wally war sich nicht sicher, in welchem Zweig der Armee er dienen wollte, aber er fühlte sich zu den Fallschirmjägern hingezogen.

translations.ko: 월리는 군대의 어느 부대에서 복무하고 싶은지 확실하지 않았지만, 그는 공수부대에 끌렸다.

857.pun_sentence: My new girlfriend and I are moving together into a tree house, I hope we won't fall out.

translations.ko: 나의 새로운 여자친구와 나는 트리 하우스에 함께 이사를 가는 중이에요, 우리가 떨어지지 않기를 바래요.

meaning_2.description: To have a disagreement or begin to dislike each other.

translations.de: Meine neue Freundin und ich ziehen zusammen in ein Baumhaus ein, ich hoffe, wir vertragen uns gut.
translations.fr: Ma nouvelle petite amie et moi emménageons ensemble dans une maison dans les arbres, j'espère que nous ne nous disputerons pas.
translations.ko: 나의 새로운 여자친구와 나는 트리 하우스에 함께 이사를 가는 중이에요, 우리가 헤어지지 않기를 바래요.

858.pun_sentence: I used to be a banker but I lost interest

meaning_1.description: Enthusiasm or passion for a career or job.

translations.de: Ich war früher Bankier, aber ich habe das Interesse verloren.
translations.fr: J'étais banquier, mais j'ai perdu l'intérêt.
translations.ko: 나는 예전에 은행원이었지만, 흥미를 잃었어요.

meaning_2.description: The money paid regularly at a particular rate for the use of money lent, or for delaying the repayment of a debt.

translations.de: Ich war früher Bankier, aber ich habe die Zinsen verloren.
translations.fr: J'étais banquier, mais j'ai perdu les intérêts.
translations.ko: 나는 예전에 은행원이었지만, 이자를 잃었어요.

859.pun_sentence: OLD PROCTOLOGISTS never die, they just face the end.

meaning_1.description: The final part or conclusion of something.

translations.de: Alte Proktologen sterben nie, sie stellen sich nur dem Ende.
translations.fr: Les vieux proctologues ne meurent jamais, ils font simplement face à la fin.
translations.ko: 노련한 대장과는 결코 죽지 않아요, 그들은 그저 끝에 대면할 뿐이에요.

meaning_2.description: The rear or hindmost part, here implying the buttocks or rectum, tying into the proctologist's profession.

translations.fr: Les vieux proctologues ne meurent jamais, ils font simplement face à l'arrière.
translations.ko: 노련한 대장과는 결코 죽지 않아요, 그들은 그저 뒷부분에 대면할 뿐이에요.

860.pun_sentence: We did it twice last night, she relayed.

meaning_1.description: to pass on something such as a message or information.

translations.de: "Wir haben es gestern Abend zweimal gemacht", übermittelte sie.
translations.fr: "On l'a fait deux fois hier soir", elle a communiqué.
translations.ko: "우리는 어제 밤에 두 번 했어요", 그녀가 전달했어요.

meaning_2.description: to repeat a physical activity

translations.de: "Wir haben es gestern Abend zweimal gemacht", wiederholte sie.
translations.fr: "On l'a fait deux fois hier soir", elle a répété.
translations.ko: "우리는 어제 밤에 두 번 했어요", 그녀가 재현했어요.

861.pun_sentence: Never invest in funerals, it's a dying industry.

translations.fr: Ne jamais investir dans les funérailles, c'est une industrie en voie de disparition.
translations.ko: 결코 장례식에 투자하지 마세요, 이것은 사라져가는 산업입니다.

meaning_2.description: The act of death or mortality.

translations.de: Investiere niemals in Beerdigungen, es ist eine sterbende Branche.
translations.fr: Ne jamais investir dans les funérailles, c'est une industrie mourante.
translations.ko: 결코 장례식에 투자하지 마세요, 이것은 죽어가는 산업입니다.

862.pun_sentence: OLD BOXERS never die, they just punch out

translations.de: Alte Boxer sterben nie, sie schlagen nur aus.
translations.fr: Les vieux boxeurs ne meurent jamais, ils se contentent de frapper.
translations.ko: 노련한 복서들은 결코 죽지 않아, 그들은 그냥 펀치를 날려.

meaning_2.description: To record leaving work, as on a time clock.

translations.fr: Les vieux boxeurs ne meurent jamais, ils pointent juste leur carte.
translations.ko: 노련한 복서들은 결코 죽지 않아, 그들은 그냥 퇴근 카드를 찍어.

863.pun_sentence: Waiter, there's a fly in my soup! "At our restaurant, we guarantee You won't find a single fly." "Whaddya mean?" "Because they're all married."

meaning_1.description: not married, or not having a romantic relationship with someone.

translations.de: "Kellner, da ist eine Fliege in meiner Suppe!" "In unserem Restaurant können wir garantieren, dass Sie keine einzige unverheiratete Fliege finden." "Wie meinen Sie das?" "Weil sie alle verheiratet sind."
translations.fr: "Garçon, il y a une mouche dans ma soupe!" "Dans notre restaurant, nous vous garantissons que vous ne trouverez pas une seule mouche célibataire." "Que voulez-vous dire?" "Parce qu'elles sont toutes mariées."
translations.ko: "웨이터, 내 수프에 파리가 있어요!" "우리 식당에서는 당신이 청혼하지 않은 단 한 마리의 파리도 발견하지 못할 것을 보장해요." "무슨 말이에요?" "왜냐하면 그들은 모두 결혼했거든요."

meaning_2.description: one only

translations.de: "Kellner, da ist eine Fliege in meiner Suppe!" "In unserem Restaurant können wir garantieren, dass Sie keine einzige Fliege finden." "Wie meinen Sie das?" "Weil sie alle verheiratet sind."
translations.fr: "Garçon, il y a une mouche dans ma soupe!" "Dans notre restaurant, nous vous garantissons que vous ne trouverez pas une seule mouche." "Que voulez-vous dire?" "Parce qu'elles sont toutes mariées."
translations.ko: "웨이터, 내 수프에 파리가 있어요!" "우리 식당에서는 당신이 단 한 마리의 파리도 발견하지 못할 것을 보장해요." "무슨 말이에요?" "왜냐하면 그들은 모두 결혼했거든요."

864.pun_sentence: OLD PLANETS never die, they just lose their attraction.

meaning_1.description: The force by which one object attracts another.

translations.de: ALTE PLANETEN sterben nie, sie verlieren einfach ihre Anziehungskraft.
translations.fr: LES VIEILLES PLANÈTES ne meurent jamais, elles perdent juste leur attraction.
translations.ko: 오래된 행성들은 결코 사라지지 않아, 그 끌림만 잃어버려.

meaning_2.description: Interest or appeal to someone or something.

translations.de: ALTE PLANETEN sterben nie, sie verlieren einfach ihren Reiz.
translations.fr: LES VIEILLES PLANÈTES ne meurent jamais, elles perdent juste leur intérêt.
translations.ko: 오래된 행성들은 결코 사라지지 않아, 그들이 갖고 있던 매력을 잃어버려.

865.pun_sentence: I wanted to make suits but I could never measure up.

meaning_1.description: to ascertain the size, amount, or degree of (something) by using an instrument or device.

translations.de: Ich wollte Anzüge herstellen, aber ich konnte nie messen.
translations.fr: Je voulais fabriquer des costumes, mais je ne pouvais jamais mesurer.
translations.ko: 나는 정장을 만들고 싶었는데, 절대로 측정할 수 없었어.

meaning_2.description: to be good enough or to meet a standard

translations.de: Ich wollte Anzüge herstellen, aber ich konnte nie mithalten.
translations.fr: Je voulais fabriquer des costumes, mais je n'étais jamais à la hauteur.
translations.ko: 나는 정장을 만들고 싶었는데, 절대로 맞춰낼 수 없었어.

866.pun_sentence: "Here's your allowance for the next two weeks," Tom advanced.

meaning_1.description: To move forward (in this case, probably to hand over something).

translations.de: "'Hier ist dein Taschengeld für die nächsten zwei Wochen,' Tom rückte vor."
translations.fr: "'Voici ton argent de poche pour les deux prochaines semaines,' Tom avança."
translations.ko: "'다음 두 주간의 용돈입니다,' 톰이 전진했다."

meaning_2.description: To provide or pay a certain amount of money before it is due.

translations.de: "'Hier ist dein Taschengeld für die nächsten zwei Wochen,' Tom zahlte im Voraus."
translations.fr: "'Voici ton argent de poche pour les deux prochaines semaines,' Tom a avancé."
translations.ko: "'다음 두 주간의 용돈입니다,' 톰이 미리 지불했다."

867.pun_sentence: OLD CARD PLAYERS never die, they just shuffle off.

meaning_1.description: To re-arrange a pack of cards in random order.

translations.de: ALTE KARTENSPIELER sterben nie, sie mischen einfach nur ab.
translations.fr: LES VIEUX JOUEURS DE CARTES ne meurent jamais, ils battent simplement les cartes.
translations.ko: 노련한 카드 플레이어들은 절대 죽지 않아, 그들은 그냥 카드를 섞어요.

meaning_2.description: to die or to move away in a shuffling manner

translations.de: ALTE KARTENSPIELER sterben nie, sie schlurfen einfach nur davon.
translations.fr: LES VIEUX JOUEURS DE CARTES ne meurent jamais, ils se traînent simplement.
translations.ko: 노련한 카드 플레이어들은 절대 죽지 않아, 그들은 그냥 뒤뚱뒤뚱 걸어 가요.

868.pun_sentence: The earliest mention of cars is in the Bible when Adam and Eve were driven out of the Garden of Eden.

meaning_1.description: To be forced or compelled to do or move in a certain direction.

translations.de: Die früheste Erwähnung von Autos steht in der Bibel, als Adam und Eva aus dem Garten Eden gezwungen wurden.
translations.fr: La première mention de voitures est dans la Bible lorsque Adam et Ève ont été chassés du Jardin d'Eden.
translations.ko: 자동차에 대한 첫 언급은 아담과 이브가 에덴의 동산에서 쫓겨날 때 성경에 나옵니다.

meaning_2.description: To be transported in a vehicle.

translations.de: Die früheste Erwähnung von Autos steht in der Bibel, als Adam und Eva aus dem Garten Eden gefahren wurden.
translations.fr: La première mention de voitures est dans la Bible lorsque Adam et Ève ont été conduits hors du Jardin d'Eden.
translations.ko: 자동차에 대한 첫 언급은 아담과 이브가 에덴의 동산에서 타고 나갈 때 성경에 나옵니다.

869.pun_sentence: When a guillotine executioner is layed off he gets severance.

meaning_1.description: a form of financial compensation given to an employee upon dismissal or termination

translations.de: Wenn ein Guillotine-Henker entlassen wird, erhält er eine Abfindung.
translations.fr: Lorsqu'un bourreau de guillotine est licencié, il reçoit une indemnité de départ.
translations.ko: 기요틴 사형 집행관이 해고될 때 그는 퇴직금을 받는다.

meaning_2.description: the act of severing or cutting off, especially the beheading through the use of a guillotine

translations.de: Wenn ein Guillotine-Henker entlassen wird, kommt er zur Trennung.
translations.fr: Lorsqu'un bourreau de guillotine est licencié, il est décapité.
translations.ko: 기요틴 사형 집행관이 해고될 때 그는 절단을 당한다.

870.pun_sentence: OLD ALCOHOLICS never die, they just lose their spirit.

meaning_1.description: enthusiasm, energy or courage.

translations.de: Alte Alkoholiker sterben nie, sie verlieren nur ihren Geist.
translations.fr: Les vieux alcooliques ne meurent jamais, ils perdent juste leur énergie.
translations.ko: 노란 음주자들은 결코 죽지 않아, 그들은 그냥 자신의 열정을 잃어버리는 거야.

meaning_2.description: a strong alcoholic beverage.

translations.de: Alte Alkoholiker sterben nie, sie verlieren nur ihren Spiritus.
translations.fr: Les vieux alcooliques ne meurent jamais, ils perdent juste leur spiritueux.
translations.ko: 노란 음주자들은 결코 죽지 않아, 그들은 그냥 자신의 술을 잃어버리는 거야.

871.pun_sentence: Jenny was sure she was going to Heaven but she wouldn't harp on it.

meaning_1.description: a large, stringed musical instrument

translations.de: Jenny war sich sicher, dass sie in den Himmel kommen würde, aber sie würde nicht darauf harfen.
translations.fr: Jenny était sûre qu'elle allait au paradis, mais elle n'allait pas jouer de la harpe dessus.
translations.ko: 제니는 자신이 천국에 가게 될 것이라 확신했지만, 그것에 대해 하프를 연주하진 않을 것이다.

meaning_2.description: to talk or complain persistently or incessantly about a particular topic.

translations.de: Jenny war sich sicher, dass sie in den Himmel kommen würde, aber sie würde nicht darauf herumreiten.
translations.fr: Jenny était sûre qu'elle allait au paradis, mais elle n'allait pas radoter dessus.
translations.ko: 제니는 자신이 천국에 가게 될 것이라 확신했지만, 그것에 대해 계속 집착하거나 불평하지 않을 것이다.

872.pun_sentence: Tires are fixed for a flat rate.

meaning_1.description: having a standardized charge for a service regardless of varying circumstances

translations.de: Reifen werden zu einem Pauschalpreis repariert.
translations.fr: Les pneus sont réparés pour un tarif forfaitaire.
translations.ko: 타이어는 고정된 비용으로 수리됩니다.

meaning_2.description: having a puncture or loss of air pressure

translations.de: Reifen werden bei einem Plattfuß repariert.
translations.fr: Les pneus sont réparés lorsqu'ils sont à plat.
translations.ko: 타이어는 펑크 난 경우에 수리됩니다.

873.pun_sentence: He was the most dishonest and cleverest card shark in the city, the police said he will be dealt with.

meaning_1.description: to take action about someone or something.

translations.de: Er war der unehrlichste und klügste Kartenspieler in der Stadt, sagte die Polizei, er wird behandelt werden.
translations.fr: Il était le tricheur aux cartes le plus malhonnête et le plus intelligent de la ville, a déclaré la police, il sera traité.
translations.ko: 그는 그 도시에서 가장 부정하고 영리한 카드 사기꾼이었다, 경찰은 그가 처리될 것이라고 말했다.

meaning_2.description: to distribute the cards to the players

translations.de: Er war der unehrlichste und klügste Kartenspieler in der Stadt, sagte die Polizei, er wird ausgeteilt.
translations.fr: Il était le tricheur aux cartes le plus malhonnête et le plus intelligent de la ville, a déclaré la police, il sera distribué.
translations.ko: 그는 그 도시에서 가장 부정하고 영리한 카드 사기꾼이었다, 경찰은 그가 카드를 나누어 줄 것이라고 말했다.

874.pun_sentence: Old electricians never die, they just get discharged.

meaning_1.description: Released from a place, duty, or responsibility.

translations.de: Alte Elektriker sterben nie, sie werden nur entlassen.
translations.fr: Les vieux électriciens ne meurent jamais, ils sont juste licenciés.
translations.ko: 노련한 전기공들은 결코 죽지 않아요, 그들은 그냥 해고되죠.

meaning_2.description: To release or allow electrical energy to flow out.

translations.de: Alte Elektriker sterben nie, sie entladen sich nur.
translations.fr: Les vieux électriciens ne meurent jamais, ils sont juste déchargés.
translations.ko: 노련한 전기공들은 결코 죽지 않아요, 그들은 그냥 방전되죠.

875.pun_sentence: The trampoline was on sale for fifty per cent off. Needless to say I jumped on the offer.

meaning_1.description: to push oneself off a surface and into the air by using the muscles in one's legs and feet.

translations.de: Das Trampolin war um fünfzig Prozent reduziert. Selbstverständlich habe ich mich auf das Angebot gestürzt.
translations.fr: Le trampoline était en solde avec cinquante pour cent de réduction. Inutile de dire que j'ai sauté sur l'offre.
translations.ko: 트램폴린이 50% 할인판매 중이었어요. 말할 필요도 없이 바로 그 기회를 뛰어들었습니다.

meaning_2.description: to take immediate and rapid advantage of.

translations.de: Das Trampolin war um fünfzig Prozent reduziert. Selbstverständlich habe ich das Angebot sofort genutzt.
translations.fr: Le trampoline était en solde avec cinquante pour cent de réduction. Inutile de dire que j'ai saisi l'offre immédiatement.
translations.ko: 트램폴린이 50% 할인 판매 중이었어요. 말할 필요도 없이 바로 그 기회를 활용했습니다.

876.pun_sentence: I wanted to be a sonar technician, but it was out of my depth.

meaning_1.description: physical depth, relating to how deep something is

translations.de: Ich wollte Sonartechniker werden, aber es war außerhalb meiner Tiefe.
translations.fr: Je voulais être un technicien sonar, mais c'était au-delà de ma profondeur.
translations.ko: 나는 소나 기술자가 되고 싶었지만, 그것은 나의 깊이를 벗어났어요.

meaning_2.description: level or extent of knowledge, experience, or empathy.

translations.de: Ich wollte Sonartechniker werden, aber es war außerhalb meines Verständnisses.
translations.fr: Je voulais être un technicien sonar, mais c'était au-delà de ma compréhension.
translations.ko: 나는 소나 기술자가 되고 싶었지만, 그것은 나의 이해를 벗어났어요.

877.pun_sentence: Peter went overboard for the lord, why can’t we.

meaning_1.description: to go to extremes in doing something; exceed the boundaries of moderation.

translations.de: Peter ging für den Herrn zu weit, warum können wir das nicht.
translations.fr: Peter s'est surpassé pour le Seigneur, pourquoi ne pouvons nous pas.
translations.ko: 피터는 주님을 위해 너무 멀리 갔어요, 우리는 왜 그렇게 하지 못하죠.

meaning_2.description: to fall or jump off a ship or boat into the water

translations.de: Peter fiel für den Herrn über Bord, warum können wir das nicht.
translations.fr: Peter est tombé à la mer pour le Seigneur, pourquoi ne pouvons nous pas.
translations.ko: 피터는 주님을 위해 배에서 물속으로 뛰어들었어요, 우리는 왜 그렇게 하지 못하죠.

878.pun_sentence: The railway constructions are on track.

meaning_1.description: a planned or expected route

translations.de: Die Bahnbauarbeiten verlaufen nach Plan.
translations.fr: Les constructions ferroviaires sont sur la bonne voie.
translations.ko: 철도 건설이 계획대로 진행되고 있습니다.

meaning_2.description: A railway path where the train moves.

translations.de: Die Bahnbauarbeiten sind auf dem Gleis.
translations.fr: Les constructions ferroviaires sont sur le rail.
translations.ko: 철도 건설이 철로 위에 있습니다.

meaning_1.description: a small adhesive piece of paper stuck to something to show an amount of money paid, especially a postage stamp.

translations.de: Stampfe überhöhte Portokosten aus.
translations.fr: Écrasez les tarifs postaux excessifs.
translations.ko: 과도한 우표 가격을 찍어내세요.

meaning_2.description: to get rid of something that is wrong or harmful

translations.de: Beseitige überhöhte Portokosten.
translations.fr: Supprimez les tarifs postaux excessifs.
translations.ko: 과도한 우표 가격을 제거하세요.

880.pun_sentence: He put so many blanks in his document that he started to feel spaced out.

meaning_1.description: to place spaces between words or characters in a document

translations.de: Er hat so viele Leerzeichen in seinem Dokument eingefügt, dass er sich ausgesperrt fühlte.
translations.fr: Il a mis tellement d'espaces dans son document qu'il a commencé à se sentir dépassé.
translations.ko: 그는 그의 문서에 너무 많은 빈 칸을 넣어서 가장한 느낌이 들었다.

meaning_2.description: Feeling lightheaded, disconnected, or as if in a trance.

translations.de: Er hat so viele Leerzeichen in seinem Dokument eingefügt, dass er sich benommen fühlte.
translations.fr: Il a mis tellement d'espaces dans son document qu'il a commencé à se sentir étourdi.
translations.ko: 그는 그의 문서에 너무 많은 빈 칸을 넣어서 혼란스러운 느낌이 들었다.

881.pun_sentence: Highways today are much better than they were many years ago and there are lots of concrete examples of it.

meaning_1.description: Actual and tangible, not abstract.

translations.de: Autobahnen sind heute viel besser als vor vielen Jahren und es gibt viele greifbare Beispiele dafür.
translations.fr: Les autoroutes aujourd'hui sont beaucoup mieux qu'il y a de nombreuses années et il y a beaucoup d'exemples concrets à ce sujet.
translations.ko: 현재의 고속도로는 수년전에 비해 훨씬 좋아졌으며, 그 실제 예가 많습니다.

meaning_2.description: A hard, durable material that is often used in construction, specifically in making roads.

translations.de: Autobahnen sind heute viel besser als vor vielen Jahren und es gibt viele Betonbeispiele dafür.
translations.fr: Les autoroutes aujourd'hui sont beaucoup mieux qu'il y a de nombreuses années et il y a beaucoup d'exemples en béton à ce sujet.
translations.ko: 현재의 고속도로는 수년전에 비해 훨씬 좋아졌으며, 그 콘크리트의 예가 많습니다.

882.pun_sentence: Don't get lost in the mist or else you won't have the foggiest idea where you are.

meaning_1.description: Covered by or involving a lot of fog.

translations.de: Verliere dich nicht im Nebel, sonst hast du keine Ahnung, wo du bist, so neblig es auch sein mag.
translations.fr: Ne te perds pas dans le brouillard, sinon tu ne sauras pas où tu es, aussi brumeux que cela puisse être.
translations.ko: 안개에 길을 잃으면 안 돼. 그렇게 되면 네가 어디 있는지 전혀 모르게 될 거야.

meaning_2.description: Having no knowledge or understanding about something.

translations.de: Verliere dich nicht im Nebel, sonst hast du nicht die geringste Ahnung, wo du bist.
translations.fr: Ne te perds pas dans le brouillard, sinon tu n'auras pas la moindre idée de où tu te trouves.
translations.ko: 안개에 길을 잃으면 안 돼. 그렇게 되면 너는 네가 어디 있는지 가장 모를지도 몰라.

883.pun_sentence: A former doctor, while auditioning for a play, broke his leg. But luckily, he could still make the cast.

meaning_1.description: The group of actors in a play or film.

translations.de: Ein ehemaliger Arzt, der für ein Theaterstück vorsprach, brach sich das Bein. Aber zum Glück, konnte er immer noch die Besetzung machen.
translations.fr: Un ancien médecin, qui passait une audition pour une pièce de théâtre, s'est cassé la jambe. Mais heureusement, il a pu encore faire partie de la distribution.
translations.ko: 전 의사가 연극 오디션을 보다가 다리를 부러뜨렸어요. 그런데 다행히도, 그는 여전히 캐스트를 만들 수 있었어요.

meaning_2.description: a plaster cast on a broken bone

translations.de: Ein ehemaliger Arzt, der für ein Theaterstück vorsprach, brach sich das Bein. Aber zum Glück, konnte er immer noch den Gips anlegen.
translations.fr: Un ancien médecin, qui passait une audition pour une pièce de théâtre, s'est cassé la jambe. Mais heureusement, il a pu encore poser le plâtre.
translations.ko: 전 의사가 연극 오디션을 보다가 다리를 부러뜨렸어요. 그런데 다행히도, 그는 여전히 깁스를 씌울 수 있었어요.

884.pun_sentence: Some jokes get dated, other jokes get married.

meaning_1.description: Being old-fashioned or outmoded.

translations.de: Manche Witze werden altmodisch, andere Witze werden verheiratet.
translations.fr: Certaines blagues deviennent démodées, d'autres blagues se marient.
translations.ko: 일부 농담들은 낡아져 가고, 다른 농담들은 결혼하게 돼요.

meaning_2.description: To go out with someone in whom one is romantically or sexually interested.

translations.de: Manche Witze haben Dates, andere Witze werden verheiratet.
translations.fr: Certaines blagues sortent ensemble, d'autres blagues se marient.
translations.ko: 일부 농담들은 데이트를 하고, 다른 농담들은 결혼하게 돼요.

885.pun_sentence: I've never tipped a cow. Then again, one has never served me food.

meaning_1.description: To push something so it falls over.

translations.de: Ich habe noch nie eine Kuh umgestoßen. Allerdings hat mir auch noch nie eine Essen serviert.
translations.fr: Je n'ai jamais renversé une vache. Cela dit, aucune ne m'a jamais servi de nourriture.
translations.ko: 나는 소를 넘어뜨린 적이 없다. 그런데 생각해보니, 소가 나에게 음식을 서빙한 적도 없다.

meaning_2.description: To give someone a gratuity for services rendered, often in a restaurant setting.

translations.de: Ich habe noch nie einer Kuh Trinkgeld gegeben. Allerdings hat mir auch noch nie eine Essen serviert.
translations.fr: Je n'ai jamais laissé un pourboire à une vache. Cela dit, aucune ne m'a jamais servi de nourriture.
translations.ko: 나는 소에게 팁을 준 적이 없다. 그런데 생각해보니, 소가 나에게 음식을 서빙한 적도 없다.

886.pun_sentence: He didn't want to volunteer for the rodeo but he got roped into it.

meaning_1.description: To be connected or attached by means of a rope.

translations.de: Er wollte sich nicht freiwillig für das Rodeo anmelden, aber er wurde daran gebunden.
translations.fr: Il ne voulait pas se porter volontaire pour le rodéo, mais il s'est retrouvé attaché à cela.
translations.ko: 그는 로데오에 자원하고 싶지 않았지만, 그는 강제로 끌려가게 됐어요.

meaning_2.description: To be persuaded or coaxed into doing something.

translations.de: Er wollte sich nicht freiwillig für das Rodeo anmelden, aber er wurde dazu überredet.
translations.fr: Il ne voulait pas se porter volontaire pour le rodéo, mais on l'a persuadé de le faire.
translations.ko: 그는 로데오에 자원하고 싶지 않았지만, 그는 설득당해 참여하게 됐어요.

887.pun_sentence: I wrote a novel about a fellow who had a small garden. It didn't have much of a plot.

meaning_1.description: a piece of land for cultivation or gardening.

translations.de: Ich habe einen Roman über einen Kerl geschrieben, der einen kleinen Garten hatte. Er hatte nicht viel von einem Grundstück.
translations.fr: J'ai écrit un roman sur un homme qui avait un petit jardin. Il n'avait pas beaucoup de parcelle.
translations.ko: 나는 작은 정원을 가진 사람에 대한 소설을 썼어. 그것은 토지가 많지 않았어.

meaning_2.description: the sequence of events or storyline of a novel or a play.

translations.de: Ich habe einen Roman über einen Kerl geschrieben, der einen kleinen Garten hatte. Er hatte nicht viel von einer Handlung.
translations.fr: J'ai écrit un roman sur un homme qui avait un petit jardin. Il n'avait pas beaucoup d'intrigue.
translations.ko: 나는 작은 정원을 가진 사람에 대한 소설을 썼어. 그것은 줄거리가 많지 않았어.

888.pun_sentence: "I want a motorized bicycle," Tom moped.

meaning_1.description: a type of small motorcycle with pedals, generally having a less stringent licensing requirement than motorcycles

translations.de: "Ich will ein Motorfahrrad," Tom mofa.
translations.fr: "Je veux une bicyclette motorisée," Tom cyclomoteur.
translations.ko: "'나는 모터사이클 자전거를 원해,' 톰이 머퍼했다.

meaning_2.description: to sulk or be dejected

translations.de: "Ich will ein Motorfahrrad," Tom schmollte.
translations.fr: "Je veux une bicyclette motorisée," Tom boude.
translations.ko: "'나는 모터사이클 자전거를 원해,' 톰이 우울해 했다.

889.pun_sentence: Photographers are often very candid people.

meaning_1.description: Honest and straightforward.

translations.de: Fotografen sind oft sehr ehrliche Menschen.
translations.fr: Les photographes sont souvent des gens très honnêtes.
translations.ko: 사진작가들은 종종 매우 진솔한 사람들입니다.

meaning_2.description: Unposed or informal, particularly in the context of a photograph.

translations.de: Fotografen sind oft sehr ungestellte Menschen.
translations.fr: Les photographes sont souvent des gens très naturels.
translations.ko: 사진작가들은 종종 매우 자연스러운 사람들입니다.

890.pun_sentence: At first he was was a sprinter, but then he decided to run for office.

meaning_1.description: to move swiftly by foot.

translations.de: Zuerst war er ein Sprinter, aber dann entschied er sich zum Laufen.
translations.fr: Au début, il était un sprinteur, mais ensuite il a décidé de courir.
translations.ko: 처음에 그는 스프린터였지만, 그 후에 그는 달리기를 결정했어요.

meaning_2.description: to compete in an election.

translations.de: Zuerst war er ein Sprinter, aber dann entschied er sich zur Kandidatur.
translations.fr: Au début, il était un sprinteur, mais ensuite il a décidé de se présenter aux élections.
translations.ko: 처음에 그는 스프린터였지만, 그 후에 그는 선거에 출마하기로 결정했어요.

891.pun_sentence: To draw cartoons for a living requires someone who is very animated.

meaning_1.description: to cause someone or something to be more active or full of life

translations.de: Um Cartoons zum Leben zu bringen, braucht es jemanden, der sehr lebendig ist.
translations.fr: Pour dessiner des dessins animés pour gagner sa vie, il faut quelqu'un de très animé.
translations.ko: 생계를 위해 만화를 그리려면 매우 활발한 사람이 필요합니다.

meaning_2.description: Displaying animation or motion, as in animated cartoons.

translations.de: Um Cartoons zum Leben zu zeichnen, braucht es jemanden, der sehr animiert ist.
translations.fr: Pour dessiner des dessins animés pour gagner sa vie, il faut quelqu'un de très animé.
translations.ko: 생계를 위해 애니메이션을 그리는 것은 매우 움직이는 사람이 필요합니다.

892.pun_sentence: Bill Gates took advantage of his Windows of opportunity

meaning_1.description: an opening in the wall or roof of a building or vehicle that is fitted with glass or other transparent material in a frame to admit light or air and allow people to see out.

translations.de: Bill Gates nutzte seine Fenster der Gelegenheit.
translations.fr: Bill Gates a profité de ses fenêtres d'opportunité.
translations.ko: 빌 게이츠는 그의 기회의 창을 이용했습니다.

meaning_2.description: the operating system created by Microsoft, which Bill Gates co-founded.

translations.de: Bill Gates nutzte seine Windows der Gelegenheit.
translations.fr: Bill Gates a profité de son Windows d'opportunité.
translations.ko: 빌 게이츠는 그의 Windows의 기회를 잘 활용했습니다.

meaning_1.description: Attracted or appealed to.

translations.de: Ich fühle mich zur Kunst hingezogen.
translations.fr: Je suis attiré par l'art.
translations.ko: 나는 예술에 끌려요.

meaning_2.description: to make a picture with a pencil or pen

translations.de: Ich zeichne zur Kunst.
translations.fr: Je dessine de l'art.
translations.ko: 나는 예술을 그려요.

894.pun_sentence: When you can't decide with your friends whose place to have a party at it's known as party politics.

meaning_1.description: A social gathering of invited guests, typically involving eating, drinking, and entertainment.

translations.de: Wenn du dich mit deinen Freunden nicht entscheiden kannst, bei wem die Party stattfinden soll, ist das als Party-Politik bekannt.
translations.fr: Lorsque vous ne pouvez pas décider avec vos amis où organiser une fête, c'est ce qu'on appelle la politique de la fête.
translations.ko: 친구들과 어디에서 파티를 할지 결정할 수 없을 때, 그것을 '파티 정치'라고 합니다.

meaning_2.description: A formally constituted political group, typically operating on a national basis, that contests elections and attempts to form or participate in a government.

translations.de: Wenn du dich mit deinen Freunden nicht entscheiden kannst, welche Partei die Wahlparty abhalten soll, wird das als Parteipolitik bezeichnet.
translations.fr: Lorsque vous ne pouvez pas décider avec vos amis quel parti devrait organiser une fête, c'est ce que l'on appelle de la politique partisane.
translations.ko: 친구들과 어떤 정당이 파티를 주최할지 결정할 수 없을 때, 그것을 '파티 정치'라고 합니다.

895.pun_sentence: Missionaries like open hooded cars because they are convertible.

meaning_1.description: A car with a fabric roof that can be folded down

translations.de: Missionare mögen offene Cabrio-Autos, weil sie Cabrio sind.
translations.fr: Les missionnaires aiment les voitures capotées ouvertes parce qu'elles sont décapotables.
translations.ko: 선교사들은 컨버터블 차를 좋아해. 왜냐하면 그것들은 컨버터블이기 때문이야.

meaning_2.description: can be changed in form, function, or character, especially in manner of religion

translations.de: Missionare mögen offene Cabrio-Autos, weil sie konvertierbar sind.
translations.fr: Les missionnaires aiment les voitures capotées ouvertes parce qu'elles sont convertibles.
translations.ko: 선교사들은 컨버터블 차를 좋아해. 왜냐하면 그것들이 변환 가능하기 때문이야.

896.pun_sentence: Undertakers' Motto - Trust us. We are the very last ones to put you down.

meaning_1.description: The act of placing somebody or something somewhere.

translations.de: Bestattermotto - Vertrauen Sie uns. Wir sind die all letzten, die Sie ablegen.
translations.fr: Devise des croque-morts - Faites-nous confiance. Nous sommes les tout derniers à vous déposer.
translations.ko: 발음자의 모토-우리를 믿으세요. 우리는 당신을 마지막으로 놓아두는 사람들입니다.

meaning_2.description: To express or state something in a particular way, often used to imply criticism or insult.

translations.de: Bestattermotto - Vertrauen Sie uns. Wir sind die letzten, die Sie beleidigen.
translations.fr: Devise des croque-morts - Faites-nous confiance. Nous sommes les derniers à vous rabaisser.
translations.ko: 발음자의 모토-우리를 믿으세요. 우리는 당신을 마지막으로 비난하는 사람들입니다.

897.pun_sentence: We are overdressed when we are wrapped up in ourselves.

meaning_1.description: To cover or enclose (someone or something) in cloth or soft material.

translations.de: Wir sind überkleidet, wenn wir uns in uns selbst einhüllen.
translations.fr: Nous sommes trop habillés lorsque nous sommes enveloppés en nous-mêmes.
translations.ko: 우리는 스스로를 감싸고 있을때 과하게 차려 입는 것입니다.

meaning_2.description: To become completely absorbed in something (like yourself, thoughts, problems, etc.)

translations.de: Wir sind überkleidet, wenn wir uns vollständig in uns selbst verlieren.
translations.fr: Nous sommes trop habillés lorsque nous sommes complètement absorbés par nous-mêmes.
translations.ko: 우리는 스스로에 빠져있을때 과하게 차려 입는 것입니다.

898.pun_sentence: The inventor of the stove top was in his element.

meaning_1.description: the part of an electrical device that produces heat.

translations.de: Der Erfinder des Kochfelds war in seinem Element.
translations.fr: L'inventeur de la plaque de cuisson était dans son élément.
translations.ko: 스토브 톱의 발명가는 그의 요소에 있었습니다.

meaning_2.description: A person's or animal's natural or preferred environment, habitat or sphere of activity.

translations.de: Der Erfinder des Kochfelds war in seiner idealen Umgebung.
translations.fr: L'inventeur de la plaque de cuisson était dans son environnement préféré.
translations.ko: 스토브 톱의 발명가는 그의 선호하는 환경에 있었습니다.

899.pun_sentence: I'm buying a birthday present for a sculptor. Can you chip in?

meaning_1.description: To contribute a small amount of money.

translations.de: Ich kaufe ein Geburtstagsgeschenk für einen Bildhauer. Kannst du mitbezahlen?
translations.fr: J'achète un cadeau d'anniversaire pour un sculpteur. Peux-tu contribuer?
translations.ko: 나는 조각가를 위한 생일선물을 사려고 해. 너 돈 조금 기여할 수 있을까?

meaning_2.description: To break off a small piece from a solid material.

translations.de: Ich kaufe ein Geburtstagsgeschenk für einen Bildhauer. Kannst du absplittern?
translations.fr: J'achète un cadeau d'anniversaire pour un sculpteur. Peux-tu écailler?
translations.ko: 나는 조각가를 위한 생일선물을 사려고 해. 너 작은 조각을 깎아낼 수 있을까?

900.pun_sentence: Installing a fan can be a breeze.

meaning_1.description: a gentle wind.

translations.de: Das Installieren eines Ventilators kann ein Lüftchen sein.
translations.fr: Installer un ventilateur peut être une brise.
translations.ko: 선풍기를 설치하는 건, 바람과 같을 수 있어요.

meaning_2.description: something easy or undemanding.

translations.de: Das Installieren eines Ventilators kann ein Kinderspiel sein.
translations.fr: Installer un ventilateur peut être un jeu d'enfant.
translations.ko: 선풍기를 설치하는 건, 아주 쉬울 수 있어요.

901.pun_sentence: Skipping school to bungee jump will get you suspended.

meaning_1.description: Physically hang or be hung in the air with the support or attachment from above.

translations.de: Wenn man die Schule schwänzt, um Bungee-Jumping zu machen, wird man aufgehängt.
translations.fr: Sauter l'école pour faire du saut à l'élastique vous suspend.
translations.ko: 학교를 빼먹고 번지점프를 하면 당신은 매달릴 것입니다.

meaning_2.description: Temporary prevented or barred from attending school or a job as punishment.

translations.de: Wenn man die Schule schwänzt, um Bungee-Jumping zu machen, wird man suspendiert.
translations.fr: Sauter l'école pour faire du saut à l'élastique vous fait suspendre.
translations.ko: 학교를 빼먹고 번지점프를 하면 당신은 정학당할 것입니다.

902.pun_sentence: OLD GRAVEDIGGERS never die, they just get buried in their work
