meaning_1.description: to be covered or hidden.

translations.de: ALTE GRABENGRÄBER sterben nie, sie werden einfach in ihrer Arbeit versteckt.
translations.fr: LES ANCIENS FOSSEYEURS ne meurent jamais, ils se perdent simplement dans leur travail.
translations.ko: 늙은 무덤파는 사람들은 절대로 죽지 않아요, 그들은 단지 그들의 일에 몸을 묻습니다.

meaning_2.description: to be placed in a grave or tomb, typically as part of a funeral ceremony.

translations.de: ALTE GRABENGRÄBER sterben nie, sie werden einfach in ihrer Arbeit begraben.
translations.fr: LES ANCIENS FOSSEYEURS ne meurent jamais, ils sont simplement enterrés dans leur travail.
translations.ko: 늙은 무덤파는 사람들은 절대로 죽지 않아요, 그들은 그냥 그들의 일에서 묻혀버립니다.

903.pun_sentence: When the shocked IRS agent was found guilty of tax evasion he had to take time to collect himself.

meaning_1.description: to gather together or accumulate a number of things.

translations.de: Als der schockierte IRS-Agent wegen Steuerhinterziehung schuldig befunden wurde, musste er sich Zeit nehmen, um sich zu sammeln.
translations.fr: Lorsque l'agent du fisc, choqué, a été reconnu coupable d'évasion fiscale, il a dû prendre du temps pour se rassembler.
translations.ko: 놀란 세무청 직원이 탈세로 유죄 판결을 받았을 때, 그는 스스로를 모으는데 시간을 가져야 했습니다.

meaning_2.description: to claim or take payment.

translations.de: Als der schockierte IRS-Agent wegen Steuerhinterziehung schuldig befunden wurde, musste er sich Zeit nehmen, um Zahlungen einzufordern.
translations.fr: Lorsque l'agent du fisc, choqué, a été reconnu coupable d'évasion fiscale, il a dû prendre du temps pour percevoir des paiements.
translations.ko: 놀란 세무청 직원이 탈세로 유죄 판결을 받았을 때, 그는 지불을 청구하는 데 시간을 가져야 했습니다.

904.pun_sentence: The rodent catcher was always trying to weasel his way out of work.

meaning_1.description: A small mammal known for being cunning and devious.

translations.de: Der Nagetierfänger versuchte immer, sich wie ein Wiesel aus der Arbeit herauszuschlängeln.
translations.fr: Le dératiseur essayait toujours de se faufiler hors du travail comme une belette.
translations.ko: 그 해충퇴치사는 항상 작업에서 벗어나려고 오소리처럼 삐끗하려고 했습니다.

meaning_2.description: to avoid doing something that you have agreed to do, especially by being dishonest.

translations.de: Der Nagetierfänger versuchte immer, sich geschickt aus der Arbeit herauszuwinden.
translations.fr: Le dératiseur essayait toujours de manigancer pour échapper à son travail.
translations.ko: 그 해충퇴치사는 항상 작업에서 요령을 부리려고 노력했습니다.

905.pun_sentence: When William joined the army he disliked the phrase 'fire at will'.

meaning_1.description: 'willpower' or 'volition,' used generally in commands or directions.

translations.de: Als William der Armee beitrat, mochte er den Ausdruck 'Feuer nach Belieben' nicht.
translations.fr: Quand William a rejoint l'armée, il n'aimait pas l'expression 'tirer à volonté'.
translations.ko: 윌리엄이 군대에 들어갔을 때, 그는 '자유롭게 발사하라'라는 문구를 싫어했다.

meaning_2.description: a person's name, in this case, William.

translations.de: Als William der Armee beitrat, mochte er den Ausdruck 'Feuer auf William' nicht.
translations.fr: Quand William a rejoint l'armée, il n'aimait pas l'expression 'tirer sur William'.
translations.ko: 윌리엄이 군대에 들어갔을 때, 그는 '윌리엄에게 발사하라'라는 문구를 싫어했다.

906.pun_sentence: Two mathematicians arguing about even numbers were at odds.

meaning_1.description: a state of disagreement or conflict.

translations.de: Zwei Mathematiker, die über gerade Zahlen stritten, waren im Konflikt.
translations.fr: Deux mathématiciens se disputant à propos de nombres pairs étaient en désaccord.
translations.ko: 짝수에 대해 논쟁하는 두 명의 수학자가 갈등하고 있었습니다.

meaning_2.description: Numbers that are not divisible by 2, aka uneven numbers.

translations.de: Zwei Mathematiker, die über gerade Zahlen stritten, waren bei ungeraden Zahlen.
translations.fr: Deux mathématiciens se disputant à propos de nombres pairs étaient sur des nombres impairs.
translations.ko: 짝수에 대해 논쟁하는 두 명의 수학자가 홀수에 있었습니다.

907.pun_sentence: The weather bureau is an umbrella organization.

meaning_1.description: a device consisting of a circular canopy of cloth on a folding metal frame, used for protection against rain or sometimes sun.

translations.de: Das Wetteramt ist eine Schirmorganisation.
translations.fr: Le bureau de la météo est une organisation parapluie.
translations.ko: 날씨 국은 우산 조직입니다.

meaning_2.description: something that includes or contains many different elements or parts.

translations.de: Das Wetteramt ist eine umfassende Organisation.
translations.fr: Le bureau de la météo est une organisation qui englobe de nombreux éléments ou parties.
translations.ko: 날씨 국은 다양한 요소나 부분을 포함하는 조직입니다.

908.pun_sentence: The builders of raceways believe that one good turn deserves another.

meaning_1.description: To move or cause to move in a particular direction by turning.

translations.de: Die Erbauer von Rennbahnen glauben, dass eine gute Wende eine weitere verdient.
translations.fr: Les constructeurs de circuits de course pensent qu'un bon virage en mérite un autre.
translations.ko: 경주로의 건설자들은 좋은 회전이 다른 것을 부르는 것을 믿습니다.

meaning_2.description: good turn deserves another means that when someone does a favor for you, you should do a favor for them in repayment; kindness should be rewarded with kindness.

translations.de: Die Erbauer von Rennbahnen glauben, dass eine gute Kurve eine weitere verdient.
translations.fr: Les constructeurs de circuits de course pensent qu'un bon tournant mérite un autre.
translations.ko: 경주로의 건설자들은 좋은 커브가 다른 것을 부르는 것을 믿습니다.

909.pun_sentence: A computer program attached to an electric chair would have to have its execution checked carefully.

meaning_1.description: The act of running or implementing a plan, program, or instruction

translations.de: Ein Computerprogramm, das an einem elektrischen Stuhl angebracht ist, müsste sorgfältig seine Ausführung überprüfen.
translations.fr: Un programme informatique attaché à une chaise électrique devrait avoir son exécution vérifiée attentivement.
translations.ko: 전기 의자에 부착된 컴퓨터 프로그램은 실행을 신중히 확인해야 합니다.

meaning_2.description: The act of carrying out a sentence of death on a condemned person.

translations.de: Ein Computerprogramm, das an einem elektrischen Stuhl angebracht ist, müsste seine Hinrichtung sorgfältig überprüfen.
translations.fr: Un programme informatique attaché à une chaise électrique devrait avoir son exécution judiciaire vérifiée attentivement.
translations.ko: 전기 의자에 부착된 컴퓨터 프로그램은 처형을 신중히 확인해야 합니다.

910.pun_sentence: OLD GAMBLERS never die, they just get discarded.

meaning_1.description: Thrown away or abandoned after use.

translations.de: Alte Spieler sterben nie, sie werden einfach weggeworfen.
translations.fr: Les vieux joueurs ne meurent jamais, ils sont simplement jetés.
translations.ko: 노련한 도박꾼은 절대로 죽지 않아요. 그들은 그냥 버려질 뿐이에요.

meaning_2.description: To get rid of a card during your turn.

translations.de: Alte Spieler sterben nie, sie werden einfach abgelegt.
translations.fr: Les vieux joueurs ne meurent jamais, ils se défaussent simplement.
translations.ko: 노련한 도박꾼은 절대로 죽지 않아요. 그들은 그냥 카드를 버릴 뿐이에요.

911.pun_sentence: My mate swallowed a cordless vacuum cleaner, they took him to hospital and he is picking up nicely.

meaning_1.description: Recovery or improvement, especially in health.

translations.de: Mein Kumpel hat einen kabellosen Staubsauger geschluckt, sie brachten ihn ins Krankenhaus und er erholte sich gut.
translations.fr: Mon ami a avalé un aspirateur sans fil, ils l'ont emmené à l'hôpital et il se rétablit bien.
translations.ko: 내 친구가 무선 청소기를 삼켰어요, 그들이 병원에 데려갔고 그는 건강이 좋아지고 있어요.

meaning_2.description: The action performed by a vacuum cleaner, picking up or sucking up dirt.

translations.de: Mein Kumpel hat einen kabellosen Staubsauger geschluckt, sie brachten ihn ins Krankenhaus und er zieht schön ein.
translations.fr: Mon ami a avalé un aspirateur sans fil, ils l'ont emmené à l'hôpital et il ramasse bien.
translations.ko: 내 친구가 무선 청소기를 삼켰어요, 그들이 병원에 데려갔고 그는 잘 빨아들이고 있어요.

912.pun_sentence: My mom ran out of poultry seasoning so she winged it.

meaning_1.description: to make something up or improvise.

translations.de: Meine Mutter hat das Geflügelgewürz ausgehen lassen, also hat sie improvisiert.
translations.fr: Ma mère a manqué d'assaisonnement pour la volaille, alors elle l'a improvisé.
translations.ko: 제 엄마는 닭고기 양념이 떨어져서 그냥 대충 해냈어요.

meaning_2.description: A part of bird’s body used for flight. This term is often used to indicate things related to birds or poultry.

translations.de: Meine Mutter hat das Geflügelgewürz ausgehen lassen, also hat sie es geflügelt.
translations.fr: Ma mère a manqué d'assaisonnement pour la volaille, alors elle l'a aile.
translations.ko: 제 엄마는 닭고기 양념이 떨어져서 그냥 날개를 달았어요.

913.pun_sentence: OLD CREDIT CARD USERS never die, they just expire.

meaning_1.description: To die or to pass away.

translations.de: Alte Kreditkartenbenutzer sterben nie, sie laufen nur ab.
translations.fr: Les anciens utilisateurs de carte de crédit ne meurent jamais, ils expirent tout simplement.
translations.ko: 오래된 신용카드 사용자들은 절대 죽지 않아, 그저 만료될 뿐이야.

meaning_2.description: To reach the end of a period of time when an official document can be used, or when a contract or agreement is legally valid.

translations.de: Alte Kreditkartenbenutzer sterben nie, sie verfallen nur.
translations.fr: Les anciens utilisateurs de carte de crédit ne meurent jamais, leur carte n'est tout simplement plus valide.
translations.ko: 오래된 신용카드 사용자들은 절대 죽지 않아, 그저 카드 유효 기간이 끝나는 거야.

914.pun_sentence: A bowling team was called 'lightning' because they had so many strikes.

meaning_1.description: To knocking down all pins with the first ball.

translations.de: Eine Bowling-Mannschaft wurde "Blitz" genannt, weil sie so viele Streiks hatten.
translations.fr: Une équipe de bowling était appelée "éclair" parce qu'ils avaient tellement de grèves.
translations.ko: 볼링 팀은 '번개'라고 불렸습니다. 왜냐하면 그들이 스트라이크를 너무 많이 했기 때문입니다.

meaning_2.description: To lightning strikes during a storm.

translations.de: Eine Bowling-Mannschaft wurde "Blitz" genannt, weil sie so viele Blitzeinschläge hatten.
translations.fr: Une équipe de bowling était appelée "éclair" parce qu'ils avaient tellement de coups de foudre.
translations.ko: 볼링 팀은 '번개'라고 불렸습니다. 왜냐하면 그들이 번개를 너무 많이 맞았기 때문입니다.

915.pun_sentence: He had to learn what the measles was, from scratch.

meaning_1.description: Starting a task from the beginning with zero knowledge or preparation.

translations.de: Er musste lernen, was Masern sind, von Grund auf.
translations.fr: Il a dû apprendre ce qu'étaient les rougeoles, à partir de zéro.
translations.ko: 그는 홍역이 무엇인지, 완전히 처음부터 배워야 했습니다.

meaning_2.description: A mark, hole, or a spot created by scratching one's body.

translations.de: Er musste lernen, was Masern sind, von kratzen her.
translations.fr: Il a dû apprendre ce qu'étaient les rougeoles, à partir d'une égratignure.
translations.ko: 그는 홍역이 무엇인지, 긁은 자리부터 배워야 했습니다.

916.pun_sentence: She had a boyfriend with a wooden leg, but broke it off.

meaning_1.description: To end or terminate something, often referring to a relationship.

translations.de: Sie hatte einen Freund mit einem Holzbein, aber sie beendete es.
translations.fr: Elle avait un petit ami avec une jambe en bois, mais elle l'a rompu.
translations.ko: 그녀는 나무 다리가 있는 남자친구가 있었지만, 그와 헤어졌어.

meaning_2.description: To physically break or snap something, specifically referring to the wooden leg.

translations.de: Sie hatte einen Freund mit einem Holzbein, aber sie brach es ab.
translations.fr: Elle avait un petit ami avec une jambe en bois, mais elle l'a cassé.
translations.ko: 그녀는 나무 다리가 있는 남자친구가 있었지만, 다리를 부러뜨렸어.

917.pun_sentence: One leftover said to another 'foiled again.'

meaning_1.description: Wrapped or covered in aluminum foil.

translations.de: Ein Rest sagte zu einem anderen "wieder in Folie gewickelt".
translations.fr: Un restant dit à un autre "encore en feuille d'aluminium".
translations.ko: 한 나머지가 다른 나머지에게 말했어. "또 알루미늄 호일에 싸여 있어".

meaning_2.description: Prevented from being successful, thwarted or frustrated.

translations.de: Ein Rest sagte zu einem anderen "wieder vereitelt".
translations.fr: Un restant dit à un autre "encore déjoué".
translations.ko: 한 나머지가 다른 나머지에게 말했어. "또 실패했어".

918.pun_sentence: Underpaid weather forecasters predicted a storm of protest.

meaning_1.description: A violent weather condition with wind, rain, or snow.

translations.de: Unterbezahlte Wettervorhersager sagten einen Sturm der Proteste voraus. (A storm in a meteorological sense)
translations.fr: Des prévisionnistes météorologiques sous-payés ont prédit une tempête de protestations. (A storm in a meteorological sense)
translations.ko: 저임금의 기상 예보자들은 항의의 폭풍을 예측했다. (A storm in a meteorological sense)

meaning_2.description: A violent or unsettled reaction, typically a controversy or an outburst of public protest.

translations.de: Unterbezahlte Wettervorhersager sagten einen Sturm der Proteste voraus. (A storm in a controversial sense)
translations.fr: Des prévisionnistes météorologiques sous-payés ont prédit une tempête de protestations. (A storm in a controversial sense)
translations.ko: 저임금의 기상 예보자들은 항의의 폭풍을 예측했다. (A storm in a controversial sense)

919.pun_sentence: Trust your calculator. It's something to count on.

meaning_1.description: To add or list numbers in order to find a total.

translations.de: Vertraue deinem Taschenrechner. Es ist etwas, auf das man zählen kann.
translations.fr: Faites confiance à votre calculatrice. C'est quelque chose sur lequel compter.
translations.ko: 너의 계산기를 신뢰해. 그것은 세어볼만한 것이야.

meaning_2.description: To rely or depend on.

translations.de: Vertraue deinem Taschenrechner. Es ist etwas, auf das man sich verlassen kann.
translations.fr: Faites confiance à votre calculatrice. C'est quelque chose sur lequel s'appuyer.
translations.ko: 너의 계산기를 신뢰해. 그것은 의지할만한 것이야.

920.pun_sentence: The journalist went to Greece to see the ancient ruins and is now writing several columns about them.

meaning_1.description: Articles or features in a newspaper or magazine.

translations.de: Der Journalist ging nach Griechenland, um die antiken Ruinen zu sehen, und schreibt nun mehrere Kolumnen darüber.
translations.fr: Le journaliste est allé en Grèce pour voir les ruines anciennes et écrit maintenant plusieurs chroniques à leur sujet.
translations.ko: 그 기자는 고대 유적을 보기 위해 그리스로 갔고, 지금 그에 대한 여러 칼럼을 쓰고 있습니다.

meaning_2.description: Architectural term referring to a pillar or a standalone structure.

translations.de: Der Journalist ging nach Griechenland, um die antiken Ruinen zu sehen, und schreibt nun mehrere Säulen darüber.
translations.fr: Le journaliste est allé en Grèce pour voir les ruines anciennes et écrit maintenant plusieurs colonnes à leur sujet.
translations.ko: 그 기자는 고대 유적을 보기 위해 그리스로 갔고, 지금 그에 대한 여러 기둥들을 쓰고 있습니다.

921.pun_sentence: The mortician was late for dinner because he was buried in his work.

meaning_1.description: Being heavily occupied or involved in a task.

translations.de: Der Bestatter kam zu spät zum Abendessen, weil er in seiner Arbeit begraben war.
translations.fr: Le croque-mort était en retard pour le dîner parce qu'il était enterré dans son travail.
translations.ko: 장의사는 그의 일에 묻혀서 저녁 식사에 늦었습니다.

meaning_2.description: The act of interring a dead body, typically related to the mortician's job.

translations.de: Der Bestatter kam zu spät zum Abendessen, weil er mit der Beerdigung beschäftigt war.
translations.fr: Le croque-mort était en retard pour le dîner parce qu'il était occupé à enterrer un corps.
translations.ko: 장의사는 시신을 묻는 일을 해서 저녁 식사에 늦었습니다.

922.pun_sentence: OLD GUITARISTS never die, they just become unstrung.

meaning_1.description: guitar having its strings removed.

translations.de: Ältere Gitarristen sterben nie, sie werden einfach nur entsaitet.
translations.fr: Les guitaristes âgés ne meurent jamais, ils se retrouvent simplement sans cordes.
translations.ko: 노년의 기타리스트는 결코 죽지 않아, 그들은 그저 현을 제거해.

meaning_2.description: becoming upset or nervous.

translations.de: Ältere Gitarristen sterben nie, sie werden einfach nur nervös.
translations.fr: Les guitaristes âgés ne meurent jamais, ils deviennent simplement bouleversés.
translations.ko: 노년의 기타리스트는 결코 죽지 않아, 그들은 그저 신경이 곤두서.

923.pun_sentence: The date of the marathon was changed. She took it in stride.

meaning_1.description: Long step while walking or running.

translations.de: Das Datum des Marathons wurde geändert. Sie nahm es im Schritt.
translations.fr: La date du marathon a été changée. Elle l'a pris en stride (marche).
translations.ko: 마라톤의 날짜가 바뀌었어. 그녀는 그것을 보폭으로 받아들였어.

meaning_2.description: To deal with a difficult situation calmly and accept it as it is.

translations.de: Das Datum des Marathons wurde geändert. Sie nahm es gelassen hin.
translations.fr: La date du marathon a été changée. Elle l'a pris avec sérénité.
translations.ko: 마라톤의 날짜가 바뀌었어. 그녀는 그것을 태연하게 받아들였어.

924.pun_sentence: The man who fell into an upholstery machine is fully recovered.

meaning_1.description: regained health after illness or injury.

translations.de: Der Mann, der in eine Polstermaschine gefallen ist, hat sich vollständig erholt.
translations.fr: L'homme qui est tombé dans une machine à rembourrer est complètement rétabli.
translations.ko: 철모를 넣는 기계에 빠진 남자가 완전히 회복했습니다.

meaning_2.description: when an item, especially furniture, is covered again with a new material.

translations.de: Der Mann, der in eine Polstermaschine gefallen ist, ist vollständig bezogen.
translations.fr: L'homme qui est tombé dans une machine à rembourrer est complètement recouvert.
translations.ko: 철모를 넣는 기계에 빠진 남자가 완전히 덮였습니다.

925.pun_sentence: She was only a Conductor's daughter, but she told you where to get off.

meaning_1.description: To leave a train, bus, or aircraft

translations.de: Sie war nur die Tochter eines Leiters, aber sie sagte dir, wo du aussteigen sollst.
translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'un chef d'orchestre, mais elle vous disait où descendre.
translations.ko: 그녀는 단지 지휘자의 딸일 뿐이었지만, 어디에서 내려야 하는지 알려주었어요.

meaning_2.description: To receive a lighter punishment

translations.de: Sie war nur die Tochter eines Leiters, aber sie sagte dir, wo du leichter davonzukommen sollst.
translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'un chef d'orchestre, mais elle vous disait où recevoir une punition plus légère.
translations.ko: 그녀는 단지 지휘자의 딸일 뿐이었지만, 어디에서 더 가볍게 처벌받을 수 있는지 알려주었어요.

926.pun_sentence: Rental agents offer quarters for dollars.

meaning_1.description: a living space, particularly for several people dwelling together.

translations.de: Vermietungsagenten bieten Quartiere für Dollar an.
translations.fr: Les agents de location offrent des logements pour des dollars.
translations.ko: 임대 대리인들이 달러에 대해 쿼터를 제공합니다.

meaning_2.description: a coin denomination in the United States, worth 25 cents.

translations.de: Vermietungsagenten bieten Vierteldollar für Dollar an.
translations.fr: Les agents de location offrent des quartiers (pièces de 25 cents) pour des dollars.
translations.ko: 임대 대리인들이 달러에 대해 25센트 동전을 제공합니다.

927.pun_sentence: She was only a Electrician's daughter, and she made house calls to remove her customers' shorts.

meaning_1.description: Short Circuits in electrical terms.

translations.de: Sie war nur die Tochter eines Elektrikers und sie machte Hausbesuche, um ihre Kunden ' Kurzschlüsse zu beseitigen.
translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'un électricien, et elle effectuait des visites à domicile pour éliminer les courts-circuits de ses clients.
translations.ko: 그녀는 전기 기사의 딸이었을 뿐이며, 고객의 단락을 제거하기 위해 집방문 서비스를 하였습니다.

meaning_2.description: Shorts as in short trousers or undergarments.

translations.de: Sie war nur die Tochter eines Elektrikers und sie machte Hausbesuche, um ihre Kunden ' Shorts zu entfernen.
translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'un électricien, et elle effectuait des visites à domicile pour enlever les shorts de ses clients.
translations.ko: 그녀는 전기 기사의 딸이었을 뿐이며, 고객의 반바지를 제거하기 위해 집방문 서비스를 하였습니다.

928.pun_sentence: A musician went to hospital after playing too many accidentals.

meaning_1.description: symbols in sheet music that cause a note to change its pitch.

translations.de: Ein Musiker ging ins Krankenhaus, nachdem er zu viele Akzidentien gespielt hatte.
translations.fr: Un musicien est allé à l'hôpital après avoir joué trop d'accidentels.
translations.ko: 음악가가 너무 많은 변조기호를 연주한 후에 병원에 갔어요.

meaning_2.description: Events or incidents that happen unexpectedly or by chance.

translations.de: Ein Musiker ging ins Krankenhaus, nachdem er zu viele Unfälle erlebt hatte.
translations.fr: Un musicien est allé à l'hôpital après avoir subi trop d'accidents.
translations.ko: 음악가가 우연이 너무 많아서 병원에 갔어요.

929.pun_sentence: OLD PHILOSOPHERS never die, they just retire to their own premises.

meaning_1.description: A house or building, together with its ground and outbuildings, occupied by a business or considered in an official context.

translations.de: Alte Philosophen sterben nie, sie ziehen sich einfach in ihre eigenen Gebäude zurück.
translations.fr: Les vieux philosophes ne meurent jamais, ils se retirent simplement dans leurs propres locaux.
translations.ko: 고인된 철학자들은 절대로 죽지 않아요, 그들은 그냥 자신의 부지로 은퇴합니다.

meaning_2.description: Assumptions or assertions, that are the base for a theory or argument.

translations.de: Alte Philosophen sterben nie, sie ziehen sich einfach auf ihre eigenen Prämissen zurück.
translations.fr: Les vieux philosophes ne meurent jamais, ils se retirent simplement sur leurs propres prémisses.
translations.ko: 고인된 철학자들은 절대로 죽지 않아요, 그들은 그냥 자신의 전제로 은퇴합니다.

930.pun_sentence: I wanted to join my local rambling club, but the guy I spoke to on the phone just went on and on.

meaning_1.description: walking for pleasure, especially in the countryside.

translations.de: Ich wollte meinem örtlichen Wanderverein beitreten, aber der Kerl, mit dem ich am Telefon sprach, ging einfach immer weiter und weiter.
translations.fr: Je voulais rejoindre mon club local de randonnée, mais le gars à qui j'ai parlé au téléphone a juste continué à parler sans cesse.
translations.ko: 저는 지역 여행 클럽에 가입하고 싶었는데, 전화로 얘기한 그 사람은 계속 말만 늘어놓더군요.

meaning_2.description: lengthy and confused or inconsequential.

translations.de: Ich wollte meinem örtlichen Schwafelclub beitreten, aber der Kerl, mit dem ich am Telefon sprach, ging einfach immer weiter und weiter.
translations.fr: Je voulais rejoindre mon club local de bavardage, mais le gars à qui j'ai parlé au téléphone a juste continué à parler sans cesse.
translations.ko: 저는 지역 잡담 클럽에 가입하고 싶었는데, 전화로 얘기한 그 사람은 계속 말만 늘어놓더군요.

931.pun_sentence: She was only a Porchclimber's daughter, but you should see her stoop

meaning_1.description: To bend the head and shoulders, or the body generally, forward and downward.

translations.de: Sie war nur eine Tochter eines Verandakletters, aber du solltest sie sich bücken sehen.
translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'un grimpeur de porche, mais tu devrais la voir se pencher.
translations.ko: 그녀는 오직 베란다 등반가의 딸이었지만, 그녀가 몸을 앞으로 젖히는 것을 보아야 해.

meaning_2.description: A small porch or steps at the front entrance of a house.

translations.de: Sie war nur eine Tochter eines Verandakletters, aber du solltest ihre Veranda sehen.
translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'un grimpeur de porche, mais tu devrais voir son petit porche.
translations.ko: 그녀는 오직 베란다 등반가의 딸이었지만, 그녀의 집 앞 출입구 계단을 보아야 해.

932.pun_sentence: If you miss a class at beauty school you'll need a makeup session.

meaning_1.description: Cosmetics such as lipstick or powder applied to the face.

translations.de: Wenn du einen Kurs in der Schönheitsschule verpasst, benötigst du eine Schmink-Sitzung.
translations.fr: Si tu rates un cours à l'école de beauté, tu auras besoin d'une séance de maquillage.
translations.ko: 뷰티 스쿨의 수업을 놓쳤다면 메이크업 세션이 필요하겠죠.

meaning_2.description: An arrangement or composition, as of type or music.

translations.de: Wenn du einen Kurs in der Schönheitsschule verpasst, benötigst du eine Nachhol-Sitzung.
translations.fr: Si tu rates un cours à l'école de beauté, tu auras besoin d'une séance de rattrapage.
translations.ko: 뷰티 스쿨의 수업을 놓쳤다면 보충 수업이 필요하겠죠.

933.pun_sentence: The musician in jail was anxiously awaiting his next release.

meaning_1.description: To set free or let go.

translations.de: Der Musiker im Gefängnis wartete ängstlich auf seine nächste Freilassung.
translations.fr: Le musicien en prison attendait anxieusement sa prochaine libération.
translations.ko: 감옥에 있는 음악가는 다음 석방을 단정컨데 기다리고 있었다.

meaning_2.description: In music, releasing refers to distributing or making available a new song or album.

translations.de: Der Musiker im Gefängnis wartete ängstlich auf seine nächste Veröffentlichung.
translations.fr: Le musicien en prison attendait anxieusement sa prochaine sortie d'album.
translations.ko: 감옥에 있는 음악가는 다음 음반 발매를 단정컨데 기다리고 있었다.

934.pun_sentence: OLD HELICOPTER PILOTS never die, they just lose their choppers.

meaning_1.description: another term for helicopters.

translations.de: Alte Hubschrauberpiloten sterben nie, sie verlieren einfach ihre Hubschrauber.
translations.fr: Les vieux pilotes d'hélicoptère ne meurent jamais, ils perdent simplement leurs hélicoptères.
translations.ko: 노련한 헬리콥터 조종사들은 절대 죽지 않아요, 그들은 그저 그들의 헬리콥터를 잃을 뿐이에요.

meaning_2.description: slang term for teeth.

translations.de: Alte Hubschrauberpiloten sterben nie, sie verlieren einfach ihre Zähne (Choppers).
translations.fr: Les vieux pilotes d'hélicoptère ne meurent jamais, ils perdent simplement leurs dents (Choppers).
translations.ko: 노련한 헬리콥터 조종사들은 절대 죽지 않아요, 그들은 그저 그들의 이빨 (Choppers)을 잃을 뿐이에요.

935.pun_sentence: Dentists have the same old grind day after day.

meaning_1.description: the action of grinding teeth together.

translations.de: Zahnärzte haben jeden Tag die gleiche alte Mahlung.
translations.fr: Les dentistes ont la même vieille mouture jour après jour.
translations.ko: 치과 의사들은 매일 같은 구김을 가지고 있어요.

meaning_2.description: a hard dull task.

translations.de: Zahnärzte haben jeden Tag die gleiche alte mühsame Aufgabe.
translations.fr: Les dentistes ont la même vieille tâche ardue jour après jour.
translations.ko: 치과 의사들은 매일 같은 힘든 일을 가지고 있어요.

936.pun_sentence: Where there are many chickens you can find layers of eggs.

meaning_1.description: Things or substances spread one on top of another.

translations.de: Wo es viele Hühner gibt, können Sie Schichten von Eiern finden.
translations.fr: Là où il y a beaucoup de poules, on peut trouver des couches d'œufs.
translations.ko: 많은 닭이 있는 곳에서는 달걀의 층을 찾을 수 있습니다.

meaning_2.description: Chickens that lay eggs.

translations.de: Wo es viele Hühner gibt, können Sie Legehennen finden.
translations.fr: Là où il y a beaucoup de poules, on peut trouver des poules pondeuses.
translations.ko: 많은 닭이 있는 곳에서는 알을 낳는 닭을 찾을 수 있습니다.

937.pun_sentence: When Irish boys carry their little brothers, they get a Pat on the back.

meaning_1.description: Gentle touch or stroke.

translations.de: Wenn irische Jungen ihre kleinen Brüder tragen, bekommen sie einen Klaps auf den Rücken.
translations.fr: Quand les garçons irlandais portent leurs petits frères, ils reçoivent une tape dans le dos.
translations.ko: 아일랜드 소년들이 동생을 업을 때, 등을 쓰다듬어 줍니다.

meaning_2.description: A common Irish name, short for Patrick.

translations.de: Wenn irische Jungen ihre kleinen Brüder namens Pat tragen, bekommen sie einen auf den Rücken.
translations.fr: Quand les garçons irlandais portent leurs petits frères nommés Pat, ils l'obtiennent dans le dos.
translations.ko: 아일랜드 소년들이 팻이라는 이름의 동생을 업을 때, 등에 그들을 얻습니다.

938.pun_sentence: He bought a donkey because he thought he might get a kick out of it.

meaning_1.description: Physical jolt or impact caused by being struck by an object.

translations.de: Er kaufte einen Esel, weil er dachte, er könnte einen Tritt von ihm bekommen.
translations.fr: Il a acheté un âne parce qu'il pensait qu'il pourrait recevoir un coup de celui-ci.
translations.ko: 그는 그가 걔로부터 걷어차임을 받을 수도 있다고 생각해서 당나귀를 샀어.

meaning_2.description: Enthusiasm or thrill.

translations.de: Er kaufte einen Esel, weil er dachte, dass es ihn begeistern könnten.
translations.fr: Il a acheté un âne parce qu'il pensait qu'il pourrait y trouver son bonheur.
translations.ko: 그는 그가 그것에 흥미를 느낄 수 있을 것 같다고 생각해서 당나귀를 샀어.

939.pun_sentence: OLD CARDIOLOGISTS never die, they just lose heart.

meaning_1.description: The organ in our body which pumps blood.

translations.de: Alte Kardiologen sterben nie, sie verlieren nur ihr Herz.
translations.fr: Les vieux cardiologues ne meurent jamais, ils perdent juste leur cœur.
translations.ko: 늙은 심장병 전문의는 결코 죽지 않아, 그들은 그저 심장을 잃어버릴 뿐이야.

meaning_2.description: Courage or enthusiasm.

translations.de: Alte Kardiologen sterben nie, sie verlieren nur ihren Mut.
translations.fr: Les vieux cardiologues ne meurent jamais, ils perdent juste leur enthousiasme.
translations.ko: 늙은 심장병 전문의는 결코 죽지 않아, 그들은 그저 용기를 잃어버릴 뿐이야.

940.pun_sentence: Everyone's fuming over the high cost of gas.

meaning_1.description: To express anger or resentment, usually in a way that is noticeable

translations.de: Jeder ärgert sich über die hohen Benzinkosten.
translations.fr: Tout le monde est furieux à cause du coût élevé de l'essence.
translations.ko: 모두가 기름값의 높은 가격으로 화를 내고 있어요.

meaning_2.description: Emitting gas, smoke, or vapor.

translations.de: Jeder dampft wegen der hohen Benzinkosten.
translations.fr: Tout le monde dégage de la fumée à cause du coût élevé de l'essence.
translations.ko: 모두가 기름값의 높은 가격으로 연기를 내고 있어요.

941.pun_sentence: He auditioned for a part as a trumpet player but he blew it.

meaning_1.description: The action of producing sound by forcing air through a trumpet.

translations.de: Er hat für eine Rolle als Trompeter vorgesprochen, hat aber rein geblasen.
translations.fr: Il a passé une audition pour le rôle d'un trompettiste, mais il a soufflé dedans.
translations.ko: 그는 트럼펫 연주자 역할을 위해 오디션을 보았지만, 그는 거기에 바람을 불었다.

meaning_2.description: To fail at something.

translations.de: Er hat für eine Rolle als Trompeter vorgesprochen, hat es aber verbockt.
translations.fr: Il a passé une audition pour le rôle d'un trompettiste, mais il l'a raté.
translations.ko: 그는 트럼펫 연주자 역할을 위해 오디션을 보았지만, 그는 그것을 망쳤다.

942.pun_sentence: Burning too much incense in a rented room could make the owner incensed.

meaning_1.description: to make very angry.

translations.de: Zu viel Räucherstäbchen in einem gemieteten Zimmer zu verbrennen könnte den Besitzer sehr wütend machen.
translations.fr: Brûler trop d'encens dans une chambre louée pourrait rendre le propriétaire très en colère.
translations.ko: 세 빌린 방에서 향을 너무 많이 태우면 주인을 화나게 할 수 있다.

meaning_2.description: filled or perfumed with the aroma of incense.

translations.de: Zu viel Räucherstäbchen in einem gemieteten Zimmer zu verbrennen könnte den Raum mit dem Aroma von Räucherstäbchen füllen.
translations.fr: Brûler trop d'encens dans une chambre louée pourrait remplir la pièce du parfum de l'encens.
translations.ko: 세 빌린 방에서 향을 너무 많이 태우면 그 방은 향이 가득할 수 있다.

943.pun_sentence: Two silk worms had a race. They ended up in a tie.

meaning_1.description: connect or link

translations.de: Zwei Seidenraupen haben ein Rennen gemacht. Sie endeten verbunden.
translations.fr: Deux vers à soie ont fait une course. Ils ont fini par se lier.
translations.ko: 두 마리의 실크웜이 경주했어. 그들은 결합해서 끝났어.

meaning_2.description: a piece of neckwear

translations.de: Zwei Seidenraupen haben ein Rennen gemacht. Sie endeten in einer Krawatte.
translations.fr: Deux vers à soie ont fait une course. Ils ont fini par une cravate.
translations.ko: 두 마리의 실크웜이 경주했어. 그들은 넥타이로 끝났어.

944.pun_sentence: Horses eat best when they don't have a bit in their mouth.

meaning_1.description: A piece of metal held in horse's mouth by headstall and reins and used to control the horse.

translations.de: Pferde essen am besten, wenn sie kein Gebiss im Mund haben.
translations.fr: Les chevaux mangent le mieux quand ils n'ont pas de mors dans la bouche.
translations.ko: 말은 입에 굴레가 없을 때 가장 잘 먹습니다.

meaning_2.description: A small amount or degree.

translations.de: Pferde essen am besten, wenn sie nur ein bisschen im Mund haben.
translations.fr: Les chevaux mangent le mieux quand ils ont un petit peu dans la bouche.
translations.ko: 말은 입에 조금 있을 때 가장 잘 먹습니다.

945.pun_sentence: I've passed the exam this time, Tom remarked.

meaning_1.description: To say something as a form of expressing an opinion or statement.

translations.de: "Ich habe diesmal die Prüfung bestanden", bemerkte Tom.
translations.fr: "J'ai réussi l'examen cette fois-ci", a remarqué Tom.
translations.ko: "이번에 시험에 합격했어", 톰이 말했다.

meaning_2.description: To score a sheet again.

translations.de: "Ich habe diesmal die Prüfung bestanden", markierte Tom erneut.
translations.fr: "J'ai réussi l'examen cette fois-ci", a noté Tom à nouveau.
translations.ko: "이번에 시험에 합격했어", 톰이 다시 점수를 매겼다.

946.pun_sentence: When he forgot to itemize what he wanted at the grocery store he felt quite listless.

meaning_1.description: lacking energy or enthusiasm.

translations.de: Als er vergaß, was er im Lebensmittelgeschäft haben wollte, aufzulisten, fühlte er sich ziemlich lustlos.
translations.fr: Lorsqu'il a oublié de détailler ce qu'il voulait au supermarché, il s'est senti tout à fait sans énergie.
translations.ko: 그가 식료품점에서 원하는 것을 품목별로 나열하는 것을 잊어버렸을 때, 그는 상당히 기력이 없어 보였다.

meaning_2.description: without a list.

translations.de: Als er vergaß, was er im Lebensmittelgeschäft haben wollte, zu notieren, fühlte er sich ziemlich ohne Liste.
translations.fr: Lorsqu'il a oublié d'itemiser ce qu'il voulait à l'épicerie, il s'est senti tout à fait sans liste.
translations.ko: 그가 식료품점에서 원하는 것을 목록에 넣는 것을 잊어버렸을 때, 그는 목록이 없어 보였다.

meaning_1.description: excellent or great.

translations.de: Surfen ist ein ausgezeichneter Sport!
translations.fr: Le surf est un sport génial !
translations.ko: 서핑은 훌륭한 스포츠입니다!

meaning_2.description: series of waves in the sea.

translations.de: Surfen ist ein Wellensport!
translations.fr: Le surf est un sport de vagues !
translations.ko: 서핑은 파도 스포츠입니다!

948.pun_sentence: Some food for thought is only baloney

meaning_1.description: a type of sausage similar to Italian mortadella.

translations.de: Einige Denkanstöße sind nur Mortadella.
translations.fr: Certaines idées à méditer ne sont que de la mortadelle.
translations.ko: 생각할 만한 음식 중 일부는 단지 라구 소시지일 뿐입니다.

meaning_2.description: a term to refer to nonsense or foolishness.

translations.de: Einige Denkanstöße sind nur Unsinn.
translations.fr: Certaines idées à méditer ne sont que des bêtises.
translations.ko: 생각할 만한 음식 중 일부는 단지 헛소리일 뿐입니다.

949.pun_sentence: I wanted to do some research on anorexia, so I went to the library to get the skinny.

meaning_1.description: Thin or slender.

translations.de: Ich wollte eine Forschung über Anorexie machen, also ging ich zur Bibliothek, um den Dünnen zu bekommen.
translations.fr: Je voulais faire des recherches sur l'anorexie, alors je suis allé à la bibliothèque pour obtenir le mince.
translations.ko: 저는 거식증에 대한 연구를 하고 싶었기 때문에 도서관에 가서 말 그대로 ‘마른 사람’을 찾으러 갔어요.

meaning_2.description: Inside information or a detailed report.

translations.de: Ich wollte eine Forschung über Anorexie machen, also ging ich zur Bibliothek, um die Insider-Informationen zu bekommen.
translations.fr: Je voulais faire des recherches sur l'anorexie, alors je suis allé à la bibliothèque pour obtenir l'information détaillée.
translations.ko: 저는 거식증에 대한 연구를 하고 싶었기 때문에 도서관에 가서 상세 정보를 얻으러 갔어요.

950.pun_sentence: I'm taking this ship back into harbor, Tom reported.

meaning_1.description: to give a spoken or written account of something that one has observed, heard, done, or investigated.

translations.de: "Ich bringe dieses Schiff zurück in den Hafen", meldete Tom.
translations.fr: "Je ramène ce navire au port", a signalé Tom.
translations.ko: "나는 이 배를 항구로 돌려보내고 있어," 톰이 보고했다.

meaning_2.description: static noise or sound, typically a loud one, generated by a weapon like a cannon.

translations.de: "Ich bringe dieses Schiff zurück in den Hafen", berichtete Tom mit Kanonendonnern.
translations.fr: "Je ramène ce navire au port", a fait Tom avec un bruit de canon.
translations.ko: "나는 이 배를 항구로 돌려보내고 있어," 톰이 대포 소리를 내며 보고했다.

951.pun_sentence: Piano players know what bar they are in.

meaning_1.description: A unit of music including a certain number of beats in it.

translations.de: Pianisten wissen, in welcher Takt sie sind.
translations.fr: Les pianistes savent dans quelle mesure ils sont.
translations.ko: 피아노 연주자들은 어느 박자에 있다는 것을 압니다.

meaning_2.description: An establishment where alcohol is served.

translations.de: Pianisten wissen, in welcher Bar sie sind.
translations.fr: Les pianistes savent dans quel bar ils sont.
translations.ko: 피아노 연주자들은 어느 바에 있다는 것을 압니다.

952.pun_sentence: Two clock makers argued and got ticked off.

meaning_1.description: The sound made by a clock.

translations.de: Zwei Uhrmacher stritten sich und wurden abgetikt.
translations.fr: Deux horlogers se sont disputés et ont été déclic.
translations.ko: 두 개의 시계 제작자가 싸웠고, 틱 소리를 내었습니다.

meaning_2.description: Being annoyed or irritated.

translations.de: Zwei Uhrmacher stritten sich und wurden verärgert.
translations.fr: Deux horlogers se sont disputés et ont été agacés.
translations.ko: 두 개의 시계 제작자가 싸웠고, 화가 났습니다.

953.pun_sentence: Eve taught us it’s okay to take a little ribbing

meaning_1.description: The action of making fun of or teasing someone in a friendly or lighthearted way.

translations.de: Eva hat uns gelehrt, dass es okay ist, ein bisschen auf den Arm genommen zu werden.
translations.fr: Eve nous a appris qu'il était bien de subir un peu de taquineries.
translations.ko: 이브는 우리에게 약간의 농담을 받는 것이 괜찮다고 가르쳐 주었어요.

meaning_2.description: The creation or origin of something from a rib. This is in reference to the biblical story where Eve was created from Adam's rib.

translations.de: Eva hat uns gelehrt, dass es okay ist, ein bisschen Rippenbildung zu nehmen.
translations.fr: Eve nous a appris qu'il était bien de prendre une petite côte.
translations.ko: 이브는 우리에게 약간의 갈비뼈 생성을 받는 것이 괜찮다고 가르쳐 주었어요.

954.pun_sentence: Meet me at the clothes line. That's where I hang out!

meaning_1.description: To suspend or be suspended from above with the lower part not attached.

translations.de: Triff mich an der Wäscheleine. Da hänge ich immer rum!
translations.fr: Rejoins-moi à la corde à linge. C'est là que je passe du temps à suspendre!
translations.ko: 나를 빨래줄에서 만나. 그곳이 내가 걸치는 곳이야!

meaning_2.description: To chat, have fun, share experiences, and enjoy each other's company

translations.de: Triff mich an der Wäscheleine. Da treffe ich mich immer mit Freunden!
translations.fr: Rejoins-moi à la corde à linge. C'est l'endroit où je traîne!
translations.ko: 나를 빨래줄에서 만나. 그곳이 나의 모임 장소야!

955.pun_sentence: He would promise to play golf, but he didn't know how to follow through.

meaning_1.description: To continue an action or maintain a path, plan or procedure that has been begun.

translations.de: Er würde versprechen, Golf zu spielen, aber er wusste nicht, wie man es durchzieht.
translations.fr: Il promettait de jouer au golf, mais il ne savait pas comment aller jusqu'au bout.
translations.ko: 그는 골프를 치겠다고 약속했지만, 계획을 이어가는 방법을 몰랐어요.

meaning_2.description: the part of a swing that happens after the ball has been hit.

translations.de: Er würde versprechen, Golf zu spielen, aber er wusste nicht, wie man den Schwung vollendet.
translations.fr: Il promettait de jouer au golf, mais il ne savait pas comment faire le mouvement de suivi.
translations.ko: 그는 골프를 치겠다고 약속했지만, 스윙 후의 움직임을 하는 방법을 몰랐어요.

956.pun_sentence: A boiled egg in the morning is hard to beat.

meaning_1.description: To beat in the culinary sense refers to mixing food rapidly to make it smooth and light.

translations.de: Ein gekochtes Ei am Morgen lässt sich schwer schlagen.
translations.fr: Un œuf à la coque le matin est difficile à battre.
translations.ko: 아침에 삶은 달걀을 풀어 놓기가 어려워요.

meaning_2.description: to surpass or do better than.

translations.de: Ein gekochtes Ei am Morgen ist schwer zu überbieten.
translations.fr: Un œuf à la coque le matin est difficile à surpasser.
translations.ko: 아침에 삶은 달걀을 능가하는 것은 어렵습니다.

957.pun_sentence: Oil executives are always using crude language.

meaning_1.description: Simple and basic in nature, often negatively associated with being rude or lacking refinement.

translations.de: Öl-Manager benutzen immer eine grobe Sprache.
translations.fr: Les dirigeants pétroliers utilisent toujours un langage grossier.
translations.ko: 석유 임원들은 항상 거친 언어를 사용합니다.

meaning_2.description: In its raw or unprocessed state, often associated with petroleum products.

translations.de: Öl-Manager sprechen immer von Rohöl.
translations.fr: Les dirigeants pétroliers parlent toujours de brut.
translations.ko: 석유 임원들은 항상 원유에 관해 이야기합니다.

958.pun_sentence: OLD HOUSEWIVES never die, they just wash away.

meaning_1.description: to clean something using water and usually soap.

translations.de: ALTE HAUSFRAUEN sterben nie, sie waschen sich einfach weg.
translations.fr: LES VIEILLES MÉNAGÈRES ne meurent jamais, elles se lavent simplement.
translations.ko: 나이든 주부들은 결코 죽지 않아요, 그저 씻어가기만 해요.

meaning_2.description: to disappear or be carried away by the action of water.

translations.de: ALTE HAUSFRAUEN sterben nie, sie verschwinden einfach.
translations.fr: LES VIEILLES MÉNAGÈRES ne meurent jamais, elles disparaissent simplement.
translations.ko: 나이든 주부들은 결코 죽지 않아요, 그저 물에 휩쓸려 가기만 해요.

959.pun_sentence: Good police officers never miss a beat.

meaning_1.description: A police officer's regular route or area that they survey or patrol.

translations.de: Gute Polizisten verpassen nie ihren Einsatzbereich.
translations.fr: Les bons policiers ne ratent jamais leur secteur de patrouille.
translations.ko: 좋은 경찰은 자신의 순찰 구역을 놓치지 않아요.

meaning_2.description: main accent or rhythmic unit in music or poetry.

translations.de: Gute Polizisten verpassen nie einen Takt.
translations.fr: Les bons policiers ne ratent jamais un battement.
translations.ko: 좋은 경찰은 비트를 놓치지 않아요.

960.pun_sentence: To save money for the company he cut all the electricity. They were soon in the black.

meaning_1.description: absence of light.

translations.de: Um Geld für das Unternehmen zu sparen, schaltete er den gesamten Strom ab. Sie waren bald im Dunkeln.
translations.fr: Pour économiser de l'argent pour l'entreprise, il a coupé toute l'électricité. Ils étaient bientôt dans le noir.
translations.ko: 그는 회사를 위해 돈을 절약하기 위해 모든 전기를 끊었습니다. 그들은 곧 어둠 속에 있었어.

meaning_2.description: profit or positive financial status in business.

translations.de: Um Geld für das Unternehmen zu sparen, schaltete er den gesamten Strom ab. Sie waren bald in den schwarzen Zahlen.
translations.fr: Pour économiser de l'argent pour l'entreprise, il a coupé toute l'électricité. Ils étaient bientôt dans le positif.
translations.ko: 그는 회사를 위해 돈을 절약하기 위해 모든 전기를 끊었습니다. 그들은 곧 흑자였어.

961.pun_sentence: A sports match was attended by many scores.

meaning_1.description: A large number or amount of people.

translations.de: Ein Sportspiel wurde von vielen Leuten besucht.
translations.fr: Un match sportif a été assisté par beaucoup de monde.
translations.ko: 스포츠 경기에 많은 수의 사람들이 참석했습니다.

meaning_2.description: The result or record of points in a game or sport.

translations.de: Bei einem Sportspiel wurden viele Punktestände erreicht.
translations.fr: Un match sportif a eu beaucoup de scores.
translations.ko: 스포츠 경기에서 많은 점수가 기록되었습니다.

962.pun_sentence: I'll corroborate that again, Tom reproved.

meaning_1.description: reprimand or criticize someone.

translations.de: "Ich werde das nochmals bestätigen", tadelte Tom.
translations.fr: "Je vais corroborer cela encore une fois", Tom a réprimandé.
translations.ko: "나는 그것을 다시 확증 할 것이다", 톰이 나무랐다.

meaning_2.description: to prove something again.

translations.de: "Ich werde das nochmals beweisen", wiederholte Tom.
translations.fr: "Je vais prouver cela encore une fois", a réaffirmé Tom.
translations.ko: "나는 그것을 다시 증명할 것이다", 톰이 다시 말했다.

963.pun_sentence: When the air conditioning failed in the indoor stadium there was a fan protest.

meaning_1.description: A device with rotating blades that produces a current of air.

translations.de: Als die Klimaanlage im Indoor-Stadion ausfiel, gab es einen Ventilator-Protest.
translations.fr: Quand la climatisation a échoué dans le stade couvert, il y a eu une protestation de ventilateur.
translations.ko: 실내 스타디움의 에어컨이 고장났을 때, 선풍기 반대 시위가 있었습니다.

meaning_2.description: A person who has a strong interest or admiration for a particular sport, art form, or famous person.

translations.de: Als die Klimaanlage im Indoor-Stadion ausfiel, gab es einen Fan-Protest.
translations.fr: Quand la climatisation a échoué dans le stade couvert, il y a eu une protestation des fans.
translations.ko: 실내 스타디움의 에어컨이 고장났을 때, 팬들의 시위가 있었습니다.

964.pun_sentence: I tried to learn how to drive a stick shift but couldn't locate the manual.

meaning_1.description: Referring to a book of instructions.

translations.de: Ich habe versucht, das Fahren mit Schaltgetriebe zu lernen, konnte aber das Handbuch nicht finden.
translations.fr: J'ai essayé d'apprendre à conduire une voiture à boîte de vitesses, mais je n'ai pas pu trouver le manuel.
translations.ko: 나는 수동 변속기를 운전하는 법을 배우려고 했는데, 매뉴얼을 찾지 못했어요.

meaning_2.description: Involving or using human effort, skill, power or physical work.

translations.de: Ich habe versucht, das Fahren mit Schaltgetriebe zu lernen, konnte aber die manuelle Kontrolle nicht beherrschen.
translations.fr: J'ai essayé d'apprendre à conduire une voiture à boîte de vitesses, mais je n'ai pas pu maîtriser le mouvement manuel.
translations.ko: 나는 수동 변속기를 운전하는 법을 배우려고 했는데, 수동 조작을 찾아내지 못했어요.

965.pun_sentence: The duke and the count had a fight. The duke was down for the count.

meaning_1.description: a noble who holds a particular title, the equivalent in Britain to a earl.

translations.de: Der Herzog und der Graf hatten einen Kampf. Der Herzog war unter dem Grafen.
translations.fr: Le duc et le comte ont eu une dispute. Le duc était sous le comte.
translations.ko: 공작과 백작이 싸웠어. 공작은 백작에게 밀렸어.

meaning_2.description: the count in boxing, when a fallen boxer has up to ten seconds to get up unassisted.

translations.de: Der Herzog und der Graf hatten einen Kampf. Der Herzog war am Boden für den Zählvorgang.
translations.fr: Le duc et le comte ont eu une dispute. Le duc était à terre pour le compte.
translations.ko: 공작과 백작이 싸웠어. 공작은 10초 카운트 다운을 받았어.

966.pun_sentence: He sold candy and chocolate.A lot of girls were sweet on him.

meaning_1.description: Having the pleasant taste characteristic of sugar or honey.

translations.de: Er verkaufte Süßigkeiten und Schokolade. Viele Mädchen fanden ihn süß.
translations.fr: Il vendait des bonbons et du chocolat. Beaucoup de filles le trouvaient doux.
translations.ko: 그는 사탕과 초콜릿을 팔았어. 많은 소녀들이 그를 달콤하게 생각했어.

meaning_2.description: Used to describe someone who is very kind, caring, and gentle.

translations.de: Er verkaufte Süßigkeiten und Schokolade. Viele Mädchen fanden ihn nett.
translations.fr: Il vendait des bonbons et du chocolat. Beaucoup de filles le trouvaient gentil.
translations.ko: 그는 사탕과 초콜릿을 팔았어. 많은 소녀들이 그를 친절하게 생각했어.

967.pun_sentence: A speaker at the firearms convention had to rifle through his notes.

meaning_1.description: To search hurriedly or quickly through something.

translations.de: Ein Sprecher auf der Waffenkonvention musste hastig seine Notizen durchgehen.
translations.fr: Un orateur à la convention sur les armes à feu a dû fouiller rapidement dans ses notes.
translations.ko: 총기 컨벤션에서 발표자가 그의 노트를 서둘러 찾아 봐야 했어요.

meaning_2.description: A type of gun, typically of the kind held against one's shoulder when fired.

translations.de: Ein Sprecher auf der Waffenkonvention musste durch seine Notizen mit seinem Gewehr gehen.
translations.fr: Un orateur à la convention sur les armes à feu a dû passer avec son fusil à travers ses notes.
translations.ko: 총기 컨벤션에서 발표자가 그의 노트를 소총으로 훑어 봐야 했어요.

968.pun_sentence: Where do pancakes live? In a flat.

meaning_1.description: smooth and even; without marked lumps or indentations.

translations.de: Wo leben Pfannkuchen? In einer ebenen Fläche.
translations.fr: Où vivent les crêpes ? Dans un plat.
translations.ko: 팬케이크는 어디에 살아요? 평평한 곳에.

meaning_2.description: The British term for an apartment.

translations.de: Wo wohnen Pfannkuchen? In einer Wohnung.
translations.fr: Où habitent les crêpes ? Dans un appartement.
translations.ko: 팬케이크는 어디에 살아요? 아파트에.

969.pun_sentence: She was only a Janitor's daughter, and she was often swept off her feet.

meaning_1.description: The action of cleaning or clearing a space by brushing away dirt.

translations.de: Sie war nur die Tochter eines Hausmeisters und wurde oft weggefegt.
translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'un concierge et elle était souvent balayée.
translations.ko: 그녀는 단지 관리인의 딸이었고, 자주 쓸려갔어.

meaning_2.description: Being overcome with strong emotions, typically referring to love or infatuation.

translations.de: Sie war nur die Tochter eines Hausmeisters und wurde oft hinweggerissen.
translations.fr: Elle n'était que la fille d'un concierge et elle se laissait souvent emporter.
translations.ko: 그녀는 단지 관리인의 딸이었고, 자주 감정에 휩쓸렸어.

meaning_1.description: the act of attacking someone and stealing their money.

translations.de: Jemandem den Kaffee zu stehlen wird "Überfallen" genannt.
translations.fr: Voler le café de quelqu'un s'appelle 'agression'.
translations.ko: 누군가의 커피를 훔치는 것을 '강도질'이라고 합니다.

meaning_2.description: drinking (or taking away) a drink from a mug.

translations.de: Jemandem den Kaffee zu stehlen wird als "Aus einer Tasse trinken" bezeichnet.
translations.fr: Voler le café de quelqu'un s'appelle 'boire dans une tasse'.
translations.ko: 누군가의 커피를 훔치는 것을 '머그잔에서 마시기'라고 합니다.

971.pun_sentence: A doctor drank while putting on patients'casts. He was soon plastered.

meaning_1.description: Being extremely drunk.

translations.de: Ein Arzt trank während er Patienten eingipste. Er war bald total betrunken.
translations.fr: Un médecin buvait en posant des plâtres aux patients. Il était vite saoul.
translations.ko: 의사가 환자의 깁스를 붙이면서 술을 마셨어. 그는 곧 취해서 헤매었어.

meaning_2.description: To cover, coat, or smear with plaster.

translations.de: Ein Arzt trank während er Patienten eingipste. Er war bald komplett eingegipst.
translations.fr: Un médecin buvait en posant des plâtres aux patients. Il était vite plâtré.
translations.ko: 의사가 환자의 깁스를 붙이면서 술을 마셨어. 그는 곧 전신이 깁스로 덮였어.

972.pun_sentence: I gave in when my wife hounded me about getting a puppy.

meaning_1.description: Persistent or nagging as in constantly bothering or urging someone.

translations.de: Ich gab nach, als meine Frau mich ständig wegen einem Welpen bedrängte.
translations.fr: J'ai cédé quand ma femme m'a harcelé pour avoir un chiot.
translations.ko: 나의 아내가 강아지를 얻자고 계속 졸라 대자 나는 그만 두었어.

meaning_2.description: Chased or pursued by a hound, a breed of dog.

translations.de: Ich gab nach, als mich meine Frau, wie ein Jagdhund, dazu getrieben hat, einen Welpen zu holen.
translations.fr: J'ai cédé quand ma femme a poursuivi l'idée d'avoir un chiot comme un chien de chasse.
translations.ko: 나의 아내가 헌드 개처럼 강아지를 얻기를 계속 쫓아 나는 그만 두었어.

973.pun_sentence: Those who make sinks often feel washed out.

meaning_1.description: cleaned or rinsed with water.

translations.de: Diejenigen, die Spülbecken herstellen, fühlen sich oft ausgewaschen.
translations.fr: Ceux qui fabriquent des éviers se sentent souvent lavés.
translations.ko: 싱크대를 만드는 사람들은 종종 헹군 것 같이 느껴져요.

meaning_2.description: emotionally drained or exhausted.

translations.de: Diejenigen, die Spülbecken herstellen, fühlen sich oft ausgelaugt.
translations.fr: Ceux qui fabriquent des éviers se sentent souvent épuisés.
translations.ko: 싱크대를 만드는 사람들은 종종 탈진감을 느끼곤 해요.

974.pun_sentence: I didn't know which hammer to get, but I think I nailed it.

meaning_1.description: To hammer a nail into something.

translations.de: Ich wusste nicht, welchen Hammer ich nehmen sollte, aber ich denke, dass ich es genagelt habe.
translations.fr: Je ne savais pas quel marteau choisir, mais je pense que je l'ai bien cloué.
translations.ko: 나는 어떤 망치를 선택해야 할지 몰랐지만, 제대로 못을 박은 거 같아.

meaning_2.description: To succeed in achieving or winning something.

translations.de: Ich wusste nicht, welchen Hammer ich nehmen sollte, aber ich denke, ich habe es geschafft.
translations.fr: Je ne savais pas quel marteau choisir, mais je pense que je l’ai réussi.
translations.ko: 나는 어떤 망치를 선택해야 할지 몰랐지만, 잘 해낸 거 같아.

975.pun_sentence: A music store owner has to have sound business practices.

meaning_1.description: noise that is produced or that can be heard.

translations.de: Ein Musikladenbesitzer muss solide Geschäftspraktiken haben.
translations.fr: Un propriétaire de magasin de musique doit avoir des pratiques commerciales solides.
translations.ko: 음악 상점 주인은 사업을 견고하게 운영해야 하지요.

meaning_2.description: Based on good judgement or reasoning; in a stable or secure state.

translations.de: Ein Musikladenbesitzer muss klangvolle Geschäftspraktiken haben.
translations.fr: Un propriétaire de magasin de musique doit avoir des pratiques commerciales sonores.
translations.ko: 음악 상점 주인은 사운드가 어울리는 사업 방식을 가져야 하지요.

976.pun_sentence: The first guy to mass produce candies made a mint.

meaning_1.description: a type of candy flavor, often associated with freshness.

translations.de: Der erste Kerl, der Bonbons in Masse produzierte, machte eine Minze.
translations.fr: Le premier gars à produire des bonbons en masse a fait de la menthe.
translations.ko: 사탕을 대량 생산한 첫 번째 남자는 민트를 창출했습니다.

meaning_2.description: a place where money is coined, often used to describe a large amount of money.

translations.de: Der erste Kerl, der Bonbons in Masse produzierte, machte einen Haufen Geld.
translations.fr: Le premier gars à produire des bonbons en masse a fait fortune.
translations.ko: 사탕을 대량 생산한 첫 번째 남자는 거금을 벌었습니다.

977.pun_sentence: Did you hear about the tire dealer that had a blowout sale?

meaning_1.description: A large or lavish party or celebration.

translations.de: Hast du von dem Reifenhändler gehört, der einen rauschenden Ausverkauf hatte?
translations.fr: As-tu entendu parler du vendeur de pneus qui a fait une grande vente?
translations.ko: 타이어 딜러가 Sale party를 열었다는 소문 들었어요?

meaning_2.description: A sudden puncture in a vehicle's tire causing it to deflate quickly.

translations.de: Hast du von dem Reifenhändler gehört, der einen plötzlichen Reifenplatzer im Verkauf hatte?
translations.fr: As-tu entendu parler du vendeur de pneus qui a eu un pneu qui a éclaté à la vente?
translations.ko: 타이어 딜러가 판매 중에 타이어가 펑크 나서 고객이 구입했다는 소문을 들었어요?

978.pun_sentence: "I won't buy a circuit breaker," Tom refused.

meaning_1.description: Declined or chose not to accept.

translations.de: "'Ich werde keinen Leistungsschalter kaufen,' lehnte Tom ab."
translations.fr: "'Je n'achèterai pas de disjoncteur,' Tom a refusé."
translations.ko: "'나는 브레이커를 사지 않을 거야,' 톰이 거절했다."

meaning_2.description: a fuse, which is a safety device used in an electrical circuit.

translations.de: "'Ich werde keine Sicherung kaufen,' sagte Tom."
translations.fr: "'Je n'achèterai pas de fusible,' Tom a refusé."
translations.ko: "'나는 퓨즈를 사지 않을 거야,' 톰이 거절했다."

979.pun_sentence: This is where I keep my arrows, said Tom, quivering.

meaning_1.description: shaking or trembling slightly.

translations.de: "Hier habe ich meine Pfeile, sagte Tom, und zitterte dabei."
translations.fr: "C'est là que je garde mes flèches," a dit Tom, tremblant.
translations.ko: "나의 화살들이 담긴 곳이야,"라며 션 했다, 떨면서.

meaning_2.description: a case or sheath for keeping arrows.

translations.de: "Das ist der Köcher, in dem ich meine Pfeile aufbewahre", sagte Tom.
translations.fr: "C'est là que je garde mes flèches," a dit Tom, montrant son carquois.
translations.ko: "나의 화살들이 담긴 곳이야,"라며 톰이 말했다, 화살통을 가리키며.

980.pun_sentence: Sure I can climb cliffs! Tom bluffed.

meaning_1.description: Lying or misleading about one's abilities or intentions.

translations.de: Sicher kann ich Klippen erklimmen! Tom hat geblufft.
translations.fr: Bien sûr, je peux grimper des falaises ! Tom a bluffé.
translations.ko: 당연히 나도 절벽을 오를 수 있어! 톰이 뻥을 쳤어.

meaning_2.description: Refers to a type of terrain; a high, steep bank or cliff.

translations.de: Sicher kann ich Klippen erklimmen! Tom meinte den Bluff.
translations.fr: Bien sûr, je peux grimper des falaises ! Tom parlait du bluff.
translations.ko: 당연히 나도 절벽을 오를 수 있어! 톰은 절벽을 의미했어.

981.pun_sentence: People in medieval days were always hanging out by the gallows.

meaning_1.description: To chat, have fun, share experiences, and enjoy each other's company

translations.de: Im Mittelalter hingen die Leute immer in der Nähe des Galgens herum.
translations.fr: Au Moyen Âge, les gens traînaient toujours près de la potence.
translations.ko: 중세 시대의 사람들은 항상 교수대 근처에서 시간을 보냈어요.

meaning_2.description: the execution of a criminal by suspending them by the neck from a gallows, typically as a method of capital punishment.

translations.de: Im Mittelalter wurden die Leute immer am Galgen aufgehängt.
translations.fr: Au Moyen Âge, les gens étaient toujours pendus à la potence.
translations.ko: 중세 시대의 사람들은 항상 교수대에서 매달려 죽었어요.

982.pun_sentence: Bowling Alley : Please be quiet.We need to hear a pin drop.

meaning_1.description: A small sharp piece of metal.

translations.de: Bowlingbahn Bitte seien Sie ruhig. Wir müssen einen Pin fallen hören.
translations.fr: Bowling Veuillez être silencieux. Nous avons besoin d'entendre une quille tomber.
translations.ko: 볼링장 조용히 해 주세요. 핀이 떨어지는 소리를 들어야 합니다.

meaning_2.description: A bowling pin, which is a target in the game of bowling.

translations.de: Bowlingbahn Bitte seien Sie ruhig. Wir müssen eine Nadel fallen hören.
translations.fr: Bowling Veuillez être silencieux. Nous avons besoin d'entendre une épingle tomber.
translations.ko: 볼링장 조용히 해 주세요. 핀처럼 예리한 것이 떨어지는 소리를 들어야 합니다.

983.pun_sentence: The forecaster was away because he was under the weather.

meaning_1.description: The state of atmospheric phenomenon including rain, snow, and sun.

translations.de: Der Wettervorhersager war abwesend, weil er unter dem Wetter war.
translations.fr: Le prévisionniste était absent parce qu'il était sous le temps.
translations.ko: 일기 예보사는 날씨에 걸려서 없었어요

meaning_2.description: feeling of being ill or unwell.

translations.de: Der Wettervorhersager war weg, weil er krank war.
translations.fr: Le prévisionniste était absent parce qu'il était malade.
translations.ko: 일기 예보사는 몸이 안 좋아서 없었어요.

984.pun_sentence: He put bug spray on his watch to get rid of the ticks.

meaning_1.description: The sound a watch or clock makes.

translations.de: Er hat Insektenspray auf seine Uhr gesprüht, um den Ticks loszuwerden.
translations.fr: Il a pulvérisé de l'insecticide sur sa montre pour se débarrasser des tics.
translations.ko: 그는 시계에 벌레 살충제를 뿌려서 '딸깍딸깍' 소리를 없애려고 했다.

meaning_2.description: Small arachnids in the order Parasitiformes, commonly known as pests.

translations.de: Er hat Insektenspray auf seine Uhr gesprüht, um die Zecken loszuwerden.
translations.fr: Il a pulvérisé de l'insecticide sur sa montre pour se débarrasser des tiques.
translations.ko: 그는 시계에 벌레 살충제를 뿌려서 진드기를 없애려고 했다.

985.pun_sentence: OLD GUNS never die they just get loaded.

meaning_1.description: to put bullets into it.

translations.de: ALTE WAFFEN sterben nie, sie werden nur geladen.
translations.fr: LES VIEUX PISTOLETS ne meurent jamais, ils sont juste chargés.
translations.ko: 오래된 총들은 절대 죽지 않아, 그냥 장전되는 거야.

meaning_2.description: someone who is very wealthy.

translations.de: ALTE WAFFEN sterben nie, sie werden nur reich.
translations.fr: LES VIEUX PISTOLETS ne meurent jamais, ils deviennent juste riches.
translations.ko: 오래된 총들은 절대 죽지 않아, 그냥 부자가 되는 거야.

986.pun_sentence: Marconi was not wired up about going.

meaning_1.description: to be very excited or energetic.

translations.de: Marconi war nicht begeistert davonzugehen.
translations.fr: Marconi n'était pas excité à l'idée de partir.
translations.ko: 마르코니는 떠나는 것에 대해 흥분하지 않았다.

meaning_2.description: connected electronically to a network or power source, usually using cables and wires.

translations.de: Marconi war nicht angeschlossen, um zu gehen.
translations.fr: Marconi n'était pas connecté pour partir.
translations.ko: 마르코니는 가기 위해 연결되지 않았다.

987.pun_sentence: Those who choose not to eat, slowly get hungry - and Fast.

meaning_1.description: Rapidly or quick in speed.

translations.de: Diejenigen, die sich entscheiden, nicht zu essen, werden langsam hungrig - und schnell.
translations.fr: Ceux qui choisissent de ne pas manger ont lentement faim - et rapidement.
translations.ko: 먹지 않기를 선택하는 사람은 천천히 배고파진다 - 그리고 빠르게.

meaning_2.description: To abstain from all or some kinds of food or drink, especially as a religious observance.

translations.de: Diejenigen, die sich entscheiden, nicht zu essen, werden langsam hungrig - und fasten.
translations.fr: Ceux qui choisissent de ne pas manger ont lentement faim - et jeûnent.
translations.ko: 먹지 않기를 선택하는 사람은 천천히 배고파진다 - 그리고 단식한다.

988.pun_sentence: You often hear of a good wine through the grapevine.

meaning_1.description: A vine on which grapes grow.

translations.de: Man hört oft von einem guten Wein durch die Weinrebe.
translations.fr: On entend souvent parler d'un bon vin à travers la vigne.
translations.ko: 좋은 와인은 종종 포도나무를 통해서 들어요.

meaning_2.description: Rumor or undisclosed information that gets passed around informally.

translations.de: Man hört oft von einem guten Wein durch die Gerüchteküche.
translations.fr: On entend souvent parler d'un bon vin à travers le téléphone arabe.
translations.ko: 좋은 와인은 종종 소문을 통해서 들어요.

989.pun_sentence: He was selling palm trees, but people thought it was a shady deal.

meaning_1.description: Photophobia or being in the shadow or beneath the shadow of trees.

translations.de: Er verkaufte Palmen, aber die Leute dachten, es handle sich um einen schattigen Handel.
translations.fr: Il vendait des palmiers, mais les gens pensaient que c'était une affaire ombragée.
translations.ko: 그는 야자수를 팔고 있었지만, 사람들은 그것이 그늘이 짙은 거래라고 생각했어요.

meaning_2.description: Suspicious or not fully truthful or legal activities.

translations.de: Er verkaufte Palmen, aber die Leute dachten, es handle sich um einen fragwürdigen Handel.
translations.fr: Il vendait des palmiers, mais les gens pensaient que c'était une affaire louche.
translations.ko: 그는 야자수를 팔고 있었지만, 사람들은 그것이 수상한 거래라고 생각했어요.

990.pun_sentence: When the human cannonball was late for work he got fired.

meaning_1.description: Terminated from a job.

translations.de: Als der menschliche Kanonenkugel zu spät zur Arbeit kam, wurde er entlassen.
translations.fr: Quand le cannonier humain est arrivé en retard au travail, il a été licencié.
translations.ko: 인간 대포 공이 일에 늦어서 그는 해고당했다.

meaning_2.description: Launched from a cannon or gun.

translations.de: Als der menschliche Kanonenkugel zu spät zur Arbeit kam, wurde er abgeschossen.
translations.fr: Quand le cannonier humain est arrivé en retard au travail, il a été lancé.
translations.ko: 인간 대포 공이 일에 늦어서 그는 대포로 발사되었다.

991.pun_sentence: My name is Carol. I sing during the holidays.

meaning_1.description: A first name for a person.

translations.de: Mein Name ist Carol. Ich singe während der Feiertage.
translations.fr: Je m'appelle Carol. Je chante pendant les vacances.
translations.ko: 제 이름은 캐롤입니다. 저는 휴일 동안 노래합니다.

meaning_2.description: A song or hymn sung during the Christmas season.

translations.de: Ich bin ein Weihnachtslied. Ich singe während der Feiertage.
translations.fr: Je suis un chant de Noël. Je chante pendant les vacances.
translations.ko: 저는 크리스마스 캐롤입니다. 저는 휴일 동안 노래합니다.

992.pun_sentence: Archimedes was buoyant at the thought.

meaning_1.description: Positive and cheerful, upbeat.

translations.de: Archimedes war von dem Gedanken begeistert.
translations.fr: Archimède était optimiste à cette pensée.
translations.ko: 아르키메데스는 그 생각에 희망차였다.

meaning_2.description: Able to float or rise in liquid or gas.

translations.de: Archimedes war wegen der Vorstellung aufschwimmend.
translations.fr: Archimède était flottant à cette pensée.
translations.ko: 아르키메데스는 그 생각에 떠올랐다.

993.pun_sentence: Two airline pilots in a stand - up comedy did a takeoff.

meaning_1.description: Rise into the air (for an airplane).

translations.de: Zwei Flugzeugpiloten machten in einer Stand-Up-Comedy einen Start.
translations.fr: Deux pilotes de ligne ont fait un décollage dans un spectacle d'humour debout.
translations.ko: 두 항공사 조종사가 스탠드업 코미디에서 이륙했어요.

meaning_2.description: A parody or humorous imitation of someone or something.

translations.de: Zwei Flugzeugpiloten präsentierten in einer Stand-Up-Comedy eine Parodie.
translations.fr: Deux pilotes de ligne ont fait une parodie dans un spectacle d'humour debout.
translations.ko: 두 항공사 조종사가 스탠드업 코미디에서 패러디를 했어요.

994.pun_sentence: Gardeners like to spring into action.

meaning_1.description: to jump or move quickly and directly.

translations.de: Gärtner springen gerne direkt in die Arbeit.
translations.fr: Les jardiniers aiment sauter rapidement dans l'action.
translations.ko: 원예사들은 바로 행동에 넘어가는 것을 좋아해요.

meaning_2.description: the season after winter and before summer, in which vegetation begins to appear.

translations.de: Gärtner mögen es, im Frühling aktiv zu werden.
translations.fr: Les jardiniers aiment passer à l'action au printemps.
translations.ko: 원예사들은 봄에 활동을 시작하는 것을 좋아해요.

995.pun_sentence: Patients usually feel better after receiving hand transplants.

meaning_1.description: to experience an emotion or sensation.

translations.de: Patienten fühlen sich normalerweise besser, nachdem sie Handtransplantationen erhalten haben.
translations.fr: Les patients se sentent généralement mieux après avoir reçu une transplantation de main.
translations.ko: 환자들은 손 이식 수술을 받은 후 보통 기분이 좋아져요.

meaning_2.description: to touch or explore something using your hand.

translations.de: Patienten können normalerweise besser fühlen, nachdem sie Handtransplantationen erhalten haben.
translations.fr: Les patients peuvent généralement mieux sentir après avoir reçu une transplantation de main.
translations.ko: 환자들은 손 이식 수술을 받은 후 보통 손으로 더 잘 느껴져요.

996.pun_sentence: If you have to pay to go to the river, we'd better stop at the bank.

meaning_1.description: the land alongside or sloping down to a river or lake.

translations.de: Wenn wir für den Flusszugang bezahlen müssen, sollten wir besser am Ufer anhalten.
translations.fr: Si nous devons payer pour aller à la rivière, nous ferions mieux de nous arrêter à la berge.
translations.ko: 강가에 가려면 돈을 내야 한다면, 우리는 강변에서 멈추는 게 나을 거예요.

meaning_2.description: a financial institution that accepts deposits from the public and creates credit.

translations.de: Wenn wir für den Flusszugang bezahlen müssen, sollten wir besser bei der Bank anhalten.
translations.fr: Si nous devons payer pour aller à la rivière, nous ferions mieux de nous arrêter à la banque.
translations.ko: 강가에 가려면 돈을 내야 한다면, 우리는 은행에서 멈추는 게 나을 거예요.

997.pun_sentence: Humpty Dumpty had a great fall - and a pretty good spring and summer, too.

meaning_1.description: To suddenly drop down or collapse.

translations.de: Humpty Dumpty hatte einen großen Sturz - und auch einen ziemlich guten Frühling und Sommer.
translations.fr: Humpty Dumpty a fait une grande chute – et un assez bon printemps et été, aussi.
translations.ko: 험프티 덤프티는 큰 추락을 했어 - 그리고 꽤 괜찮은 봄과 여름도 있었어.

meaning_2.description: the season between summer and winter.

translations.de: Humpty Dumpty hatte einen tollen Herbst - und auch einen ziemlich guten Frühling und Sommer.
translations.fr: Humpty Dumpty a eu un bel automne – et aussi un assez bon printemps et été.
translations.ko: 험프티 덤프티는 멋진 가을을 보냈어 - 그리고 꽤 괜찮은 봄과 여름도 있었어.

998.pun_sentence: The place that made rubber balls almost went bankrupt, but they bounced back.

meaning_1.description: Referring to the movement of a ball, it indicates the action of coming back after hitting a hard surface.

translations.de: Der Ort, der Gummibälle herstellte, wäre fast bankrott gegangen, aber sie prallten zurück.
translations.fr: L'endroit qui fabriquait des balles en caoutchouc a failli faire faillite, mais elles ont rebondi.
translations.ko: 고무 공을 만든 곳이 거의 파산했지만, 다시 튀어올랐어요.

meaning_2.description: to recover from a difficult situation, like a downturn or a setback.

translations.de: Der Ort, der Gummibälle herstellte, wäre fast bankrott gegangen, aber sie erholten sich.
translations.fr: L'endroit qui fabriquait des balles en caoutchouc a failli faire faillite, mais ils se sont rétablis.
translations.ko: 고무 공을 만든 곳이 거의 파산했으나, 다시 회복하였어요.

999.pun_sentence: Weather forecasters have to have lots of degrees.

meaning_1.description: A unit of measurement of angles or temperature.

translations.de: Wettervorhersager müssen viele Grade haben.
translations.fr: Les prévisionnistes météo doivent avoir beaucoup de degrés.
translations.ko: 날씨 예보사들은 많은 도수를 가져야 합니다.

meaning_2.description: Academic titles or qualifications received from a college or university.

translations.de: Wettervorhersager müssen viele akademische Grade haben.
translations.fr: Les prévisionnistes météo doivent avoir beaucoup de diplômes.
translations.ko: 날씨 예보사들은 많은 학위를 가져야 합니다.
